atk-abh03a:16_0: 1. Saṅgaho asaṅgahotiādīnañhi vasena idaṃ pakaraṇaṃ cuddasavidhena vibhattanti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:16_1: Taṃ sabbampi uddesaniddesato dvidhā ṭhitaṃ. Tattha mātikā uddeso. Sā pañcavidhā –
atk-abh03a:16_2: nayamātikā, abbhantaramātikā, nayamukhamātikā, lakkhaṇamātikā, bāhiramātikāti. Tattha
atk-abh03a:16_3: saṅgaho asaṅgaho…pe… vippayuttena saṅgahitaṃ asaṅgahitanti – ayaṃ cuddasahi padehi
atk-abh03a:16_4: nikkhittā nayamātikā nāma. Ayañhi iminā saṅgahādikena nayena dhātukathā dhammā vibhattāti
atk-abh03a:16_5: dassetuṃ ṭhapitattā nayamātikāti vuccati. Etesaṃ padānaṃ mūlabhūtattā mūlamātikātipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-abh03a:18_0: 2. Pañcakkhandhā …pe… manasikāroti ayaṃ pañcavīsādhikena padasatena nikkhittā abbhantaramātikā
atk-abh03a:18_1: nāma. Ayañhi “sabbāpi dhammasaṅgaṇī dhātukathāya mātikā”ti evaṃ avatvā saṅgahādinā
atk-abh03a:18_2: nayena vibhajitabbe khandhādidhamme sarūpato dassetvā dhātukathāya abbhantareyeva
atk-abh03a:18_3: ṭhapitattā abbhantaramātikāti vuccati. Khandhādipadānaṃ dhammasaṅgaṇīmātikāya asaṅgahitattā
atk-abh03a:20_0: 3. Tīhi saṅgaho, tīhi asaṅgaho; catūhi sampayogo, catūhi vippayogoti ayaṃ catūhi
atk-abh03a:20_1: padehi nikkhittā nayamukhamātikā nāma. Ayañhi sabbesupi pañcakkhandhādīsu ceva kusalattikādīsu
atk-abh03a:20_2: ca mātikādhammesu, tīhi khandhāyatanadhātupadeheva saṅgaho ca asaṅgaho ca yojetabbo.
atk-abh03a:20_3: Tathā catūhi arūpakkhandhehi sampayogo ca vippayogo ca. Etāni imesaṃ saṅgahāsaṅgahādīnaṃ
atk-abh03a:20_4: nayānaṃ mukhānīti dassetuṃ ṭhapitattā nayamukhamātikāti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:22_0: 4. Sabhāgo, visabhāgoti ayaṃ dvīhi padehi nikkhittā lakkhaṇamātikā nāma. Ayañhi sabhāgalakkhaṇehi
atk-abh03a:22_1: dhammehi saṅgahanayo, visabhāgalakkhaṇehi asaṅgahanayo, tathā sampayogavippayoganayo
atk-abh03a:24_0: 5. Sabbāpi dhammasaṅgaṇī dhātukathāya mātikāti ayaṃ chasaṭṭhi tikapadāni, dve ca
atk-abh03a:24_1: dukapadasatāni saṅkhipitvā nikkhittā bāhiramātikā nāma. Ayañhi “pañcakkhandhā…pe…
atk-abh03a:24_2: manasikāro”ti evaṃ dhātukathāya abbhantare avatvā “sabbāpi dhammasaṅgaṇī”ti evaṃ
atk-abh03a:24_3: dhātukathāya mātikato bahi ṭhapitattā bāhiramātikāti vuccati.
atk-abh03a:25_0: Evaṃ mātikāya pañcadhā ṭhitabhāvaṃ viditvā idāni ‘saṅgaho asaṅgaho’tiādīsu saṅgaho
atk-abh03a:25_1: tāva jātisañjātikiriyāgaṇanavasena catubbidho. Tattha – “sabbe khattiyā āgacchantu,
atk-abh03a:25_2: sabbe brāhmaṇā, sabbe vessā, sabbe suddā āgacchantu”, “yā cāvuso visākha, sammāvācā,
atk-abh03a:25_3: yo ca sammākammanto, yo ca sammāājīvo, ime dhammā sīlakkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti ayaṃ
atk-abh03a:25_4: jātisaṅgaho nāma. “Ekajātikā āgacchantū”ti vuttaṭṭhāne viya hi idha sabbepi jātiyā
atk-abh03a:25_5: ekasaṅgahaṃ gatā. “Sabbe kosalakā āgacchantu, sabbe māgadhakā, sabbe bhārukacchakā
atk-abh03a:25_6: āgacchantu”, “yo cāvuso visākha, sammāvāyāmo; yā ca sammāsati, yo ca sammāsamādhi,
atk-abh03a:25_7: ime dhammā samādhikkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti ayaṃ sañjātisaṅgaho nāma. “Ekaṭṭhāne jātā
atk-abh03a:25_8: saṃvaḍḍhā āgacchantū”ti vuttaṭṭhāne viya hi idha sabbepi sañjātiṭhānena nivutthokāsena
atk-abh03a:25_9: ekasaṅgahaṃ gatā. “Sabbe hatthārohā āgacchantu, sabbe assārohā, sabbe rathikā āgacchantu”,
atk-abh03a:25_10: “yā cāvuso visākha, sammādiṭṭhi, yo ca sammāsaṅkappo, ime dhammā paññākkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti
atk-abh03a:25_11: ayaṃ kiriyāsaṅgaho nāma. Sabbeva hete attano kiriyākaraṇena ekasaṅgahaṃ gatā. “Cakkhāyatanaṃ
atk-abh03a:25_12: katamakkhandhagaṇanaṃ gacchatīti? Rūpakkhandhagaṇanaṃ gacchatī”ti. Hañci cakkhāyatanaṃ
atk-abh03a:25_13: rūpakkhandhagaṇanaṃ gacchati, tena vata re vattabbe – ‘cakkhāyatanaṃ rūpakkhandhena
atk-abh03a:25_14: saṅgahita”nti, ayaṃ gaṇanasaṅgaho nāma. Ayamidha adhippeto. Tappaṭipakkhena asaṅgaho
atk-abh03a:25_16: sampayogo, tappaṭipakkhato vippayogo. Tesaṃ vikappato sampayuttena vippayuttādīni.
atk-abh03a:25_18: pana khandhavibhaṅgādīsu vuttanayeneva veditabbāni. Phassādayo panettha sanniṭṭhānavasena
atk-abh03a:30_1: saddhiṃ yojetvā dassetuṃ rūpakkhandho katihi khandhehītiādinā nayena niddesavāro
atk-abh03a:30_2: āraddho. Tattha yasmā “saṅgaho asaṅgahotiādikāya nayamātikāya “tīhi saṅgaho, tīhi
atk-abh03a:30_3: asaṅgaho”ti nayamukhamātikā ṭhapitā, tasmā rūpakkhandhādīnaṃ saṅgahaṃ dassetuṃ katihi
atk-abh03a:30_4: khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhīti tīṇi khandhāyatanadhātupadāneva uddhaṭāni.
atk-abh03a:30_5: ‘Cattāri saccānī’tiādīsu ekampi na parāmaṭṭhaṃ. Yasmā ca “sabhāgo visabhāgo”ti evaṃ
atk-abh03a:30_6: lakkhaṇamātikā ṭhapitā, tasmā imassa pañhassa vissajjane rūpakkhandho ekena khandhenātiādi
atk-abh03a:30_7: vuttaṃ. Sabhāgā hi tassa ete khandhādayoti. Tattha ekena khandhenāti rūpakkhandheneva.
atk-abh03a:30_8: Yañhi kiñci rūpaṃ rūpakkhandhasabhāgattā rūpakkhandhotveva saṅgahaṃ gacchatīti rūpakkhandheneva
atk-abh03a:30_9: gaṇitaṃ, taṃ rūpakkhandheneva paricchinnaṃ. Ekādasahāyatanehīti manāyatanavajjehi.
atk-abh03a:30_10: Sabbopi hi rūpakkhandho dasāyatanāni dhammāyatanekadeso ca hoti, tasmā ekādasahāyatanehi
atk-abh03a:30_11: gaṇito, paricchinno. Ekādasahi dhātūhīti sattaviññāṇadhātuvajjāhi ekādasahi etāsu
atk-abh03a:31_0: Asaṅgahanayaniddese katihi asaṅgahitoti saṅkhepeneva pucchā katā. Vissajjane panassa
atk-abh03a:31_1: yasmā rūpakkhandhassa visabhāgā cattāro arūpakkhandhā, ekaṃ manāyatanaṃ, satta viññāṇadhātuyo;
atk-abh03a:31_2: tasmā catūhi khandhehītiādi vuttaṃ. Iminā nayena sabbapadesu saṅgahāsaṅgaho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:31_3: Imasmiṃ pana khandhaniddese – “rūpakkhandho katihi khandhehī”tiādimhi tāva ekamūlake
atk-abh03a:31_4: saṅgahanaye sarūpeneva dassitā pañca pucchā, pañca vissajjanāni. Asaṅgahanaye saṅkhepena
atk-abh03a:31_5: dassitā pañca pucchā, pañca vissajjanāni. Iminā upāyena dukamūlakādīsupi pucchāvissajjanāni
atk-abh03a:31_6: veditabbāni. Rūpakkhandhamūlakāyeva cettha dukatikacatukkā dassitā. Pañcake pana
atk-abh03a:31_7: “rūpakkhandho ca…pe… viññāṇakkhandho cā”ti evaṃ bhedato ca, “pañcakkhandhā katihi
atk-abh03a:31_8: khandhehī”ti evaṃ abhedato cāti dvidhā pucchāvissajjanāni katāni. Evaṃ pāḷinayo veditabboti.
atk-abh03a:33_0: 22. Āyatanapadaniddesādīsu āyatanapadaniddese tāva cakkhāyatanaṃ ekena khandhenāti
atk-abh03a:33_1: ekena rūpakkhandheneva, ekena cakkhāyataneneva ekāya cakkhudhātuyāva saṅgahitanti
atk-abh03a:33_2: veditabbaṃ. Sotāyatanādīsupi imināva nayena saṅgahāsaṅgaho veditabbo. Asaṅkhataṃ
atk-abh03a:33_3: khandhato ṭhapetvāti ettha pana yasmā asaṅkhataṃ dhammāyatanaṃ nāma nibbānaṃ, tañca
atk-abh03a:33_4: khandhasaṅgahaṃ na gacchati; tasmā ‘khandhato ṭhapetvā’ti vuttaṃ. Catūhi khandhehīti
atk-abh03a:33_6: Viññāṇakkhandhena pana ṭhapetvā dhammāyatanadhammadhātuyo sesāyatanadhātūhi ca taṃ
atk-abh03a:33_7: na saṅgayhati. Tena vuttaṃ – “ekena khandhena, ekādasahāyatanehi, sattarasahi dhātūhi
atk-abh03a:33_8: asaṅgahita”nti. Yathā ca te heṭṭhā rūpakkhandhamūlakā, evamidhāpi cakkhāyatanamūlakāva
atk-abh03a:33_9: nayā veditabbā. Dukamattameva pana pāḷiyaṃ dassetvā “dvādasāyatanānī”ti abhedatova
atk-abh03a:34: 40. Saccaniddese – sabbepi dukatikacatukkā pāḷiyaṃ dassitā. Yasmā ca dukatikesu samudayasaccasadisameva maggasaccepi vissajjanaṃ, tasmā taṃ samudayānantaraṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:35_0: 50. Indriyaniddese – jīvitindriyaṃ dvīhi khandhehīti rūpajīvitindriyaṃ rūpakkhandhena,
atk-abh03a:35_1: arūpajīvitindriyaṃ saṅkhārakkhandhena saṅgahitaṃ. Sesaṃ vuttanayānusāreneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:37_0: 61. Paṭiccasamuppādaniddese – “avijjā katihi khandhehī”ti pucchaṃ anārabhitvā avijjā
atk-abh03a:37_1: ekena khandhenāti evaṃ vissajjanameva dassitaṃ. Tattha saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇanti
atk-abh03a:37_2: paṭisandhiyaṃ pavatte ca sabbampi vipākaviññāṇaṃ. Tenevāha – “sattahi dhātūhi saṅgahita”nti.
atk-abh03a:37_3: Nāmarūpampi paṭisandhipavattivaseneva veditabbaṃ. Tenevettha saddāyatanampi saṅgahetvā
atk-abh03a:37_4: ekādasahāyatanehi saṅgaho dassito. Phassādīsu khandhabhedo veditabbo. Aññeneva hi
atk-abh03a:37_5: ekena khandhena phasso saṅgahito, aññena vedanā, taṇhāupādānakammabhavā pana saṅkhārakkhandheneva
atk-abh03a:37_6: saṅgahitā. Bhavapadañcettha kammabhavādīnaṃ vasena ekādasadhā vibhattaṃ. Tattha kammabhavo
atk-abh03a:37_7: phassādīhi sadisavisajjanattā tehi saddhiṃ ekato dassito. Upapattibhavakāmabhavasaññābhavapañcavokārabhavā
atk-abh03a:37_8: aññamaññasadisavissajjanattā ekato dassitā. Yasmā cete upādinnakadhammāva tasmā “ekādasahāyatanehi
atk-abh03a:37_9: sattarasahi dhātūhī”ti vuttaṃ. Saddāyatanañhi anupādinnaṃ, taṃ ettha na gahitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:38_2: Arūpabhavādayopi tayo sadisavissajjanattāva ekato dassitā. Tathā asaññābhavaekavokārabhavā.
atk-abh03a:38_3: Tattha dvīhāyatanehīti rūpāyatanadhammāyatanehi. Dhātūsupi eseva nayo. Ekatalavāsikānañhi
atk-abh03a:38_4: sesabrahmānaṃ cakkhusabbhāvato tassārammaṇattā tattha rūpāyatanaṃ uddhaṭaṃ.
atk-abh03a:39_0: 71. Jāti dvīhi khandhehīti rūpajāti rūpakkhandhena, arūpajāti saṅkhārakkhandhena.
atk-abh03a:39_1: Jarāmaraṇesupi eseva nayo. Sokādīsupi ekena khandhenāti sokadukkhadomanassāni vedanākkhandhena,
atk-abh03a:39_2: paridevo rūpakkhandhena, upāyāsādayo saṅkhārakkhandhenāti evaṃ khandhaviseso veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:40_1: ca. Jhānaṃ dvīhīti vedanākkhandhasaṅkhārakkhandhehi. Appamaññādayo sadisavissajjanattā
atk-abh03a:40_2: ekato niddiṭṭhā. Cittaṃ pana cetanānantaraṃ nikkhittampi asadisavissajjanattā pacchā
atk-abh03a:40_3: gahitaṃ. Tattha appamaññādīsu ekena khandhenāti vedanā vedanākkhandhena, saññā saññākkhandhena,
atk-abh03a:40_4: sesā saṅkhārakkhandhena saṅgahitāti evaṃ khandhaviseso veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:42_0: 77. Evaṃ abbhantaramātikāya saṅgahaṃ dassetvā idāni bāhiramātikāya saṅgahaṃ dassetuṃ
atk-abh03a:42_1: kusalā dhammātiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha vedanāttike tīhi dhātūhīti kāyaviññāṇamanoviññāṇadhammadhātūhi.
atk-abh03a:42_3: ca. Vipākattike aṭṭhahi dhātūhīti kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā saddhiṃ tāhiyeva. Vipākadhammadhammā
atk-abh03a:42_4: pana saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikehi saddhiṃ sadisavissajjanattā ekato gahitā. Yathā cete,
atk-abh03a:42_5: evaṃ sabbatikadukapadesu yaṃ yaṃ padaṃ yena yena padena saddhiṃ sadisavissajjanaṃ
atk-abh03a:42_6: hoti, taṃ taṃ uppaṭipāṭiyāpi tena tena saddhiṃ gahetvā vissajjitaṃ. Tattha vuttānusāreneva
atk-abh03a:45_0: 171. Idāni saṅgahitena asaṅgahitapadaṃ bhājetuṃ cakkhāyatanenātiādi āraddhaṃ. Tatridaṃ
atk-abh03a:45_1: lakkhaṇaṃ – imasmiñhi vāre yaṃ khandhapadena saṅgahitaṃ hutvā āyatanadhātupadehi
atk-abh03a:45_2: asaṅgahitaṃ, khandhāyatanapadehi vā saṅgahitaṃ hutvā dhātupadena asaṅgahitaṃ, tassa
atk-abh03a:45_3: khandhādīhi asaṅgahaṃ pucchitvā vissajjanaṃ kataṃ. Taṃ pana rūpakkhandhādīsu na yujjati.
atk-abh03a:45_4: Rūpakkhandhena hi rūpakkhandhova saṅgahito. So ca aḍḍhekādasahi āyatanadhātūhi asaṅgahito
atk-abh03a:45_5: nāma natthi. Vedanākkhandhena ca vedanākkhandhova saṅgahito. Sopi dhammāyatanadhammadhātūhi
atk-abh03a:45_6: asaṅgahito nāma natthi. Evaṃ asaṅgahitatāya abhāvato etāni aññāni ca evarūpāni manāyatanadhammāyatanādīni
atk-abh03a:45_7: padāni imasmiṃ vāre na gahitāni. Yāni pana padāni rūpekadesaṃ arūpena asammissaṃ,
atk-abh03a:45_8: viññāṇekadesañca aññena asammissaṃ dīpenti, tāni idha gahitāni. Pariyosāne ca –
atk-abh03a:50_0: Evaṃ uddānagāthāya dassitāneva. Tasmā tesaṃ vaseneva saṅgahāsaṅgaho veditabbo. Pañhavasena
atk-abh03a:50_1: hi imasmiṃ vāre āyatanadhātuvaseneva sadisavissajjane vīsati dhamme samodhānetvā
atk-abh03a:50_2: eko pañho kato, satta viññāṇadhātuyo samodhānetvā eko, sattindriyāni samodhānetvā
atk-abh03a:50_3: eko, dve bhave samodhānetvā eko, paridevena ca sanidassanasappaṭighehi ca eko, anidassanasappaṭighehi
atk-abh03a:50_4: eko, sanidassanehi eko, sappaṭighehi ca upādādhammehi ca ekoti aṭṭha pañhā katā.
atk-abh03a:50_5: Tesu khandhādivibhāgo evaṃ veditabbo seyyathidaṃ – paṭhamapañhe tāva catūhi khandhehīti
atk-abh03a:50_6: arūpakkhandhehi, dvīhāyatanehīti cakkhāyatanādīsu ekekena saddhiṃ manāyatanena, aṭṭhahi
atk-abh03a:50_7: dhātūhīti cakkhudhātuādīsu ekekāya saddhiṃ sattahi viññāṇadhātūhi.
atk-abh03a:51_0: Tatrāyaṃ nayo – cakkhāyatanena hi khandhasaṅgahena rūpakkhandho saṅgahito. Tasmiṃ
atk-abh03a:51_1: saṅgahite rūpakkhandhe āyatanasaṅgahena cakkhāyatanamevekaṃ saṅgahitaṃ. Sesāni dasa
atk-abh03a:51_2: āyatanāni asaṅgahitāni. Dhātusaṅgahenapi tena cakkhudhātuyevekā saṅgahitā. Sesā dasa
atk-abh03a:51_3: dhātuyo asaṅgahitā. Iti yāni tena asaṅgahitāni dasāyatanāni, tāni cakkhāyatanamanāyatanehi
atk-abh03a:51_4: dvīhi asaṅgahitāni. Yāpi tena asaṅgahitā dasa dhātuyo, tā cakkhudhātuyā ceva sattahi
atk-abh03a:51_5: ca viññāṇadhātūhi asaṅgahitāti. Rūpāyatanādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a:52_0: 172. Dutiyapañhe – yasmā yāya kāyaci viññāṇadhātuyā saṅgahito viññāṇakkhandho manāyatanena
atk-abh03a:52_1: asaṅgahito nāma natthi, tasmā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitāti vuttaṃ. Ettha pana catūhi
atk-abh03a:52_2: khandhehīti rūpādīhi catūhi. Ekādasahāyatanehīti manāyatanavajjehi. Dvādasahi dhātūhīti
atk-abh03a:52_3: yathānurūpā cha viññāṇadhātuyo apanetvā sesāhi dvādasahi. Cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā hi
atk-abh03a:52_4: cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyeva saṅgahitā, itarā asaṅgahitā. Sotaviññāṇadhātuādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a:53_1: pana dhammāyatanena saddhiṃ dve āyatanāni, dhammadhātuyā ca saddhiṃ aṭṭha dhātuyo veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:54_0: 174. Catutthapañhe – tīhāyatanehīti rūpāyatanadhammāyatanamanāyatanehi. Tesu hi bhavesu
atk-abh03a:54_1: rūpāyatanadhammāyatanavasena dveva āyatanāni tehi saṅgahitāni. Sesāni nava rūpāyatanāni
atk-abh03a:54_2: teheva ca dvīhi, manāyatanena cāti tīhi asaṅgahitāni nāma honti. Navahi dhātūhīti
atk-abh03a:55_1: Dutiyapadaṃ sandhāya rūpāyatanamanāyatanehi. Dhātuyopi tesaṃyeva ekekena saddhiṃ
atk-abh03a:56_1: rūpadhātudhammadhātuvajjeheva. Kathaṃ? Anidassanasappaṭighā hi dhammā nāma nava oḷārikāyatanāni.
atk-abh03a:56_2: Tehi khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahite rūpakkhandhe, āyatanasaṅgahena tāneva navāyatanāni
atk-abh03a:56_3: saṅgahitāni. Rūpāyatanadhammāyatanāni asaṅgahitāni. Dhātusaṅgahenapi tā eva nava
atk-abh03a:56_4: dhātuyo saṅgahitā. Rūpadhātudhammadhātuyo asaṅgahitā. Iti yāni tehi asaṅgahitāni
atk-abh03a:56_5: dve āyatanāni, tāni rūpāyatanavajjehi navahi oḷārikāyatanehi, manāyatanena cāti dasahi
atk-abh03a:56_6: asaṅgahitāni. Yāpi tehi asaṅgahitā dve dhātuyo, tā rūpadhātuvajjāhi navahi oḷārikadhātūhi,
atk-abh03a:56_7: sattahi ca viññāṇadhātūhīti soḷasahi asaṅgahitāti veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:57: 177. Sattamapañhe – dvīhāyatanehīti rūpāyatanamanāyatanehi. Aṭṭhahi dhātūhīti rūpadhātuyā saddhiṃ sattahi viññāṇadhātūhi.
atk-abh03a:58_1: upādādhamme sandhāya phoṭṭhabbāyatanavajjehi. Dhātūsupi eseva nayo. Atthayojanā panettha
atk-abh03a:61_0: 179. Idāni asaṅgahitenasaṅgahitapadaṃ bhājetuṃ vedanākkhandhenātiādi āraddhaṃ. Tatridaṃ
atk-abh03a:61_1: lakkhaṇaṃ – imasmiñhi vāre yaṃ khandhapadena asaṅgahitaṃ hutvā āyatanadhātupadehi
atk-abh03a:61_2: saṅgahitaṃ, tassa khandhādīhi saṅgahaṃ pucchitvā vissajjanaṃ kataṃ. Taṃ pana rūpakkhandhaviññāṇakkhandhacakkhāyatanādīsu
atk-abh03a:61_3: na yujjati. Rūpakkhandhena hi cattāro khandhā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā. Tesu tena
atk-abh03a:61_4: ekadhammopi āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahito nāma natthi. Nanu ca vedanādayo dhammāyatanena
atk-abh03a:61_5: saṅgahitāti? Saṅgahitā. Na pana rūpakkhandhova dhammāyatanaṃ, rūpakkhandhato hi sukhumarūpamattaṃ
atk-abh03a:61_6: dhammāyatanaṃ bhajati. Tasmā ye dhammāyatanena saṅgahitā, na te rūpakkhandhena saṅgahitā
atk-abh03a:61_7: nāma. Viññāṇakkhandhenapi itare cattāro khandhā asaṅgahitā. Tesu tena ekopi āyatanadhātusaṅgahena
atk-abh03a:61_8: saṅgahito nāma natthi. Evaṃ saṅgahitatāya abhāvato etāni aññāni ca evarūpāni cakkhāyatanādīni
atk-abh03a:61_9: padāni imasmiṃ vāre na gahitāni. Yāni pana padāni viññāṇena vā oḷārikarūpena vā asammissaṃ
atk-abh03a:61_10: dhammāyatanekadesaṃ dīpenti, tāni idha gahitāni. Tesaṃ idamuddānaṃ –
atk-abh03a:62: “Tayo khandhā tathā saccā, indriyāni ca soḷasa;
atk-abh03a:66_0: Etesu pana padesu sadisavissajjanāni padāni ekato katvā sabbepi dvādasa pañhā vuttā.
atk-abh03a:66_1: Tesu evaṃ khandhavibhāgo veditabbo. Āyatanadhātūsu pana bhedo natthi. Tattha paṭhamapañhe
atk-abh03a:66_2: tāva – tīhi khandhehīti rūpasaññāsaṅkhārakkhandhehi. Āyatanadhātuyo pana dhammāyatanadhammadhātuvasena veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:67_0: Tatrāyaṃ nayo – vedanākkhandhena hi nibbānañca sukhumarūpasaññāsaṅkhārā ca khandhasaṅgahena
atk-abh03a:67_1: asaṅgahitā hutvā āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā. Tesu nibbānaṃ khandhasaṅgahaṃ na
atk-abh03a:67_2: gacchati, sesā rūpasaññāsaṅkhārakkhandhehi saṅgahaṃ gacchanti. Āyatanadhātusaṅgahaṃ
atk-abh03a:67_3: pana nibbānampi gacchateva. Tena vuttaṃ – “asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā tīhi khandhehi,
atk-abh03a:67_4: ekenāyatanena, ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā”ti. Saññākkhandhapakkhe panettha saññaṃ apanetvā
atk-abh03a:67_5: vedanāya saddhiṃ tayo khandhā saṅkhārādīsu saṅkhārakkhandhaṃ apanetvā rūpavedanāsaññāvasena
atk-abh03a:68: 180. Dutiye – catūhi khandhehīti viññāṇavajjehi. Te hi nirodhena khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā hutvā āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a:69_0: 181. Tatiye – dvīhīti vedanāsaññākkhandhehi. Rūpārūpajīvitindriyena hi vedanāsaññāviññāṇakkhandhā
atk-abh03a:69_1: ca khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā. Tesu pana vedanāsaññāva āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a:69_2: Tena vuttaṃ – “vedanāsaññākkhandhehī”ti. Iminā upāyena sabbattha khandhabhedo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:71_0: 183. Pañcame – jātijarāmaraṇesu jīvitindriyasadisova. Jhānena pana nibbānaṃ sukhumarūpaṃ
atk-abh03a:71_1: saññā ca khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā hutvā āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā. Tasmā
atk-abh03a:71_2: taṃ sandhāya rūpakkhandhasaññākkhandhānaṃ vasena dve khandhā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:72_0: 184. Chaṭṭhe – sokādittaye vedanāya sadiso. Upāyāsādīsu saṅkhārasadiso. Puna vedanāya
atk-abh03a:72_2: vinicchayo. Iminā upāyena sattamapañhādīsupi saṅgahāsaṅgaho veditabboti.
atk-abh03a:75_0: 191. Idāni saṅgahitenasaṅgahitapadaṃ bhājetuṃ samudayasaccenātiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha
atk-abh03a:75_1: yaṃ khandhādīhi saṅgahitena khandhādivasena saṅgahitaṃ, puna tasseva khandhādīhi
atk-abh03a:75_2: saṅgahaṃ pucchitvā vissajjanaṃ kataṃ. Taṃ khandhāyatanadhātūsu ekampi sakalakoṭṭhāsaṃ
atk-abh03a:75_3: gahetvā ṭhitapadesu na yujjati. Sakalena hi khandhādipadena aññaṃ khandhādivasena
atk-abh03a:75_4: saṅgahitaṃ nāma natthi, yaṃ attano saṅgāhakaṃ saṅgaṇhitvā puna teneva saṅgahaṃ gaccheyya.
atk-abh03a:75_5: Tasmā tathārūpāni padāni imasmiṃ vāre na gahitāni. Yāni pana padāni saṅkhārekadesaṃ
atk-abh03a:75_6: vā aññena asammissaṃ dīpenti – vedanekadesaṃ vā sukhumarūpaṃ vā saddekadesaṃ vā,
atk-abh03a:78_0: Pañhā panettha dveyeva honti. Tattha yaṃ pucchāya uddhaṭaṃ padaṃ, tadeva yehi dhammehi
atk-abh03a:78_1: khandhādivasena saṅgahitaṃ, te dhamme sandhāya sabbattha ekena khandhenātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:78_2: Tatrāyaṃ nayo – samudayasaccena hi taṇhāvajjā sesā saṅkhārā khandhādisaṅgahena saṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a:78_3: Puna tehi taṇhāva saṅgahitā. Sā taṇhā puna saṅkhāreheva khandhādisaṅgahena saṅgahitāti.
atk-abh03a:78_4: Eseva nayo sabbattha. Arūpadhammapucchāsu panettha saṅkhārakkhandho vā vedanākkhandho
atk-abh03a:78_5: vā eko khandho nāma. Rūpadhammapucchāsu rūpakkhandho. Paridevapucchāya saddāyatanaṃ
atk-abh03a:78_6: ekaṃ āyatanaṃ nāma. Saddadhātu ekā dhātu nāma, sesaṭṭhānesu dhammāyatanadhammadhātuvaseneva attho veditabboti.
atk-abh03a:81_0: 193. Idāni asaṅgahitena asaṅgahitapadaṃ bhājetuṃ rūpakkhandhenātiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha
atk-abh03a:81_1: yaṃ khandhādīhi asaṅgahitena khandhādivasena asaṅgahitaṃ, puna tasseva khandhādīhi
atk-abh03a:81_2: asaṅgahaṃ pucchitvā vissajjanaṃ kataṃ. Taṃ pañcakkhandhaggāhakesu dukkhasaccādīsu
atk-abh03a:81_3: viññāṇena saddhiṃ sukhumarūpaggāhakesu anidassanaappaṭighādīsu ca padesu na yujjati.
atk-abh03a:81_4: Tādisena hi padena nibbānaṃ khandhasaṅgahamattaṃ na gaccheyya. Sesā khandhādīhi asaṅgahitadhammā
atk-abh03a:81_5: nāma natthi. Tasmā tathārūpāni padāni imasmiṃ vāre na gahitāni. Yāni pana pañcakkhandhe
atk-abh03a:81_6: viññāṇañca sukhumarūpena saddhiṃ ekato na dīpenti, tāni idha gahitāni. Tesaṃ idamuddānaṃ –
atk-abh03a:85: Gocchake sattati dve ca, satta cūḷantare padā.
atk-abh03a:87: Aṭṭhāraseva ñātabbā, sesā idha na bhāsitā”ti.
atk-abh03a:88_0: Pañhā panettha sadisavissajjanānaṃ vasena samodhānetvā katihi saddhiṃ sabbepi catuttiṃsa
atk-abh03a:88_1: honti. Tattha yaṃ pucchāya uddhaṭaṃ padaṃ, tadeva yehi khandhādīhi asaṅgahitaṃ, te
atk-abh03a:89_0: Tatrāyaṃ nayo – rūpakkhandhena hi cattāro khandhā nibbānañca khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a:89_1: Āyatanadhātusaṅgahena pana ṭhapetvā viññāṇaṃ avasesā saṅgahitāti viññāṇameva tīhipi
atk-abh03a:89_2: khandhasaṅgahādīhi asaṅgahitaṃ nāma. Puna tena viññāṇena saddhiṃ nibbānena cattāro
atk-abh03a:89_3: khandhā khandhādisaṅgahena asaṅgahitā. Te sabbepi puna viññāṇeneva khandhādisaṅgahena
atk-abh03a:89_4: asaṅgahitāti ekena khandhena, ekenāyatanena, sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā nāma honti.
atk-abh03a:89_5: Atha vā – yadetaṃ rūpakkhandhena viññāṇameva tīhi khandhādisaṅgahehi asaṅgahitaṃ,
atk-abh03a:89_6: tehipi viññāṇadhammehi te rūpadhammāva tīhi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitā. Puna te rūpadhammā
atk-abh03a:89_7: viññāṇeneva tīhi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitā. Viññāṇañca khandhato eko viññāṇakkhandho hoti,
atk-abh03a:89_8: āyatanato ekaṃ manāyatanaṃ, dhātuto satta viññāṇadhātuyo. Tasmā “ekena khandhenā”tiādi
atk-abh03a:89_9: vuttaṃ. Iminā upāyena sabbattha yaṃ pucchāya uddhaṭaṃ padaṃ, tadeva yehi dhammehi
atk-abh03a:89_10: khandhādivasena asaṅgahitaṃ, tesaṃ dhammānaṃ vasena khandhādayo veditabbā. Tattha
atk-abh03a:89_11: dutiyapañhe tāva – rūpaviññāṇānaṃ vasena veditabbā. Vedanādayo hi rūpaviññāṇeheva
atk-abh03a:89_12: khandhādisaṅgahena asaṅgahitā. Te ca dve khandhā ekādasāyatanāni sattarasa dhātuyo honti.
atk-abh03a:90: 195. Tatiyapañhe – viññāṇaṃ rūpādīhi catūhi asaṅgahitanti tesaṃ vasena khandhādayo veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:91_0: 196. Catutthapañhe – cakkhāyatanaṃ vedanādīhi catūhīti iminā nayena sabbattha khandhādayo
atk-abh03a:91_1: veditabbā. Pariyosāne – rūpañca dhammāyatananti uddānagāthāya dassitadhammāyeva aññenākārena
atk-abh03a:94_0: 228. Idāni sampayogavippayogapadaṃ bhājetuṃ rūpakkhandhotiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha yaṃ
atk-abh03a:94_1: labbhati yañca na labbhati taṃ sabbaṃ pucchāya gahitaṃ. Vissajjane pana yaṃ na labbhati,
atk-abh03a:94_2: taṃ natthīti paṭikkhittaṃ. Catūhi sampayogo, catūhi vippayogo; sabhāgo visabhāgoti
atk-abh03a:94_3: hi vacanato catūhi arūpakkhandheheva sabhāgānaṃ ekasantānasmiṃ ekakkhaṇe uppannānaṃ
atk-abh03a:94_4: arūpakkhandhānaṃyeva aññamaññaṃ sampayogo labbhati. Rūpadhammānaṃ pana rūpena nibbānena
atk-abh03a:94_5: vā, nibbānassa ca rūpena saddhiṃ sampayogo nāma natthi. Tathā rūpanibbānānaṃ arūpakkhandhehi,
atk-abh03a:94_6: visabhāgā hi te tesaṃ. Yathā ca arūpakkhandhānaṃ rūpanibbānehi, evaṃ bhinnasantānehi
atk-abh03a:94_7: nānākkhaṇikehi arūpadhammehipi saddhiṃ natthiyeva. Tepi hi tesaṃ santānakkhaṇavisabhāgatāya
atk-abh03a:94_8: visabhāgāyeva. Ayaṃ pana visabhāgatā saṅgahaṭṭhena virujjhanato saṅgahanaye natthi.
atk-abh03a:94_9: Gaṇanūpagamattañhi saṅgahaṭṭho. Sampayoganaye pana atthi, ekuppādatādilakkhaṇañhi
atk-abh03a:94_10: sampayogaṭṭhoti. Evamettha yassa ekadhammenapi sampayogalakkhaṇaṃ na yujjhati, tassa
atk-abh03a:94_11: pucchāya saṅgahaṃ katvāpi natthīti paṭikkhepo kato. Yassa vippayogalakkhaṇaṃ yujjati,
atk-abh03a:94_12: tassa vippayogo dassito. Yāni pana padāni sattasu viññāṇadhātūsu ekāyapi avippayutte
atk-abh03a:94_13: rūpena nibbānena vā missakadhamme dīpenti, tāni sabbathāpi idha na yujjantīti na
atk-abh03a:98: Gocchakesu ca paññāsa, aṭṭha cūḷantare padā.
atk-abh03a:100: Tevīsa padasataṃ etaṃ, sampayoge na labbhatī”ti.
atk-abh03a:101_0: Dhammāyatanañhi rūpanibbānamissakattā tasmiṃ apariyāpannena viññāṇenapi na sakkā
atk-abh03a:101_1: sampayuttanti vattuṃ. Yasmā panettha vedanādayo viññāṇena sampayuttā, tasmā vippayuttantipi
atk-abh03a:101_2: na sakkā vattuṃ. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Evaṃ sabbatthāpi etāni na yujjantīti idha na
atk-abh03a:101_3: gahitāni. Sesāni khandhādīni yujjantīti tāni gahetvā ekekavasena ca samodhānena ca
atk-abh03a:101_4: pañhavissajjanaṃ kataṃ. Tesu pañhesu, paṭhame – ekenāyatanenāti manāyatanena. Kehicīti
atk-abh03a:102_0: 229. Dutiye – tīhīti pucchitaṃ pucchitaṃ ṭhapetvā sesehi. Kehici sampayuttoti vedanākkhandho
atk-abh03a:102_1: saññāsaṅkhārehi. Itarepi attānaṃ ṭhapetvā itarehi. Kehici vippayuttoti rūpanibbānehi.
atk-abh03a:102_2: Evaṃ sabbattha rūpassa vippayoge dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu arūpaṃ, arūpassa vippayoge
atk-abh03a:103_0: 231. Catutthe – ‘katihi khandhehī’tiādiṃ avatvā sampayuttanti natthīti vuttaṃ. Taṃ
atk-abh03a:103_1: pana khandhādīnaṃyeva vasena veditabbaṃ. Paratopi evarūpesu pañhesu eseva nayo. Ādipañhasmiñhi
atk-abh03a:103_2: sarūpato dassetvā parato pāḷi saṃkhittā. Iminā nayena sabbattha atthayojanā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:103_3: Yattha pana nātipākaṭā bhavissati, tattha naṃ pākaṭaṃ katvāva gamissāma.
atk-abh03a:104: 234. Soḷasahi dhātūhīti cakkhuviññāṇadhātu tāva attānaṃ ṭhapetvā chahi viññāṇadhātūhi, dasahi ca rūpadhātūhi. Sesāsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a:105_0: 235. Tīhi khandhehīti saṅkhārakkhandhaṃ ṭhapetvā sesehi. Ekāya dhātuyāti manoviññāṇadhātuyā.
atk-abh03a:105_1: Samudayamaggānañhi aññāya dhātuyā sampayogo natthi. Ekena khandhenāti saṅkhārakkhandhena.
atk-abh03a:105_2: Ekenāyatanenāti dhammāyatanena. Ekāya dhātuyāti dhammadhātuyā. Etesu hi taṃ saccadvayaṃ kehici sampayuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:106: 238. Sukhindriyādipañhe – tīhīti saññāsaṅkhāraviññāṇehi. Ekāya dhātuyāti kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā, manoviññāṇadhātuyā ca. Chahi dhātūhīti kāyaviññāṇadhātuvajjāhi.
atk-abh03a:107: 245. Rūpabhavapañhe – sabbesampi arūpakkhandhānaṃ arūpāyatanānañca atthitāya na kehicīti vuttaṃ. Ghānajivhākāyaviññāṇadhātūnaṃ pana natthitāya tīhi dhātūhi vippayuttoti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:108: 256. Adhimokkhapañhe – dvīhi dhātūhīti manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātūhi. Pannarasahīti sesāhi dasahi rūpadhātūhi, pañcahi ca cakkhuviññāṇādīhi.
atk-abh03a:109: 257. Kusalapañhe – kusalehi catunnampi khandhānaṃ gahitattā sampayogo paṭikkhitto.
atk-abh03a:110_1: ceva rūpadhātūhi ca. Ekādasahīti kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā saddhiṃ rūpadhātūhi.
atk-abh03a:111_2: viññāṇehi saddhiṃ rūpadhātūhi. Avitakkavicāramattapañhe – ekena khandhenātiādi saṅkhārakkhandhavaseneva
atk-abh03a:111_3: veditabbaṃ. Dutiyajjhānavicārañhi ṭhapetvā sesā avitakkavicāramattā nāma. Pītiṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-abh03a:111_4: sesā pītisahagatā. Tattha vicāro vicārena, pīti ca pītiyā na sampayuttāti saṅkhārakkhandhadhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu
atk-abh03a:111_5: kehici sampayuttā nāma. Soḷasahīti dhammadhātumanoviññāṇadhātuvajjāheva. Avitakkaavicārapañhe
atk-abh03a:111_6: – ekāya dhātuyāti manodhātuyā. Sukhasahagatā upekkhāsahagatā ca vedanāttike vuttāva.
atk-abh03a:112_0: 271. Parittārammaṇaṃ vipākadhammasadisaṃ. Ekāya dhātuyāti dhammadhātuyā. Kehicīti
atk-abh03a:112_1: ye tattha parittārammaṇā na honti, tehi. Dhammadhātu pana parittārammaṇānaṃ channaṃ
atk-abh03a:112_2: cittuppādānaṃ vasena catūhi khandhehi saṅgahitattā paṭhamapaṭikkhepameva bhajati.
atk-abh03a:113_0: 273. Anuppannesu – pañcahi dhātūhīti cakkhuviññāṇādīhi. Tāni hi ekantena uppādidhammabhūtāneva,
atk-abh03a:113_2: Hetuādayo samudayasadisāva. Sahetukā ceva na ca hetūpi pītisahagatasadisāva. Tathā
atk-abh03a:113_3: parāmāsasampayuttā. Anupādinnā anuppannasadisāva. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a:116_0: 306. Idāni sampayuttenavippayuttapadaṃ bhājetuṃ vedanākkhandhenātiādi āraddhaṃ. Tatridaṃ
atk-abh03a:116_1: lakkhaṇaṃ – imasmiñhi vāre pucchāya uddhaṭapadena ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi ye dhammā
atk-abh03a:116_2: vippayuttā, tesaṃ khandhādīhi vippayogaṃ pucchitvā vissajjanaṃ kataṃ. Taṃ pana rūpakkhandhādīsu
atk-abh03a:116_3: na yujjati. Rūpakkhandhena hi sampayuttā nāma natthi. Tasmā tañca aññāni ca evarūpāni
atk-abh03a:116_4: padāni imasmiṃ vāre na gahitāni. Yāni pana padāni dhammadhātuyā sampayutte dhamme
atk-abh03a:116_5: viññāṇañca aññena asammissaṃ dīpenti, tāni idha gahitāni. Tesaṃ idamuddānaṃ –
atk-abh03a:123_0: Pariyosāne – khandhā caturotiādināpi ayamevattho saṅgahito. Tattha yāni padāni sadisavissajjanāni,
atk-abh03a:123_1: tāni uppaṭipāṭiyāpi samodhānetvā tattha vedanākkhandhādikā pañhā katā. Tesu evaṃ
atk-abh03a:123_2: khandhādivibhāgo veditabbo. Vedanākkhandhādipañhe tāva – ekenāti manāyatanena. Sattahīti
atk-abh03a:123_3: viññāṇadhātūhi. Kehicīti dhammāyatane vedanādīhi. Viññāṇadhātupañhe – te dhammā na
atk-abh03a:123_4: kehicīti te pucchāya uddhaṭapadaṃ viññāṇadhātuṃ ṭhapetvā sesā cha viññāṇadhātudhammā,
atk-abh03a:123_5: rūpaṃ, nibbānañca. Tehi sabbesaṃ khandhāyatanānaṃ saṅgahitattā na kehici khandhehi
atk-abh03a:123_6: āyatanehi vā vippayuttā. Ekāya dhātuyāti yā yā pucchāya uddhaṭā hoti tāya tāya.
atk-abh03a:124: 309. Upekkhindriyapañhe – pañcahīti upekkhāsampayuttāhi cakkhuviññāṇadhātuādīhi. Iminā nayena sabbattha pucchāya uddhaṭapadeneva saddhiṃ vippayuttānaṃ vasena attho veditabboti.
atk-abh03a:127_0: 317. Idāni vippayuttenasampayuttapadaṃ bhājetuṃ rūpakkhandhenātiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha
atk-abh03a:127_1: sabbāpi pucchā moghapucchāva. Rūpakkhandhena hi vippayuttā nāma cattāro khandhā,
atk-abh03a:127_2: tesaṃ aññehi sampayogo natthi. Vedanākkhandhena vippayuttaṃ rūpaṃ nibbānañca, tassa
atk-abh03a:127_3: ca kenaci sampayogo natthi. Evaṃ sabbapadesu. Vippayuttānaṃ pana sampayogābhāvo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:127_4: Iti pucchāya moghattā sabbavissajjanesu natthi natthiicceva vuttanti.
atk-abh03a:130_0: 319. Idāni sampayuttenasampayuttapadaṃ bhājetuṃ vedanākkhandhenātiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha
atk-abh03a:130_1: yaṃ khandhādivasena sampayuttaṃ, puna tasseva khandhādīhi sampayogaṃ pucchitvā vissajjanaṃ
atk-abh03a:130_2: kataṃ. Taṃ rūpena vā rūpamissakehi vā sabbarūpakkhandhasaṅgāhakehi vā padehi saddhiṃ
atk-abh03a:130_3: na yujjati. Rūpena hi rūpamissakena vā aññesaṃ sampayogo natthi. Sabbarūpakkhandhasaṅgāhakehi
atk-abh03a:130_4: sabbesaṃ sampayogārahānaṃ khandhādīnaṃ gahitattā aññaṃyeva natthi, yaṃ tena saha
atk-abh03a:130_5: sampayogaṃ gaccheyya. Tasmā tathārūpāni padāni idha na gahitāni. Yāni pana padāni
atk-abh03a:130_6: rūpena asammissaṃ arūpekadesaṃ dīpenti, tāni idha gahitāni. Tesaṃ idamuddānaṃ –
atk-abh03a:137_0: Sabbapañhesu pana ye dhammā pucchāya uddhaṭā, te yehi sampayuttā honti, tesaṃ vasena
atk-abh03a:137_1: khandhādibhedo veditabbo. Vedanākkhandhena hi itare tayo khandhā sampayuttā, puna
atk-abh03a:137_2: tehi vedanākkhandho sampayutto. So tehi saññādīhi tīhi khandhehi, ekena manāyatanena,
atk-abh03a:137_3: sattahi viññāṇadhātūhi, ekasmiṃ dhammāyatane, dhammadhātuyā ca, kehici saññāsaṅkhāreheva
atk-abh03a:140_0: 353. Idāni vippayuttenavippayuttapadaṃ bhājetuṃ rūpakkhandhenātiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha
atk-abh03a:140_1: ye sampayogavippayogapadaniddese rūpakkhandhādayo dhammā uddhaṭā, sabbapucchāsu teyeva
atk-abh03a:140_2: uddhaṭā. Sadisavissajjanānaṃ pana ekato gahitattā padāni aññāya paṭipāṭiyā āgatāni.
atk-abh03a:140_3: Tattha yaṃ padaṃ pucchāya uddhaṭaṃ, taṃ yehi dhammehi vippayuttaṃ, tesaṃ vasena khandhādivibhāgo
atk-abh03a:140_4: veditabbo. Rūpakkhandhena hi vedanādayo vippayuttā, tehi ca rūpakkhandho vippayutto.
atk-abh03a:140_5: Nibbānaṃ pana sukhumarūpagatikameva. So rūpakkhandho catūhi khandhehi, ekena manāyatanena
atk-abh03a:140_6: sattahi viññāṇadhātūhi, dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu, kehici vedanādīhi dhammeheva vippayutto.
atk-abh03a:143_1: Tattha ye saṅgahitenasaṅgahitapadaniddese samudayasaccādayova dhammā uddhaṭā, sabbapucchāsu
atk-abh03a:143_2: teyeva uddhaṭā. Sadisavissajjanānaṃ pana ekato gahitattā padāni aññāya paṭipāṭiyā
atk-abh03a:143_3: āgatāni. Tattha ye dhammā pucchāya uddhaṭapadena khandhādisaṅgahena saṅgahitā, tesaṃ
atk-abh03a:143_4: yehi sampayogo vā vippayogo vā hoti, tesaṃ vasena khandhādivibhāgo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:144_0: Tatrāyaṃ nayo – samudayasaccena tāva saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannā dhammā khandhādisaṅgahena
atk-abh03a:144_1: saṅgahitā. Te ca sesehi tīhi khandhehi, ekena manāyatanena, sattahi viññāṇadhātūhi,
atk-abh03a:144_2: saṅkhārakkhandhe dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu ca ṭhapetvā taṇhaṃ sesehi sampayuttattā
atk-abh03a:144_3: kehici sampayuttā nāma. Ekena pana rūpakkhandhena, dasahi rūpāyatanehi, rūpadhātūhi
atk-abh03a:144_4: ca vippayuttā, ekasmiṃ dhammāyatane dhammadhātuyā ca, rūpanibbānehi vippayuttattā
atk-abh03a:144_5: kehici vippayuttā nāma. Iminā upāyena sabbattha attho veditabboti.
atk-abh03a:147_1: Tattha ye sampayuttenasampayuttapadaniddese vedanākkhandhādayo dhammā uddhaṭā, sabbapucchāsu
atk-abh03a:147_2: teyeva uddhaṭā. Tattha ye dhammā pucchāya uddhaṭapadena sampayuttā, tesaṃ yehi saṅgaho
atk-abh03a:147_3: vā asaṅgaho vā hoti, tesaṃ vasena khandhādibhedo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:148_0: Tatrāyaṃ nayo – vedanākkhandho hi saññādīhi sampayutto. Te saññādayo tīhi saññādikkhandhehi,
atk-abh03a:148_1: dvīhi dhammāyatanamanāyatanehi, dhammadhātuyā ceva, sattahi ca viññāṇadhātūhīti aṭṭhahi
atk-abh03a:148_2: dhātūhi saṅgahitā, sesāhi khandhāyatanadhātūhi asaṅgahitā. Iminā upāyena sabbattha attho veditabboti.
atk-abh03a:151_1: Tattha ye pañcame asaṅgahitenaasaṅgahitapadaniddese rūpakkhandhena sadisapañhā dhammā,
atk-abh03a:151_2: ye ca arūpabhavena sadisā, teyeva uddhaṭā. Sesā pana na ruhantīti na uddhaṭā. Vedanākkhandhena
atk-abh03a:151_3: hi khandhādivasena pana rūpārūpadhammā asaṅgahitā honti. Tesañca sampayogo nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a:151_4: Tasmā yāni padāni ruhanti, tāneva sadisavissajjanehi saddhiṃ samodhānetvā uddhaṭāni.
atk-abh03a:151_5: Tattha ye dhammā pucchāya uddhaṭadhammehi khandhādivasena asaṅgahitā, te yehi sampayuttā
atk-abh03a:151_6: ca vippayuttā ca, tesaṃ vasena khandhādivibhāgo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:152_0: Tatrāyaṃ nayo – rūpakkhandhena tāva viññāṇameva tīhi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitaṃ. Taṃ vedanādīhi
atk-abh03a:152_1: tīhi khandhehi, dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu ca vedanādīheva sampayuttaṃ. Ekena rūpakkhandhena,
atk-abh03a:152_2: dasahi rūpāyatanarūpadhātūhi, dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu ca rūpanibbānadhammehi vippayuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:152_3: Taṃ sandhāya te dhammā tīhi khandhehītiādi vuttaṃ. Iminā nayena sabbattha attho veditabboti.
atk-abh03a:155_1: Tattha yesaṃ padānaṃ vippayogo na ruhati, tāni imasmiṃ vāre na gahitāni. Kāni pana
atk-abh03a:155_2: tānīti? Dhammāyatanādīni. Dhammāyatanassa hi khandhādīsu ekenāpi vippayogo na ruhati.
atk-abh03a:161: Cha padāni tato uddhaṃ sabbānipi samāsato;
atk-abh03a:162: Padāni ca na labbhanti, cattālīsañca satta cā”ti.
atk-abh03a:163_0: Pariyosāne ca – dhammāyatanaṃ dhammadhātūti gāthāpi imamevatthaṃ dīpetuṃ vuttā. Imāni
atk-abh03a:163_1: pana ṭhapetvā sesāni sabbānipi labbhanti. Tesu khandhādivibhāgo vuttanayānusāreneva veditabboti.
atk-abh03a:170: Ñātuṃ sabbepi nayā, saṅkhepakathāva iti vuttā.
atk-abh03a:171: Ekekassa pana sace, padassa vitthārameva bhāseyyaṃ;
atk-abh03a:172: Vacanañca ativiya bahuṃ, bhaveyya attho ca aviseso.
atk-abh03a:173: Iti ūnabhāṇavāradvayāya, yaṃ tantiyā mayā etaṃ;
atk-abh03a:174: Kurunā pattaṃ puññaṃ, sukhāya taṃ hotu lokassāti.
atk-abh03a:184: Tasmā naṃ vaṇṇayissāmi, taṃ suṇātha samāhitāti.
atk-abh03a:186_0: 1. Cha paññattiyo – khandhapaññatti…pe… puggalapaññattīti ayaṃ tāva puggalapaññattiyā
atk-abh03a:186_1: uddeso. Tattha chāti gaṇanaparicchedo. Tena ye dhamme idha paññapetukāmo tesaṃ gaṇanavasena
atk-abh03a:186_3: Tattha “ācikkhati deseti paññapeti paṭṭhapetī”ti āgataṭṭhāne paññāpanā dassanā pakāsanā
atk-abh03a:186_4: paññatti nāma. “Supaññattaṃ mañcapīṭha”nti āgataṭṭhāne ṭhapanā nikkhipanā paññatti
atk-abh03a:186_5: nāma. Idha ubhayampi vaṭṭati. Cha paññattiyoti hi cha paññāpanā, cha dassanā pakāsanātipi;
atk-abh03a:186_6: cha ṭhapanā nikkhipanātipi idha adhippetameva. Nāmapaññatti hi te te dhamme dassetipi,
atk-abh03a:187_0: Khandhapaññattītiādi pana saṃkhepato tāsaṃ paññattīnaṃ sarūpadassanaṃ. Tattha khandhānaṃ
atk-abh03a:187_1: ‘khandhā’ti paññāpanā dassanā pakāsanā ṭhapanā nikkhipanā khandhapaññatti nāma. Āyatanānaṃ
atk-abh03a:187_2: āyatanānīti, dhātūnaṃ dhātuyoti, saccānaṃ saccānīti, indriyānaṃ indriyānīti, puggalānaṃ
atk-abh03a:187_3: puggalāti paññāpanā dassanā pakāsanā ṭhapanā nikkhipanā puggalapaññatti nāma.
atk-abh03a:188_0: Pāḷimuttakena pana aṭṭhakathānayena aparāpi cha paññattiyo – vijjamānapaññatti, avijjamānapaññatti,
atk-abh03a:188_1: vijjamānena avijjamānapaññatti, avijjamānena vijjamānapaññatti, vijjamānena vijjamānapaññatti,
atk-abh03a:188_3: vijjamānassa sato sambhūtassa dhammassa paññāpanā vijjamānapaññatti nāma. Tathā avijjamānassa
atk-abh03a:188_4: lokaniruttimattasiddhassa itthipurisādikassa paññāpanā avijjamānapaññatti nāma. Sabbākārenapi
atk-abh03a:188_6: vā paññāpanāpi avijjamānapaññattiyeva. Sā pana sāsanāvacarā na hotīti idha na gahitā.
atk-abh03a:188_7: Iti imesaṃ vijjamānāvijjamānānaṃ vikappanavasena sesā veditabbā. ‘Tevijjo’, ‘chaḷabhiñño’tiādīsu
atk-abh03a:188_8: hi tisso vijjā cha abhiññā ca vijjamānā, puggalo avijjamāno. Tasmā tisso vijjā assāti
atk-abh03a:188_9: tevijjo, cha abhiññā assāti chaḷabhiññoti evaṃ vijjamānena avijjamānassa paññāpanato
atk-abh03a:188_11: itthipurisā avijjamānā, rūpaṃ vijjamānaṃ. Tasmā itthiyā rūpaṃ itthirūpaṃ, purisassa
atk-abh03a:188_12: rūpaṃ purisarūpanti evaṃ avijjamānena vijjamānassa paññāpanato evarūpā avijjamānena
atk-abh03a:188_13: vijjamānapaññatti nāma. Cakkhusamphasso, sotasamphassotiādīsu cakkhusotādayopi phassopi
atk-abh03a:188_14: vijjamānoyeva. Tasmā cakkhumhi samphasso, cakkhuto jāto samphasso, cakkhussa vā phalabhūto
atk-abh03a:188_15: samphasso cakkhusamphassoti evaṃ vijjamānena vijjamānassa paññāpanato evarūpā vijjamānena
atk-abh03a:188_16: vijjamānapaññatti nāma. Khattiyaputto, brāhmaṇaputto, seṭṭhiputtotiādīsu khattiyādayopi
atk-abh03a:188_17: avijjamānā, puttopi. Tasmā khattiyassa putto khattiyaputtoti evaṃ avijjamānena avijjamānassa
atk-abh03a:188_18: paññāpanato evarūpā avijjamānena avijjamānapaññatti nāma. Tāsu imasmiṃ pakaraṇe purimā
atk-abh03a:188_19: tissova paññattiyo labbhanti. “Khandhapaññatti…pe… indriyapaññattī”ti imasmiñhi ṭhāne
atk-abh03a:188_21: avijjamānapaññatti. Parato pana ‘tevijjo’, ‘chaḷabhiñño’tiādīsu vijjamānena avijjamānapaññatti labbhatīti.
atk-abh03a:189_0: Aṭṭhakathāmuttakena pana ācariyanayena aparāpi cha paññattiyo – upādāpaññatti, upanidhāpaññatti,
atk-abh03a:189_2: yo rūpavedanādīhi ekattena vā aññattena vā rūpavedanādayo viya saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena
atk-abh03a:189_3: anupalabbhasabhāvopi rūpavedanādibhede khandhe upādāya nissāya kāraṇaṃ katvā sammato
atk-abh03a:189_4: satto. Tāni tāni aṅgāni upādāya ratho gehaṃ muṭṭhi uddhananti ca; te teyeva rūpādayo
atk-abh03a:189_5: upādāya ghaṭo paṭo; candasūriyaparivattādayo upādāya kālo, disā; taṃ taṃ bhūtanimittañceva
atk-abh03a:189_6: bhāvanānisaṃsañca upādāya nissāya kāraṇaṃ katvā sammataṃ tena tenākārena upaṭṭhitaṃ
atk-abh03a:189_7: uggahanimittaṃ paṭibhāganimittanti ayaṃ evarūpā upādāpaññatti nāma. Paññapetabbaṭṭhena
atk-abh03a:189_8: cesā paññatti nāma, na paññāpanaṭṭhena. Yā pana tassatthassa paññāpanā, ayaṃ avijjamānapaññattiyeva.
atk-abh03a:190_0: Yā paṭhamadutiyādīni upanidhāya dutiyaṃ tatiyantiādikā, aññamaññañca upanidhāya dīghaṃ
atk-abh03a:190_1: rassaṃ, dūraṃ, santikantiādikā paññāpanā; ayaṃ upanidhāpaññatti nāma. Apicesā upanidhāpaññatti
atk-abh03a:191_0: Tattha dutiyaṃ tatiyantiādikāva tadaññaṃ apekkhitvā vuttatāya tadaññāpekkhūpanidhā
atk-abh03a:191_1: nāma. Chattapāṇi, satthapāṇītiādikā hatthagataṃ upanidhāya vuttatāya hatthagatūpanidhā
atk-abh03a:191_2: nāma. Kuṇḍalī, sikharī, kiriṭītiādikā sampayuttaṃ upanidhāya vuttatāya sampayuttūpanidhā
atk-abh03a:191_3: nāma. Dhaññasakaṭaṃ, sappikumbhotiādikā samāropitaṃ upanidhāya vuttatāya samāropitūpanidhā
atk-abh03a:191_4: nāma. Indasālaguhā, piyaṅguguhā, serīsakantiādikā avidūragataṃ upanidhāya vuttatāya
atk-abh03a:191_5: avidūragatūpanidhā nāma. Suvaṇṇavaṇṇo, usabhagāmītiādikā paṭibhāgaṃ upanidhāya vuttatāya
atk-abh03a:191_6: paṭibhāgūpanidhā nāma. Padumassaro, brāhmaṇagāmotiādikā tabbahulaṃ upanidhāya vuttatāya
atk-abh03a:191_7: tabbahulūpanidhā nāma. Maṇikaṭakaṃ, vajirakaṭakantiādikā tabbisiṭṭhaṃ upanidhāya
atk-abh03a:192_0: Yā pana tesaṃ tesaṃ samodhānamapekkhitvā tidaṇḍaṃ, aṭṭhapadaṃ, dhaññarāsi, puppharāsītiādikā
atk-abh03a:192_1: paññāpanā, ayaṃ samodhānapaññatti nāma. Yā purimassa purimassa upanikkhipitvā dve,
atk-abh03a:192_2: tīṇi, cattārītiādikā paññāpanā, ayaṃ upanikkhittapaññatti nāma. Yā taṃ taṃ dhammasabhāvaṃ
atk-abh03a:192_3: apekkhitvā pathavī, tejo, kakkhaḷatā, uṇhatātiādikā paññāpanā, ayaṃ tajjāpaññatti
atk-abh03a:192_4: nāma. Yā pana santativicchedābhāvaṃ apekkhitvā āsītiko, nāvutikotiādikā paññāpanā,
atk-abh03a:192_5: ayaṃ santatipaññatti nāma. Etāsu pana tajjāpaññatti vijjamānapaññattiyeva. Sesā avijjamānapakkhañceva,
atk-abh03a:193_0: Aṭṭhakathāmuttakena ācariyanayeneva aparāpi cha paññattiyo – kiccapaññatti, saṇṭhānapaññatti,
atk-abh03a:193_1: liṅgapaññatti, bhūmipaññatti, paccattapaññatti, asaṅkhatapaññattīti. Tattha bhāṇako,
atk-abh03a:193_2: dhammakathikotiādikā kiccavasena paññāpanā kiccapaññatti nāma. Kiso, thūlo, parimaṇḍalo,
atk-abh03a:193_3: caturassotiādikā saṇṭhānavasena paññāpanā saṇṭhānapaññatti nāma. Itthī, purisotiādikā
atk-abh03a:193_4: liṅgavasena paññāpanā liṅgapaññati nāma. Kāmāvacarā, rūpāvacarā, arūpāvacarā, kosalakā,
atk-abh03a:193_5: mādhurātiādikā bhūmivasena paññāpanā bhūmipaññatti nāma. Tisso, nāgo, sumanotiādikā
atk-abh03a:193_6: paccattanāmakaraṇamattavasena paññāpanā paccattapaññatti nāma. Nirodho, nibbānantiādikā
atk-abh03a:193_7: asaṅkhatadhammassa paññāpanā asaṅkhatapaññatti nāma. Tattha ekaccā bhūmipaññatti
atk-abh03a:193_8: asaṅkhatapaññatti ca vijjamānapaññattiyeva, kiccapaññatti vijjamānena avijjamānapakkhaṃ
atk-abh03a:194_0: 2. Idāni yāsaṃ paññattīnaṃ uddesavāre saṅkhepato sarūpadassanaṃ kataṃ, saṅkhepatoyeva
atk-abh03a:194_1: tāva tāsaṃ vatthuṃ vibhajitvā dassanavasena tā dassetuṃ kittāvatātiādimāha. Tattha
atk-abh03a:194_2: pucchāya tāva evamattho veditabbo – yā ayaṃ khandhānaṃ ‘khandhā’ti paññāpanā, dassanā,
atk-abh03a:194_3: ṭhapanā, sā kittakena hotīti kathetukamyatāpucchā. Parato kittāvatā āyatanānantiādīsupi
atk-abh03a:194_4: eseva nayo. Vissajjanepi evamattho veditabbo – yattakena paññāpanena saṅkhepato pañcakkhandhāti
atk-abh03a:194_5: vā pabhedato “rūpakkhandho…pe… viññāṇakkhandho”ti vā; tatrāpi rūpakkhandho kāmāvacaro,
atk-abh03a:194_6: sesā catubhūmikāti vā evarūpaṃ paññāpanaṃ hoti; ettakena khandhānaṃ ‘khandhā’ti paññatti hoti.
atk-abh03a:195_0: 3. Tathā yattakena paññāpanena saṅkhepato dvādasāyatanānīti vā, pabhedato “cakkhāyatanaṃ…pe…
atk-abh03a:195_1: dhammāyatana”nti vā; tatrāpi dasāyatanā kāmāvacarā, dvāyatanā catubhūmikāti vā, evarūpaṃ
atk-abh03a:195_2: paññāpanaṃ hoti; ettakena āyatanānaṃ āyatanānīti paññatti hoti.
atk-abh03a:196_0: 4. Yattakena paññāpanena saṅkhepato aṭṭhārasa dhātuyoti vā, pabhedato “cakkhudhātu…pe…
atk-abh03a:196_1: manoviññāṇadhātū”ti vā; tatrāpi soḷasa dhātuyo kāmāvacarā, dve dhātuyo catubhūmikāti
atk-abh03a:196_2: vā evarūpaṃ paññāpanaṃ hoti; ettakena dhātūnaṃ dhātūti paññatti hoti.
atk-abh03a:197_0: 5. Yattakena paññāpanena saṅkhepato cattāri saccānīti vā, pabhedato “dukkhasaccaṃ…pe…
atk-abh03a:197_1: nirodhasacca”nti vā; tatrāpi dve saccā lokiyā, dve saccā lokuttarāti vā evarūpaṃ
atk-abh03a:197_2: paññāpanaṃ hoti; ettakena saccānaṃ ‘saccānī’ti paññatti hoti.
atk-abh03a:198_0: 6. Yattakena paññāpanena saṅkhepato bāvīsatindriyānīti vā, pabhedato “cakkhundriyaṃ…pe…
atk-abh03a:198_1: aññātāvindriya”nti vā; tatrāpi dasindriyāni kāmāvacarāni, navindriyāni missakāni,
atk-abh03a:198_2: tīṇi indriyāni lokuttarānīti vā evarūpaṃ paññāpanaṃ hoti; ettakena indriyānaṃ indriyānīti
atk-abh03a:198_3: paññatti hoti. Ettāvatā saṅkhepato vatthuṃ vibhajitvā dassanavasena pañca paññattiyo dassitā honti.
atk-abh03a:199_0: 7. Idāni vitthārato vatthuṃ vibhajitvā dassanavasena puggalapaññattiṃ dassetuṃ samayavimutto
atk-abh03a:199_1: asamayavimuttotiādimāha. Sammāsambuddhena hi tile visārayamānena viya, vāke hīrayamānena
atk-abh03a:199_2: viya ca, heṭṭhā vibhaṅgappakaraṇe imāsaṃ pañcannaṃ paññattīnaṃ vatthubhūtā khandhādayo
atk-abh03a:199_3: nippadesena kathitāti tena te idha ekadeseneva kathesi. Chaṭṭhā puggalapaññatti heṭṭhā
atk-abh03a:199_4: akathitāva. Idhāpi uddesavāre ekadeseneva kathitā; tasmā taṃ vitthārato kathetukāmo
atk-abh03a:199_5: samayavimutto asamayavimuttoti ekakato paṭṭhāya yāva dasakā mātikaṃ ṭhapesīti.
atk-abh03a:203_0: 1. Idāni yathāṭhapitaṃ mātikaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya vibhajitvā dassetuṃ – katamo ca puggalo
atk-abh03a:203_1: samayavimuttotiādimāha. Tattha idhāti imasmiṃ sattaloke. Ekacco puggaloti eko puggalo.
atk-abh03a:203_2: Kālena kālanti ettha bhummavasena attho veditabbo. Ekekasmiṃ kāleti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:203_3: Samayena samayanti idaṃ purimasseva vevacanaṃ. Aṭṭha vimokkheti rūpāvacarārūpāvacaraaṭṭhasamāpattiyo.
atk-abh03a:203_4: Tāsañhi paccanīkadhammehi vimuccanato vimokkhoti nāmaṃ. Kāyenāti vimokkhasahajātena
atk-abh03a:203_5: nāmakāyena. Phusitvā viharatīti paṭilabhitvā iriyati. Katamasmiṃ panesa kāle vimokkhe
atk-abh03a:203_6: phusitvā viharatīti? Samāpattiṃ samāpajjitukāmassa hi kālo nāma atthi, akālo nāma
atk-abh03a:203_7: atthi. Tattha pātova sarīrapaṭijagganakālo, vattakaraṇakālo ca samāpajjanassa akālo
atk-abh03a:203_8: nāma. Sarīraṃ pana paṭijaggitvā vattaṃ katvā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā nisinnassa yāva
atk-abh03a:203_9: piṇḍāya gamanakālo nāgacchati, etasmiṃ antare samāpajjanassa kālo nāma.
atk-abh03a:204_0: Piṇḍāya gamanakālaṃ pana sallakkhetvā nikkhantassa cetiyavandanakālo, bhikkhusaṅghaparivutassa
atk-abh03a:204_1: vitakkamāḷake ṭhānakālo piṇḍāya gamanakālo gāme caraṇakālo; āsanasālāya yāgupānakālo
atk-abh03a:204_2: vattakaraṇakāloti ayampi samāpajjanassa akālo nāma. Āsanasālāya pana vivitte okāse
atk-abh03a:204_3: sati yāva bhattakālo nāgacchati, etasmimpi antare samāpajjanassa kālo nāma. Bhattaṃ
atk-abh03a:204_5: paripucchādānakāloti ayampi samāpajjanassa akālo nāma. Yo akālo, sveva asamayo. Taṃ
atk-abh03a:204_6: sabbampi ṭhapetvā avasese kāle kāle, samaye samaye vuttappakāre aṭṭha vimokkhe sahajātanāmakāyena
atk-abh03a:205_0: Apicesa saphassakehi sahajātanāmadhammehi sahajātadhamme phusatiyeva nāma, upacārena
atk-abh03a:205_1: appanaṃ phusatiyeva nāma. Purimāya appanāya aparaṃ appanaṃ phusatiyeva. Yena hi saddhiṃ
atk-abh03a:205_2: ye dhammā sahajātā, tena te paṭiladdhā nāma honti. Phassenāpi phuṭṭhāyeva nāma honti.
atk-abh03a:205_3: Upacārampi appanāya paṭilābhakāraṇameva, tathā purimā appanā aparaappanāya. Tatrāssa
atk-abh03a:205_4: evaṃ sahajātehi sahajātānaṃ phusanā veditabbā – paṭhamajjhānañhi vitakkādīhi pañcaṅgikaṃ.
atk-abh03a:205_5: Tasmiṃ ṭhapetvā tāni aṅgāni sesā atirekapaṇṇāsadhammā cattāro khandhā nāma honti.
atk-abh03a:205_6: Tena nāmakāyena paṭhamajjhānasamāpattivimokkhaṃ phusitvā paṭilabhitvā viharati. Dutiyaṃ
atk-abh03a:205_7: jhānaṃ pītisukhacittekaggatāhi tivaṅgikaṃ, tatiyaṃ sukhacittekaggatāhi duvaṅgikaṃ,
atk-abh03a:205_8: catutthaṃ upekkhācittekaggatāhi duvaṅgikaṃ, tathā ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ…pe… nevasaññānāsaññāyatanañca.
atk-abh03a:205_9: Tattha ṭhapetvā tāni aṅgāni sesā atirekapaṇṇāsadhammā cattāro khandhā nāma honti.
atk-abh03a:205_10: Tena nāmakāyena nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattivimokkhaṃ phusitvā paṭilabhitvā viharati.
atk-abh03a:206_0: Paññāya cassa disvāti vipassanāpaññāya saṅkhāragataṃ, maggapaññāya catusaccadhamme
atk-abh03a:206_1: passitvā. Ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā hontīti upaḍḍhupaḍḍhā paṭhamamaggādivajjhā āsavā
atk-abh03a:206_2: parikkhīṇā honti. Ayaṃ vuccati puggalo samayavimuttoti ettha aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī
atk-abh03a:206_3: puthujjano tena nāmakāyena phusitvā viharatīti vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Pāḷiyaṃ pana “ekacce
atk-abh03a:206_4: āsavā parikkhīṇā”ti vuttaṃ. Puthujjanassa ca khīṇā āsavā nāma natthi, tasmā so na
atk-abh03a:206_5: gahito. Aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī khīṇāsavopi tena nāmakāyena phusitvā viharatīti vattuṃ
atk-abh03a:206_6: vaṭṭati. Tassa pana aparikkhīṇāsavā nāma natthi, tasmā sopi na gahito. Samayavimuttoti
atk-abh03a:207_1: panettha sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Sukkhavipassakā pana sotāpannasakadāgāmianāgāmino
atk-abh03a:207_2: aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino ca khīṇāsavā puthujjanā ca imasmiṃ duke na labbhanti, dukamuttakapuggalā
atk-abh03a:207_3: nāma honti. Tasmā satthā attano buddhasubuddhatāya heṭṭhā gahite ca aggahite ca saṅkaḍḍhitvā
atk-abh03a:207_4: saddhiṃ piṭṭhivaṭṭakehi tantiṃ āropento sabbepi ariyapuggalātiādimāha. Tattha ariye
atk-abh03a:207_5: vimokkheti kilesehi ārakattā ariyeti saṅkhaṃ gate lokuttaravimokkhe. Idaṃ vuttaṃ
atk-abh03a:207_6: hoti – bāhirānañhi aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ samāpajjantassa samayopi atthi asamayopi.
atk-abh03a:207_7: Maggavimokkhena vimuccanassa samayo vā asamayo vā natthi. Yassa saddhā balavatī,
atk-abh03a:207_8: vipassanā ca āraddhā, tassa gacchantassa tiṭṭhantassa nisīdantassa nipajjantassa
atk-abh03a:207_9: khādantassa bhuñjantassa maggaphalapaṭivedho nāma na hotīti natthi. Iti maggavimokkhena
atk-abh03a:207_10: vimuccanassa samayo vā asamayo vā natthīti heṭṭhā gahite ca aggahite ca saṅkaḍḍhitvā
atk-abh03a:207_11: imaṃ piṭṭhivaṭṭakaṃ tantiṃ āropesi dhammarājā. Samāpattilābhī puthujjano imāyapi
atk-abh03a:207_12: tantiyā aggahitova. Bhajāpiyamāno pana samāpattivikkhambhitānaṃ kilesānaṃ vasena
atk-abh03a:208_0: 3. Kuppadhammākuppadhammaniddesesu – yassa adhigato samāpattidhammo kuppati nassati,
atk-abh03a:208_1: so kuppadhammo. Rūpasahagatānanti rūpanimittasaṅkhātena rūpena sahagatānaṃ. Tena
atk-abh03a:208_2: saddhiṃ pavattānaṃ na vinā rūpārammaṇānaṃ catunnaṃ rūpāvacarajjhānānanti attho. Arūpasahagatānanti
atk-abh03a:208_3: rūpato aññaṃ, na rūpanti arūpaṃ. Arūpena sahagatānaṃ tena saddhiṃ pavattānaṃ na vinā
atk-abh03a:208_4: arūpārammaṇānaṃ catunnaṃ arūpāvacarajjhānānanti attho. Na nikāmalābhīti pañcahākārehi
atk-abh03a:208_5: aciṇṇavasitāya icchitākārena aladdhattā na nikāmalābhī. Appaguṇasamāpattikoti attho.
atk-abh03a:208_6: Na akicchalābhīti kicchalābhī dukkhalābhī. Yo āgamanamhi kilese vikkhambhento upacāraṃ
atk-abh03a:208_7: pāpento appanaṃ pāpento cittamañjūsaṃ labhanto dukkhena kicchena sasaṅkhārena sappayogena
atk-abh03a:208_8: kilamanto taṃ sampadaṃ pāpuṇituṃ sakkoti, so na akicchalābhī nāma. Na akasiralābhīti
atk-abh03a:208_9: avipulalābhī. Samāpattiṃ appetvā addhānaṃ pharituṃ na sakkoti. Ekaṃ dve cittavāre
atk-abh03a:209_0: Yatthicchakanti yasmiṃ okāse samāpattiṃ appetvā nisīdituṃ icchati. Yadicchakanti
atk-abh03a:209_1: kasiṇajjhānaṃ vā ānāpānajjhānaṃ vā brahmavihārajjhānaṃ vā asubhajjhānaṃ vāti yaṃ
atk-abh03a:209_2: yaṃ samāpattiṃ appetvā nisīdituṃ icchati. Yāvaticchakanti addhānaparicchedena yattakaṃ
atk-abh03a:209_3: kālaṃ icchati. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yattha yattha yaṃ yaṃ samāpattiṃ yattakaṃ addhānaṃ
atk-abh03a:209_4: samāpajjitumpi vuṭṭhātumpi icchati, tattha tattha taṃ taṃ samāpattiṃ tattakaṃ addhānaṃ
atk-abh03a:209_5: samāpajjitumpi vuṭṭhātumpi na sakkoti. Candaṃ vā sūriyaṃ vā ulloketvā ‘imasmiṃ cande
atk-abh03a:209_6: vā sūriye vā ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ gate vuṭṭhahissāmī’ti paricchinditvā jhānaṃ samāpanno
atk-abh03a:209_7: yathāparicchedena vuṭṭhātuṃ na sakkoti, antarāva vuṭṭhāti; samāpattiyā appaguṇatāyāti.
atk-abh03a:210_0: Pamādamāgammāti pamādaṃ paṭicca. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evaṃvidho puggalo kuppadhammoti
atk-abh03a:210_1: vuccati. Idaṃ pana aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino puthujjanassa sotāpannassa sakadāgāminoti
atk-abh03a:210_2: tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ nāmaṃ. Etesañhi samādhipāribandhakā vipassanāpāribandhakā ca dhammā
atk-abh03a:210_3: na suvikkhambhitā, na suvikkhālitā, tena tesaṃ samāpatti nassati parihāyati. Sā ca
atk-abh03a:210_4: kho neva sīlabhedena, nāpattivītikkamena. Na garukamokkhadhammo panesa appamattakenapi
atk-abh03a:211_0: Tatridaṃ vatthu – eko kira thero samāpattiṃ vaḷañjeti. Tasmiṃ piṇḍāya gāmaṃ paviṭṭhe
atk-abh03a:211_1: dārakā pariveṇe kīḷitvā pakkamiṃsu. Thero āgantvā ‘pariveṇaṃ sammajjitabba’nti cintetvā
atk-abh03a:211_2: asammajjitvā vihāraṃ pavisitvā ‘samāpattiṃ appessāmī’ti nisīdi. So appetuṃ asakkonto,
atk-abh03a:211_3: ‘kiṃ nu kho āvaraṇa’nti sīlaṃ āvajjanto appamattakampi vītikkamaṃ adisvā ‘vattabhedo
atk-abh03a:211_4: nu kho atthī’ti olokento pariveṇassa asammaṭṭhabhāvaṃ ñatvā sammajjitvā pavisitvā
atk-abh03a:212_0: 4. Akuppadhammaniddeso vuttapaṭipakkhavaseneva veditabbo. Akuppadhammoti idaṃ pana
atk-abh03a:212_1: aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino anāgāmissa ceva khīṇāsavassa cāti dvinnaṃ puggalānaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-abh03a:212_2: Tesañhi samādhipāribandhakā vipassanāpāribandhakā ca dhammā suvikkhambhitā suvikkhālitā;
atk-abh03a:212_3: tena tesaṃ bhassasaṅgaṇikārāmādikiccena vā aññena vā yena kenaci attano anurūpena
atk-abh03a:212_4: pamādena vītināmentānampi samāpatti na kuppati, na nassati. Sukkhavipassakā pana
atk-abh03a:212_5: sotāpannasakadāgāmianāgāmikhīṇāsavā imasmiṃ duke na labbhanti; dukamuttakapuggalā
atk-abh03a:212_6: nāma honti. Tasmā satthā attano buddhasubuddhatāya heṭṭhā gahite ca aggahite ca saṅkaḍḍhitvā
atk-abh03a:212_7: imasmimpi duke saddhiṃ piṭṭhivaṭṭakehi tantiṃ āropento sabbepi ariyapuggalātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:212_8: Aṭṭhannañhi samāpattīnaṃ kuppanaṃ nassanaṃ bhaveyya, lokuttaradhammassa pana sakiṃ
atk-abh03a:212_9: paṭividdhassa kuppanaṃ nassanaṃ nāma natthi, taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:213_1: Kevalañhi idha puggalassa pamādaṃ paṭicca dhammānaṃ parihānampi aparihānampi gahitanti
atk-abh03a:213_2: idaṃ pariyāyadesanāmattameva nānaṃ. Sesaṃ sabbattha tādisameva.
atk-abh03a:214_0: 7. Cetanābhabbaniddese – cetanābhabboti cetanāya aparihāniṃ āpajjituṃ bhabbo. Sace
atk-abh03a:214_1: anusañcetetīti, sace samāpajjati. Samāpattiñhi samāpajjanto anusañceteti nāma. So
atk-abh03a:215_1: bhabbo. Sace anurakkhatīti sace anupakāradhamme pahāya upakāradhamme sevanto samāpajjati.
atk-abh03a:215_2: Evañhi paṭipajjanto anurakkhati nāma. So na parihāyati, itaro parihāyati.
atk-abh03a:216_0: Ime dvepi samāpattiṃ ṭhapetuṃ thāvaraṃ kātuṃ paṭibalā. Cetanābhabbato pana anurakkhaṇābhabbova
atk-abh03a:216_1: balavataro. Cetanābhabbo hi upakārānupakāre dhamme na jānāti. Ajānanto upakāradhamme
atk-abh03a:216_2: nudati nīharati, anupakāradhamme sevati. So te sevanto samāpattito parihāyati. Anurakkhaṇābhabbo
atk-abh03a:216_3: upakārānupakāre dhamme jānāti. Jānanto anupakāradhamme nudati nīharati, upakāradhamme
atk-abh03a:216_4: sevati. So te sevanto samāpattito na parihāyati.
atk-abh03a:217_0: Yathā hi dve khettapālā eko paṇḍurogena sarogo akkhamo sītādīnaṃ, eko arogo sītādīnaṃ
atk-abh03a:217_1: saho. Sarogo heṭṭhākuṭiṃ na otarati, rattārakkhaṃ divārakkhaṃ vijahati. Tassa divā
atk-abh03a:217_2: sukamorādayo khettaṃ otaritvā sālisīsaṃ khādanti, rattiṃ migasūkarādayo pavisitvā
atk-abh03a:217_3: khalaṃ tacchi taṃ viya chetvā gacchanti. So attano pamattakāraṇā puna bījamattampi
atk-abh03a:217_4: na labhati. Itaro rattārakkhaṃ divārakkhaṃ na vijahati. So attano appamattakāraṇā
atk-abh03a:218_0: Tattha sarogakhettapālo viya cetanābhabbo, arogo viya anurakkhaṇābhabbo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh03a:218_1: Sarogassa attano pamādena puna bījamattassapi alabhanaṃ viya cetanābhabbassa upakārānupakāre
atk-abh03a:218_2: dhamme ajānitvā upakāre pahāya anupakāre sevantassa samāpattiyā parihānaṃ. Itarassa
atk-abh03a:218_3: attano appamādena ekakarīsamattato catuaṭṭhasakaṭauddharaṇaṃ viya anurakkhaṇābhabbassa
atk-abh03a:218_4: upakārānupakāre dhamme jānitvā anupakāre pahāya upakāre sevantassa samāpattiyā aparihānaṃ
atk-abh03a:218_5: veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ cetanābhabbato anurakkhaṇābhabbova samāpattiṃ thāvaraṃ kātuṃ balavataroti veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:219_1: Etāni hi phalakkhaṇe pahīnāni nāma honti. Ayaṃ pana phalakkhaṇepi na hotīti dasseti.
atk-abh03a:219_2: Tesaṃ dhammānanti tesaṃ saṃyojanadhammānaṃ. Maggakkhaṇasmiñhi tesaṃ pahānāya paṭipanno
atk-abh03a:219_3: nāma hoti. Ayaṃ pana maggakkhaṇepi na hoti. Ettāvatā vissaṭṭhakammaṭṭhāno thūlabālaputhujjanova
atk-abh03a:220_0: 10. Gotrabhuniddese – yesaṃ dhammānanti yesaṃ gotrabhuñāṇena saddhiṃ uppannānaṃ paropaṇṇāsakusaladhammānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:220_1: Ariyadhammassāti lokuttaramaggassa. Avakkanti hotīti okkanti nibbatti pātubhāvo hoti.
atk-abh03a:220_2: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ nibbānārammaṇena ñāṇena sabbaṃ puthujjanasaṅkhaṃ puthujjanagottaṃ
atk-abh03a:220_3: puthujjanamaṇḍalaṃ puthujjanapaññattiṃ atikkamitvā ariyasaṅkhaṃ ariyagottaṃ ariyamaṇḍalaṃ
atk-abh03a:221_0: 11. Bhayūparataniddese – bhayena uparatoti bhayūparato. Sattapi sekkhā puthujjanā
atk-abh03a:221_1: ca bhāyitvā pāpato oramanti pāpaṃ na karonti. Tattha puthujjanā duggatibhayaṃ, vaṭṭabhayaṃ,
atk-abh03a:221_2: kilesabhayaṃ, upavādabhayanti cattāri bhayāni bhāyanti. Tesu bhāyitabbaṭṭhena duggatiyeva
atk-abh03a:221_3: bhayaṃ duggatibhayaṃ. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Tattha puthujjano ‘sace tvaṃ pāpaṃ karissasi,
atk-abh03a:221_4: cattāro apāyā mukhaṃ vivaritvā ṭhitacchātaajagarasadisā, tesu dukkhaṃ anubhavanto
atk-abh03a:221_5: kathaṃ bhavissasī’ti duggatibhayaṃ bhāyitvā pāpaṃ na karoti. Anamataggasaṃsāravaṭṭaṃyeva
atk-abh03a:221_6: pana vaṭṭabhayaṃ nāma. Sabbampi akusalaṃ kilesabhayaṃ nāma. Garahā pana upavādabhayaṃ
atk-abh03a:221_7: nāma. Tānipi bhāyitvā puthujjano pāpaṃ na karoti. Sotāpannasakadāgāmianāgāmino pana
atk-abh03a:221_8: tayo sekkhā duggatiṃ atītattā sesāni tīṇi bhayāni bhāyitvā pāpaṃ na karonti. Maggaṭṭhakasekkhā
atk-abh03a:221_9: āgamanavasena vā asamucchinnabhayattā vā bhayūparatā nāma honti. Khīṇāsavo imesu
atk-abh03a:221_10: catūsu bhayesu ekampi na bhāyati. So hi sabbaso samucchinnabhayo; tasmā abhayūparatoti
atk-abh03a:221_11: vuccati. Kiṃ pana so upavādampi na bhāyatīti? Na bhāyati. Upavādaṃ pana rakkhatīti
atk-abh03a:222_3: kattukamyatākusalacchandarahitā. Te ṭhapetvā jambudīpaṃ itaradīpattayavāsino veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:222_4: Tesu hi manussā acchandikabhāvaṃ paviṭṭhā nāma. Duppaññāti bhavaṅgapaññārahitā. Abhabbāti
atk-abh03a:222_6: etaṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattasaṅkhātaṃ niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ pavisituṃ tattha patiṭṭhātuṃ abhabbā.
atk-abh03a:223_0: 13. Bhabbāgamananiddeso vuttapaṭipakkhanayena veditabbo. Evamimasmiṃ duke ye ca puggalā
atk-abh03a:223_1: pañcānantariyakā, ye ca niyatamicchādiṭṭhikā, yehi ca ahetukaduhetukapaṭisandhi gahitā,
atk-abh03a:223_2: ye ca buddhādīnaṃ na saddahanti, yesañca kattukamyatāchando natthi, ye ca aparipuṇṇabhavaṅgapaññā,
atk-abh03a:223_3: yesañca maggaphalānaṃ upanissayo natthi, te sabbepi sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamituṃ abhabbā,
atk-abh03a:224_1: Sabbepi hete nirayassa atthāya niyatattā niyatā nāma. Aṭṭha pana ariyapuggalā sammābhāvāya
atk-abh03a:224_2: uparūparimaggaphalatthāya ceva anupādāparinibbānatthāya ca niyatattā niyatā nāma.
atk-abh03a:224_3: Avasesapuggalā pana anibaddhagatikā. Yathā ākāse khittadaṇḍo pathaviyaṃ patanto ‘aggena
atk-abh03a:224_4: vā majjhena vā mūlena vā patissatī’ti na ñāyati; evameva ‘asukagatiyā nāma nibbattissantī’ti
atk-abh03a:224_5: niyamābhāvā aniyatā nāmāti veditabbā. Yā pana uttarakurukānaṃ niyatagatikatā vuttā,
atk-abh03a:224_6: na sā niyatadhammavasena. Micchattasammattaniyatadhammāyeva hi niyatā nāma. Tesañca
atk-abh03a:225_0: 15. Paṭipannakaniddese – maggasamaṅginoti maggaṭṭhakapuggalā. Te hi phalatthāya paṭipannattā
atk-abh03a:225_1: paṭipannakā nāma. Phalasamaṅginoti phalapaṭilābhasamaṅgitāya phalasamaṅgino. Phalapaṭilābhato
atk-abh03a:225_2: paṭṭhāya hi te phalasamāpattiṃ asamāpannāpi phale ṭhitāyeva nāma.
atk-abh03a:226_0: 16. Samasīsīniddese – apubbaṃ acarimanti apure apacchā, ekappahārenevāti attho. Pariyādānanti
atk-abh03a:226_1: parikkhayo. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ puggalo samasīsī nāma vuccati. So panesa tividho
atk-abh03a:226_2: hoti – iriyāpathasamasīsī, rogasamasīsī, jīvitasamasīsīti. Tattha yo caṅkamantova
atk-abh03a:226_3: vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ patvā caṅkamantova parinibbāti padumatthero viya;
atk-abh03a:226_4: ṭhitakova vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ patvā ṭhitakova parinibbāti koṭapabbatavihāravāsītissatthero
atk-abh03a:226_5: viya; nisinnova vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ patvā nisinnova parinibbāti, nipannova
atk-abh03a:226_6: vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ patvā nipannova parinibbāti – ayaṃ iriyāpathasamasīsī nāma.
atk-abh03a:227: Yo pana ekaṃ rogaṃ patvā antorogeyeva vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ patvā teneva rogena parinibbāti – ayaṃ rogasamasīsī nāma.
atk-abh03a:228_0: Kataro jīvitasamasīsī nāma? “Sīsanti terasa sīsāni – palibodhasīsañca taṇhā, vinibandhanasīsañca
atk-abh03a:228_1: māno, parāmāsasīsañca diṭṭhi, vikkhepasīsañca uddhaccaṃ, saṃkilesasīsañca avijjā,
atk-abh03a:228_2: adhimokkhasīsañca saddhā, paggahasīsañca vīriyaṃ, upaṭṭhānasīsañca sati, avikkhepasīsañca
atk-abh03a:228_3: samādhi, dassanasīsañca paññā, pavattasīsañca jīvitindriyaṃ, gocarasīsañca vimokkho,
atk-abh03a:228_4: saṅkhārasīsañca nirodho”ti. Tattha kilesasīsaṃ avijjaṃ arahattamaggo pariyādiyati.
atk-abh03a:228_5: Pavattasīsaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ cuticittaṃ pariyādiyati. Avijjāpariyādāyakaṃ cittaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ
atk-abh03a:228_6: pariyādātuṃ na sakkoti. Jīvitindriyapariyādāyakaṃ cittaṃ avijjaṃ pariyādātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh03a:228_7: Avijjāpariyādāyakaṃ cittaṃ aññaṃ, jīvitindriyapariyādāyakaṃ cittaṃ aññaṃ. Yassa cetaṃ
atk-abh03a:228_8: sīsadvayaṃ samaṃ pariyādānaṃ gacchati, so jīvitasamasīsī nāma.
atk-abh03a:229_0: Kathamidaṃ samaṃ hotīti? Vārasamatāya. Yasmiñhi vāre maggavuṭṭhānaṃ hoti – sotāpattimagge
atk-abh03a:229_1: pañca paccavekkhaṇāni, sakadāgāmimagge pañca, anāgāmimagge pañca, arahattamagge cattārīti
atk-abh03a:229_2: ekūnavīsatiyā paccavekkhaṇañāṇe patiṭṭhāya bhavaṅgaṃ otaritvā parinibbāyati. Imāya
atk-abh03a:229_3: vārasamatāya idaṃ ubhayasīsapariyādānaṃ samaṃ hoti nāma. Tenāyaṃ puggalo jīvitasamasīsīti
atk-abh03a:230_0: 17. Ṭhitakappīniddese – ṭhito kappoti ṭhitakappo, ṭhitakappo assa atthīti ṭhitakappī.
atk-abh03a:230_1: Kappaṃ ṭhapetuṃ samatthoti attho. Uḍḍayhanavelā assāti jhāyanakālo bhaveyya. Neva
atk-abh03a:230_2: tāvāti yāva esa maggasamaṅgī puggalo sotāpattiphalaṃ na sacchikaroti, neva tāva kappo
atk-abh03a:230_3: jhāyeyya. Jhāyamānopi ajjhāyitvāva tiṭṭheyya. Kappavināso hi nāma mahāvikāro mahāpayogo
atk-abh03a:230_4: koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷassa jhāyanavasena mahālokavināso. Ayampi evaṃ mahāvināso
atk-abh03a:230_5: tiṭṭheyya vāti vadati. Sāsane pana dharamāne ayaṃ kappavināso nāma natthi. Kappavināse
atk-abh03a:230_6: sāsanaṃ natthi. Gatakoṭike hi kāle kappavināso nāma hoti. Evaṃ santepi satthā antarāyābhāvaṃ
atk-abh03a:230_7: dīpetuṃ idaṃ kāraṇaṃ āhari – “idampi bhaveyya, maggasamaṅgino pana phalassa antarāyo
atk-abh03a:230_8: na sakkā kātu”nti. Ayaṃ pana puggalo kappaṃ ṭhapento kittakaṃ kālaṃ ṭhapeyyāti? Yasmiṃ
atk-abh03a:230_9: vāre maggavuṭṭhānaṃ hoti, atha bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭentaṃ manodvārāvajjanaṃ uppajjati.
atk-abh03a:230_10: Tato tīṇi anulomāni, ekaṃ gotrabhucittaṃ, ekaṃ maggacittaṃ, dve phalacittāni, pañca
atk-abh03a:230_11: paccavekkhaṇañāṇānīti ettakaṃ kālaṃ ṭhapeyya. Imaṃ panatthaṃ bāhirāya āgantukūpamāyapi
atk-abh03a:230_12: evaṃ dīpayiṃsu. Sace hi sotāpattimaggasamaṅgissa matthakūpari yojanikaṃ ekagghanaselaṃ
atk-abh03a:230_13: tivaṭṭāya rajjuyā bandhitvā olambeyya, ekasmiṃ vaṭṭe chinne dvīhi olambeyya, dvīsu
atk-abh03a:230_14: chinnesu ekena olambeyyeva, tasmimpi chinne abbhakūṭaṃ viya ākāse tiṭṭheyya, na tveva
atk-abh03a:230_15: tassa puggalassa maggānantaraphalassa antarāyaṃ kareyyāti. Ayaṃ pana dīpanā parittā,
atk-abh03a:230_16: purimāva mahantā. Na kevalaṃ pana sotāpattimaggaṭṭhova kappaṃ ṭhapeti, itare maggasamaṅginopi
atk-abh03a:230_17: ṭhapentiyeva. Tena bhagavā heṭṭhā gahitañca aggahitañca sabbaṃ saṅkaḍḍhitvā saddhiṃ
atk-abh03a:230_18: piṭṭhivaṭṭakapuggalehi imaṃ tantiṃ āropesi – “sabbepi maggasamaṅgino puggalā ṭhitakappino”ti.
atk-abh03a:231: 18. Ariyaniddese – kilesehi ārakattā ariyā. Sadevakena lokena araṇīyattā ariyā. Ariyaṭṭho nāma parisuddhaṭṭhoti parisuddhattāpi ariyā. Sesā aparisuddhatāya anariyā.
atk-abh03a:232_0: 19. Sekkhaniddese – maggasamaṅgino maggakkhaṇe, phalasamaṅgino ca phalakkhaṇe, adhisīlasikkhādikā
atk-abh03a:232_1: tissopi sikkhā sikkhantiyevāti sekkhā. Arahatā pana arahattaphalakkhaṇe tisso sikkhā
atk-abh03a:232_2: sikkhitā. Puna tassa sikkhanakiccaṃ natthīti asekkhā. Iti satta ariyā sikkhantīti
atk-abh03a:232_3: sekkhā. Khīṇāsavā aññassa santike sīlādīnaṃ sikkhitattā sikkhitaasekkhā nāma. Buddhapaccekabuddhā
atk-abh03a:232_4: sayambhūtatāya asikkhitaasekkhā nāma. Sesapuggalā neva sikkhanti na sikkhitāti nevasekkhānāsekkhā.
atk-abh03a:233_0: 20. Tevijjaniddese – paṭhamaṃ pubbenivāsadibbacakkhuñāṇāni nibbattetvā pacchā arahattaṃ
atk-abh03a:233_1: pattopi, paṭhamaṃ arahattaṃ patvā pacchā pubbenivāsadibbacakkhuñāṇanibbattakopi tevijjoyeva
atk-abh03a:233_2: nāma. Suttantakathā pana pariyāyadesanā abhidhammakathā nippariyāyadesanāti imasmiṃ
atk-abh03a:233_3: ṭhāne āgamanīyameva dhuraṃ. Tasmā paṭhamaṃ dve vijjā nibbattetvā pacchā arahattaṃ
atk-abh03a:233_4: pattova idha adhippeto. Chaḷabhiññepi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a:234_1: pubbe aññassa kassaci santike assutapubbesu. Tato purimapurimesu pana bhavesu sabbaññubodhisattā
atk-abh03a:234_2: buddhasāsane pabbajitvā tīṇi piṭakāni uggahetvā gatapaccāgatavattaṃ āruyha kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh03a:234_3: anulomaṃ gotrabhuṃ āhacca ṭhapenti. Tasmā pacchimabhavasmiṃyeva anācariyakabhāvaṃ
atk-abh03a:234_4: sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Tadā hi tathāgato pūritapāramittā aññassa santike sāmaṃ ananussutesu
atk-abh03a:234_5: saṅkhatāsaṅkhatadhammesu “idaṃ dukkhaṃ…pe… ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”ti attapaccakkhena
atk-abh03a:235_0: Tattha cāti tasmiñca catusaccasambodhisaṅkhāte arahattamagge. Sabbaññutaṃ pāpuṇāti
atk-abh03a:235_1: balesu ca vasībhāvanti sabbaññutaññāṇañceva balesu ca ciṇṇavasībhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti. Buddhānañhi
atk-abh03a:235_2: sabbaññutaññāṇassa ceva dasabalañāṇassa ca adhigamanato paṭṭhāya aññaṃ kātabbaṃ nāma
atk-abh03a:235_3: natthi. Yathā pana ubhatosujātassa khattiyakumārassa abhisekappattito paṭṭhāya ‘idaṃ
atk-abh03a:235_4: nāma issariyaṃ anāgata’nti na vattabbaṃ, sabbaṃ āgatameva hoti. Evameva buddhānaṃ
atk-abh03a:235_5: arahattamaggassa āgamanato paṭṭhāya ‘ayaṃ nāma guṇo na āgato, na paṭividdho, na paccakkho’ti
atk-abh03a:235_6: na vattabbo, sabbepi sabbaññuguṇā āgatā paṭividdhā paccakkhakatāva honti. Ayaṃ vuccatīti
atk-abh03a:235_7: ayaṃ evaṃ pāramīpūraṇasiddhānubhāvena ariyamaggena paṭividdhasabbaññuguṇo puggalo
atk-abh03a:236_0: 23. Paccekabuddhaniddesepi – pubbe ananussutesūti pade pubbe vuttanayeneva attho
atk-abh03a:236_1: veditabbo. Paccekabuddhopi hi pacchimabhave anācariyako attukkaṃsikañāṇeneva paṭividdhasacco
atk-abh03a:236_2: sabbaññutaññāṇañceva balesu ca ciṇṇavasībhāvaṃ na pāpuṇāti.
atk-abh03a:237_0: 24. Ubhatobhāgavimuttaniddese – aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharatīti aṭṭha samāpattiyo
atk-abh03a:237_1: sahajātanāmakāyena paṭilabhitvā viharati. Paññāya cassa disvāti vipassanāpaññāya
atk-abh03a:237_2: saṅkhāragataṃ, maggapaññāya cattāri saccāni passitvā cattāropi āsavā khīṇā honti.
atk-abh03a:237_3: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo ubhatobhāgavimutto nāmāti vuccati. Ayañhi dvīhi
atk-abh03a:237_4: bhāgehi dve vāre vimuttoti ubhatobhāgavimutto. Tatrāyaṃ theravādo – tipiṭakacūḷanāgatthero
atk-abh03a:237_5: tāva āha – “samāpattiyā vikkhambhanavimokkhena, maggena samucchedavimokkhena vimuttoti
atk-abh03a:237_6: ubhatobhāgehi dve vāre vimutto”ti. Tipiṭakamahādhammarakkhitatthero “nāmanissitako eso”ti vatvā –
atk-abh03a:242_0: Vatvā suttaṃ āharitvā “nāmakāyato ca rūpakāyato ca suvimuttattā ubhatobhāgavimutto”ti
atk-abh03a:242_2: vimutto maggena samucchedavimokkhena ekavāraṃ vimuttoti ubhatobhāgavimutto”ti. Ime
atk-abh03a:242_3: pana tayopi therā paṇḍitā, ‘tiṇṇampi vāde kāraṇaṃ dissatī’ti tiṇṇampi vādaṃ tantiṃ katvā ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-abh03a:243_0: Saṅkhepato pana arūpasamāpattiyā rūpakāyato vimutto, maggena nāmakāyato vimuttoti
atk-abh03a:243_1: ubhohi bhāgehi vimuttattā ubhatobhāgavimutto. So catunnaṃ arūpasamāpattīnaṃ ekekato
atk-abh03a:243_2: vuṭṭhāya saṅkhāre sammasitvā arahattaṃ pattānaṃ catunnaṃ, nirodhā vuṭṭhāya arahattaṃ
atk-abh03a:243_3: pattassa anāgāmino ca vasena pañcavidho hoti. Tattha purimā cattāro samāpattisīsaṃ
atk-abh03a:243_4: nirodhaṃ na samāpajjantīti pariyāyena ubhatobhāgavimuttā nāma. Aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī
atk-abh03a:243_5: anāgāmī taṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pattoti nippariyāyena
atk-abh03a:243_6: ubhatobhāgavimuttaseṭṭho nāma. Nanu ca arūpāvacarajjhānampi upekkhācittekaggatāhi
atk-abh03a:243_7: duvaṅgikaṃ rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānampi, tasmā tampi padaṭṭhānaṃ katvā arahattaṃ pattena
atk-abh03a:243_8: ubhatobhāgavimuttena bhavitabbanti? Na bhavitabbaṃ. Kasmā? Rūpakāyato avimuttattā.
atk-abh03a:243_9: Tañhi kilesakāyatova vimuttaṃ, na rūpakāyato; tasmā tato vuṭṭhāya arahattaṃ patto
atk-abh03a:243_10: ubhatobhāgavimutto nāma na hoti. Arūpāvacaraṃ pana nāmakāyato ca vimuttaṃ rūpakāyato
atk-abh03a:243_11: cāti tadeva pādakaṃ katvā arahattaṃ patto ubhatobhāgavimutto hotīti veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:244_0: 25. Paññāvimuttaniddese – paññāya vimuttoti paññāvimutto. So sukkhavipassako catūhi
atk-abh03a:244_1: jhānehi vuṭṭhāya arahattaṃ pattā cattāro cāti pañcavidho hoti. Etesu hi ekopi aṭṭhavimokkhalābhī
atk-abh03a:244_2: na hoti. Teneva na heva kho aṭṭha vimokkhetiādimāha. Arūpāvacarajjhānesu pana ekasmiṃ
atk-abh03a:245_0: 26. Kāyasakkhiniddese – ekacce āsavāti heṭṭhimamaggattayavajjhā. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ
atk-abh03a:245_1: evarūpo puggalo kāyasakkhīti vuccati. So hi phuṭṭhantaṃ sacchikarotīti kāyasakkhī.
atk-abh03a:245_2: Jhānaphassaṃ paṭhamaṃ phusati, pacchā nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikarotītipi kāyasakkhī.
atk-abh03a:245_3: So sotāpattiphalaṭṭhaṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva arahattamaggaṭṭhā chabbidho hoti.
atk-abh03a:246_0: 27. Diṭṭhippattaniddese – idaṃ dukkhanti idaṃ dukkhaṃ, ettakaṃ dukkhaṃ, na ito uddhaṃ
atk-abh03a:246_1: dukkhaṃ. Dukkhasamudayādīsupi eseva nayo. Yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti ṭhapetvā taṇhaṃ
atk-abh03a:246_2: pañcupādānakkhandhe ‘dukkhasacca’nti yāthāvasarasato pajānāti. Taṇhā pana dukkhaṃ
atk-abh03a:246_3: janeti nibbatteti, pabhāveti, tato taṃ dukkhaṃ samudeti; tasmā naṃ ayaṃ ‘dukkhasamudayo’ti
atk-abh03a:246_4: yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti. Yasmā pana idaṃ dukkhañca samudayo ca nibbānaṃ patvā nirujjhanti
atk-abh03a:246_5: vūpasammanti appavattiṃ gacchanti; tasmā naṃ ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodho’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
atk-abh03a:246_6: Ariyo pana aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, taṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ gacchati; tena taṃ ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī
atk-abh03a:246_7: paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti. Ettāvatā nānākkhaṇe saccavavatthānaṃ dassitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:246_8: Idāni ekakkhaṇe dassetuṃ tathāgatappaveditātiādimāha. Tattha tathāgatappaveditāti
atk-abh03a:246_9: mahābodhimaṇḍe nisīdatvā tathāgatena paṭividdhā viditā pākaṭīkatā. Dhammāti catusaccadhammā.
atk-abh03a:246_10: Vodiṭṭhā hontīti sudiṭṭhā honti. Vocaritāti sucaritā. Tesu anena paññā suṭṭhu carāpitā
atk-abh03a:246_11: hotīti attho. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo diṭṭhippattoti vuccati. Ayañhi
atk-abh03a:246_12: diṭṭhantaṃ patto. “Dukkhā saṅkhārā, sukho nirodho”ti ñāṇaṃ hoti. Diṭṭhaṃ viditaṃ
atk-abh03a:246_13: sacchikataṃ passitaṃ paññāyāti diṭṭhappatto. Ayampi kāyasakkhī viya chabbidhova hoti.
atk-abh03a:247_0: 28. Saddhāvimuttaniddese – no ca kho yathā diṭṭhippattassāti yathā diṭṭhippattassa
atk-abh03a:247_1: āsavā parikkhīṇā, na evaṃ saddhāvimuttassāti attho. Kiṃ pana nesaṃ kilesappahāne
atk-abh03a:247_2: nānattaṃ atthīti? Natthi. Atha kasmā saddhāvimutto diṭṭhippattaṃ na pāpuṇātīti? Āgamanīyanānattena.
atk-abh03a:247_3: Diṭṭhippato hi āgamanamhi kilese vikkhambhento appadukkhena appakasirena akilamantova
atk-abh03a:247_4: vikkhambhetuṃ sakkoti. Saddhāvimutto pana dukkhena kasirena kilamanto hutvā vikkhambhetuṃ
atk-abh03a:247_5: sakkoti, tasmā diṭṭhippattaṃ na pāpuṇāti. Apica nesaṃ paññāyapi nānattaṃ atthiyeva.
atk-abh03a:247_6: Diṭṭhippattassa hi upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ tikkhaṃ sūraṃ pasannaṃ hutvā
atk-abh03a:247_7: vahati. Saddhāvimuttassa vipassanāñāṇaṃ no tikkhaṃ sūraṃ pasannaṃ hutvā vahati, tasmāpi
atk-abh03a:248_0: Yathā hi dvīsu taruṇesu sippaṃ dassentesu ekassa hatthe tikhiṇo asi, ekassa kuṇṭho.
atk-abh03a:248_1: Tikhiṇena asinā kadalī chijjamānā saddaṃ na karoti. Kuṇṭhena asinā chijjamānā ‘kaṭakaṭā’ti
atk-abh03a:248_2: saddaṃ karoti. Tattha tikhiṇena asinā saddaṃ akarontiyā eva kadaliyā chedanaṃ viya
atk-abh03a:248_3: diṭṭhippattassa tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanāñāṇassa tikhiṇasūravippasannabhāvo. Kuṇṭhena
atk-abh03a:248_4: asinā saddaṃ karontiyāpi kadaliyā chedanaṃ viya saddhāvimuttassa tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ
atk-abh03a:248_5: vipassanāñāṇassa atikhiṇaasūraappasannabhāvo veditabbo. Imaṃ pana nayaṃ ‘no’ti paṭikkhipitvā,
atk-abh03a:248_6: āgamanīyanānatteneva saddhāvimutto diṭṭhippattaṃ na pāpuṇātīti sanniṭṭhānaṃ kataṃ.
atk-abh03a:249_0: Āgamaṭṭhakathāsu pana vuttaṃ – “etesu hi saddhāvimuttassa pubbabhāgamaggakkhaṇe saddahantassa
atk-abh03a:249_1: viya okappentassa viya adhimuccantassa viya ca kilesakkhayo hoti. Diṭṭhippattassa
atk-abh03a:249_2: pubbabhāgamaggakkhaṇe kilesacchedakañāṇaṃ adandhaṃ tikhiṇaṃ sūraṃ hutvā vahati. Tasmā
atk-abh03a:249_3: yathā nāma atikhiṇena asinā kadaliṃ chindantassa chinnaṭṭhānaṃ na maṭṭhaṃ hoti, asi
atk-abh03a:249_4: na sīghaṃ vahati, saddo suyyati, balavataro vāyāmo kātabbo hoti; evarūpā saddhāvimuttassa
atk-abh03a:249_5: pubbabhāgamaggabhāvanā. Yathā pana sunisiteneva asinā kadaliṃ chindantassa chinnaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh03a:249_6: maṭṭhaṃ hoti, asi sīghaṃ vahati, saddo na suyyati, balavavāyāmakiccaṃ na hoti; evarūpā
atk-abh03a:249_7: diṭṭhippattassa pubbabhāgamaggabhāvanā veditabbā”ti. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo
atk-abh03a:249_8: puggalo saddhāvimuttoti vuccati. Ayañhi saddahanto vimuttoti saddhāvimutto. Ayampi
atk-abh03a:250_0: 29. Dhammānusārīniddese – paṭipannassāti iminā sotāpattimaggaṭṭho dassito. Adhimattanti
atk-abh03a:250_1: balavaṃ. Paññaṃ vāhetīti paññāvāhī. Paññā imaṃ puggalaṃ vahatīti paññāvāhītipi vuttaṃ
atk-abh03a:250_2: hoti. Paññāpubbaṅgamanti paññaṃ purecārikaṃ katvā. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo
atk-abh03a:250_3: dhammānusārīti vuccati. So hi paññāsaṅkhātena dhammena sarati anussaratīti dhammānusārī.
atk-abh03a:250_4: Sotāpattimaggaṭṭhassevetaṃ nāmaṃ. Phale pana patte diṭṭhippatto nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:251_0: 30. Saddhānusārīniddesepi – saddhaṃ vāhetīti saddhāvāhī. Saddhā imaṃ puggalaṃ vahatīti
atk-abh03a:251_1: saddhāvāhītipi vuttameva. Saddhāpubbaṅgamanti saddhaṃ purecārikaṃ katvā. Ayaṃ vuccatīti
atk-abh03a:251_2: ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo saddhānusārīti vuccati. So hi saddhāya sarati. Anussaratīti
atk-abh03a:251_3: saddhānusārī. Sotāpattimaggaṭṭhassevetaṃ nāmaṃ. Phale pana patte saddhāvimutto nāma
atk-abh03a:251_4: hoti. Lokuttaradhammañhi nibbattentānaṃ dve dhurāni nāma, dve abhinivesā nāma, dve
atk-abh03a:251_5: sīsāni nāma. Tattha saddhādhuraṃ paññādhuranti – dve dhurāni nāma. Eko pana bhikkhu
atk-abh03a:251_6: samathābhinivesena abhinivisati, eko vipassanābhinivesenāti – ime dve abhinivesā
atk-abh03a:251_7: nāma. Eko ca matthakaṃ pāpuṇanto ubhatobhāgavimutto hoti, eko paññāvimuttoti – imāni
atk-abh03a:251_8: dve sīsāni nāma. Ye keci hi lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattenti, sabbe te ime dve dhamme
atk-abh03a:251_9: dhuraṃ katvā imesu dvīsu ṭhānesu abhinivisitvā imehi dvīhi ṭhānehi vimuccanti. Tesu
atk-abh03a:251_10: yo bhikkhu aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī paññaṃ dhuraṃ katvā samathavasena abhiniviṭṭho aññataraṃ
atk-abh03a:251_11: arūpasamāpattiṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti, so sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe
atk-abh03a:251_12: dhammānusārī nāma. Parato pana chasu ṭhānesu kāyasakkhī nāma. Arahattaphale patte
atk-abh03a:252_0: Aparo paññameva dhuraṃ katvā vipassanāvasena abhiniviṭṭho suddhasaṅkhāre vā rūpāvacarajjhānesu
atk-abh03a:252_1: vā aññataraṃ sammasitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti, ayampi sotāpattimaggakkhaṇeyeva dhammānusārī
atk-abh03a:252_2: nāma. Parato pana chasu ṭhānesu diṭṭhippatto nāma. Arahatte patte paññāvimutto nāma.
atk-abh03a:252_3: Idha dve nāmāni apubbāni, tāni purimehi saddhiṃ pañca honti. Aparo aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī
atk-abh03a:252_4: saddhaṃ dhuraṃ katvā samādhivasena abhiniviṭṭho aññataraṃ arūpasamāpattiṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh03a:252_5: katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti – ayaṃ sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe saddhānusārī
atk-abh03a:252_6: nāma. Parato chasu ṭhānesu kāyasakkhīyeva nāma. Arahatte patte ubhatobhāgavimuttoyeva
atk-abh03a:252_7: nāma. Idha ekameva nāmaṃ apubbaṃ. Tena saddhiṃ purimāni pañca cha honti. Aparo saddhameva
atk-abh03a:252_8: dhuraṃ katvā vipassanāvasena abhiniviṭṭho suddhasaṅkhāre vā rūpāvacarajjhānesu vā
atk-abh03a:252_9: aññataraṃ sammasitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti. Ayampi sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe saddhānusārī
atk-abh03a:252_10: nāma. Parato chasu ṭhānesu saddhāvimutto nāma. Arahatte patte paññāvimutto nāma.
atk-abh03a:252_11: Idhāpi ekameva nāmaṃ apubbaṃ. Tena saddhiṃ purimāni cha satta honti. Ime satta puggalā
atk-abh03a:253_1: attabhāvaggahaṇaṃ assa, tato paraṃ aṭṭhamaṃ bhavaṃ nādiyatīti sattakkhattuparamo.
atk-abh03a:253_2: Sotāpanno hotīti ettha sototi ariyamaggo, tena samannāgato sotāpanno nāma. Yathāha –
atk-abh03a:254_0: “Soto sototi hidaṃ, sāriputta, vuccati. Katamo nu kho, sāriputta, sototi? Ayameva
atk-abh03a:254_1: hi, bhante, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo soto, seyyathidaṃ – sammādiṭṭhi…pe… sammāsamādhīti.
atk-abh03a:254_2: Sotāpanno sotāpannoti, hidaṃ, sāriputta, vuccati. Katamo nu kho, sāriputta, sotāpannoti?
atk-abh03a:254_3: Yo hi, bhante, iminā ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena samannāgato ayaṃ vuccati sotāpanno,
atk-abh03a:254_4: svāyaṃ āyasmā evaṃnāmo evaṃgotto iti vā”ti.
atk-abh03a:255: Evaṃ maggakkhaṇepi sotāpanno nāma hoti. Idha pana maggena phalassa nāmaṃ dinnanti phalakkhaṇe sotāpanno adhippeto.
atk-abh03a:256_0: Avinipātadhammoti vinipātasaṅkhātaṃ apāyaṃ upapattivasena anāgamanasabhāvo. Niyatoti
atk-abh03a:256_1: magganiyāmena niyato. Sambodhiparāyaṇoti bujjhanakabhāvaparāyaṇo. So hi paṭiladdhamaggena
atk-abh03a:256_2: bujjhatīti sambodhiparāyaṇo. Upari tīhi maggehi avassaṃ bujjhissatīti sambodhiparāyaṇo.
atk-abh03a:256_3: Deve ca manusse cāti devalokañca manussalokañca. Sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvāti paṭisandhivasena
atk-abh03a:256_4: aparāparaṃ gantvā. Dukkhassantaṃ karotīti vaṭṭadukkhassa pariyantaṃ parivaṭumaṃ karoti.
atk-abh03a:256_5: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo sattakkhattuparamo nāma vuccati. Ayaṃ pana kālena
atk-abh03a:256_6: devalokassa kālena manussalokassa vasena missakabhavena kathitoti veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:257_0: 32. Kolaṃkolaniddese – kulato kulaṃ gacchatīti kolaṃkolo. Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyato
atk-abh03a:257_1: hi paṭṭhāya nīce kule upapatti nāma natthi, mahābhogakulesuyeva nibbattatīti attho.
atk-abh03a:257_2: Dve vā tīṇi vā kulānīti devamanussavasena dve vā tayo vā bhave. Iti ayampi missakabhaveneva
atk-abh03a:257_3: kathito. Desanāmattameva cetaṃ – ‘dve vā tīṇi vā’ti. Yāva chaṭṭhabhavā saṃsarantopi
atk-abh03a:258_0: 33. Ekabījiniddese – khandhabījaṃ nāma kathitaṃ. Yassa hi sotāpannassa ekaṃyeva khandhabījaṃ
atk-abh03a:258_1: atthi, ekaṃ attabhāvaggahaṇaṃ, so ekabījī nāma. Mānusakaṃ bhavanti idaṃ panettha
atk-abh03a:258_2: desanāmattameva. Devabhavaṃ nibbattetītipi pana vattuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Bhagavatā gahitanāmavaseneva
atk-abh03a:258_3: cetāni etesaṃ nāmāni. Ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ gato sattakkhattuparamo nāma hoti, ettakaṃ kolaṃkolo,
atk-abh03a:258_4: ettakaṃ ekabījīti bhagavatā etesaṃ nāmaṃ gahitaṃ. Niyamato pana ayaṃ sattakkhattuparamo,
atk-abh03a:259_0: Ko pana tesaṃ etaṃ pabhedaṃ niyametīti? Keci tāva therā ‘pubbahetu niyametī’ti vadanti,
atk-abh03a:259_1: keci ‘paṭhamamaggo’, keci ‘upari tayo maggā’, keci ‘tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanā’ti.
atk-abh03a:259_2: Tattha ‘pubbahetu niyametī’ti vāde ‘paṭhamamaggassa upanissayo kato nāma hoti, upari
atk-abh03a:259_3: tayo maggā nirupanissayā uppannā’ti vacanaṃ āpajjati. ‘Paṭhamamaggo niyametī’ti vāde
atk-abh03a:259_4: upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ niratthakatā āpajjati. ‘Upari tayo maggā niyamentī’ti vāde
atk-abh03a:259_5: ‘aṭṭhamamagge anuppanneyeva upari tayo maggā uppannā’ti āpajjati. ‘Tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ
atk-abh03a:259_6: vipassanā niyametī’ti vādo pana yujjati. Sace hi upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanā
atk-abh03a:259_7: balavatī hoti, ekabījī nāma hoti; tato mandatarāya kolaṃkolo; tato mandatarāya sattakkhattuparamoti.
atk-abh03a:260_0: Ekacco hi sotāpanno vaṭṭajjhāsayo hoti, vaṭṭābhirato, punappunaṃ vaṭṭasmiṃyeva vicarati
atk-abh03a:260_1: sandissati. Anāthapiṇḍiko seṭṭhi, visākhā upāsikā, cūḷarathamahārathā devaputtā,
atk-abh03a:260_2: anekavaṇṇo devaputto, sakko devarājā, nāgadatto devaputtoti ime hi ettakā janā vaṭṭajjhāsayā
atk-abh03a:260_3: vaṭṭābhiratā ādito paṭṭhāya cha devaloke sodhetvā akaniṭṭhe ṭhatvā parinibbāyissanti,
atk-abh03a:260_4: ime idha na gahitā. Na kevalañcime; yopi manussesuyeva sattakkhattuṃ saṃsaritvā arahattaṃ
atk-abh03a:260_5: pāpuṇāti, yopi devaloke nibbatto devesuyeva sattakkhattuṃ aparāparaṃ saṃsaritvā arahattaṃ
atk-abh03a:260_6: pāpuṇāti, imepi idha na gahitā. Missakabhavavaseneva panettha sattakkhattuparamakolaṃkolā
atk-abh03a:260_7: mānusakabhavanibbattakoyeva ca ekabījī gahitoti veditabbo. Tattha ekeko dukkhāpaṭipadādivasena
atk-abh03a:260_8: catubbidhabhāvaṃ āpajjati. Saddhādhureneva cattāro sattakkhattuparamā, cattāro kolaṃkolā,
atk-abh03a:260_9: cattāro ekabījinoti dvādasa honti. Sace paññāya sakkā nibbattetuṃ, ‘ahaṃ lokuttaraṃ
