atk-abh03a:396_5: vatvā daḷhīkammaṃ kattāti attho. Samaggo ārāmo assāti samaggārāmo. Yattha samaggā
atk-abh03a:396_6: natthi, tattha vasitumpi na icchatīti attho. Samaggarāmotipi pāḷi. Ayameva attho.
atk-abh03a:396_7: Samaggaratoti samaggesu rato. Te pahāya aññatra gantumpi na icchatīti attho. Samagge
atk-abh03a:396_8: disvāpi sutvāpi nandatīti samagganandī. Samaggakaraṇiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitāti yā vācā satte
atk-abh03a:396_9: samaggeyeva karoti, taṃ sāmaggīguṇaparidīpakameva vācaṃ bhāsati, na itaranti.
atk-abh03a:397_0: Kālena vadatīti kālavādī. Vattabbayuttakālaṃ sallakkhetvā vadatīti attho. Bhūtaṃ
atk-abh03a:397_2: katvā vadatīti atthavādī. Navalokuttaradhammasannissitaṃ katvā vadatīti dhammavādī.
atk-abh03a:397_3: Saṃvaravinayapahānavinayasannissitaṃ katvā vadatīti vinayavādī. Nidhānaṃ vuccati
atk-abh03a:397_4: ṭhapanokāso. Nidhānamassa atthīti nidhānavatī. Hadaye nidhātabbayuttakaṃ vācaṃ bhāsitāti
atk-abh03a:397_5: attho. Kālenāti evarūpiṃ bhāsamānopi ca “ahaṃ nidhānavatiṃ vācaṃ bhāsissāmī”ti na
atk-abh03a:397_6: akālena bhāsati. Yuttakālaṃ pana sallakkhetvāva bhāsatīti attho. Sāpadesanti saupamaṃ,
atk-abh03a:397_7: sakāraṇanti attho. Pariyantavatinti paricchedaṃ dassetvā. Yathāssā paricchedo paññāyati,
atk-abh03a:397_8: evaṃ bhāsatīti attho. Atthasaṃhitanti anekehipi nayehi vibhajantena pariyādātuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya
atk-abh03a:397_9: atthasampannaṃ bhāsati. Yaṃ vā so atthavādī atthaṃ vadati, tena atthena saṃhitattā
atk-abh03a:397_10: atthasaṃhitaṃ vācaṃ bhāsati. Na aññaṃ nikkhipitvā aññaṃ bhāsatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:398_1: bījabījanti pañcavidhassa bījagāmassa ceva yassa kassaci nīlatiṇarukkhādikassa bhūtagāmassa
atk-abh03a:398_2: ca samārambhā. Chedanabhedanapacanādibhāvena vikopanā paṭiviratoti attho. Ekabhattikoti
atk-abh03a:398_3: pātarāsabhattaṃ, sāyamāsabhattanti dve bhattāni. Tesu pātarāsabhattaṃ antomajjhanhikena
atk-abh03a:398_4: paricchinnaṃ. Itaraṃ majjhanhikato uddhaṃ antoaruṇena. Tasmā antomajjhanhike dasakkhattuṃ
atk-abh03a:398_5: bhuñjamānopi ekabhattikova hoti. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – ekabhattikoti. Rattiyā bhojanaṃ
atk-abh03a:398_6: ratti, tato uparatoti rattūparato. Atikkante majjhanhike yāva sūriyasatthaṅgamanā
atk-abh03a:398_7: bhojanaṃ vikālabhojanaṃ nāma, tato viratattā virato vikālabhojanā. Sāsanassa ananulomattā
atk-abh03a:398_8: visūkaṃ paṭāṇībhūtaṃ dassananti visūkadassanaṃ. Attanā naccananaccāpanādivasena naccā
atk-abh03a:398_9: ca gītā ca vāditā ca antamaso mayūranaccanāpanādivasenapi pavattānaṃ naccādīnaṃ visūkabhūtā
atk-abh03a:398_10: dassanā cāti naccagītavāditavisūkadassanā. Naccādīni hi attanā payojetuṃ vā parehi
atk-abh03a:398_11: payojāpetuṃ vā yuttāni passituṃ vā neva bhikkhūnaṃ na bhikkhunīnaṃ vaṭṭanti. Mālādīsu
atk-abh03a:398_12: – mālāti yaṃkiñci pupphaṃ. Gandhanti yaṃkiñci gandhajātaṃ. Vilepananti chavirāgakaraṇaṃ.
atk-abh03a:398_13: Tattha piḷandhanto dhāreti nāma. Ūnaṭṭhānaṃ pūrento maṇḍeti nāma. Gandhavasena chavirāgavasena
atk-abh03a:398_14: ca sādiyanto vibhūseti nāma. Ṭhānaṃ vuccati kāraṇaṃ. Tasmā yāya dussīlyacetanāya
atk-abh03a:398_15: tāni mālādhāraṇādīni mahājano karoti, tato paṭiviratoti attho. Uccāsayanaṃ vuccati
atk-abh03a:398_16: pamāṇātikkantaṃ. Mahāsayanaṃ akappiyasanthataṃ, tato paṭiviratoti attho. Jātarūpanti
atk-abh03a:398_17: suvaṇṇaṃ. Rajatanti kahāpaṇo, lohamāsako, jatumāsako, dārumāsakoti ye vohāraṃ gacchanti.
atk-abh03a:398_18: Tassa ubhayassāpi paṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato, neva naṃ uggaṇhāti, na uggaṇhāpeti, na
atk-abh03a:399_1: āmakadhaññassa paṭiggahaṇā. Na kevalañca etesaṃ paṭiggahaṇameva, āmasanampi bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-abh03a:399_2: na vaṭṭatiyeva. Āmakamaṃsapaṭiggahaṇāti ettha aññatra odissa anuññātā āmakamacchamaṃsānaṃ
atk-abh03a:399_3: paṭiggahaṇameva bhikkhūnaṃ na vaṭṭati, no āmasanaṃ. Itthikumārikapaṭiggahaṇāti ettha
atk-abh03a:399_4: itthīti purisantaragatā. Itarā kumārikā nāma. Tāsaṃ paṭiggahaṇampi āmasanampi akappiyameva.
atk-abh03a:399_5: Dāsidāsapaṭiggahaṇāti ettha dāsidāsavaseneva tesaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vaṭṭati. ‘Kappiyakārakaṃ
atk-abh03a:399_6: dammi’, ‘ārāmikaṃ dammī’ti evaṃ vutte pana vaṭṭati. Ajeḷakādīsupi khettavatthupariyosānesu
atk-abh03a:399_7: kappiyākappiyanayo vinayavasena upaparikkhitabbo. Tattha khettaṃ nāma yasmiṃ pubbaṇṇaṃ
atk-abh03a:399_8: ruhati. Vatthu nāma yasmiṃ aparaṇṇaṃ ruhati. Yattha vā ubhayampi ruhati taṃ khettaṃ.
atk-abh03a:399_9: Tadatthāya akatabhūmibhāgo vatthu. Khettavatthusīsena cettha vāpitaḷākādīnipi saṅgahitāneva.
atk-abh03a:400_0: Dūteyyaṃ vuccati dūtakammaṃ. Gihīnaṃ pahitaṃ paṇṇaṃ vā sāsanaṃ vā gahetvā tattha
atk-abh03a:400_1: tattha gamanaṃ. Pahīṇagamanaṃ vuccati paragharaṃ pesitassa khuddakagamanaṃ. Anuyogo
atk-abh03a:400_2: nāma tadubhayakaraṇaṃ. Tasmā dūteyyapahīṇagamanānaṃ anugoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh03a:400_3: Kayavikkayāti kayā ca vikkayā ca. Tulākūṭādīsu – kūṭanti vañcanaṃ. Tattha tulākūṭaṃ
atk-abh03a:400_4: nāma rūpakūṭaṃ, aṅgakūṭaṃ gahaṇakūṭaṃ, paṭicchannakūṭanti catubbidhaṃ hoti. Tattha
atk-abh03a:400_5: rūpakūṭaṃ nāma dve tulā samarūpā katvā gaṇhanto mahatiyā gaṇhāti, dadanto khuddikāya
atk-abh03a:400_6: deti. Aṅgakūṭaṃ nāma gaṇhanto pacchābhāge hatthena tulaṃ akkamati, dadanto pubbabhāge.
atk-abh03a:400_7: Gahaṇakūṭaṃ nāma gaṇhanto mūle rajjuṃ gaṇhāti, dadanto agge. Paṭicchannakūṭaṃ nāma
atk-abh03a:400_8: tulaṃ susiraṃ katvā anto ayacuṇṇaṃ pakkhipitvā gaṇhanto taṃ pacchābhāge karoti, dadanto aggabhāge.
atk-abh03a:401_0: Kaṃso vuccati suvaṇṇapāti. Tāya vañcanaṃ kaṃsakūṭaṃ. Kathaṃ? Ekaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ katvā
atk-abh03a:401_1: aññā dve tisso lohapātiyo suvaṇṇavaṇṇā karonti, tato janapadaṃ gantvā kiñcideva aḍḍhakulaṃ
atk-abh03a:401_2: pavisitvā suvaṇṇabhājanāni kiṇathā’ti vatvā agghe pucchite samagghataraṃ dātukāmā
atk-abh03a:401_3: honti. Tato tehi ‘kathaṃ imesaṃ suvaṇṇabhāvo jānitabbo’ti vutte ‘vīmaṃsitvā gaṇhathā’ti
atk-abh03a:401_4: suvaṇṇapātiṃ pāsāṇe ghaṃsitvā sabbapātiyo datvā gacchanti.
atk-abh03a:402_0: Mānakūṭaṃ nāma hadayabhedasikhābhedarajjubhedavasena tividhaṃ hoti. Tattha hadayabhedo
atk-abh03a:402_1: sappitelādiminanakāle labbhati. Tāni hi gaṇhanto heṭṭhā chiddena mānena ‘saṇikaṃ
atk-abh03a:402_2: āsiñcā’ti vatvā antobhājane bahuṃ paggharāpetvā gaṇhāti. Dadanto chiddaṃ pidhāya
atk-abh03a:402_3: sīghaṃ pūretvā deti. Sikhābhedo tilataṇḍulādiminanakāle labbhati. Tāni hi gaṇhanto
atk-abh03a:402_4: saṇikaṃ sikhaṃ ussāpetvā gaṇhāti. Dadanto vegena pūretvā sikhaṃ chindanto deti. Rajjubhedo
atk-abh03a:402_5: khettavatthuminanakāle labbhati. Lañjaṃ alabhantā hi khettaṃ amahantampi mahantaṃ katvā minanti.
atk-abh03a:403_0: Ukkoṭanādīsu – ukkoṭananti assāmike sāmike kātuṃ lañjaggahaṇaṃ. Vañcananti tehi tehi
atk-abh03a:403_1: upāyehi paresaṃ vañcanaṃ. Tatridamekaṃ vatthu – eko kira luddako migañca migapotakañca
atk-abh03a:403_2: gahetvā āgacchati. Tameko dhutto – “kiṃ bho migo agghati, kiṃ migapotako”ti āha.
atk-abh03a:403_3: “Migo dve kahāpaṇe, migapotako eka”nti ca vutte kahāpaṇaṃ datvā migapotakaṃ gahetvā
atk-abh03a:403_4: thokaṃ gantvā nivatto, “na me bho migapotakena attho, migaṃ me dehī”ti āha. Tena
atk-abh03a:403_5: hi “dve kahāpaṇe dehī”ti. So āha – “nanu te, bho, mayā paṭhamaṃ eko kahāpaṇo dinno”ti?
atk-abh03a:403_6: “Āma dinno”ti. Idampi migapotakaṃ gaṇha, evaṃ so ca kahāpaṇo ayañca kahāpaṇagghaṇako
atk-abh03a:403_7: migapotakoti dve kahāpaṇā bhavissantīti. So “kāraṇaṃ vadatī”ti sallakkhetvā migapotakaṃ
atk-abh03a:404_0: Nikatīti yogavasena vā māyāvasena vā apāmaṅgaṃ pāmaṅganti, amaṇiṃ maṇīti, asuvaṇṇaṃ
atk-abh03a:404_1: suvaṇṇanti katvā patirūpakena vañcanaṃ. Sāciyogoti kuṭilayogo. Etesaṃyeva ukkoṭanādīnametaṃ
atk-abh03a:404_2: nāmaṃ. Tasmā ukkoṭanasāciyogo vañcanasāciyogo nikatisāciyogoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh03a:404_3: Keci aññaṃ dassetvā aññassa parivattanaṃ ‘sāciyogo’ti vadanti. Taṃ pana vañcaneneva saṅgahitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:405_0: Chedanādīsu – chedananti hatthacchedanādi. Vadhoti māraṇaṃ. Bandhoti rajjubandhanādīhi
atk-abh03a:405_1: bandhanaṃ. Viparāmosoti himaviparāmoso, gumbaviparāmosoti duvidho. Yañhi himapātasamaye
atk-abh03a:405_2: himena paṭicchannā hutvā maggappaṭipannaṃ janaṃ musanti, ayaṃ himaviparāmoso. Yaṃ
atk-abh03a:405_3: gumbādīhi paṭicchannā musanti, ayaṃ gumbaviparāmoso. Ālopo vuccati gāmanigamādīnaṃ
atk-abh03a:405_4: vilopakaraṇaṃ. Sahasākāroti sāhasikakiriyā. Gehaṃ pavisitvā manussānaṃ ure satthaṃ
atk-abh03a:405_5: ṭhapetvā icchitabhaṇḍaggahaṇaṃ. Evametasmā chedana…pe… sahasākārā paṭivirato hoti.
atk-abh03a:406_0: 180. So santuṭṭho hotīti so catūsu paccayesu dvādasavidhena itarītarapaccayasantosena
atk-abh03a:406_1: samannāgato hoti. Kāyaparihārikenāti kāyaṃ pariharaṇamattakena. Kucchiparihārikenāti
atk-abh03a:406_2: kucchipariharaṇamattakena. Samādāyeva pakkamatīti aṭṭhavidhaṃ bhikkhu parikkhāramattakaṃ
atk-abh03a:406_3: sabbaṃ gahetvāva kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ katvāva gacchati. “Mama vihāro pariveṇaṃ upaṭṭhāko”ti
atk-abh03a:406_4: saṅgo vā baddho vā na hoti. So jiyā muttasaro viya yūthā pakkanto, mattahatthī viya
atk-abh03a:406_5: icchiticchitaṃ senāsanaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ vanapatthaṃ pabbhāraṃ paribhuñjanto
atk-abh03a:406_6: ekova tiṭṭhati, ekova nisīdati. Sabbiriyāpathesu ekova adutiyo.
atk-abh03a:412_0: Idāni tamatthaṃ upamāya sādhento, “seyyathāpī”tiādimāha. Tattha pakkhī sakuṇoti pakkhayutto
atk-abh03a:412_1: sakuṇo. Ḍetīti uppatati. Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepattho – sakuṇo nāma “asukasmiṃ padese
atk-abh03a:412_2: rukkho paripakkaphalo”ti ñatvā nānādisāhi āgantvā nakhapakkhatuṇḍādīhi tassa phalāni
atk-abh03a:412_3: vijjhantā vidhunantā khādanti. “Idaṃ ajjatanāya, idaṃ svātanāya bhavissatī”ti tesaṃ
atk-abh03a:412_4: na hoti. Phale pana khīṇe neva rukkhassa ārakkhaṃ ṭhapenti, na tattha pattaṃ vā nakhaṃ
atk-abh03a:412_5: vā tuṇḍaṃ vā ṭhapenti. Atha kho tasmiṃ rukkhe anapekkho hutvā yo yaṃ disābhāgaṃ icchati,
atk-abh03a:412_6: so tena sapattabhārova uppatitvā gacchati. Evameva ayaṃ bhikkhu nissaṅgo nirapekkhoyeva
atk-abh03a:412_7: pakkamati, tena vuttaṃ samādāyeva pakkamatīti. Ariyenāti niddosena. Ajjhattanti sake
atk-abh03a:413_0: 181. So cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti so iminā ariyena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato bhikkhu
atk-abh03a:413_1: cakkhuviññāṇena rūpaṃ passitvāti attho. Sesapadesupi yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ heṭṭhā
atk-abh03a:413_2: vuttameva. Abyāsekasukhanti kilesehi anavasittasukhaṃ. Avikiṇṇasukhantipi vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:413_3: Indriyasaṃvarasukhañhi diṭṭhādīsu diṭṭhamattādivasena pavattatāya avikiṇṇaṃ hoti.
atk-abh03a:414_0: 182. So abhikkante paṭikkanteti so manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ saṃvarena samannāgato
atk-abh03a:414_1: bhikkhu imesu abhikkantapaṭikkantādīsu sattasu ṭhānesu satisampajaññavasena sampajānakārī
atk-abh03a:414_2: hoti. Tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ jhānavibhaṅge vuttameva.
atk-abh03a:415_0: So iminā cātiādinā kiṃ dasseti? Araññavāsassa paccayasampattiṃ dasseti. Yassa hi
atk-abh03a:415_1: ime cattāro paccayā natthi, tassa araññavāso na ijjhati, tiracchānagatehi vā vanacarakehi
atk-abh03a:415_2: vā saddhiṃ vattabbataṃ āpajjati. Araññe adhivatthā devatā “kiṃ evarūpassa pāpabhikkhuno
atk-abh03a:415_3: araññavāsenā”ti bheravaṃ saddaṃ sāventi. Hatthehi sīsaṃ paharitvā palāyanākāraṃ karonti.
atk-abh03a:415_4: “Asuko bhikkhu araññaṃ pavisitvā idañcidañca pāpakammaṃ akāsī”ti ayaso pattharati.
atk-abh03a:415_5: Yassa panete cattāro paccayā atthi, tassa araññavāso ijjhati. So hi attano sīlaṃ
atk-abh03a:415_6: paccavekkhanto kiñci kāḷakaṃ vā tilakaṃ vā apassanto pītiṃ uppādetvā taṃ khayato
atk-abh03a:415_7: vayato sammasanto ariyabhūmiṃ okkamati. Araññe adhivatthā devatā attamanā vaṇṇaṃ
atk-abh03a:415_8: bhāsanti. Itissa udake pakkhittatelabindu viya yaso vitthāriko hoti. Vivittantiādīni
atk-abh03a:415_9: heṭṭhā vuttatthāneva. So evaṃ samāhite citte…pe… yathākammūpage satte pajānātīti
atk-abh03a:415_10: ettake ṭhāne yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ sabbaṃ visuddhimagge vuttameva.
atk-abh03a:416_0: 185. Tatiyavijjāya so evaṃ samāhite citteti vipassanāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānacittaṃ
atk-abh03a:416_1: veditabbaṃ. Āsavānaṃ khayañāṇāyāti arahattamaggañāṇatthāya. Arahattamaggo hi āsavānaṃ
atk-abh03a:416_2: vināsanato āsavānaṃ khayoti vuccati. Tatra cetaṃ ñāṇaṃ tappariyāpannattāti. Cittaṃ
atk-abh03a:416_3: abhininnāmetīti vipassanācittaṃ abhinīharati. So idaṃ dukkhanti evamādīsu – “ettakaṃ
atk-abh03a:416_4: dukkhaṃ, na ito bhiyyo”ti sabbampi dukkhasaccaṃ sarasalakkhaṇappaṭivedhena yathābhūtaṃ
atk-abh03a:416_5: pajānāti, paṭivijjhati. Tassa ca dukkhassa nibbattikaṃ taṇhaṃ – ayaṃ dukkhasamudayoti;
atk-abh03a:416_6: tadubhayampi yaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā nirujjhati, taṃ tesaṃ appavattiṃ nibbānaṃ – ayaṃ dukkhanirodhoti;
atk-abh03a:416_7: tassa ca sampāpakaṃ ariyamaggaṃ – ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti sarasalakkhaṇapaṭivedhena
atk-abh03a:417_0: Evaṃ sarūpato saccāni dassetvā idāni kilesavasena pariyāyato dassento ime āsavātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:417_1: Tassa evaṃ jānato evaṃ passatoti tassa evaṃ jānantassa evaṃ passantassa saha vipassanāya
atk-abh03a:417_2: koṭippattaṃ maggaṃ katheti. Kāmāsavāti kāmāsavato. Vimuccatīti iminā maggakkhaṇaṃ
atk-abh03a:417_3: dasseti. Vimuttasminti iminā phalakkhaṇaṃ dasseti. Maggakkhaṇe hi cittaṃ vimuccati,
atk-abh03a:417_4: phalakkhaṇe vimuttaṃ hoti. Vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇanti iminā paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ
atk-abh03a:417_5: dasseti. Khīṇā jātītiādīhi tassa bhūmiṃ. Tena hi ñāṇena so paccavekkhanto ‘khīṇā
atk-abh03a:417_6: jātī’tiādīni pajānāti. Vusitanti vuṭṭhaṃ parivuṭṭhaṃ kataṃ caritaṃ niṭṭhitanti attho.
atk-abh03a:417_7: Brahmacariyanti maggabrahmacariyaṃ. Puthujjanakalyāṇakena hi saddhiṃ satta sekkhā
atk-abh03a:417_8: brahmacariyavāsaṃ vasanti nāma. Khīṇāsavo vuṭṭhavāso. Tasmā so attano brahmacariyavāsaṃ
atk-abh03a:417_9: paccavekkhanto vusitaṃ brahmacariyanti pajānāti. Kataṃ karaṇīyanti catūsu saccesu
atk-abh03a:417_10: catūhi maggehi pariññāpahānasacchikiriyābhāvanāvasena soḷasavidhampi kiccaṃ niṭṭhāpitanti
atk-abh03a:417_11: attho. Puthujjanakalyāṇakādayo hi taṃ kiccaṃ karonti; khīṇāsavo katakaraṇīyo. Tasmā
atk-abh03a:417_12: so attano karaṇīyaṃ paccavekkhanto. “Kataṃ karaṇīya”nti pajānāti. Nāparaṃ itthattāyāti
atk-abh03a:417_13: “idāni puna etthabhāvāya evaṃ soḷasakiccabhāvāya kilesakkhayāya vā maggabhāvanākiccaṃ natthī”ti pajānāti.
atk-abh03a:418: 186. Sarāgādīsu – appahīnoti vikkhambhanappahānena vā tadaṅgappahānena vā samucchedappahānena vā appahīno.
atk-abh03a:419_0: 187. Lābhī hotītiādīsu – lābhīti lābhavā paṭilabhitvā ṭhito. Ajjhattaṃ cetosamathassāti
atk-abh03a:419_1: niyakajjhattasaṅkhāte attano citte uppannassa cetosamathassa. Adhipaññādhammavipassanāyāti
atk-abh03a:419_2: adhipaññāsaṅkhātāya khandhadhammesu aniccādivasena pavattāya vipassanāya. Rūpasahagatānanti
atk-abh03a:419_4: arūpasamāpattīnaṃ. Ettha ca paṭhamo aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī puthujjano. Dutiyo sukkhavipassakaariyasāvako.
atk-abh03a:419_5: Tatiyo aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī ariyasāvako. Catuttho lokiyamahājano veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:420_0: 188. Anusotagāmīādīsu – anusotagāmīti vaṭṭasotaṃ anugato, vaṭṭasote nimuggo puthujjano
atk-abh03a:420_1: veditabbo. Paṭisotagāmīti paṭisotagamano. Anusotaṃ agantvā paṭisotaṃ gacchantassetaṃ
atk-abh03a:420_2: adhivacanaṃ. Pāpañca kammaṃ na karotīti paññattaṃ vītikkamanto na karoti. Sahāpi
atk-abh03a:420_3: dukkhena sahāpi domanassenāti kilesapariyuṭṭhāne sati uppannena dukkhadomanassena
atk-abh03a:420_4: saddhimpi. Paripuṇṇanti tissannaṃ sikkhānaṃ ekāyapi anūnaṃ. Parisuddhanti nirupakkilesaṃ.
atk-abh03a:420_5: Brahmacariyanti seṭṭhacariyaṃ. Iminā vārena sotāpannasakadāgāmino kathitā. Kiṃ pana
atk-abh03a:420_6: te rudantā brahmacariyaṃ carantīti? Āma. Kilesarodanena rudantā caranti nāma. Sīlasampanno
atk-abh03a:421_0: Ṭhitattoti ṭhitasabhāvo. Anāgāmīti kāmarāgabyāpādehi akampanīyacittatāya ca tamhā
atk-abh03a:421_1: lokā anāvattidhammatāya ca ṭhitasabhāvo nāma. Tiṇṇoti taṇhāsotaṃ uttiṇṇo. Pāraṅgatoti
atk-abh03a:421_2: nibbānapāraṃ gato. Thale tiṭṭhatīti arahattaphalasamāpattithale tiṭṭhati. Cetovimuttinti
atk-abh03a:421_3: phalasamādhiṃ. Paññāvimuttinti phalañāṇaṃ. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ khīṇāsavo “tiṇṇo pāraṅgato
atk-abh03a:421_4: thale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇo”ti vuccati. Bāhitapāpatāya hi esa brāhmaṇo nāma.
atk-abh03a:422_0: 189. Appassutādīsu – appakaṃ sutaṃ hotīti navaṅge satthusāsane kiñcideva thokaṃ sutaṃ
atk-abh03a:422_1: hoti. Na atthamaññāya, na dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammapaṭipanno hotīti aṭṭhakathañca
atk-abh03a:422_2: pāḷiñca jānitvā lokuttaradhammassa anurūpadhammaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno na
atk-abh03a:422_3: hoti. Iminā nayena sabbattha attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:423_0: 190. Samaṇamacalādīsu – samaṇamacaloti samaṇaacalo, makāro padasandhikaro. Niccalasamaṇo,
atk-abh03a:423_1: thirasamaṇoti attho. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ sotāpanno sāsane mūlajātāya saddhāya patiṭṭhitattā
atk-abh03a:423_2: ‘samaṇamacalo’ti vuccati. Sakadāgāmī pana rajjanakilesassa atthitāya samaṇapadumoti
atk-abh03a:423_3: vutto. Rattaṭṭho hi idha padumaṭṭho nāmāti vuttaṃ. Anāgāmī kāmarāgasaṅkhātassa rajjanakilesassa
atk-abh03a:423_4: natthitāya samaṇapuṇḍarīkoti vutto. Paṇḍaraṭṭho hi idha puṇḍarīkaṭṭho nāmāti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:423_5: Khīṇāsavo ca thaddhabhāvakarānaṃ kilesānaṃ abhāvena samaṇesu samaṇasukhumālo nāmāti
atk-abh03a:426_0: 191. Pañcake – tatrāti tesu “ārabhati ca vippaṭisārī ca hotī”tiādinā nayena heṭṭhā
atk-abh03a:426_1: uddiṭṭhapuggalesu. Yvāyanti yo ayaṃ. Ārabhatīti ettha ārambhasaddo kammakiriyāhiṃsanavīriyavikopanāpattivītikkamesu
atk-abh03a:426_2: vattati. Tathā hesa “yaṃkiñci dukkhaṃ sambhoti, sabbaṃ ārambhapaccayā”ti kamme āgato.
atk-abh03a:426_3: “Mahāyaññā mahārambhā, na te honti mahapphalā”ti kiriyāyaṃ. “Samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ uddissa
atk-abh03a:426_4: pāṇaṃ ārabhantī”ti hiṃsane. “Ārabhatha, nikkhamatha, yuñjatha buddhasāsane”ti vīriye.
atk-abh03a:426_6: ca hotī”ti ayaṃ pana āpattivītikkame āgato. Tasmā āpattivītikkamavasena ārabhati
atk-abh03a:426_7: ceva tappaccayā vippaṭisārī ca hotīti ayamettha attho.
atk-abh03a:427_0: Yathābhūtaṃ nappajānātīti anadhigatattā yathāsabhāvato na jānāti. Yatthassāti yasmiṃ
atk-abh03a:427_1: assa, yaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā etassa puggalassa uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā
atk-abh03a:427_2: nirujjhantīti attho. Kiṃ pana patvā te nirujjhantīti? Arahattamaggaṃ. Phalappattassa
atk-abh03a:427_3: pana niruddhā nāma honti. Evaṃ santepi idha maggakiccavasena phalameva vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:427_4: Ārambhajāti āpattivītikkamasambhavā. Vippaṭisārajāti vippaṭisārato jātā. Pavaḍḍhantīti
atk-abh03a:427_5: punappunaṃ uppajjanena vaḍḍhanti. Sādhūti āyācanasādhu. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yāva aparaddhañca
atk-abh03a:427_6: vata āyasmatā, evaṃ santepi mayaṃ āyasmantaṃ yācāma – “desetabbayuttakassa desanāya,
atk-abh03a:427_7: vuṭṭhātabbayuttakassa vuṭṭhānena, āvikātabbayuttakassa āvikiriyāya, ārambhaje āsave
atk-abh03a:427_8: pahāya, suddhante ṭhitabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena vippaṭisāraje āsave paṭivinodetvā nīharitvā
atk-abh03a:427_9: vipassanācittañceva vipassanāpaññañca bhāvetū”ti. Amunā pañcamena puggalenāti etena
atk-abh03a:427_10: pañcamena khīṇāsavapuggalena. Samasamo bhavissatīti lokuttaraguṇehi samabhāveneva
atk-abh03a:427_11: samo bhavissatīti evaṃ khīṇāsavena ovaditabboti attho.
atk-abh03a:428_0: Ārabhati na vippaṭisārī hotīti āpattiṃ āpajjati. Taṃ pana desetuṃ sabhāgapuggalaṃ
atk-abh03a:428_1: pariyesati. Tasmā na vippaṭisārī hoti. Aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “vuṭṭhitattā na
atk-abh03a:428_2: vippaṭisārī hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Na ārabhati vippaṭisārī hotīti āpattiṃ nāpajjati, vinayapaññattiyaṃ
atk-abh03a:428_3: pana akovidattā anāpattiyaṃ āpattisaññī hutvā vippaṭisārī hoti. Aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyaṃ
atk-abh03a:428_4: pana “sakiṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya pacchā kiñcāpi nāpajjati, vippaṭisāraṃ
atk-abh03a:428_5: pana vinodetuṃ na sakkotī”ti vuttaṃ. Na ārabhati na vippaṭisārī hotīti neva āpattiṃ
atk-abh03a:428_6: āpajjati, na vippaṭisārī hoti. Katamo panesa puggaloti? Ossaṭṭhavīriyapuggalo. So
atk-abh03a:428_7: hi “kiṃ me imasmiṃ buddhakāle parinibbānena, anāgate metteyyasammāsambuddhakāle parinibbāyissāmī”ti
atk-abh03a:428_8: visuddhasīlopi paṭipattiṃ na pūreti. Sopi “kimatthaṃ āyasmā pamatto viharati puthujjanassa
atk-abh03a:428_9: nāma gati anibaddhā. Āyasmā hi metteyyasammāsambuddhassa sammukhabhāvaṃ labheyyapi
atk-abh03a:428_10: na labheyyāpīti arahattatthāya vipassanaṃ bhāvehī”ti ovaditabbova. Sesaṃ sabbattha
atk-abh03a:429_0: 192. Datvā avajānātītiādīsu – eko bhikkhu mahāpuñño catupaccayalābhī hoti. So cīvarādīni
atk-abh03a:429_1: labhitvā aññaṃ appapuññaṃ āpucchati. Sopi tasmiṃ punappunaṃ āpucchantepi gaṇhātiyeva.
atk-abh03a:429_2: Athassa itaro thokaṃ kupito hutvā maṅkubhāvaṃ uppādetukāmo vadati – “ayaṃ attano
atk-abh03a:429_3: dhammatāya cīvarādīni na labhati, amhe nissāya labhatī”ti. Evaṃ puggalo datvā avajānāti
atk-abh03a:429_4: nāma. Eko pana ekena saddhiṃ dve tīṇi vassāni vasanto pubbe taṃ puggalaṃ garuṃ katvā
atk-abh03a:429_5: pacchā gacchante gacchante kāle cittīkāraṃ na karoti, āsanāpi na vuṭṭhāti, upaṭṭhānampi
atk-abh03a:429_6: na gacchati. Evaṃ puggalo saṃvāsena avajānāti nāma.
atk-abh03a:430_0: Ādheyyamukhoti ādito dheyyamukho. Paṭhamavacanasmiṃyeva ṭhapitamukhoti attho. Adhimuccitā
atk-abh03a:430_1: hotīti saddhātā hoti. Tatrāyaṃ nayo – eko puggalo sāruppaṃyeva bhikkhuṃ ‘asāruppo
atk-abh03a:430_2: eso’ti katheti, taṃ sutvā esa niṭṭhaṃ gacchati. Puna aññena sabhāgena bhikkhunā ‘sāruppo
atk-abh03a:430_3: aya’nti vuttepi tassa vacanaṃ na gaṇhāti “asukena nāma ‘asāruppo aya’nti amhākaṃ
atk-abh03a:430_4: kathita”nti purimabhikkhunova kathaṃ gaṇhāti. Aparopissa dussīlaṃ ‘sīlavā’ti katheti.
atk-abh03a:430_5: Tassa vacanaṃ saddahitvā puna aññena “asāruppo esa bhikkhu, nāyaṃ tumhākaṃ santikaṃ
atk-abh03a:430_6: upasaṅkamituṃ yutto”ti vuttopi tassa vacanaṃ aggahetvā purimasseva kathaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-abh03a:430_7: Aparo vaṇṇampi kathitaṃ gaṇhāti, avaṇṇampi kathitaṃ gaṇhātiyeva. Ayampi ādheyyamukhoyeva
atk-abh03a:430_8: nāma. Ādhātabbamukho yaṃ yaṃ suṇāti, tattha tattha ṭhapitamukhoti attho.
atk-abh03a:431_0: Loloti saddhādīnaṃ ittarakālaṭṭhitikattā assaddhiyādīhi lulitabhāvena lolo. Ittarasaddhoti
atk-abh03a:431_1: parittasaddho, aparipuṇṇasaddho. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Ettha pana punappunaṃ bhajanavasena
atk-abh03a:431_2: saddhāva bhatti. Pemaṃ saddhāpemaṃ gehasitapemampi vaṭṭati. Pasādo saddhāpasādova.
atk-abh03a:431_3: Evaṃ puggalo lolo hotīti evaṃ ittarasaddhāditāya puggalo lolo nāma hoti. Haliddirāgo
atk-abh03a:431_4: viya, thusarāsimhi koṭṭitakhāṇuko viya, assapiṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhapitakumbhaṇḍaṃ viya ca anibaddhaṭṭhāno
atk-abh03a:432: Mando momūhoti aññāṇabhāvena mando avisadatāya momūho. Mahāmūḷhoti attho.
atk-abh03a:433_0: 193. Yodhājīvūpamesu – yodhājīvāti yuddhūpajīvino. Rajagganti hatthiassādīnaṃ pādappahārabhinnāya
atk-abh03a:433_1: bhūmiyā uggataṃ rajakkhandhaṃ. Na santhambhatīti santhambhitvā ṭhātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-abh03a:433_2: Sahati rajagganti rajakkhandhaṃ disvāpi adhivāseti. Dhajagganti hatthiassādipiṭṭhesu
atk-abh03a:433_3: vā rathesu vā ussāpitānaṃ dhajānaṃ aggaṃ. Ussāraṇanti hatthiassarathādīnañceva balakāyassa
atk-abh03a:433_4: ca uccāsaddamahāsaddaṃ. Sampahāreti samāgate appamattakepi pahāre. Haññatīti vihaññati,
atk-abh03a:433_5: vighātaṃ āpajjati. Byāpajjatīti vipattiṃ āpajjati, pakatibhāvaṃ jahati. Sahati sampahāranti
atk-abh03a:433_6: dve tayo pahāre patvāpi sahati, adhivāseti. Tameva saṅgāmasīsanti tameva jayakhandhāvāraṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:433_7: Ajjhāvasatīti sattāhamattaṃ abhibhavitvā āvasati. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Laddhappahārānaṃ pahārajagganatthañceva
atk-abh03a:434: 194. Idāni yasmā satthu yodhājīvehi kiccaṃ natthi, imasmiṃ pana sāsane tathārūpe pañca puggale dassetuṃ idaṃ opammaṃ ābhataṃ, tasmā te puggale dassento evamevantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:435_0: Tattha saṃsīdatīti micchāvitakkasmiṃ visīdati, anupavisati. Na sakkoti brahmacariyaṃ
atk-abh03a:435_1: sandhāretunti brahmacariyavāsaṃ anupacchijjamānaṃ gopetuṃ na sakkoti. Sikkhādubbalyaṃ
atk-abh03a:435_2: āvikatvāti sikkhāya dubbalabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā. Kimassa rajaggasminti kiṃ tassa puggalassa
atk-abh03a:435_3: rajaggaṃ nāmāti vadati. Abhirūpāti abhirūpavatī. Dassanīyāti dassanayoggā. Pāsādikāti
atk-abh03a:435_4: dassaneneva cittappasādāvahā. Paramāyāti uttamāya. Vaṇṇapokkharatāyāti sarīravaṇṇena
atk-abh03a:436: 196. Ūhasatīti avahasati. Ullapatīti katheti. Ujjagghatīti pāṇiṃ paharitvā mahāhasitaṃ hasati. Uppaṇḍetīti uppaṇḍanakathaṃ katheti.
atk-abh03a:437: 197. Abhinisīdatīti abhibhavitvā santike vā ekāsane vā nisīdati. Dutiyapadepi eseva nayo. Ajjhottharatīti avattharati.
atk-abh03a:438: 198. Viniveṭhetvā vinimocetvāti gahitaṭṭhānato tassa hatthaṃ viniveṭhetvā ceva, mocetvā ca. Sesamettha uttānatthameva.
atk-abh03a:439_0: 199. Piṇḍapātikesu – mandattā momūhattāti neva samādānaṃ jānāti, na ānisaṃsaṃ; attano
atk-abh03a:439_1: pana mandattā momūhattā aññāṇeneva piṇḍapātiko hoti. Pāpiccho icchāpakatoti piṇḍapātikassa
atk-abh03a:439_2: me sato “ayaṃ piṇḍapātiko”ti catupaccayasakkāraṃ karissanti. Lajjī, appicchotiādīhi
atk-abh03a:439_3: ca guṇehi sambhāvessantīti. Evaṃ pāpikāya icchāya ṭhatvā tāya pāpicchāya abhibhūto
atk-abh03a:439_4: hutvā piṇḍapātiko hoti. Ummādavasena piṇḍāya caranto pana ummādā cittavikkhepā piṇḍapātiko
atk-abh03a:439_5: nāma hoti. Vaṇṇitanti idaṃ piṇḍapātikaṅgaṃ nāma buddhehi ca buddhasāvakehi ca vaṇṇitaṃ
atk-abh03a:439_6: pasatthanti piṇḍapātiko hoti. Appicchataṃyeva nissāyātiādīsu – “iti appiccho bhavissāmi,
atk-abh03a:439_7: idaṃ me piṇḍapātikaṅgaṃ appicchatāya saṃvattissati; ‘iti santuṭṭho bhavissāmi idaṃ
atk-abh03a:439_8: me piṇḍapātikaṅgaṃ santuṭṭhiyā saṃvattissati’; ‘iti kilese saṃlikhissāmi’, idaṃ me
atk-abh03a:439_9: piṇḍapātikaṅgaṃ kilesasallekhanatthāya saṃvattissatī”ti piṇḍapātiko hoti. Idamatthitanti
atk-abh03a:439_10: imāya kalyāṇāya paṭipattiyā atthikabhāvaṃ, iminā vā piṇḍapātamattena atthikabhāvaṃ.
atk-abh03a:439_11: Yaṃ yaṃ laddhaṃ tena teneva yāpanabhāvaṃ nissāyāti attho. Aggoti jeṭṭhako. Sesāni tasseva vevacanāni.
atk-abh03a:440_0: Gavā khīranti gāvito khīraṃ nāma hoti, na vinā gāviyā. Khīramhā dadhītiādīsupi eseva
atk-abh03a:440_1: nayo. Evamevanti yathā etesu pañcasu gorasesu sappimaṇḍo aggo; evamevaṃ imesu pañcasu
atk-abh03a:440_2: piṇḍapātikesu yvāyaṃ appicchatādīni nissāya piṇḍapātiko hoti. Ayaṃ aggo ca seṭṭho
atk-abh03a:440_3: ca pāmokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca. Imesu pana pañcasu piṇḍapātikesu dveva janā piṇḍapātikā,
atk-abh03a:440_4: tayo na piṇḍapātikā. Nāmamattena pana piṇḍapātikāti veditabbā. Khalupacchābhattikādīsupi eseva nayoti.
atk-abh03a:443: 202. Chakke – tatrāti tesu chasu puggalesu. Sammāsambuddho tena daṭṭhabboti so puggalo tena anācariyakena attanā uppāditena sabbaññutaññāṇena sabbaññubuddho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh03a:444_0: Paccekasambuddho tenātiādīsupi tena paccekasambodhiñāṇena so puggalo paccekasambuddho.
atk-abh03a:444_1: Tena sāvakapāramīñāṇena te puggalā sāriputtamoggallānā. Tena dukkhassa antakaraṇena
atk-abh03a:444_2: te puggalā avasesā arahanto. Tena itthattaṃ anāgamanena so puggalo anāgāmī. Tena
atk-abh03a:444_3: itthattaṃ āgamanena te puggalā sotāpannasakadāgāmino daṭṭhabbāti.
atk-abh03a:447_0: 203. Sattake – sakiṃ nimuggoti ekavāraṃ nimuggo. Ekantakāḷakehīti ekanteneva kāḷakehi
atk-abh03a:447_2: iminā kāraṇena puggalo ekavāraṃ nimuggo tathā nimuggova hoti. Etassa hi puna bhavato
atk-abh03a:447_3: vuṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthīti vadanti. Makkhaligosālādayo viya heṭṭhā narakaggīnaṃyeva āhāro hoti.
atk-abh03a:448_0: Sāhu saddhā kusalesu dhammesūti kusaladhammesu saddhā nāma sādhuladdhikāti ummujjati.
atk-abh03a:448_1: So tāvatakeneva kusalena ummujjati nāma. Sādhu hirītiādīsupi eseva nayo. Hāyatiyevāti
atk-abh03a:448_2: caṅkavāre āsittaudakaṃ viya ekantena parihāyateva. Evaṃ puggaloti evaṃ sāhu saddhāti.
atk-abh03a:448_3: Imesaṃ saddhādīnaṃ vasena ekavāraṃ ummujjitvā tesaṃ parihāniyā puna nimujjatiyeva,
atk-abh03a:448_4: devadattādayo viya. Devadatto hi aṭṭha samāpattiyo, pañca ca abhiññāyo nibbattetvāpi
atk-abh03a:448_5: puna buddhānaṃ paṭikaṇṭakatāya tehi guṇehi parihīno ruhiruppādakammaṃ saṅghabhedakammañca
atk-abh03a:448_6: katvā kāyassa bhedā dutiyacittavārena niraye nibbatti. Kokāliko dve aggasāvake upavaditvā
atk-abh03a:449_0: Neva hāyati no vaḍḍhatīti appahonakakālepi na hāyati, pahonakakālepi na vaḍḍhati.
atk-abh03a:449_1: Ubhayampi panetaṃ agārikenapi anagārikenapi dīpetabbaṃ. Ekacco hi agāriko appahonakakāle
atk-abh03a:449_2: pakkhikabhattaṃ vā salākabhattaṃ vā vassāvāsikaṃ vā upanibandhāpeti. So pacchā pahonakakālepi
atk-abh03a:449_3: pakkhikabhattādimattameva pavatteti. Anagārikopi ādimhi appahonakakāle uddesaṃ vā
atk-abh03a:449_4: dhutaṅgaṃ vā gaṇhāti, medhābalavīriyasampattiyā pahonakakālepi tato uttariṃ na karoti.
atk-abh03a:449_5: Evaṃ puggaloti evaṃ imāya saddhādīnaṃ ṭhitiyā puggalo ummujjitvā ṭhito nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a:450: Ummujjitvā vipassati viloketīti sotāpanno puggalo uṭṭhahitvā gamanamaggaṃ gantabbaṃ disaṃ vā āloketi nāma.
atk-abh03a:451: Ummujjitvā pataratīti sakadāgāmipuggalo kilesatanutāya uṭṭhahitvā gantabbadisābhimukho patarati nāma.
atk-abh03a:452: Patigādhappatto hotīti anāgāmipuggalo uṭṭhāya viloketvā pataritvā gantvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne patiṭṭhāpatto nāma hoti, tiṭṭhati, na punāgacchati.
atk-abh03a:453: Tiṇṇo pāraṅgato thale tiṭṭhatīti sabbakilesoghaṃ taritvā paratīraṃ gantvā nibbānathale ṭhito nāma hoti. Ime pana satta puggalā udakopamena dīpitā.
atk-abh03a:454_0: Satta kira jaṅghavāṇijā addhānamaggapaṭipannā antarāmagge ekaṃ puṇṇanadiṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-abh03a:454_1: Tesu paṭhamaṃ otiṇṇo udakabhīruko puriso otiṇṇaṭṭhāneyeva nimujjitvā puna uṭṭhātuṃ
atk-abh03a:454_2: nāsakkhi, antoyeva macchakacchapabhakkho jāto. Dutiyo otiṇṇaṭṭhāne nimujjitvā sakiṃ
atk-abh03a:454_3: uṭṭhahitvā puna nimuggo uṭṭhātuṃ nāsakkhi, antoyeva macchakacchapabhakkho jāto. Tatiyo
atk-abh03a:454_4: nimujjitvā uṭṭhahi. So majjhe nadiyā ṭhatvā neva orato āgantuṃ, na parato gantuṃ
atk-abh03a:454_5: asakkhi. Catuttho uṭṭhāya ṭhito uttaraṇatitthaṃ olokesi. Pañcamo otaraṇatitthaṃ oloketvā
atk-abh03a:454_6: patari. Chaṭṭho taritvā pārimatīraṃ gantvā kaṭippamāṇe udake ṭhito. Sattamo pārimatīraṃ
atk-abh03a:454_7: gantvā gandhacuṇṇādīhi nhātvā varavatthāni nivāsetvā surabhivilepanaṃ vilimpitvā
atk-abh03a:454_8: nīluppalādīni piḷandhitvā nānālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍito mahānagaraṃ pavisitvā pāsādavaramāruyha
atk-abh03a:455_0: Tattha satta jaṅghavāṇijā viya ime satta puggalā. Nadī viya vaṭṭaṃ. Paṭhamassa udakabhīrukassa
atk-abh03a:455_1: purisassa otiṇṇaṭṭhāneyeva nimujjanaṃ viya micchādiṭṭhikassa vaṭṭe nimujjanaṃ. Ummujjitvā
atk-abh03a:455_2: nimuggapuriso viya saddhādīnaṃ uppattimattakena ummujjitvā tesaṃ parihāniyā nimuggapuggalo.
atk-abh03a:455_3: Majjhe nadiyā ṭhito viya saddhādīnaṃ ṭhitiyā ṭhitapuggalo. Uttaraṇatitthaṃ olokento
atk-abh03a:455_4: viya gantabbamaggaṃ gantabbadisaṃ vā olokento sotāpanno. Pataritapuriso viya kilesatanutāya
atk-abh03a:455_5: pataranto sakadāgāmī. Taritvā kaṭimatte udake ṭhitapuriso viya anāvattitadhammatāya
atk-abh03a:455_6: ṭhito anāgāmī. Nhatvā pārimatīraṃ uttaritvā thale ṭhitapuriso viya cattāro oghe atikkamitvā
atk-abh03a:455_7: nibbānathale ṭhito khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇo. Thale ṭhitapurisassa nagaraṃ pavisitvā pāsādavaraṃ
atk-abh03a:455_8: āruyha uttamabhojanabhuñjanaṃ viya khīṇāsavassa nibbānārammaṇaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā
atk-abh03a:459_1: kāmāvacarabhūmiyaññeva niṭṭhā hoti. Kāmāvacarattabhāveneva arahattappatti ca anupādisesanibbānappatti ca hotīti attho.
atk-abh03a:460_0: Idha vihāyāti idha kāmāvacare attabhāve vihāya suddhāvāsattabhāve ṭhitānaṃ niṭṭhā
atk-abh03a:460_1: hotīti attho. Antarāparinibbāyiādayo hi idha anāgāmiphalaṃ patvā ito cutā suddhāvāsesu
atk-abh03a:460_2: uppajjitvā tena attabhāvena arahattañceva anupādisesanibbānadhātuñca pāpuṇanti. Tena
atk-abh03a:468: Suvibhatto asaṃkiṇṇo, yo yo attho yahiṃ yahiṃ;
atk-abh03a:469: Tato tato taṃ gahetvā, pahāya ativitthāraṃ.
atk-abh03a:470: Visuddhimagge yaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ anādāya saṅkhatā;
atk-abh03a:474: Sampattaṃ kusalaṃ tena, saddhammaṃ sukhumaṃ sivaṃ;
atk-abh03a:489: Tasmā naṃ vaṇṇayissāmi, taṃ suṇātha samāhitāti.
atk-abh03a:491_1: vassaṃ upagantvā mātaraṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā devaparisāya abhidhammakathaṃ kathento
atk-abh03a:491_3: vāre sampatte “anāgate mama sāvako mahāpañño moggaliputtatissatthero nāma uppannaṃ
atk-abh03a:491_4: sāsanamalaṃ sodhetvā tatiyasaṅgītiṃ karonto bhikkhusaṅghassa majjhe nisinno sakavāde
atk-abh03a:491_5: pañca suttasatāni paravāde pañcāti suttasahassaṃ samodhānetvā imaṃ pakaraṇaṃ bhājessatī”ti
atk-abh03a:491_6: tassokāsaṃ karonto yā cesā puggalavāde tāva catūsu pañhesu dvinnaṃ pañcakānaṃ vasena
atk-abh03a:491_7: aṭṭhamukhā vādayutti, taṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbakathāmaggesu asampuṇṇabhāṇavāramattāya
atk-abh03a:491_8: tantiyā mātikaṃ ṭhapesi. Athāvasesaṃ abhidhammakathaṃ vitthāranayeneva kathetvā vutthavasso
atk-abh03a:491_9: suvaṇṇarajatasopānamajjhe maṇimayena sopānena devalokato saṅkassanagare oruyha sattahitaṃ
atk-abh03a:491_10: sampādento yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi.
atk-abh03a:492_0: Athassa mahākassapappamukho vasīgaṇo ajātasatturājānaṃ sahāyaṃ gahetvā dhammavinayasarīraṃ
atk-abh03a:492_1: saṅgahaṃ āropesi. Tato vassasatassa accayena vajjiputtakā bhikkhū dasa vatthūni dīpayiṃsu.
atk-abh03a:492_2: Tāni sutvā kākaṇḍakassa brāhmaṇassa putto yasatthero susunāgaputtaṃ kālāsokaṃ nāma
atk-abh03a:492_3: rājānaṃ sahāyaṃ gahetvā dvādasannaṃ bhikkhusatasahassānaṃ antare sattatherasatāni
atk-abh03a:492_4: uccinitvā tāni dasavatthūni madditvā dhammavinayasarīraṃ saṅgahaṃ āropesi.
atk-abh03a:493_0: Tehi pana dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi niggahitā dasasahassā vajjiputtakā bhikkhū pakkhaṃ
atk-abh03a:493_1: pariyesamānā attano anurūpaṃ dubbalapakkhaṃ labhitvā visuṃ mahāsaṅghikācariyakulaṃ
atk-abh03a:493_2: nāma akaṃsu. Tato bhijjitvā aparāni dve ācariyakulāni jātāni – gokulikā ca ekabyohārikā
atk-abh03a:493_3: ca. Gokulikanikāyato bhijjitvā aparāni dve ācariyakulāni jātāni – paṇṇattivādā ca
atk-abh03a:493_4: bāhuliyā ca. Bahussutikātipi tesaṃyeva nāmaṃ. Tesaṃyeva antare cetiyavādā nāma apare
atk-abh03a:493_5: ācariyavādā uppannā. Evaṃ mahāsaṅghikācariyakulato dutiye vassasate pañcācariyakulāni
atk-abh03a:493_6: uppannāni. Tāni mahāsaṅghikehi saddhiṃ cha honti.
atk-abh03a:494_0: Tasmiṃyeva dutiye vassasate theravādato bhijjitvā dve ācariyavādā uppannā – mahisāsakā
atk-abh03a:494_1: ca vajjiputtakā ca. Tattha vajjiputtakavādato bhijjitvā apare cattāro ācariyavādā
atk-abh03a:494_2: uppannā – dhammuttariyā, bhadrayānikā, channāgārikā, samitiyāti. Puna tasmiṃyeva
atk-abh03a:494_3: dutiye vassasate mahisāsakavādato bhijjitvā sabbatthivādā dhammaguttikāti dve ācariyavādā
atk-abh03a:494_4: uppannā. Puna sabbatthivādakulato bhijjitvā kassapikā nāma jātā. Kassapikesu bhinnesu
atk-abh03a:494_5: apare saṅkantikā nāma jātā. Saṅkantikesu bhinnesu suttavādā nāma jātāti theravādato
atk-abh03a:494_6: bhijjitvā ime ekādasa ācariyavādā uppannā. Te theravādehi saddhiṃ dvādasa honti.
atk-abh03a:494_7: Iti ime ca dvādasa, mahāsaṅghikānañca cha ācariyavādāti sabbeva aṭṭhārasa ācariyavādā
atk-abh03a:494_8: dutiye vassasate uppannā. Aṭṭhārasa nikāyātipi, aṭṭhārasācariyakulānītipi etesaṃyeva
atk-abh03a:494_9: nāmaṃ. Etesu pana sattarasa vādā bhinnakā, theravādo asambhinnakoti veditabbo. Vuttampi cetaṃ dīpavaṃse –
atk-abh03a:496: Aññaṃ pakkhaṃ labhitvāna, adhammavādī bahū janā.
atk-abh03a:502: Atthaṃ dhammañca bhindiṃsu, vinaye nikāyesu ca pañcasu.
atk-abh03a:505: “Aññaṃ sandhāya bhaṇitaṃ, aññaṃ atthaṃ ṭhapayiṃsu te;
atk-abh03a:506: Byañjanacchāyāya te bhikkhū, bahuṃ atthaṃ vināsayuṃ.
atk-abh03a:508: Patirūpaṃ suttaṃ vinayaṃ, tañca aññaṃ kariṃsu te.
atk-abh03a:536: Ganthañca ekadesañhi, chaḍḍetvā aññaṃ akaṃsu te.
atk-abh03a:538: Pakatibhāvaṃ jahitvā, tañca aññaṃ akaṃsu te.
atk-abh03a:546_0: Aparāparaṃ pana hemavatikā, rājagirikā, siddhatthikā, pubbaseliyā, aparaseliyā, vājiriyāti
atk-abh03a:546_1: aññepi cha ācariyavādā uppannā. Te idha anadhippetā. Purimakānaṃ pana aṭṭhārasannaṃ
atk-abh03a:546_2: ācariyavādānaṃ vasena pavattamāne sāsane paṭiladdhasaddho asoko dhammarājā divase
atk-abh03a:546_3: divase buddhapūjāya satasahassaṃ, dhammapūjāya satasahassaṃ, saṅghapūjāya satasahassaṃ,
atk-abh03a:546_4: attano ācariyassa nigrodhattherassa satasahassaṃ, catūsu dvāresu bhesajjatthāya satasahassanti
atk-abh03a:546_5: pañcasatasahassāni pariccajanto sāsane uḷāraṃ lābhasakkāraṃ pavattesi.
atk-abh03a:547_0: Titthiyā hatalābhasakkārā antamaso ghāsacchādanamattampi alabhantā lābhasakkāraṃ
atk-abh03a:547_1: patthayamānā bhikkhūsu pabbajitvā sakāni sakāni diṭṭhigatāni – “ayaṃ dhammo, ayaṃ
atk-abh03a:547_2: vinayo, idaṃ satthusāsana”nti dīpenti. Pabbajjaṃ alabhamānāpi sayameva kese chinditvā
atk-abh03a:547_3: kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā vihāresu vicarantā uposathakammādikaraṇakāle saṅghamajjhaṃ
atk-abh03a:547_4: pavisanti. Te bhikkhusaṅghena dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena niggayhamānāpi dhammavinayānulomāya
atk-abh03a:547_5: paṭipattiyā asaṇṭhahantā anekarūpaṃ sāsanassa abbudañca malañca kaṇṭakañca samuṭṭhāpenti.
atk-abh03a:547_6: Keci aggiṃ paricaranti, keci pañcātape tapanti, keci ādiccaṃ anuparivattanti, keci
atk-abh03a:547_7: “dhammañca vinayañca vobhindissāmā”ti tathā tathā paggaṇhiṃsu. Tadā bhikkhusaṅgho
atk-abh03a:547_8: na tehi saddhiṃ uposathaṃ vā pavāraṇaṃ vā akāsi. Asokārāme satta vassāni uposatho upacchijji.
atk-abh03a:548_0: Rājā “āṇāya kāressāmī”ti vāyamantopi kāretuṃ nāsakkhi, aññadatthu duggahitagāhinā
atk-abh03a:548_1: bālena amaccena anekesu bhikkhūsu jīvitā voropitesu vippaṭisārī ahosi. So tañca vippaṭisāraṃ
atk-abh03a:548_2: tañca sāsane uppannaṃ abbudaṃ vūpasametukāmo “ko nu kho imasmiṃ atthe paṭibalo”ti
atk-abh03a:548_3: saṅghaṃ pucchitvā “moggaliputtatissatthero, mahārājā”ti sutvā saṅghassa vacanena
atk-abh03a:548_4: ahogaṅgāpabbatato theraṃ pakkosāpetvā iddhipāṭihāriyadassanena therassa ānubhāve
atk-abh03a:548_5: nibbicikiccho attano kukkuccaṃ pucchitvā vippaṭisāraṃ vūpasamesi. Theropi taṃ rājuyyāneyeva
atk-abh03a:548_6: vasanto satta divasāni samayaṃ uggaṇhāpesi. So uggahitasamayo sattame divase asokārāme
atk-abh03a:548_7: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātāpetvā sāṇipākāraṃ parikkhipāpetvā sāṇipākārantare nisinno
atk-abh03a:548_8: ekaladdhike ekaladdhike bhikkhū ekato ekato kāretvā ekamekaṃ bhikkhusamūhaṃ pakkosāpetvā
atk-abh03a:548_10: āhaṃsu. Ekaccasassatikā, antānantikā, amarāvikkhepikā, adhiccasamuppannikā, saññīvādā,
atk-abh03a:548_12: āhaṃsu. Rājā paṭhamameva samayassa uggahitattā nayime bhikkhū aññatitthiyā imeti
atk-abh03a:548_13: ñatvā tesaṃ setakāni vatthāni datvā uppabbājesi. Te sabbepi saṭṭhisahassā ahesuṃ.
atk-abh03a:549_0: Athaññe bhikkhū pakkosāpetvā pucchi – “kiṃvādī, bhante, sammāsambuddho”ti? “Vibhajjavādī,
atk-abh03a:549_1: mahārājā”ti. Evaṃ vutte rājā theraṃ pucchi – “vibhajjavādī, bhante, sammāsambuddho”ti?
atk-abh03a:549_2: “Āma, mahārājā”ti. Tato rājā ‘suddhaṃ dāni, bhante, sāsanaṃ, karotu bhikkhusaṅgho
atk-abh03a:549_3: uposatha’nti ārakkhaṃ datvā nagaraṃ pāvisi. Samaggo saṅgho sannipatitvā uposathaṃ
atk-abh03a:549_4: akāsi. Tasmiṃ sannipāte saṭṭhibhikkhusatasahassāni ahesuṃ. Tasmiṃ samāgame moggaliputtatissatthero
atk-abh03a:549_5: yāni ca tadā uppannāni vatthūni, yāni ca āyatiṃ uppajjissanti, sabbesampi tesaṃ paṭibāhanatthaṃ
atk-abh03a:549_6: satthārā dinnanayavaseneva tathāgatena ṭhapitamātikaṃ vibhajanto sakavāde pañca suttasatāni
atk-abh03a:549_7: paravāde pañcāti suttasahassaṃ āharitvā imaṃ parappavādamathanaṃ āyatilakkhaṇaṃ kathāvatthuppakaraṇaṃ abhāsi.
atk-abh03a:550_0: Tato saṭṭhisatasahassasaṅkhyesu bhikkhū uccinitvā tipiṭakapariyattidharānaṃ pabhinnapaṭisambhidānaṃ
atk-abh03a:550_1: bhikkhūnaṃ sahassamekaṃ gahetvā yathā mahākassapatthero ca yasatthero ca dhammañca
atk-abh03a:550_2: vinayañca saṅgāyiṃsu; evameva saṅgāyanto sāsanamalaṃ visodhetvā tatiyasaṅgītiṃ akāsi.
atk-abh03a:550_3: Tattha abhidhammaṃ saṅgāyanto imaṃ yathābhāsitaṃ pakaraṇaṃ saṅgahaṃ āropesi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-abh03a:556: Tasmā naṃ vaṇṇayissāmi, taṃ suṇātha samāhitā”ti.
atk-abh03a:562_0: 1. Tattha puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenāti ayaṃ pucchā. Āmantāti ayaṃ
atk-abh03a:562_1: paṭijānanā. Kassa panāyaṃ pucchā, kassa paṭijānanāti? Asukassāti na vattabbā. Bhagavatā
atk-abh03a:562_2: hi imasmiṃ pakaraṇe nānappakārānaṃ laddhīnaṃ visodhanatthaṃ tantivasena mātikā ṭhapitā.
atk-abh03a:562_3: Sā therena satthārā dinnanaye ṭhatvā tantivasena vibhattā. Na hi thero yattakā ettha
atk-abh03a:562_4: vādamaggā dassitā, tattakehi vādīhi saddhiṃ vādena viggāhikakathaṃ kathesi. Evaṃ
atk-abh03a:562_5: santepi pana tāsaṃ tāsaṃ kathānaṃ atthassa sukhāvadhāraṇatthaṃ sakavādīpucchā, paravādīpucchā,
atk-abh03a:562_6: sakavādīpaṭiññā, paravādīpaṭiññāti evaṃ vibhāgaṃ dassetvāva atthavaṇṇanaṃ karissāma.
atk-abh03a:563_0: Puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenāti hi ayaṃ sakavādīpucchā. Tāya “ye atthi
atk-abh03a:563_1: puggaloti evaṃladdhikā puggalavādino, te evaṃ pucchitabbā”ti dīpeti. Ke pana puggalavādinoti?
atk-abh03a:563_2: Sāsane vajjiputtakā ceva samitiyā ca bahiddhā ca bahū aññatitthiyā. Tattha puggaloti
atk-abh03a:563_3: attā, satto jīvo. Upalabbhatīti paññāya upagantvā labbhati, ñāyatīti attho. Saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenāti
atk-abh03a:563_4: ettha saccikaṭṭhoti māyāmarīciādayo viya abhūtākārena aggahetabbo bhūtaṭṭho. Paramatthoti
atk-abh03a:563_5: anussavādivasena aggahetabbo uttamattho. Ubhayenāpi yo parato “puggalo upalabbhati
atk-abh03a:563_7: sattapaññāsavidho dhammappabhedo dassito. Yathā so bhūtena sabhāvaṭṭhena upalabbhati,
atk-abh03a:563_8: evaṃ tava puggalo upalabbhatīti pucchati. Paravādī āmantāti paṭijānāti. Paṭijānanañhi
atk-abh03a:563_9: katthaci “āma, bhante”ti āgacchati, katthaci “āmo”ti paṭijānanaṃ āgacchati. Idha
atk-abh03a:563_10: pana “āmantā”ti āgataṃ. Tatrāyaṃ adhippāyo – so hi yaṃ taṃ parato vuttaṃ bhagavatā
atk-abh03a:563_11: – “atthi puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno”ti suttaṃ āgataṃ, taṃ gahetvā yasmā pana bhagavā
atk-abh03a:563_12: saccavādī na visaṃvādanapurekkhāro vācaṃ bhāsati, nāpi anussavādivasena dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-abh03a:563_13: sadevakaṃ pana lokaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedeti, tasmā yo tena vutto “atthi
atk-abh03a:563_14: puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno”ti, so saccikaṭṭhaparamattheneva atthīti laddhiṃ gahetvā
atk-abh03a:564_0: Athassa tādisassa lesavacanassa chalavādassa okāsaṃ adadamāno sakavādī yo saccikaṭṭhotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:564_1: Tatrāyaṃ adhippāyo – yvāyaṃ parato “sappaccayo appaccayo, saṅkhato asaṅkhato, sassato,
atk-abh03a:564_2: asassato sanimitto animitto”ti evaṃ paridīpito rūpādisattapaññāsavidho dhammappabhedo
atk-abh03a:564_3: āgato; na sammutisaccavasena, nāpi anussavādivasena gahetabbo. Attano pana bhūtatāya
atk-abh03a:564_4: eva saccikaṭṭho, attapaccakkhatāya ca paramattho. Taṃ sandhāyāha – “yo saccikaṭṭho
atk-abh03a:564_5: paramattho, tato so puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā”ti.
atk-abh03a:565_0: Tatoti karaṇavacanametaṃ, tasmā tena saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena so puggalo upalabbhatīti
atk-abh03a:565_1: ayamettha attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – ruppanādibhedena vā sappaccayādibhedena vā ākārena
atk-abh03a:565_2: yo saccikaṭṭhaparamattho upalabbhati, kiṃ te puggalopi tenākārena upalabbhatīti?
atk-abh03a:565_3: Na hevaṃ vattabbeti avajānanā paravādissa. So hi tathārūpaṃ puggalaṃ anicchanto avajānāti.
atk-abh03a:565_4: Tatrāyaṃ padacchedo – ‘na hi evaṃ vattabbe’ti, na hi evantipi vaṭṭati. Dvinnampi
atk-abh03a:566_0: Ājānāhi niggahanti sakavādivacanaṃ. Yasmā te purimāya vattabbapaṭiññāya pacchimā
atk-abh03a:566_1: navattabbapaṭiññā, pacchimāya ca purimā na sandhiyati, tasmāpi niggahaṃ patto. Taṃ
atk-abh03a:566_2: niggahaṃ dosaṃ aparādhaṃ sampaṭicchāhīti attho. Evaṃ niggahaṃ ājānāpetvā idāni taṃ
atk-abh03a:566_3: ṭhapanāya ceva anulomapaṭilomato pāpanāropanānañca vasena pākaṭaṃ karonto hañci puggalotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:566_4: Tattha hañci puggalo upalabbhatīti yadi puggalo upalabbhati, sace puggalo upalabbhati
atk-abh03a:566_5: saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenāti attho. Ayaṃ tāva paravādīpakkhassa ṭhapanato niggahapāpanāropanānaṃ
atk-abh03a:566_6: lakkhaṇabhūtā anulomaṭhapanā nāma. Tena vata retiādi anulomapakkhe niggahassa pāpitattā
atk-abh03a:566_7: anulomapāpanā nāma. Tattha tenāti kāraṇavacanaṃ. Vatāti okappanavacanaṃ. Reti āmantanavacanaṃ.
atk-abh03a:566_8: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – tena, re vattabbe vata, re hambho, bhadramukha, tena kāraṇena
atk-abh03a:566_9: vattabboyevāti. Yaṃ tattha vadesītiādi anulomapakkhe niggahassa āropitattā anulomaropanā
atk-abh03a:566_10: nāma. Yaṃ tassa pariyosāne micchātipadaṃ tassa purato idaṃ te’ti āharitabbaṃ. Idaṃ
atk-abh03a:566_11: te micchāti ayañhettha attho. Parato ca pāḷiyaṃ etaṃ āgatameva.
atk-abh03a:567_0: No ce pana vattabbetiādi “na hevaṃ vattabbe”ti paṭikkhittapakkhassa ṭhapitattā paṭilomato
atk-abh03a:567_1: niggahapāpanāropanānaṃ lakkhaṇabhūtā paṭilomaṭhapanā nāma. No ca vata retiādi paṭilomapakkhe
atk-abh03a:567_2: niggahassa pāpitattā paṭilomapāpanā nāma. Puna yaṃ tattha vadesītiādi paṭilomapakkhe
atk-abh03a:567_3: niggahassa āropitattā paṭilomaropanā nāma. Idhāpi pariyosāne micchātipadassa purato
atk-abh03a:567_4: idaṃ teti āharitabbameva. Paratopi evarūpesu ṭhānesu eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a:568_0: Tatrāyaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya saṅkhepattho – yadi puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena,
atk-abh03a:568_1: tena vata bho so upalabbhatīti vattabbo. Yaṃ pana tattha vadesi “vattabbo kho purimapañhe
atk-abh03a:568_2: ‘saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena upalabbhatī’ti, no ca vattabbo dutiyapañhe ‘tato so puggalo
atk-abh03a:568_3: upalabbhatī”’ti, idaṃ te micchāti evaṃ tāva anulomato ṭhapanāpāpanāropanā honti.
atk-abh03a:568_4: Atha na vattabbo dutiyapañhe “tato so upalabbhatī”ti, purimapañhepi na vattabbova.
atk-abh03a:568_5: Yaṃ panettha vadesi “vattabbo kho purimapañhe ‘saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena upalabbhatī’ti,
atk-abh03a:568_6: no ca vattabbo dutiyapañhe ‘tato so puggalo upalabbhatī”’ti, idaṃ te micchāti evaṃ
atk-abh03a:568_7: paṭilomato ṭhapanāpāpanāropanā honti. Evametaṃ niggahassa ca anulomapaṭilomato catunnaṃ
atk-abh03a:568_8: pāpanāropanānañca vuttattā upalabbhatītiādikaṃ anulomapañcakaṃ nāma. Ettha ca kiñcāpi
atk-abh03a:568_9: anulomato pāpanāropanāhi eko, paṭilomato pāpanāropanāhi ekoti dve niggahā katā. ‘Ājānāhi
atk-abh03a:568_10: niggaha’nti etasseva panettha puggalo upalabbhatīti paṭhamaṃ vādaṃ nissāya paṭhamassa
atk-abh03a:568_11: niggahassa dvīhākārehi āropitattā ekovāyaṃ niggahoti paṭhamo niggaho.
atk-abh03a:569_0: 2. Idāni paccanīkanayo hoti. Tattha pucchā paravādissa. So hi “atthi puggalo attahitāya
atk-abh03a:569_1: paṭipanno”ti gahitattā “nupalabbhatī”ti asampaṭicchanto evaṃ pucchati. Sakavādī yathā
atk-abh03a:569_2: rūpādidhammā upalabbhanti, evaṃ anupalabbhanīyato āmantāti paṭijānāti. Puna itaro
atk-abh03a:569_3: attanā adhippetaṃ saccikaṭṭhaṃyeva sandhāya yo saccikaṭṭhotiādimāha. Sammutisaccaparamatthasaccāni
atk-abh03a:569_4: vā ekato katvāpi evamāha. Sakavādī ‘puggalo’ti upādāpaññattisabbhāvatopi dvinnaṃ
atk-abh03a:569_5: saccānaṃ ekato katvā pucchitattāpi na hevanti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:570_0: Idāni kiñcāpi tena paṭhamaṃ paramatthasaccavasena nupalabbhanīyatā sampaṭicchitā,
atk-abh03a:570_1: pacchā sammutisaccavasena vomissakavasena vā paṭikkhittā. Paravādī pana ‘nupalabbhatī’ti
atk-abh03a:570_2: vacanasāmaññamattaṃ chalavādaṃ nissāya yaṃ tayā paṭhamaṃ paṭiññātaṃ, taṃ pacchā paṭikkhittanti
atk-abh03a:570_3: bhaṇḍanassa paṭibhaṇḍanaṃ viya attano katassa niggahakammassa paṭikammaṃ karonto
atk-abh03a:570_4: ājānāhi paṭikammanti āha. Idāni yathāssa anulomapañcake sakavādinā vādaṭṭhapanaṃ
atk-abh03a:570_5: katvā anulomapaṭilomato pāpanāropanāhi niggaho pākaṭo kato, evaṃ paṭikammaṃ pākaṭaṃ
atk-abh03a:570_6: karonto hañci puggalotiādimāha. Taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva atthato veditabbaṃ. Yasmā
atk-abh03a:570_7: panettha ṭhapanā nāma paravādīpakkhassa ṭhapanato “ayaṃ tava doso”ti dassetuṃ ṭhapanamattameva
atk-abh03a:570_8: hoti, na niggahassa vā paṭikammassa vā pākaṭabhāvakaraṇaṃ, pāpanāropanāhi panassa
atk-abh03a:570_9: pākaṭakaraṇaṃ hoti. Tasmā idaṃ anulomapaṭilomato pāpanāropanānaṃ vasena catūhākārehi.
atk-abh03a:570_10: Paṭikammassa katattā paṭikammacatukkaṃ nāmāti ekaṃ catukkaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:571_0: 3. Evaṃ paṭikammaṃ katvā idāni yvāssa anulomapañcake sakavādinā niggaho kato, tassa
atk-abh03a:571_1: tameva chalavādaṃ nissāya dukkaṭabhāvaṃ dassento tvañce pana maññasītiādimāha. Tattha
atk-abh03a:571_2: tvaṃ ce pana maññasīti yadi tvaṃ maññasi. Vattabbe khoti idaṃ paccanīke āmantāti
atk-abh03a:571_3: paṭiññaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. No ca vattabbeti idaṃ pana na hevāti avajānanaṃ sandhāya
atk-abh03a:571_4: vuttaṃ. Tena tava tatthāti tena kāraṇena tvaṃyeva tasmiṃ nupalabbhatīti pakkhe –
atk-abh03a:571_5: “hevaṃ paṭijānantanti āmantā”ti evaṃ paṭijānanto. Hevaṃ niggahetabbeti puna na hevāti
atk-abh03a:571_6: avajānanto evaṃ niggahetabbo. Atha taṃ niggaṇhāmāti athevaṃ niggahārahaṃ taṃ niggaṇhāma.
atk-abh03a:571_7: Suniggahito ca hosīti sakena matena niggahitattā suniggahito ca bhavasi.
atk-abh03a:572_0: Evamassa niggahetabbabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni taṃ niggaṇhanto hañcītiādimāha. Tattha
atk-abh03a:572_1: ṭhapanāpāpanāropanā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbā. Pariyosāne pana idaṃ te micchāti
atk-abh03a:572_2: idaṃ tava vacanaṃ micchā hotīti attho. Idaṃ chalavādena catūhi ākārehi niggahassa
atk-abh03a:573_0: 4. Evaṃ niggahaṃ katvāpi idāni “yadi ayaṃ mayā tava matena kato niggaho dunniggaho,
atk-abh03a:573_1: yo mama tayā heṭṭhā anulomapañcake kato niggaho, sopi dunniggaho”ti dassento ese
atk-abh03a:573_2: ce dunniggahitetiādimāha. Tattha ese ce dunniggahiteti eso ce tava vādo mayā dunniggahito.
atk-abh03a:573_3: Atha vā eso ce tava mayā kato niggaho dunniggaho. Hevamevaṃ tattha dakkhāti tatthāpi
atk-abh03a:573_4: tayā mama heṭṭhā kate niggahe evamevaṃ passa. Idāni yvāssa heṭṭhā sakavādinā niggaho
atk-abh03a:573_5: kato, taṃ “vattabbe kho”tiādivacanena dassetvā puna taṃ niggahaṃ aniggahabhāvaṃ upanento
atk-abh03a:573_6: no ca mayaṃ tayātiādimāha. Tattha no ca mayaṃ tayā tattha hetāya paṭiññāyātiādīsu
atk-abh03a:573_7: ayamattho – yasmā so tayā mama kato niggaho dunniggaho, tasmā mayaṃ tayā tattha anulomapañcake
atk-abh03a:573_8: āmantāti etāya paṭiññāya evaṃ paṭijānantā puna na hevāti paṭikkhepe katepi “ājānāhi
atk-abh03a:573_9: niggaha”nti evaṃ na niggahetabboyeva. Evaṃ aniggahetabbampi maṃ niggaṇhāsi, īdisena
atk-abh03a:574_0: Idāni yaṃ niggahaṃ sandhāya “dunniggahitā ca homā”ti avoca, taṃ dassetuṃ hañci puggalo…pe…
atk-abh03a:574_1: idaṃ te micchātiāha. Evamidaṃ anulomapaṭilomato catūhi pāpanāropanāhi niggahassa
atk-abh03a:575_0: 5. Idāni “na hevaṃ niggahetabbe”tiādikaṃ niggamanacatukkaṃ nāma hoti. Tattha na hevaṃ
atk-abh03a:575_1: niggahetabbeti yathāhaṃ tayā niggahito, na hi evaṃ niggahetabbo. Etassa hi niggahassa
atk-abh03a:575_2: dunniggahabhāvo mayā sādhito. Tena hīti tena kāraṇena, yasmā esa niggaho dunniggaho,
atk-abh03a:575_3: tasmā yaṃ maṃ niggaṇhāsi hañci puggalo…pe… idaṃ te micchāti, idaṃ niggaṇhanaṃ tava
atk-abh03a:575_4: micchāti attho. Tena hi ye kate niggaheti yena kāraṇena idaṃ micchā, tena kāraṇena
atk-abh03a:575_5: yo tayā niggaho kato, so dukkaṭo. Yaṃ mayā paṭikammaṃ kataṃ, tadeva sukataṃ. Yāpi
atk-abh03a:575_6: cesā paṭikammacatukkādivasena kathāmaggasampaṭipādanā katā, sāpi sukatā. Evametaṃ
atk-abh03a:575_8: vasena anulomapaccanīkapañcakaṃ nāma niddiṭṭhanti veditabbaṃ. Ettāvatā sakavādino
atk-abh03a:575_9: pubbapakkhe sati paravādino vacanasāmaññamattena chalavādena jayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:577_0: 6. Idāni yathā paravādino pubbapakkhe sati sakavādino dhammeneva tathena sujayo hoti,
atk-abh03a:577_1: tathā vāduppattiṃ dassetuṃ puggalo nupalabbhatīti paccanīkānulomapañcakaṃ āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:577_2: Tattha paccanīke pucchā paravādissa, rūpādibhedaṃ saccikaṭṭhaparamatthaṃ sandhāya
atk-abh03a:577_3: paṭiññā sakavādissa. Suddhasammutisaccaṃ vā paramatthamissakaṃ vā sammutisaccaṃ sandhāya
atk-abh03a:577_4: yo saccikaṭṭhoti puna anuyogo paravādissa, sammutivasena nupalabbhatīti navattabbattā
atk-abh03a:577_5: missakavasena vā anuyogassa saṃkiṇṇattā na hevanti paṭikkhepo sakavādissa. Paṭiññātaṃ
atk-abh03a:577_6: paṭikkhipatīti vacanasāmaññamattena ājānāhi niggahantiādivacanaṃ paravādissa. Evamayaṃ
atk-abh03a:577_7: puggalo nupalabbhatīti dutiyavādaṃ nissāya dutiyo niggaho hotīti veditabbo. Evaṃ
atk-abh03a:578_0: 7-10. Idāni dhammena samena attano vāde jayaṃ dassetuṃ anulomanaye pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:578_1: attano laddhiṃ nissāya paṭiññā paravādissa. Laddhiyā okāsaṃ adatvā paramatthavasena
atk-abh03a:578_2: puna anuyogo sakavādissa, paramatthavasena puggalassa abhāvato paṭikkhepo paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:578_3: Tato paraṃ dhammena samena attano jayadassanatthaṃ ājānāhi paṭikammantiādi sabbaṃ
atk-abh03a:578_5: heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo. Evamidaṃ puggalo nupalabbhatītiādikassa paccanīkapañcakassa
atk-abh03a:578_7: nāma niddiṭṭhaṃ hoti. Evametāni paṭhamasaccikaṭṭhe dve pañcakāni niddiṭṭhāni. Tattha
atk-abh03a:578_8: purimapañcake paravādissa sakavādinā kato niggaho suniggaho. Sakavādissa pana paravādinā
atk-abh03a:578_9: chalavādaṃ nissāya paṭikammaṃ katvā attanā sādhito jayo dujjayo. Dutiyapañcake sakavādissa
atk-abh03a:578_10: paravādinā kato niggaho dunniggaho. Paravādissa pana sakavādinā dhammavādaṃ nissāya
atk-abh03a:578_11: paṭikammaṃ katvā attanā sādhito jayo sujayoti paṭhamasaccikaṭṭho. Tatthetaṃ vuccati –
atk-abh03a:584: Dhammena hi jayo nāma, adhammena kuto jayo.
atk-abh03a:591_0: 11. Evaṃ suddhikasaccikaṭṭhaṃ vitthāretvā idāni tameva aparehi okāsādīhi nayehi vitthāretuṃ
atk-abh03a:591_1: puna puggalo upalabbhatītiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:591_2: Puna sabbatthāti sarīraṃ sandhāya anuyogo sakavādissa, rūpasmiṃ attānaṃ samanupassanādosañca
atk-abh03a:591_3: ‘aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīra’nti āpajjanadosañca disvā paṭikkhepo paravādissa. Sesamettha
atk-abh03a:591_4: anulomapaccanīkapañcake heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Pāṭho pana saṅkhitto. Tattha
atk-abh03a:591_5: yasmā sarīraṃ sandhāya “sabbattha na upalabbhatī”ti vutte sarīrato bahi upalabbhatīti
atk-abh03a:591_6: āpajjati. Tasmā paccanīke paṭikkhepo sakavādissa, paṭhamaṃ anujānitvā pacchā avajānātīti
atk-abh03a:591_7: chalavādassa vasena paṭikammaṃ paravādissa. Sesaṃ pākaṭameva.
atk-abh03a:594_1: anuyogo sakavādissa, sveva khattiyo so brāhmaṇotiādīnaṃ āpattidosañca dharamānaparinibbutānaṃ
atk-abh03a:594_2: visesābhāvadosañca disvā paṭikkhepo paravādissa. Sesaṃ paṭhamanaye vuttasadisameva.
atk-abh03a:597: 13. Tatiyanaye sabbesūti khandhāyatanādīni sandhāya anuyogo sakavādissa, rūpasmiṃ attā, cakkhusmiṃ attātiādidosabhayena paṭikkhepo paravādissa. Sesaṃ tādisamevāti.
atk-abh03a:600_0: 14. Evametāni tīṇi anulomapaccanīkapañcake anulomamattavaseneva tāva paṭipāṭiyā bhājetvā
atk-abh03a:600_1: puna paccanīkānulomapañcake paccanīkamattavaseneva bhājetuṃ puggalo nupalabbhatītiādi
atk-abh03a:600_2: āraddhaṃ. Tattha anulomapañcakassa pāḷiyaṃ saṅkhipitvā āgate paccanīke vuttanayeneva
atk-abh03a:600_3: paccanīkassa ca pāḷiyaṃ saṅkhipitvā āgate anulome vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:600_4: Ettāvatā suddhikassa ceva imesañca tiṇṇanti catunnaṃ saccikaṭṭhānaṃ ekekasmiṃ saccikaṭṭhe
atk-abh03a:600_5: anulomapaccanīkassa paccanīkānulomassa cāti dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ paccanīkānaṃ vasena ayaṃ
atk-abh03a:600_6: aṭṭhamukhā nāma vādayutti niddiṭṭhā hotīti veditabbā. Yā ekekasmiṃ mukhe ekekassa
atk-abh03a:600_7: niggahassa vasena aṭṭhakaniggahoti pāḷiyaṃ likhiyati. Tatthetaṃ vuccati –
atk-abh03a:608_0: 17-27. Idāni rūpādīhi saddhiṃ saccikaṭṭhasaṃsandanaṃ hoti. Tattha rūpañcāti yathā
atk-abh03a:608_1: rūpaṃ paramatthato upalabbhati, kiṃ te puggalopi tatheva upalabbhatīti sandhāya pucchā
atk-abh03a:608_2: sakavādissa, atthi puggaloti vacanamattaṃ gahetvā paṭiññā paravādissa. Yadi te rūpaṃ
atk-abh03a:608_3: viya paramatthato puggalo atthi, rūpato vedanādīnaṃ viya puggalassāpi aññattaṃ āpajjatīti
atk-abh03a:608_4: anuyogo sakavādissa, samayasuttavirodhaṃ disvā paṭikkhepo paravādissa. Sesaṃ atthato
atk-abh03a:608_5: pākaṭameva. Dhammato panettha sattapaññāsabhedassa saccikaṭṭhaparamatthassa vasena
atk-abh03a:608_6: sakavādīpakkhamūlake anulomapaccanīke sattapaññāsa anulomapañcakāni dassitāni. Paṭikammacatukkādīni
atk-abh03a:608_8: dassitāni. Paṭikammacatukkādīni saṅkhittāni. Tattha “vuttaṃ bhagavatā”ti vacanamattena
atk-abh03a:608_9: puggalassa atthitaṃ rūpassa ca saccikaṭṭhaparamatthavasena upalabbhanīyataṃ dassetvā
atk-abh03a:608_10: ubhinnaṃ aññattaṃ paṭijānāpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatāti anuyogo paravādissa, sammutiparamatthānaṃ
atk-abh03a:608_11: ekattanānattapañhassa ṭhapanīyattā paṭikkhepo sakavādissa. Sesamidhāpi atthato pākaṭamevāti.
atk-abh03a:611_0: 28-36. Idāni rūpādīheva saddhiṃ opammavasena saccikaṭṭhasaṃsandanaṃ hoti. Tattha
atk-abh03a:611_1: rūpavedanānaṃ upaladdhisāmaññena aññattapucchā ca puggalarūpānaṃ upaladdhisāmaññapucchā
atk-abh03a:611_2: cāti pucchādvayampi sakavādissa, ubhopi paṭiññā paravādissa. Paravādinā anuññātena
atk-abh03a:611_3: upaladdhisāmaññena rūpavedanānaṃ viya rūpapuggalānaṃ aññattānuyogo sakavādissa, paṭikkhepo
atk-abh03a:611_4: itarassa. Sesamidhāpi atthato pākaṭameva. Dhammato panettha rūpamūlakādīnaṃ cakkānañca
atk-abh03a:611_5: vasena sakavādīpakkhe vīsādhikāni nava niggahapañcakasatāni dassitāni. Kathaṃ? Khandhesu
atk-abh03a:611_6: tāva rūpamūlake cakke cattāri, tathā vedanādimūlakesūti vīsati. Āyatanesu cakkhāyatanamūlake
atk-abh03a:611_7: cakke ekādasa, tathā sesesūti dvattiṃsasataṃ. Dhātūsu cakkhudhātumūlake cakke sattarasa,
atk-abh03a:611_8: tathā sesesūti chādhikāni tīṇi satāni. Indriyesu cakkhundriyamūlake cakke ekavīsati,
atk-abh03a:611_9: tathā sesesūti dvāsaṭṭhādhikāni cattāri satāni. Evaṃ sabbānipi vīsādhikāni nava niggahapañcakasatāni honti.
atk-abh03a:612_0: 37-45. Paravādīpakkhepi rūpaṃ upalabbhatīti anulomavaseneva rūpavedanādīnaṃ aññattapaṭiññaṃ
atk-abh03a:612_1: kāretvā puna atthi puggaloti suttaṃ nissāya chalavasena puggalassa rūpādīhi upaladdhisāmaññaṃ
atk-abh03a:612_2: āropetvā aññattānuyogo kato. Sesamidhāpi atthato uttānameva. Dhammatopi sakavādīpakkhe
atk-abh03a:615_0: 46-52. Idāni yaṃ saccikaṭṭhaparamatthena upalabbhati, tena yasmā rūpādīsu sattapaññāsāya
atk-abh03a:615_1: saccikaṭṭhaparamatthesu aññatarena bhavitabbaṃ; rūpādinissitena vā, aññatra vā rūpādīhi,
atk-abh03a:615_2: rūpādīnaṃ vā nissayena, tasmā iminā catukkanayena saccikaṭṭhasaṃsandanaṃ āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:615_3: Tattha rūpaṃ puggaloti anuyogo sakavādissa, ucchedadiṭṭhibhayena na hevāti paṭikkhepo
atk-abh03a:615_4: paravādissa, niggahāropanaṃ sakavādissa. Kiṃ panetaṃ yuttaṃ, nanu rūpaṃ vedanāti
atk-abh03a:615_5: vuttampi paṭikkhipitabbamevāti? Āma paṭikkhipitabbaṃ. Taṃ pana rūpato vedanāya aññasabhāvasabbhāvato,
atk-abh03a:615_6: na aññattābhāvato. Ayañca rūpādīsu ekadhammatopi puggalassa aññattaṃ na icchati,
atk-abh03a:615_7: tasmā yuttaṃ. Ayañca anuyogo rūpaṃ puggalo…pe… aññātāvindriyaṃ puggaloti sakalaṃ
atk-abh03a:615_8: paramatthasaccaṃ sandhāya āraddho. Sakalaṃ pana paccattalakkhaṇavasena ekato vattuṃ
atk-abh03a:615_9: na sakkāti tantivasena anuyogalakkhaṇamattametaṃ ṭhapitaṃ. Tena viññū atthaṃ vibhāventi.
atk-abh03a:615_10: Vādakāmena pana imaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ gahetvā yathā yathā paravādissa okāso na hoti, tathā
atk-abh03a:615_11: tathā vattabbaṃ. Iti tantivasena anuyogalakkhaṇassa ṭhapitattāpi yuttameva. Iminā
atk-abh03a:616_0: Ayaṃ pana viseso – rūpasmiṃ puggalotiādīsu yathā ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ nissāya tayo mahābhūtā,
atk-abh03a:616_1: vatthurūpaṃ nissāya viññāṇaṃ rūpasminti vattuṃ vaṭṭati, kiṃ te evaṃ rūpasmiṃ puggalo?
atk-abh03a:616_2: Yathā ca sabhāgavinibbhogato vedanādayo sabbadhammā, arūpā vā pana cattāro khandhā,
atk-abh03a:616_3: nibbānameva vā “aññatra rūpā”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati, kiṃ te evaṃ puggalo? Yathā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ
atk-abh03a:616_4: rūpānaṃ nissayavasena “vedanāya rūpaṃ…pe… viññāṇasmiṃ rūpa”nti vattuṃ vaṭṭati, kiṃ
atk-abh03a:616_5: te evaṃ puggaloti? Sabbānuyogesu pana ucchedadiṭṭhibhayena ceva samayavirodhena ca
atk-abh03a:616_6: paṭikkhepo paravādissa. Sesamettha atthato pākaṭameva. Dhammato panettha sattapaññāsāya
atk-abh03a:616_7: saccikaṭṭhesu ekekasmiṃ cattāri cattāri katvā niggahavasena aṭṭhavīsādhikāni dve
atk-abh03a:616_8: pañcakasatāni dassitāni. Paravādīpakkhepi paṭikammavasena tattakāneva. Yā panettha
atk-abh03a:616_9: atthi puggaloti vutte sakavādissa paṭiññā, sā sutte āgatena sammutivasena. Yo rūpaṃ
atk-abh03a:616_10: puggalotiādīsu paṭikkhepo, so sakkāyadiṭṭhipañhassa ṭhapanīyattā. Paravādissa paṭikammaṃ chalavasenevāti.
atk-abh03a:620_0: 53. Idāni lakkhaṇayutti nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā ṭhapetvā nibbānaṃ seso saccikaṭṭhaparamattho
atk-abh03a:620_1: paccayapaṭibaddhatāya sappaccayo, paccayehi samāgamma katattā saṅkhato, uppajjitvā
atk-abh03a:620_2: nirujjhanato sadā abhāvato asassato, uppattikāraṇasaṅkhātassa nimittassa atthitāya
atk-abh03a:620_3: sanimitto, nibbānaṃ vuttappakārābhāvato appaccayaṃ asaṅkhataṃ sassataṃ animittanti
atk-abh03a:620_4: idaṃ saccikaṭṭhassa lakkhaṇaṃ. Tasmā yadi puggalopi saccikaṭṭhaparamatthova tassāpi
atk-abh03a:620_5: iminā lakkhaṇena bhavitabbanti sandhāya puggalo sappaccayotiādayo aṭṭhapi anuyogā
atk-abh03a:620_6: sakavādissa, paṭikkhepo paravādissa. Ājānāhi niggahantiādi panettha saṅkhittaṃ. Evametāni
atk-abh03a:620_7: sakavādīpakkhe anulomapaccanīke anulomamattavasena aṭṭha pañcakāni veditabbāni.
atk-abh03a:621_0: 54. Paravādīpakkhepi paccanīkānulome paccanīkamattavasena aṭṭheva. Tattha yasmā paravādinā
atk-abh03a:621_1: suttavasena sammutisaccaṃ sādhitaṃ, sammutiyā ca sappaccayādibhāvo natthi, tasmā
atk-abh03a:621_2: yāthāvato ca paṭikkhepo sakavādissa. Chalavasena pana vattabbaṃ “ājānāhi paṭikamma”ntiādi
atk-abh03a:624_0: 55-59. Idāni vacanasodhanaṃ hoti. Tattha yadetaṃ puggalo upalabbhatīti vacanaṃ, taṃ
atk-abh03a:624_1: sodhetuṃ puggalo upalabbhati, upalabbhati puggaloti. Pucchā sakavādissa. Tassattho
atk-abh03a:624_2: – yadetaṃ puggalo upalabbhatīti padadvayaṃ, taṃ ekatthaṃ vā bhaveyya nānatthaṃ vā.
atk-abh03a:624_3: Yadi tāva nānatthaṃ, yathā aññaṃ rūpaṃ, aññā vedanā, evaṃ añño puggalo, añño upalabbhatīti
atk-abh03a:624_4: āpajjati. Athekatthaṃ, yathā yaṃ cittaṃ taṃ mano, evaṃ sveva puggalo, so upalabbhatīti
atk-abh03a:624_5: āpajjati. Tena taṃ vadāmi “yadi te yo puggalo, so upalabbhati, evaṃ sante yo yo upalabbhati,
atk-abh03a:624_6: so so puggaloti āpajjati, kiṃ sampaṭicchasi eta”nti? Tato puggalavādī yasmā puggalassa
atk-abh03a:624_7: upalabbhataṃ icchati, na upalabbhamānānampi rūpādīnaṃ puggalabhāvaṃ, tasmā puggalo
atk-abh03a:624_8: upalabbhati, upalabbhati ke hi ci puggalo ke hi ci na puggalotiādimāha. Tassattho
atk-abh03a:624_9: – mama puggalo atthi puggaloti satthu vacanato upalabbhati. Yo pana upalabbhati,
atk-abh03a:624_10: na so sabbo puggalo, atha kho ke hi ci puggalo ke hi ci na puggaloti. Tattha ko-kāratthe
atk-abh03a:624_11: ke-kāro, hi-kāro ca nipātamatto. Koci puggalo, koci na puggaloti ayaṃ panettha attho.
atk-abh03a:624_12: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – puggalopi hi rūpādīsupi yo koci dhammo upalabbhatiyeva, tattha
atk-abh03a:624_13: puggalova puggalo. Rūpādīsu pana kocipi na puggaloti. Tato taṃ sakavādī āha – puggalo
atk-abh03a:624_14: ke hi ci upalabbhati ke hi ci na upalabbhatīti. Tassattho – puggalo upalabbhatīti
atk-abh03a:624_15: padadvayassa atthato ekatte yadi upalabbhatīti anuññāto dhammo puggalato anaññopi
atk-abh03a:624_16: koci puggalo koci na puggalo, puggalopi te koci upalabbhati, koci na upalabbhatīti
atk-abh03a:624_17: āpajjati, kiṃ sampaṭicchasi etanti? So puggalassa anupaladdhiṃ anicchanto na hevanti
atk-abh03a:624_18: paṭikkhipati. Ito paraṃ “ājānāhi niggaha”ntiādi sabbaṃ saṅkhittaṃ. Vitthārato pana
atk-abh03a:624_19: veditabbaṃ. Puggalo saccikaṭṭhotiādīsupi eseva nayo. Sabbāni hetāni upalabbhativevacanāneva,
atk-abh03a:624_20: apica yasmā “puggalo upalabbhatisaccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā”ti ayaṃ puggalavādino paṭiññā,
atk-abh03a:624_21: tasmāssa yatheva puggalo upalabbhatīti laddhi, evamevaṃ puggalo saccikaṭṭhotipi āpajjati.
atk-abh03a:624_22: Yā panassa puggalo atthīti laddhi, tassā vijjamānotivevacanameva, tasmā sabbānipetāni vacanāni sodhitāni.
atk-abh03a:625_0: 60. Tattha yaṃ avasāne “puggalo atthi, atthi na sabbo puggalo”tiādi vuttaṃ, tatrāyamadhippāyo
atk-abh03a:625_1: – yañhetaṃ paravādinā “puggalo atthi, atthi kehici puggalo, kehici na puggalo”ti
atk-abh03a:625_2: vuttaṃ, taṃ yasmā atthato puggalo atthi, atthi na sabbo puggaloti ettakaṃ hoti, tasmā
atk-abh03a:625_3: naṃ sakavādī sampaṭicchāpetvā idāni naṃ evaṃ anuyuñjati. Tayā hi “atthi puggalo attahitāya
atk-abh03a:625_4: paṭipanno”ti vacanamattaṃ nissāya “puggalo atthī”ti laddhi gahitā, yathā ca bhagavatā
atk-abh03a:625_5: etaṃ vuttaṃ, tathā “suññato lokaṃ avekkhassu, mogharājā, sadā sato”tiādinā nayena
atk-abh03a:625_6: “natthī”tipi vuttaṃ, tasmā yatheva te “puggalo atthi, atthi na sabbo puggalo”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:625_7: tathā puggalo natthi, natthi na sabbo puggalotipi āpajjati, kiṃ etaṃ sampaṭicchasīti?
atk-abh03a:625_8: Atha naṃ asampaṭicchanto na hevāti paṭikkhipati. Sesamettha niggahādividhānaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
atk-abh03a:628_0: 61-66. Idāni paññattānuyogo nāma hoti. Rūpadhātuyā hi puggalavādī rūpiṃ puggalaṃ
atk-abh03a:628_1: paññapeti, tathā arūpadhātuyā arūpiṃ. Tassa taṃ laddhiṃ bhindituṃ sabbāpi pucchā
atk-abh03a:628_2: sakavādissa, paṭiññā ca paṭikkhepo ca itarassa. So hi rūpīti vutte rūpakāyasabbhāvato
atk-abh03a:628_3: ceva tathārūpāya ca paññattiyā atthitāya paṭijānāti. Kāmīti vutte vītarāgasabbhāvato
atk-abh03a:628_4: ceva tathārūpāya ca paññattiyā natthitāya paṭikkhipati. Arūpīti vuttepi arūpakkhandhasabbhāvato
atk-abh03a:628_5: ceva tathārūpāya ca paññattiyā atthitāya paṭijānāti. Dvīsupi nayesu sattoti puggalassa
atk-abh03a:629_0: 67. Idāni yasmā so “kāye kāyānupassī”ti āgataṭṭhāne añño kāyo añño puggaloti icchati,
atk-abh03a:629_1: tasmā taṃ laddhiṃ bhindituṃ kāyoti vā sarīranti vātiādi sakavādīpucchā hoti. Tattha
atk-abh03a:629_2: kāyaṃ appiyaṃ karitvāti kāyaṃ appetabbaṃ allīyāpetabbaṃ ekībhāvaṃ upanetabbaṃ avibhajitabbaṃ
atk-abh03a:629_3: katvā pucchāmīti attho. Eseseti eso soyeva. Ese esetipi pāṭho. Eso esoyevāti attho.
atk-abh03a:629_4: Ekaṭṭheti ekaṭṭho. Same samabhāge tajjāteti samo samabhāgo tajjātiko. Vacanamatteyevettha
atk-abh03a:629_5: bhedo. Atthato pana kāyova esoti pucchati. Paravādī nānattaṃ apassanto āmantāti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:629_6: Puggaloti vā jīvoti vāti pucchāyapi eseva nayo. Añño kāyoti puṭṭho pana kāyānupassanāya
atk-abh03a:629_7: evaṃladdhikattā paṭijānāti. Aññaṃ jīvanti puṭṭho pana āhacca bhāsitaṃ suttaṃ paṭikkhipituṃ
atk-abh03a:629_8: asakkonto avajānāti. Tato paraṃ “ājānāhi niggaha”ntiādi uttānatthameva.
atk-abh03a:630: 68. Paravādīpakkhe pana añño kāyo añño puggaloti puṭṭho sakavādī ṭhapanīyapañhattā paṭikkhipati, paravādī chalavasena paṭikammaṃ karoti. Tampi uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a:633_0: 69-72. Idāni gatiparivattanamukhena cutipaṭisandhianuyogo hoti. Tattha yasmā puggalavādī
atk-abh03a:633_1: “sa sattakkhattuparamaṃ sandhāvitvāna puggalo”tiādīni suttāni nissāya puggalo sandhāvatīti
atk-abh03a:633_2: laddhiṃ gahetvā voharati, tasmāssa taṃ laddhiṃ bhindituṃ sandhāvatīti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:633_3: Tattha sandhāvatīti saṃsarati gamanāgamanaṃ karoti. Attano laddhivasena paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:633_4: So puggalotiādayo anuyogopi sakavādissa, paṭikkhepo itarassa. Tattha soti soyevāti
atk-abh03a:633_5: attho. Evaṃ pana anuyutto sassatadiṭṭhibhayena paṭikkhipati. Aññoti puṭṭho ucchedadiṭṭhibhayena.
atk-abh03a:633_6: So ca añño cāti puṭṭho ekaccasassatadiṭṭhibhayena. Neva so na aññoti puṭṭho amarāvikkhepadiṭṭhibhayena.
atk-abh03a:633_7: Puna cattāropi pañhe ekato puṭṭho catunnampi diṭṭhīnaṃ bhayena paṭikkhipitvā puna
atk-abh03a:633_8: yānissa suttāni nissāya laddhi uppannā tāni dassento tena hi puggalo sandhāvatītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:634_0: 76. Puna sakavādinā “yvāyaṃ tava laddhiyā sandhāvati, kiṃ so asmiñca parasmiñca loke
atk-abh03a:634_1: ekoyevā”ti adhippāyena svevāti niyametvā puṭṭho sassatabhayā paṭikkhipitvā puna daḷhaṃ
atk-abh03a:634_2: katvā tatheva puṭṭho yasmā so puggalova na añño bhāvo, “so tato cuto idhūpapanno”tiādisuttampi
atk-abh03a:634_3: atthi, tasmā paṭijānāti. Sveva manussoti puṭṭho manussasseva devattābhāvato paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:635_0: 77. Puna puṭṭho “ahaṃ tena samayena sunetto nāma satthā ahosi”ntiādisuttavasena paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:635_1: Athassa sakavādī devamanussupapattīnaṃ nānattato vacanaṃ micchāti pakāsento manusso hutvātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:636: 78. Tattha hevaṃ maraṇaṃ na hehitīti evaṃ sante maraṇaṃ na bhavissatīti attho. Ito paraṃ yakkho petoti attabhāvanānattavasena anuyoganānattaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:637: 82. Khattiyotiādīni jātivasena ceva aṅgavekallādivasena ca vuttāni.
atk-abh03a:638_0: 87. Puna na vattabbanti paravādinā puṭṭho idhaṭṭhakassa upapattivasena paralokassa
atk-abh03a:638_1: gamanābhāvato paṭiññā sakavādissa puna sotāpannassa bhavantarepi sotāpannabhāvāvijahanato
atk-abh03a:639: 88. Puna devaloke upapannassa manussattābhāvadassanena anuyogo sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:640: 89. Tato paraṃ anañño avigatoti ettha anaññoti sabbākārena ekasadiso. Avigatoti ekenāpi ākārena avigatoti attho. Na hevanti devaloke upapannassa manussabhāvābhāvato evamāha.
atk-abh03a:641_0: 90. Puna daḷhaṃ katvā anuyutto “sveva puggalo sandhāvatī”ti laddhiyā anujānāti. Hatthacchinnotiādi
atk-abh03a:641_1: ākāravigamanadassanena avigato sandhāvatīti laddhibhindanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha aḷacchinnoti
atk-abh03a:641_2: yassa aṅguṭṭhakā chinnā. Kaṇḍaracchinnoti yassa mahānhārū chinnā.
atk-abh03a:642_0: 91. Sarūpotiādīsu paṭhame pañhe iminā rūpakāyena saddhiṃ agamanaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:642_1: Dutiye antarābhavapuggalaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. So hi tassa laddhiyā sarūpova gantvā
atk-abh03a:642_2: mātukucchiṃ pavisati. Athassa taṃ rūpaṃ bhijjati. Taṃ jīvanti yena rūpasaṅkhātena
atk-abh03a:642_3: sarīrena saddhiṃ gacchati, kimassa tadeva jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti pucchati. Paravādī
atk-abh03a:643_0: Savedanotiādīsu asaññūpapattiṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati, tadaññaṃ upapattiṃ sandhāya
atk-abh03a:643_1: paṭijānāti. Taṃ jīvanti yena vedanādisaṅkhātena sarīrena saddhiṃ gacchati. Kimassa
atk-abh03a:643_2: tadeva jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti pucchati. Taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīraṃ, aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīranti
atk-abh03a:643_3: etissā hi laddhiyā pañcapi khandhā sarīranti adhippetā. Paravādī suttavirodhā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:644_0: 92. Arūpotiādīsu paṭhame pañhe antarābhavaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Dutiye arūpā rūpaṃ
atk-abh03a:644_1: upapajjamānaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Aññaṃ, jīvanti yaṃ rūpasaṅkhātaṃ sarīraṃ pahāya
atk-abh03a:644_2: arūpo sandhāvati, kiṃ te taṃ sarīraṃ aññaṃ, aññaṃ jīvanti pucchati. Itaro suttavirodhā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:645_0: Avedanotiādīsu saññībhavaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati, tadaññaṃ upapattiṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:645_1: Aññaṃ jīvanti yaṃ vedanādisaṅkhātaṃ sarīraṃ pahāya avedano aviññāṇo sandhāvati, kiṃ
atk-abh03a:645_2: te taṃ aññaṃ sarīraṃ, aññaṃ jīvanti pucchati. Itaro suttavirodhā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:646_0: 93. Rūpaṃ sandhāvatītiādīsu ye rūpādayo khandhe upādāya puggalaṃ paññapeti, kiṃ te
atk-abh03a:646_1: tasmiṃ puggale sandhāvante tampi rūpaṃ sandhāvatīti pucchati. Paravādī “avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ
atk-abh03a:646_2: sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarata”nti sattasseva sandhāvanavacanato
atk-abh03a:646_3: paṭikkhipati. Puna puṭṭho yasmā rūpādidhamme vinā puggalo natthi, tasmā tasmiṃ sandhāvante
atk-abh03a:646_4: tenapi rūpena sandhāvitabbanti saññāya paṭijānāti. Vedanādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a:647_0: 94. Rūpaṃ na sandhāvatītiādīsu yasmā te rūpaṃ puggalo na hoti, sveva ca sandhāvatīti
atk-abh03a:647_1: vadesi, tasmā taṃ pucchāmi, kiṃ te rūpaṃ na sandhāvatīti attho. Itaro puggale sandhāvante
atk-abh03a:647_2: na sakkā tassa upādānabhūtena rūpena sandhāvitunti saññāya paṭikkhipati. Puna puṭṭho
atk-abh03a:648_0: Gāthānaṃ pana ayamattho – āyasmato matena rukkhaṃ upādāya chāyā viya, indhanaṃ upādāya
atk-abh03a:648_1: aggi viya ca, khandhe upādāya puggalo; rūpādīnaṃ sandhāvane asati tesu khandhesu
atk-abh03a:648_2: bhijjamānesu so tava puggalo bhijjati ce, evaṃ sante ucchedā bhavati diṭṭhi, ucchedadiṭṭhi
atk-abh03a:648_3: te āpajjati. Katarā yā buddhena vivajjitā akusaladiṭṭhi. Yā pana “ucchedavādī samaṇo
atk-abh03a:648_4: gotamo”ti pariyāyabhāsitā, na taṃ vadāmāti dasseti. Athāpi tesu khandhesu bhijjamānesu
atk-abh03a:648_5: so puggalo na bhijjati, evaṃ sante sassato puggalo hoti. Tato so nibbānena samasamo
atk-abh03a:648_6: āpajjati. Samasamoti ativiya samo, samena vā samo, samabhāveneva samo. Yatheva nibbānaṃ
atk-abh03a:648_7: nuppajjati na bhijjati, evaṃ te puggalopi tena samasamoti.
atk-abh03a:652_0: 95. Idāni upādāpaññattānuyogo hoti. Tattha pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññāpaṭikkhepo
atk-abh03a:652_1: paravādissa. So hi rukkhaṃ upādāya chāyāya viya, indhanaṃ upādāya aggissa viya ca,
atk-abh03a:652_2: rūpādīni upādāya puggalassa paññattiṃ paññāpanaṃ avabodhanaṃ icchati, tasmā “rūpaṃ
atk-abh03a:652_3: upādāyā”ti puṭṭho paṭijānāti. Puna yathā rukkhupādānā chāyā rukkho viya, indhanupādāno
atk-abh03a:652_4: ca aggi indhanaṃ viya aniccādidhammo, evaṃ te rūpādiupādāno puggalo rūpādayo viya
atk-abh03a:652_5: aniccoti imamatthaṃ puṭṭho attano laddhiyaṃ ṭhatvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:653: 97. Nīlaṃ rūpaṃ upādāya nīlotiādīsu nīlarūpena saddhiṃ puggalassa ekattaṃ, ekasarīre nīlādīnaṃ bahūnaṃ vasena bahubhāvañca anicchanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:654_0: 98. Kusalaṃ vedananti etthāpi vedanāya saddhiṃ ekattaṃ ekasantāne bahūnaṃ kusalavedanānaṃ
atk-abh03a:654_1: vasena bahubhāvañca anicchanto paṭikkhipati. Dutiyanaye maggakusalotiādivacanasabbhāvato
atk-abh03a:654_2: chekaṭṭhaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Saphalotiādīni puṭṭho tathārūpassa vohārassa abhāvato paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:656: 100. Abyākatapakkhe sassatādivasena abyākatabhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Sesamettha heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:657: 104. Cakkhuṃ upādāyātiādīsu “cakkhumā visamānīva…pe… pāpāni parivajjaye”ti ādivohārasabbhāvato paṭijānāti. Cakkhumattādinirodhena puggalanirodhaṃ anicchanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:658_0: 107. Rūpaṃ upādāya vedanaṃ upādāyāti ettha aññepi rūpamūlakā dukatikacatukkā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:658_1: Yasmā pana khandhe upādāya puggalassa paññatti, tasmā dvepi tayopi cattāropi pañcapi
atk-abh03a:658_2: upādāya paññattiṃ paṭijānāti. Ekasantāne pana dvinnaṃ pañcannaṃ vā abhāvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:659_0: 112. Idāni yaṃ upādāya yassa paññatti, yathā tassa aniccatāya tassāpi aniccatā, tato
atk-abh03a:659_1: ca aññattaṃ siddhaṃ, evaṃ tassa puggalassāpi āpajjatīti dassetuṃ yathā rukkhantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:659_2: Tattha upādāyāti paṭicca āgamma, na vinā tanti attho. Paravādī pana tathā anicchanto
atk-abh03a:660: 115. Nigaḷoti saṅkhalikabandhanaṃ. Negaḷikoti tena bandhako yassa rūpaṃ so rūpavāti yasmā yassa rūpaṃ so rūpavā hoti, tasmā yathā na nigaḷo …pe… añño rūpavāti attho.
atk-abh03a:661_0: 116. Citte cittetiādīsu sarāgādicittavasena sarāgāditaṃ sandhāya cittānupassanāvasena
atk-abh03a:661_1: paṭijānāti. Jāyatītiādinā nayena puṭṭho puggalassa khaṇikabhāvaṃ anicchanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:661_2: “So”ti vā “añño”ti vā puṭṭho sassatucchedabhayena paṭikkhipati. Puna na vattabbaṃ
atk-abh03a:661_3: “kumārako”ti vā “kumārikā”ti vā puṭṭho lokavohārasamucchedabhayena vattabbanti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:662_0: 118. Idāni paravādī aññenākārena laddhiṃ patiṭṭhāpetukāmo na vattabbaṃ puggalo upalabbhatītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:662_1: Tattha na vattabbanti kiṃ te iminā evaṃ bahunā upādāpaññattānuyogena, idaṃ tāva vadehi,
atk-abh03a:662_2: kiṃ na vattabbaṃ “puggalo upalabbhati saccikaṭṭhaparamatthenā”ti. Tato sakavādinā
atk-abh03a:662_3: āmantāti vutte nanu yo passatītiādimāha. Tattha yoti puggalo. Yanti rūpaṃ. Yenāti
atk-abh03a:662_4: cakkhunā. Soti puggalo. Tanti rūpaṃ. Tenāti cakkhunā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – nanu yo
atk-abh03a:662_5: yaṃ rūpaṃ yena cakkhunā passati, so taṃ rūpaṃ tena cakkhunā passanto puggaloti. Sakavādī
atk-abh03a:662_6: kiñcāpi cakkhuviññāṇassa nissayabhāvaṃ gacchantaṃ cakkhumeva rūpaṃ passati, tathā
atk-abh03a:662_7: sotameva saddaṃ suṇāti…pe… viññāṇameva dhammaṃ vijānāti, “atthi arahato cakkhu, passati
atk-abh03a:662_8: arahā cakkhunā rūpa”ntiādisammutivasena pana āmantāti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:663_0: 120. Tato chalavādaṃ nissāya paravādinā puggalassa vattabbatāya sādhitāya tameva
atk-abh03a:663_1: vādaṃ parivattetvā puggalo upalabbhatītiādimāha. Tattha yo na passatīti andho asaññasatto
atk-abh03a:663_2: arūpaṃ upapanno nirodhaṃ samāpanno, anandhopi ca aññatra dassanasamayā na passati
atk-abh03a:663_3: nāma. Sesavāresupi eseva nayo. Sesaṃ pāḷivaseneva atthato veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:664_0: 122. Suttasaṃsandanāyaṃ dibbassa cakkhuno rūpagocarattā rūpaṃ passatīti āha. Dutiyavāre
atk-abh03a:664_1: “satte passāmī”tivacanato puggalaṃ passatīti āha. Tatiyavāre “rūpaṃ disvā puggalaṃ
atk-abh03a:664_2: vibhāvetī”ti laddhito ubho passatīti āha. Yasmā pana passitabbaṃ nāma diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ
atk-abh03a:664_3: mutaṃ viññātanti catubbidhe rūpasaṅgahe rūpāyatanameva saṅgahitaṃ, tasmā sakavādī
atk-abh03a:664_4: “rūpaṃ puggalo, puggalo rūpaṃ, ubho rūpa”nti anuyogaṃ karoti. Tassattho pākaṭoyevāti.
atk-abh03a:667_0: 123. Idāni purisakārānuyogo hoti. Tattha kamme sati niyamato tassa kārakenapi bhavitabbanti
atk-abh03a:667_1: laddhiyā pucchā paravādissa, tathārūpānaṃ kammānaṃ atthitāya paṭiññā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:667_2: Puna kattā kāretāti pucchā paravādissa. Tattha kattāti tesaṃ kammānaṃ kārako. Kāretāti
atk-abh03a:667_3: āṇattidesanādīhi upāyehi kārāpako. Idāni yasmā paravādī puggalaṃ sandhāya kattāti
atk-abh03a:667_4: pucchati, na karaṇamattaṃ, tasmā paṭikkhepo sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:668_0: 124. Tassa kattā kāretāti ettha yadi yaṃ yaṃ upalabbhati, tassa tassa kattā puggalo
atk-abh03a:668_1: te upalabbhati, kiṃ tassāpi kārako ca kārāpako ca añño puggalo upalabbhatīti attho.
atk-abh03a:668_2: Paravādī tathā anicchanto issaranimmānavādabhayena paṭikkhipati. Puna puṭṭho yasmā
atk-abh03a:668_3: puggalaṃ mātāpitaro janenti nāmaṃ karonti posenti, tasmāssa te kārakā. Ye ca pana
atk-abh03a:668_4: taṃ kalyāṇamittā vā ācariyā vā tāni tāni vijjāṭṭhānasippāyatanāni sikkhāpenti, te
atk-abh03a:668_5: kārāpakā nāmāti imamatthaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Purimakammameva tassa kattā ceva
atk-abh03a:669_0: 125. Tassa tassevāti iminā idaṃ pucchati – yadi kammānaṃ kārakassa kattā tassāpi
atk-abh03a:669_1: kattā tassāpi kattā attheva, evaṃ sante purimena purimena avassaṃ pacchā pacchā puggalo
atk-abh03a:669_2: kātabboti imināpi te kammānaṃ kārakena puggalena āyatiṃ añño puggalo kātabbo, tenāpi
atk-abh03a:669_3: aññoti natthi dukkhassa antakiriyā, natthi vaṭṭassa upacchedo, natthi appaccayaparinibbānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:669_4: Paccayābhāvena paccayapaṭibaddhassa dukkhassa abhāvā yaṃ nibbānaṃ vuttaṃ, natthi
atk-abh03a:669_5: te tanti. Atha vā tassa tassevāti yadi kammaṃ kammamattaṃ na hoti, tassa pana kārako
atk-abh03a:669_6: puggalo, tassāpi kārako, tassāpi kārakoti evaṃ puggalaparamparā atthi. Evaṃ sante
atk-abh03a:669_7: yā esā kammavaṭṭassa appavattikaraṇena dukkhassa antakiriyā vuttā, sā natthīti attho.
atk-abh03a:669_8: Paravādī taṃ anicchanto paṭikkhipati. Ito aparāsupi upalabbhati sāmaññena kārakapucchāsu
atk-abh03a:669_9: puggalaṃyeva sandhāya “kattā kāretā”ti vuttaṃ, na paccaye. Na hi mahāpathavīādīnaṃ paccayā natthi.
atk-abh03a:670: 135. Añño kalyāṇapāpakānaṃ kammānaṃ kattāti pañho “saṅkhāravantaṃ vā attāna”ntiādidiṭṭhibhayā paṭikkhitto.
atk-abh03a:671_0: 136. Vipāko upalabbhatītiādi vipākapaṭisaṃvedīvasena puggalaṃ dassentassa laddhibhindanatthaṃ
atk-abh03a:671_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha vipākapaṭisaṃvedīti anuyogo paravādissa, vipākapavattito aññassa vedakassa
atk-abh03a:671_2: abhāvā paṭikkhepo sakavādissa. Puna pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a:672_0: 138. Tassa paṭisaṃvedīti tassa vipākapaṭisaṃvedakassa paṭisaṃvedī yasmā pana paṭisaṃveditabbo
atk-abh03a:672_1: nāma vipāko, na ca puggalo vipāko, tasmā paṭikkhepo paravādissa. Puna puṭṭho yasmā
atk-abh03a:672_2: puññavipāke ṭhitattā vipākapaṭisaṃvedī puttaṃ vā patiṃ vā mātā vā jāyā vā paricumbati
atk-abh03a:672_3: parisajjati, tasmā tathārūpaṃ paṭisaṃveditaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti paravādī.
atk-abh03a:673_0: Tassa tassevāti yadi vipāko vipākamattaṃ na hoti, tassa pana paṭisaṃvedī puggalo,
atk-abh03a:673_1: tassāpi paṭisaṃvedī tassāpi paṭisaṃvedīti evaṃ puggalaparamparā atthi. Evaṃ sante
atk-abh03a:673_2: yā esā vipākavaṭṭassa appavattikaraṇena dukkhassa antakiriyā vuttā, sā natthīti attho.
atk-abh03a:673_3: Ito paraṃ upalabbhatisāmaññena paṭisaṃvedīpucchāsu heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:674: 142. Añño kalyāṇapāpakānaṃ kammānaṃ vipākapaṭisaṃvedīti pañho “vedanavantaṃ vā attāna”ntiādidiṭṭhibhayā paṭikkhitto.
atk-abh03a:675_0: 143. Dibbaṃ sukhantiādi kalyāṇapāpakānaṃ kammānaṃ vipākaṃ bhājetvā dassanavasena
atk-abh03a:675_1: āraddhaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Sakavādino cettha puggalavaseneva
atk-abh03a:676: 148. Mahāpathavīādīni hi ārammaṇaṃ katvā vedayitānaṃ uppatti appaṭisiddhā.
