atk-abh03a:677_0: 170. Kattā kāretā vipākapaṭisaṃvedītiādi vomissakanayavasena āraddhaṃ. Tattha so
atk-abh03a:677_1: karotīti yaṃ tvaṃ kattāti ca paṭisaṃvedīti ca vadesi, kiṃ soyeva karoti, so paṭisaṃvedeti.
atk-abh03a:678: 171. Puna puṭṭho “idha nandati pecca nandatī”tiādisuttavasena paṭiññā tasseva. Athassa vacanokāsaṃ paṭibāhanto sakavādī sayaṃkataṃ sukhadukkhanti āha.
atk-abh03a:679_0: 172. Tattha añño karotīti kārakavedakānaṃ aññattapucchāvasena vuttaṃ. Tato paravādī
atk-abh03a:679_1: suttavirodhabhayena paṭikkhipitvā puna puṭṭho “manussabhūto katvā devabhūto paṭisaṃvedetī”ti
atk-abh03a:679_2: maññamāno paṭijānāti. Evaṃvādino pana paraṃkataṃ sukhadukkhaṃ āpajjatīti tassa vasena
atk-abh03a:680_0: 174. So ca añño cāti kārakavedakānaṃ ekattaaññattapucchāvasena vuttaṃ. Tato paravādī
atk-abh03a:680_1: suttavirodhabhayeneva paṭikkhipitvā puna puṭṭho purime dvepi naye ekato katvā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:680_2: Evaṃvādino pana sayaṃkatañca paraṃkatañca sukhadukkhaṃ āpajjatīti tassa vasena puṭṭho puna paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:681_0: 176. Neva so karotīti kārakavedakānaṃ ekattaaññattapaṭikkhepavasena vuttaṃ. Tato
atk-abh03a:681_1: paravādī suttavirodhavaseneva paṭikkhipitvā puna puṭṭho yasmā manusso devalokūpapattiyā
atk-abh03a:681_2: kammaṃ katvā na manussabhūtova paṭisaṃvedeti, nāpi yena kammaṃ kataṃ, tato aññova
atk-abh03a:681_3: paṭisaṃvedeti, tasmā kārakato vedako neva so hoti, na aññoti maññamāno paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:681_4: Laddhimattamevetaṃ? Evaṃvādino pana asayaṃkāraṃ aparaṃkāraṃ adhiccasamuppannaṃ sukhadukkhaṃ
atk-abh03a:681_5: āpajjatīti tassa vasena puṭṭho puna paṭikkhipati. Apica imasmiṃ vomissakanaye ādito
atk-abh03a:681_6: paṭṭhāya imināpi nayena attho veditabbo. Yasmā hi ayaṃ puggalavādī kammānaṃ kārakañceva
atk-abh03a:681_7: vedakañca icchati, tasmāssa yo kārako, teneva vā vedakena bhavitabbaṃ, aññena vā
atk-abh03a:681_8: ubhohi vā bhavitabbaṃ, ubhohi vāpi na bhavitabbanti idamāpannaṃ hoti. Evamāpannameva
atk-abh03a:681_9: anuyogaṃ anuyuñjanto sakavādī “so karotī”tiādayo cattāropi vikappe āha. Sesaṃ vuttappakārameva.
atk-abh03a:682_0: Pariyosāne pana cattāropi pañhā ekato puṭṭhā. Tattha paṭikkhepo ca paṭijānanā ca
atk-abh03a:682_1: sayaṃkatādidosappatti ca purimanayeneva veditabbā. Ito paraṃ “kalyāṇapāpakānī”ti
atk-abh03a:682_2: avatvā heṭṭhā vuttanayā eva “kammaṃ atthī”tiādinā vikappena dassitā. Tesampi heṭṭhā
atk-abh03a:686_0: 193. Ito paraṃ abhiññānuyogādivasena arahattasādhanā hoti. Tattha āmantāti sakavādinā
atk-abh03a:686_2: ajjhattaṃ atthi, tasmā iddhādinibbattakena puggalena bhavitabba”nti maññamāno nanu
atk-abh03a:686_3: atthi koci iddhiṃ vikubbatītiādimāha. Taṃ sabbaṃ uttānatthameva.
atk-abh03a:689_0: 197. Idāni mātātiādiko ñātakānuyogo. Khattiyotiādiko jātianuyogo. Gahaṭṭho pabbajitoti
atk-abh03a:689_1: paṭipattianuyogo. Devo manussoti upapattianuyogo. Sotāpannotiādiko paṭivedhānuyogo,
atk-abh03a:689_2: ariyānuyogotipi vuccati. Te sabbe uttānatthāyeva. “Arahā hutvā na arahā”ti panettha
atk-abh03a:691_0: 209. Saṅkhatotiādi saccikaṭṭhasabhāvānuyogo. Tattha tatiyā koṭīti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:691_1: Tathārūpassa saccikaṭṭhassa abhāvato paṭikkhepo paravādissa. Puna puṭṭho puggalaṃ
atk-abh03a:692: 211. Añño puggalotipañhepi saṅkhatehi khandhehi aññattaṃ anicchanto paṭikkhepo tasseva.
atk-abh03a:693: 212. Khandhā saṅkhatātiādi saṅkhatāsaṅkhatāni sarūpena dassetvā aññattapucchanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:694: 213. Rūpaṃ saṅkhatantiādi khandhe vibhāgato dassetvā aññattapucchanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:695_0: 214. Puggalassa uppādoti pucchā sakavādissa, “jātidhammā jarādhammā, atho maraṇadhammino”tiādisuttavasena
atk-abh03a:695_1: paṭiññā paravādissa. Saṅkhatabhāvaṃ panassa so na icchati, tasmā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:696: 215. Puna na uppādo paññāyatītiādinā nayena puṭṭho “dukkhameva hi sambhoti, dukkhaṃ tiṭṭhati veti cā”tiādivacanato puggalassa uppādādayo nāma na yujjantīti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:697: 216. Atthatthamhīti atthaṃ vuccati nibbānaṃ. Tattha atthīti pucchati. Tassa atthitāya sassataṃ, natthitāya. Ucchedo āpajjati. Tadubhayampi anicchanto pacchā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:701: 218. Vedanaṃ vediyamānapañhe vedanaṃ vediyamāno pariggahitavedano yogāvacarova pajānāti, bālaputhujjano nappajānāti.
atk-abh03a:703: 226. Pārāyanagāthāya suññato lokaṃ avekkhassūti sattasuññatavasena khandhalokaṃ olokehīti attho.
atk-abh03a:704_0: 228. Puggalo avekkhatīti sakavādipucchā. Paravādissa hi “suññato lokaṃ avekkhassū”ti
atk-abh03a:704_1: gāthāya yo avekkhati, so puggaloti laddhi, tasmā naṃ evaṃ pucchati. Saha rūpenāti
atk-abh03a:704_2: rūpakāyena saddhiṃ. Tato anissaṭo hutvāti attho. Idaṃ pañcavokāravasena anujānitvā
atk-abh03a:704_3: puna taṃ jīvanti puṭṭho suttavirodhabhayena paṭikkhipati. Vinā rūpenāti idaṃ catuvokāravasena
atk-abh03a:704_4: anujānitvā puna aññaṃ jīvanti puṭṭho suttavirodhabhayeneva paṭikkhipati. “Abbhantaragato”ti
atk-abh03a:704_5: ca “bahiddhā nikkhamitvā”ti ca idaṃ “saha rūpena vinā rūpenā”ti heṭṭhā vuttassa lakkhaṇavacanaṃ.
atk-abh03a:704_6: Tattha abbhantaragatoti rūpassa antogato, ito vā etto vā anikkhamitvā rūpaparicchedavaseneva
atk-abh03a:704_7: ṭhito hutvāti attho. Nikkhamitvāti rūpaparicchedaṃ atikkamitvā. Rūpaṃ anissito hutvāti attho.
atk-abh03a:705_0: 231. Anattāti attanā jīvena puggalena rahito. Ekadhammepi puggalo natthīti attho.
atk-abh03a:705_1: Evaṃ sabbasuttānaṃ āgamaṭṭhakathāsu vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo. Idha pana sandhāyabhāsitamattameva vakkhāma.
atk-abh03a:706_0: 237. Vuttaṃ bhagavatā sappikumbhotiādi “sabbāva desanā yathārutavaseneva atthato
atk-abh03a:706_1: na gahetabbā”ti dassanatthaṃ ābhataṃ. Yathā hi suvaṇṇaṃ gahetvā kato suvaṇṇavikāro
atk-abh03a:706_2: kumbho suvaṇṇakumbhoti vuccati, na evaṃ sappiṃ gahetvā kato sappissa vikāro sappikumbho
atk-abh03a:706_3: nāma atthi. Yasmiṃ pana kumbhe sappi pakkhittaṃ, so sappikumbho nāmāti ayamettha
atk-abh03a:706_4: attho. Telakumbhādīsupi eseva nayo. Yathā ca nibbānaṃ niccaṃ dhuvaṃ, na evaṃ bhattaṃ
atk-abh03a:706_5: vā yāgu vā atthi. Kālaparicchedaṃ pana akatvā divase divase dassāmāti paññattavasena
atk-abh03a:707_0: “Atthi puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno”tiādīsupi yathā rūpādayo dhammā paccattalakkhaṇasāmaññalakkhaṇavasena
atk-abh03a:707_1: atthi, na evaṃ puggalo. Rūpādīsu pana sati ‘evaṃnāmo’‘evaṃgotto’ti vohāro hoti. Iti
atk-abh03a:707_2: iminā lokavohārena lokasammutiyā lokaniruttiyā atthi puggaloti ayamettha attho. Vuttampi
atk-abh03a:707_3: cetaṃ bhagavatā – “imā kho citta, lokasamaññā lokaniruttiyo lokavohārā lokapaññattiyo”ti.
atk-abh03a:707_4: Rūpādidhammā pana vināpi lokasammutiṃ paccattasāmaññalakkhaṇavasena paññāpanato atthīti ayamettha attho.
atk-abh03a:708_0: Buddhānaṃ pana dve kathā sammutikathā ca paramatthakathā ca. Tattha satto, puggalo,
atk-abh03a:708_1: devo, brahmātiādikā sammutikathā nāma. Aniccaṃ, dukkhaṃ, anattā, khandhā, dhātuyo,
atk-abh03a:709_0: Tattha yo sammutidesanāya sattoti vā…pe… brahmāti vāti vutte jānituṃ paṭivijjhituṃ
atk-abh03a:709_1: niyyātuṃ arahattajayaggāhaṃ gahetuṃ sakkoti, tassa bhagavā āditova sattoti vā puggaloti
atk-abh03a:709_2: vā posoti vā devoti vā brahmāti vā katheti. Yo paramatthadesanāya aniccanti vā dukkhanti
atk-abh03a:709_3: vātiādīsu aññataraṃ sutvāva jānituṃ paṭivijjhituṃ niyyātuṃ arahattajayaggāhaṃ gahetuṃ
atk-abh03a:709_4: sakkoti. Tassa aniccantiādīsu aññataraṃ katheti. Tathā sammutikathāya bujjhanakasattassa
atk-abh03a:709_5: na paṭhamaṃ paramatthakathaṃ katheti. Sammutikathāya pana bodhetvā pacchā paramatthakathaṃ
atk-abh03a:709_6: katheti. Paramatthakathāya bujjhanakasattassāpi na paṭhamaṃ sammutikathaṃ katheti.
atk-abh03a:709_7: Paramatthakathāya pana bodhetvā pacchā sammutikathaṃ katheti. Pakatiyā pana paṭhamameva
atk-abh03a:709_8: paramatthakathaṃ kathentassa desanā lūkhākārā hoti. Tasmā buddhā paṭhamaṃ sammutikathaṃ
atk-abh03a:709_9: kathetvā pacchā paramatthakathaṃ kathenti. Te sammutikathaṃ kathentāpi saccameva
atk-abh03a:709_10: sabhāvameva amusāva kathenti. Paramatthakathaṃ kathentāpi saccameva sabhāvameva amusāva kathenti. Ayañhi –
atk-abh03a:715_0: Aparo nayo – dve bhagavato desanā paramatthadesanā ca khandhādivasena, sammutidesanā
atk-abh03a:715_1: ca sappikumbhādivasena. Na hi bhagavā samaññaṃ atidhāvati. Tasmā “atthi puggalo”ti
atk-abh03a:715_2: vacanamattato abhiniveso na kātabbo. Satthārā hi –
atk-abh03a:723_0: 239. Idāni parihānikathā hoti. Parihānidhammo aparihānidhammo, “dveme, bhikkhave,
atk-abh03a:723_1: dhammā sekkhassa, bhikkhuno parihānāya saṃvattanti”, “pañcime, bhikkhave, dhammā
atk-abh03a:723_2: samayavimuttassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṃvattantī”ti evamādīni hi suttāni nissāya
atk-abh03a:723_3: sammitiyā vajjiputtakā sabbatthivādino ekacce ca mahāsaṅghikā arahatopi parihāniṃ
atk-abh03a:723_4: icchanti, tasmā te vā hontu aññeyeva vā, yesaṃ ayaṃ laddhi, tesaṃ laddhibhindanatthaṃ
atk-abh03a:723_5: parihāyati arahā arahattāti pucchā sakavādissa. Tatra parihāyatīti dve parihāniyo
atk-abh03a:723_6: pattaparihāni ca appattaparihāni ca. Tattha “dutiyampi kho āyasmā godhiko tamhā sāmayikāya
atk-abh03a:723_7: cetovimuttiyā parihāyī”ti ayaṃ pattaparihāni nāma. “Mā vo sāmaññatthikānaṃ sataṃ
atk-abh03a:723_8: sāmaññattho parihāyī”ti ayaṃ appattaparihāni. Tāsu idha pattaparihāni adhippetā.
atk-abh03a:723_9: Tañhi sandhāya āmantāti paṭiññā paravādissa. Sakasamaye pana imaṃ pattaparihāniṃ
atk-abh03a:723_10: nāma lokiyasamāpattiyāva icchanti, na arahattādīhi sāmaññaphalehi. Parasamayepi naṃ
atk-abh03a:723_11: sabbasāmaññaphalesu sabbabhavesu sabbakālesu sabbesañca puggalānaṃ na icchanti. Taṃ
atk-abh03a:723_12: pana tesaṃ laddhimattamevāti sabbaṃ laddhijālaṃ bhindituṃ puna sabbatthātiādinā nayena desanā vaḍḍhitā.
atk-abh03a:724_0: Tattha yasmā paravādī kamena parihāyitvā sotāpattiphale ṭhitassa arahato parihāniṃ
atk-abh03a:724_1: na icchati, upariphalesu ṭhitasseva icchati. Yasmā ca rūpārūpabhavesu ṭhitassa na
atk-abh03a:724_2: icchati, kammārāmatādīnaṃ pana parihāniyadhammānaṃ bhāvato kāmabhave ṭhitasseva icchati,
atk-abh03a:724_3: tasmā “sabbatthā”ti puṭṭho paṭikkhipati. Puna daḷhaṃ katvā puṭṭho kāmabhavaṃ sandhāya
atk-abh03a:724_4: paṭijānāti. Sabbasmimpi hi kāmabhave parihānikarā kāmaguṇā atthi, tasmā tattha parihāyatīti tassa laddhi.
atk-abh03a:725_0: Tatiyapucchāya parihānīti parihānikare dhamme pucchati. Tattha yasmā parihāni nāma
atk-abh03a:725_1: kammārāmatādidhammā, visesato vā kāmarāgabyāpādā eva, te ca rūpārūpabhave natthi,
atk-abh03a:726_0: Sabbadāti kālapucchā. Tattha paṭhamapañhe yonisomanasikārakāle aparihāyanato paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:726_1: Dutiye ayonisomanasikaroto rattibhāge vā divasabhāge vā sabbadā parihāyanato paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:726_2: Tatiye parihānikaradhammasamāyoge sati muhuttameva parihāni nāma hoti, tato pubbe
atk-abh03a:726_3: aparihīnassa pacchā parihīnassa ca parihāni nāma natthīti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:727_0: Sabbeva arahantoti pañhānaṃ paṭhamasmiṃ tikkhindriye sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Dutiyasmiṃ
atk-abh03a:727_1: mudindriye sandhāya paṭijānāti. Tatiyasmimpi tikkhindriyāva adhippetā. Tesañhi sabbesampi
atk-abh03a:728_0: Seṭṭhiudāharaṇe paṭhamapucchā paravādissa, dutiyā sakavādissa. Tatrāyaṃ adhippāyo
atk-abh03a:728_1: – yaṃ maṃ tumhe pucchatha – “arahā arahattā parihāyanto catūhi phalehi parihāyatī”ti,
atk-abh03a:728_2: tatra vo paṭipucchāmi – “catūhi satasahassehi seṭṭhī seṭṭhittaṃ karonto satasahassehi
atk-abh03a:728_3: parihīne seṭṭhī seṭṭhittā parihīno hotī”ti. Tato sakavādinā ekadesena parihāniṃ sandhāya
atk-abh03a:728_4: “āmantā”ti vutte sabbasāpateyyā parihīno hotīti pucchati. Tathā aparihīnattā sakavādī
atk-abh03a:728_5: na hevāti vatvā atha naṃ “evameva arahāpi parihāyati ca. Na ca catūhi phalehī”ti
atk-abh03a:728_6: uppannaladdhikaṃ dutiyaṃ bhabbapañhaṃ pucchati. Paravādī seṭṭhino abhabbatāya niyamaṃ
atk-abh03a:728_7: apassanto paṭijānitvā arahato catūhi phalehi parihānibhabbataṃ puṭṭho “niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo”ti
atk-abh03a:728_8: vacanassa ayoniso atthaṃ gahetvā laddhiyaṃ ṭhito sotāpattiphalato parihāyituṃ abhabbataṃ
atk-abh03a:731_0: 240. Idāni ariyapuggalasaṃsandanā āraddhā. Tattha yasmā keci arahatova parihāniṃ
atk-abh03a:731_1: icchanti, keci anāgāminopi, keci sakadāgāmissapi. Sotāpannassa pana sabbepi na icchantiyeva.
atk-abh03a:731_2: Ye arahattā parihāyitvā anāgāmisakadāgāmibhāve ṭhitā, tesaṃ parihāniṃ icchanti, na
atk-abh03a:731_3: itaresaṃ anāgāmisakadāgāmīnaṃ. Sotāpannassa pana tepi sabbathāpi na icchantiyeva,
atk-abh03a:731_4: tasmā peyyālamukhena pucchā katā. Tattha tesaṃ laddhivasena paṭiññā ca paṭikkhepo
atk-abh03a:731_5: ca veditabbā. “Parihāyati anāgāmī anāgāmiphalā”ti hi pañhasmiṃ ye anāgāmino parihāniṃ
atk-abh03a:731_6: na icchanti, tesaṃ vasena paṭikkhepo. Ye pakatianāgāmino vā arahattā parihāyitvā
atk-abh03a:731_7: ṭhitaanāgāmino vā parihāniṃ icchanti, tesaṃ vasena paṭiññāti idamettha nayamukhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:732_0: 241. Yaṃ panettha “sotāpattiphalassa anantarā arahattaṃyeva sacchikarotī”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:732_1: taṃ parihīnassa puna vāyamato arahattappattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Itaro sotāpattiphalānantaraṃ
atk-abh03a:733_0: 242. Tato paraṃ “parihāni nāmesā kilesappahānassa vā mandatāya bhaveyya, maggabhāvanādīnaṃ
atk-abh03a:733_1: vā anadhimattatāya, saccānaṃ vā adassanenā”ti evamādīnaṃ vasena anuyuñjituṃ kassa
atk-abh03a:733_2: bahutarā kilesā pahīnātiādi vuttaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ uttānādhippāyameva suttānaṃ panattho
atk-abh03a:734_0: 262. Samayavimutto arahā arahattā parihāyatīti ettha mudindriyo samayavimutto, tikkhindriyo
atk-abh03a:734_1: asamayavimuttoti tesaṃ laddhi. Sakasamaye pana avasippatto jhānalābhī samayavimutto,
atk-abh03a:734_2: vasippatto jhānalābhī ceva sabbe ca ariyapuggalā ariye vimokkhe asamayavimuttāti
atk-abh03a:734_3: sanniṭṭhānaṃ. So pana taṃ attano laddhiṃ gahetvā samayavimutto parihāyati, itaro
atk-abh03a:737_0: 265. Idāni suttasādhanā hoti. Tattha uccāvacāti uttamahīnabhedato uccā ca avacā ca.
atk-abh03a:737_1: Paṭipādāti paṭipadā. Samaṇena pakāsitāti buddhasamaṇena jotitā. Sukhāpaṭipadā hi
atk-abh03a:737_2: khippābhiññā uccā. Dukkhāpaṭipadā dandhābhiññā avacā. Itarā dve ekenaṅgena uccā,
atk-abh03a:737_3: ekena avacā. Paṭhamaṃ vuttā eva vā uccā, itaro tissopi avacā. Tāya cetāya uccāvacāya
atk-abh03a:737_4: paṭipadāya na pāraṃ diguṇaṃ yanti, ekamaggena dvikkhattuṃ nibbānaṃ na gacchantīti
atk-abh03a:737_5: attho. Kasmā? Yena maggena ye kilesā pahīnā, tena tesaṃ puna appahātabbato. Etena
atk-abh03a:737_6: parihānidhammābhāvaṃ dīpeti. Nayidaṃ ekaguṇaṃ mutanti tañca idaṃ pāraṃ ekavāraṃyeva
atk-abh03a:737_7: phusanārahaṃ na hoti. Kasmā? Ekena maggena sabbakilesānaṃ appahānato. Etena ekamaggeneva
atk-abh03a:738_0: Atthi chinnassa chediyanti chinnassa kilesavaṭṭassa puna chinditabbaṃ kiñci atthīti
atk-abh03a:738_1: pucchati. Itaro tikkhindriyaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipitvā puna puṭṭho mudindriyaṃ sandhāya
atk-abh03a:738_2: paṭijānāti. Sakavādī suttaṃ āharitvā natthibhāvaṃ dasseti. Tattha oghapāsoti kilesogho ceva kilesapāso ca.
atk-abh03a:739: 266. Katassa paṭicayoti bhāvitassa maggassa puna bhāvanā. Idhāpi paṭikkhepapaṭijānanāni purimanayeneva veditabbāni.
atk-abh03a:740_0: 267. Parihānāya saṃvattantīti paravādinā ābhate sutte pañca dhammā appattaparihānāya
atk-abh03a:740_1: ceva lokiyasamāpattiparihānāya ca saṃvattanti. So pana pattassa arahattaphalassa
atk-abh03a:740_2: parihānāya sallakkheti. Teneva atthi arahato kammārāmatāti āha. Itaropi asamayavimuttaṃ
atk-abh03a:740_3: sandhāya paṭikkhipitvā itaraṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Kāmarāgavasena vā pavattamānaṃ
atk-abh03a:740_4: taṃ paṭikkhipitvā itarathā pavattamānaṃ paṭijānāti. Rāgādīnaṃ pana atthitaṃ puṭṭho
atk-abh03a:741_0: 268. Kiṃ pariyuṭṭhitoti kena pariyuṭṭhito anubaddho ajjhotthato vā hutvāti attho.
atk-abh03a:741_2: Kalyāṇānusayoti vacanamattasāmaññena vā paṭijānāti. Rāgo upacayaṃ gacchatīti bhāvanāya
atk-abh03a:741_3: pahīnaṃ sandhāyāha. Parato dosamohesupi eseva nayo. Sakkāyadiṭṭhiādīnaṃ pana dassanena
atk-abh03a:741_4: pahīnattā upacayaṃ na icchati. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a:746_0: 269. Idāni brahmacariyakathā hoti. Tattha dve brahmacariyavāsā, maggabhāvanā ca pabbajjā
atk-abh03a:746_1: ca. Pabbajjā sabbadevesu natthi. Maggabhāvanā ṭhapetvā asaññasatte sesesu appaṭisiddhā.
atk-abh03a:746_2: Tattha ye paranimmitavasavattideve upādāya taduparidevesu maggabhāvanampi na icchanti
atk-abh03a:746_3: seyyathāpi sammitiyā, te sandhāya natthi devesūti pucchā sakavādissa. “Tīhi, bhikkhave,
atk-abh03a:746_4: ṭhānehi jambudīpakā manussā uttarakuruke ca manusse adhiggaṇhanti deve ca tāvatiṃse.
atk-abh03a:746_5: Katamehi tīhi? Sūrā satimanto idha brahmacariyavāso”ti idaṃ suttaṃ nissāya dvepi
atk-abh03a:746_6: brahmacariyavāsā natthi devesūti uppannaladdhivasena paṭiññā paravādissa. Puna dvinnampi
atk-abh03a:746_7: brahmacariyānaṃ antarāyikadhammavaseneva sabbe devā jaḷāti pucchā sakavādissa. Tattha
atk-abh03a:746_8: hatthasaṃvācikāti mūgā viya hatthamuddhāya vattāro. Parato atthi devesūti pucchā
atk-abh03a:746_9: paravādissa, maggabhāvanaṃ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādissa. Paṭiññāya adhippāyaṃ asallakkhetvā
atk-abh03a:747_0: 270. Yattha natthi pabbajjāti pañhe gihīnañceva ekaccānañca devānaṃ maggapaṭilābhaṃ
atk-abh03a:747_1: sandhāya paṭikkhepo tasseva. Puna puṭṭho paccantavāsino ceva asaññasatte ca sandhāya
atk-abh03a:747_2: paṭiññā tasseva. Yo pabbajatītiādīsu pucchāsupi eseva nayo. Puna “atthi devesū”ti
atk-abh03a:747_3: pañhepi maggabhāvanaṃ sandhāyeva paṭiññā sakavādissa, “sabbadevesū”ti vutte asaññasatte
atk-abh03a:748: 271. Manussesūti pañhadvaye jambudīpake sandhāya paṭiññā. Paccantavāsino sandhāya paṭikkhepo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:749: Atthi yattha atthīti atthi te devā, atthi vā so padeso, yattha atthīti evaṃ sattapadesavibhāgamukhena vissajjanaṃ sakavādissa. Iminā nayena sabbe ekantarikapañhā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:750: 272. Suttānuyoge kuhiṃ phaluppattīti tassa anāgāmino arahattaphaluppatti kuhinti pucchā sakavādissa. Tatthevāti suddhāvāsesūti attho.
atk-abh03a:751_0: Handa hīti kāraṇatthe nipāto. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yasmā anāgāmipuggalo idha loke bhāvitena
atk-abh03a:751_1: maggena tattha suddhāvāsesu phalaṃ sacchikaroti, na tattha aññaṃ maggaṃ bhāveti,
atk-abh03a:753_0: 273. Idāni yadi aññattha bhāvitena maggena aññattha phalasacchikiriyā hoti, sotāpannādīnampi
atk-abh03a:753_1: siyāti etamatthaṃ dassetuṃ puna anāgāmītiādīnaṃ saṃsandanapucchā sakavādissa. Tattha
atk-abh03a:753_2: anāgāmissa phalasacchikiriyāya paṭiññā, sesānaṃ phalasacchikiriyāya paṭikkhepo paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:753_3: Idha bhāvitamaggo hi anāgāmī idhavihāyaniṭṭho nāma hoti. So idha anāgāmimaggaṃ bhāvetvā
atk-abh03a:753_5: arahattaphalaṃ sacchikarotī”ti tassa laddhi. Sotāpannasakadāgāmino pana tattha maggaṃ
atk-abh03a:753_6: bhāvetvā tatrupapattikā nāma hontīti tesaṃ idhāgamanaññeva natthi. Iti so anāgāmissa
atk-abh03a:754_0: Anāgāmī puggalo tattha bhāvitena maggenāti pañhe “anāgāmino tattha maggabhāvanāva
atk-abh03a:754_1: natthī”ti laddhiyā paṭikkhipati. Maggo ca bhāvīyati, na ca kilesā pahīyantīti pucchā
atk-abh03a:754_2: sakavādissa, rūpāvacaramaggaṃ sandhāya paṭiññā itarassa. Rūpāvacaramaggena hi so
atk-abh03a:755_0: Anāgāmī puggalo katakaraṇīyoti pañhe “opapātiko tatthaparinibbāyī”ti vacanato upapattiyāvassa
atk-abh03a:755_1: katakaraṇīyādibhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Arahāti pañhe idhaparinibbāyino arahato
atk-abh03a:755_2: vaseneva paṭikkhipati. Puna puṭṭho tatthaparinibbāyino vasena paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:756_0: Atthi arahato punabbhavotiādīsupi tatthaparinibbāyī idhaparinibbāyīnaṃ vaseneva attho
atk-abh03a:756_1: veditabbo. Appaṭividdhākuppova tatthaparinibbāyatīti puṭṭho idheva bhāvitena maggena
atk-abh03a:757: Yathā migoti paṭhamaṃ udāharaṇaṃ paravādissa, dutiyaṃ sakavādissa. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a:760_0: 274. Idāni odhisokathā nāma hoti. Tattha ye sotāpannādīnaṃ nānābhisamayavasena dukkhadassanādīhi
atk-abh03a:760_1: odhiso odhiso ekadesena ekadesena kilesappahānaṃ icchanti seyyathāpi etarahi sammitiyādayo,
atk-abh03a:760_2: tesaṃ taṃ laddhiṃ bhindituṃ odhisoti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā paravādissa. Puna
atk-abh03a:760_3: anuyogo sakavādissa, ekadesena sotāpannādibhāvassa abhāvato paṭikkhepo paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:764_0: 279. Idāni jahatikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ “jhānalābhī puthujjano saha saccābhisamayā
atk-abh03a:764_1: anāgāmī nāma hoti, tassa puthujjanakāleyeva kāmarāgabyāpādā pahīnā”ti laddhi seyyathāpi
atk-abh03a:764_2: etarahi sammitiyānaṃ, tesaṃ taṃ laddhiṃ bhindituṃ jahati puthujjanoti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:764_3: jhānavikkhambhitānaṃ pana tesaṃ pariyuṭṭhānaṃ apassantassa paṭiññā paravādissa. Yasmā
atk-abh03a:764_4: pana tesaṃ jhānavikkhambhitānampi anāgāmimaggeneva accantaṃ pahānaṃ hoti, tasmā puna
atk-abh03a:764_5: accantantiādianuyogo sakavādissa, tathārūpassa pahānassa abhāvato paṭikkhepo itarassa.
atk-abh03a:764_6: Vikkhambhetīti accantavikkhambhanameva sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa. Tato paraṃ anāgāmimaggaṭṭhena
atk-abh03a:765: 280. Tato paraṃ anāgāmiphale saṇṭhātīti puṭṭho jhānānāgāmitaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Arahatte saṇṭhātīti puṭṭho dassanamaggena uddhambhāgiyānaṃ pahānābhāvato paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:766_0: Apubbaṃ acarimaṃ tayo maggeti puṭṭho tathārūpāya bhāvanāya abhāvā paṭikkhipati. Puna
atk-abh03a:766_1: puṭṭho tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ kiccasabbhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Sāmaññaphalapucchāsupi
atk-abh03a:766_2: eseva nayo. Katamena maggenāti puṭṭho anāgāmimaggenāti jhānānāgāmitaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-abh03a:766_3: Puna saṃyojanappahānaṃ puṭṭho tiṇṇaṃ anāgāmimaggena tesaṃ kilesānaṃ appaheyyattā
atk-abh03a:766_4: paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho paṭhamamaggasseva jhānānāgāmimaggabhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:770_0: 282. Idāni sabbamatthītivādakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ “yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ…pe…
atk-abh03a:770_1: ayaṃ vuccati rūpakkhandho”tiādivacanato “sabbepi atītādibhedā dhammā khandhasabhāvaṃ
atk-abh03a:770_2: na vijahanti, tasmā sabbaṃ atthiyeva nāmā”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi sabbamatthivādānaṃ,
atk-abh03a:770_3: tesaṃ laddhivisodhanatthaṃ sabbamatthīti pucchā sakavādissa, vuttappakārāya laddhiyā
atk-abh03a:770_4: ṭhatvā paṭiññā itarassa. Sabbathāti sabbasmiṃ sarīre sabbamatthīti pucchati. Sabbadāti
atk-abh03a:770_5: sabbasmiṃ kāle sabbamatthīti pucchati. Sabbena sabbanti sabbenākārena sabbamatthīti
atk-abh03a:770_6: pucchati. Sabbesūti sabbesu dhammesu sabbamatthīti pucchati. Ayoganti ayuttaṃ. Nānāsabhāvānañhi
atk-abh03a:770_7: yogo hoti, na ekasabhāvassa. Iti imasmiṃ pañhe rūpaṃ vedanāya, vedanaṃ vā rūpena
atk-abh03a:770_8: anānaṃ ekalakkhaṇameva katvā sabbamatthīti pucchati. Yampi natthi tampatthīti yampi
atk-abh03a:770_9: chaṭṭhakhandhādikaṃ sasavisāṇādikaṃ vā kiñci natthīti siddhaṃ, tampi te atthīti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:770_10: Sabbamatthīti yā diṭṭhi sā diṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhīti, yā diṭṭhi sā diṭṭhi sammādiṭṭhīti
atk-abh03a:770_11: hevamatthīti iminā idaṃ pucchati – yā te esā sabbamatthīti diṭṭhi, sā diṭṭhi ayāthāvakattā
atk-abh03a:770_12: micchādiṭṭhīti evaṃ yā amhākaṃ diṭṭhi, sā diṭṭhi yāthāvakattā sammādiṭṭhīti evaṃ
atk-abh03a:770_13: tava samaye atthīti pucchati. Itaro sabbesupi etesu nayesu vuttappakārāya atthitāya
atk-abh03a:770_14: abhāvato paṭikkhipati. Imesu pana sabbesupi nayesu “ājānāhi niggaha”nti ādiṃ katvā
atk-abh03a:770_15: sabbo kathāmaggabhedo vitthārato veditabboti ayaṃ tāvettha vādayutti.
atk-abh03a:772: 283-284. Idāni atītaṃ atthīti kālasaṃsandanaṃ hoti. Tattha atītaṃ atthītiādikaṃ suddhikasaṃsandanaṃ. Atītaṃ rūpaṃ atthītiādikaṃ khandhavasena kālasaṃsandanaṃ.
atk-abh03a:773_0: 285. Paccuppannaṃ rūpaṃ appiyaṃ karitvāti atītānāgataṃ pahāya paccuppannarūpameva
atk-abh03a:773_1: appiyaṃ avibhajitabbaṃ karitvā. Rūpabhāvaṃ jahatītipañhe niruddhassāpi rūpassa rūpakkhandhasaṅgahitattā
atk-abh03a:773_2: paṭikkhipati. Rūpabhāvaṃ na jahatīti paṭilomapañhepi rūpakkhandhena saṅgahitattāva
atk-abh03a:773_3: paṭijānāti. Odātaṃ vatthaṃ appiyaṃ karitvāti ettha kiñcāpi na sabbaṃ vatthaṃ odātaṃ,
atk-abh03a:773_4: iminā pana vatthanti avatvā “odātaṃ vatthaṃ appiyaṃ karitvā”ti vutte sakavādinā ekatthatā
atk-abh03a:773_5: anuññātā. Odātabhāvaṃ jahatīti pañhe vaṇṇavigamaṃ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādissa. Vatthabhāvaṃ
atk-abh03a:773_6: jahatīti ettha pana paññattiyā avigatattā paṭikkhepo tasseva. Paṭilomepi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a:774_0: 286. Atītaṃ atītabhāvaṃ na jahatīti puṭṭho “yadi jaheyya, anāgataṃ vā paccuppannaṃ
atk-abh03a:774_1: vā siyā”ti maññamāno paṭijānāti. Anāgataṃ anāgatabhāvaṃ na jahatīti puṭṭho pana “yadi
atk-abh03a:774_2: na jaheyya, anāgatamevassa, paccuppannabhāvaṃ na pāpuṇeyyā”ti maññamāno paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:774_3: Paccuppannapañhepi atītabhāvaṃ anāpajjanadoso siyāti paṭikkhipati. Anulomapañhesupi
atk-abh03a:775: 287. Evaṃ suddhikanayaṃ vatvā puna khandhavasena dassetuṃ atītaṃ rūpantiādi vuttaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ pāḷianusāreneva sakkā jānituṃ.
atk-abh03a:777_0: 288. Idāni “atītaṃ nvatthī”tiādi vacanasodhanā hoti. Tattha hañci atītaṃ nvatthīti
atk-abh03a:777_1: yadi atītaṃ no atthīti attho. Atītaṃ atthīti micchāti atītañca taṃ atthi cāti micchā
atk-abh03a:777_2: eva. Taññeva anāgataṃ taṃ paccuppannanti puṭṭho anāgatakkhaṇeyevassa paccuppannatāya
atk-abh03a:778_0: Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho yaṃ uppādato pubbe anāgataṃ ahosi, tassa uppannakāle paccuppannattā
atk-abh03a:778_1: paṭijānāti. Hutvā hoti hutvā hotīti yadetaṃ tayā “anāgataṃ hutvā paccuppannaṃ hotī”ti
atk-abh03a:778_2: vadatā taññeva anāgataṃ taṃ paccuppannanti laddhivasena “anāgataṃ vā paccuppannaṃ
atk-abh03a:778_3: vā hutvā hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Kiṃ te tampi hutvā hotīti? Itaro hutvā bhūtassa puna hutvā
atk-abh03a:779_0: Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho yasmā taṃ anāgataṃ hutvā paccuppannaṃ hontaṃ “hutvā hotī”ti saṅkhaṃ
atk-abh03a:779_1: gataṃ, tasmā paṭijānāti. Atha naṃ sakavādī “yadi te taṃ anāgataṃ hutvā paccuppannaṃ
atk-abh03a:779_2: hontaṃ ‘hutvā hotī’ti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ, puna hutvā hoti, yaṃ anāgataṃ na hutvā paccuppannaṃ
atk-abh03a:779_3: na hontaṃ ‘na hutvā na hotī’ti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ sasavisāṇaṃ, kiṃ te tampi puna na hutvā
atk-abh03a:779_4: na hotī”tiadhippāyena na hutvā na hoti na hutvā na hotīti pañhaṃ pucchati. Itaro
atk-abh03a:779_5: “yaṃ natthi, taṃ natthitāya, eva anāgataṃ na hutvā paccuppannaṃ na hotīti nahutvānahoti
atk-abh03a:779_6: nāma tāva hotu, puna nahutvānahotibhāvo panassa kuto”ti maññamāno paṭikkhipati. Taññeva
atk-abh03a:779_7: paccuppannaṃ taṃ atītanti pañhepi paccuppannakkhaṇeyevassa atītatāya abhāvaṃ sandhāya
atk-abh03a:780_0: Dutiyapañhe puṭṭho yaṃ atītabhāvato pubbe paccuppannaṃ ahosi, tasseva atītattā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:780_1: Hutvā hoti hutvā hotīti yadetaṃ tayā “paccuppannaṃ hutvā atītaṃ hotī”ti vadatā “taññeva
atk-abh03a:780_2: paccuppannaṃ taṃ atīta”nti laddhivasena “paccuppannaṃ vā atītaṃ vā hutvā hotī”ti
atk-abh03a:780_3: vuttaṃ, kiṃ te tampi hutvā hotīti? Itaro hutvā bhūtassa puna hutvā abhāvato na hevanti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:781_0: Dutiyapañhe yasmā taṃ paccuppannaṃ hutvā atītaṃ hontaṃ “hutvā hotī”ti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ,
atk-abh03a:781_1: tasmā paṭijānāti. Atha naṃ sakavādī “yadi te taññeva paccuppannaṃ hutvā atītaṃ hontaṃ
atk-abh03a:781_2: ‘hutvā hotī’ti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ, puna hutvā hoti, yaṃ paccuppannaṃ na hutvā atītaṃ na
atk-abh03a:781_3: hontaṃ ‘na hutvā na hotī’ti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ sasavisāṇaṃ, kiṃ te tampi puna na hutvā
atk-abh03a:781_4: na hotī”ti adhippāyena na hutvā na hoti na hutvā na hotīti pañhaṃ pucchati. Itaro
atk-abh03a:781_5: “yaṃ natthi, taṃ natthitāya eva paccuppannaṃ na hutvā atītaṃ na hotīti nahutvānahoti
atk-abh03a:781_6: nāma tāva hotu. Puna nahutvānahotibhāvo panassa kuto”ti maññamāno paṭikkhipati. Ubhayaṃ
atk-abh03a:781_7: ekato katvā āgate tatiyapañhepi imināvupāyena yojanā kātabbā.
atk-abh03a:782_0: Aparo nayo – yadi taññeva anāgataṃ taṃ paccuppannaṃ, anāgatassa paccuppanne vutto
atk-abh03a:782_1: hotibhāvo, paccuppannassa ca anāgate vutto hutvābhāvo āpajjati. Evaṃ sante anāgatampi
atk-abh03a:782_2: hutvāhoti nāma. Paccuppannampi hutvāhotiyeva nāma. Tena taṃ pucchāma – “kiṃ te etesu
atk-abh03a:782_3: ekekaṃ hutvā hoti hutvā hotī”ti? Itaro – “taññeva anāgataṃ taṃ paccuppanna”nti pañhe
atk-abh03a:782_4: paṭikkhittanayeneva paṭikkhipitvā puna puṭṭho dutiye pañhe paṭiññātanayeneva paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:782_5: Atha naṃ sakavādī “taññeva anāgataṃ taṃ paccuppanna”nti pañhāvasena tesu ekekaṃ hutvā
atk-abh03a:782_6: hoti hutvā hotīti paṭijānantaṃ purimaṃ paṭikkhittapañhaṃ parivattitvā pucchanto na
atk-abh03a:782_7: hutvā na hoti na hutvā na hotīti pucchati. Tassattho – nanu “tayā taññeva anāgataṃ
atk-abh03a:782_8: taṃ paccuppanna”nti vutte paṭhamapañhaṃ paṭikkhipantena anāgatassa hotibhāvo paccuppannassa
atk-abh03a:782_9: ca hutvābhāvo paṭikkhittoti. Tena anāgataṃ na hoti nāma, paccuppannaṃ na hutvā nāma.
atk-abh03a:783_0: Dutiyapañhe ca taññeva anāgataṃ taṃ paccuppannanti paṭiññātaṃ. Evaṃ sante anāgatampi
atk-abh03a:783_1: na hutvā na hoti nāma. Paccuppannampi na hutvā na hotiyeva nāma. Tena taṃ pucchāma
atk-abh03a:783_2: – “kiṃ te etesu ekekaṃ na hutvā na hoti na hutvā na hotī”ti? Paravādī sabbato andhakārena
atk-abh03a:783_3: pariyonaddho viya tesaṃ nahutvānahotibhāvaṃ apassanto na hevanti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:784_0: Dutiyavārepi yadi taññeva paccuppannaṃ taṃ atītaṃ, paccuppannassa atīte vutto hotibhāvo,
atk-abh03a:784_1: atītassa ca paccuppanne vutto hutvābhāvo āpajjati, evaṃ sante paccuppannampi hutvāhoti
atk-abh03a:784_2: nāma, atītampi hutvāhotiyeva nāma. Tena taṃ pucchāma – “kiṃ te etesu ekekaṃ hutvā
atk-abh03a:784_3: hoti hutvā hotī”ti? Itaro taññeva paccuppannaṃ taṃ atītantipañhe paṭikkhittanayeneva
atk-abh03a:784_4: paṭikkhipitvā puna puṭṭho dutiyapañhe paṭiññātanayeneva paṭijānāti. Atha naṃ sakavādī
atk-abh03a:784_5: “taññeva paccuppannaṃ taṃ atīta”nti pañhāvasena tesu ekekaṃ hutvā hoti hutvā hotīti
atk-abh03a:784_6: paṭijānantaṃ purimaṃ paṭikkhittapañhaṃ parivattitvā pucchanto na hutvā na hoti na
atk-abh03a:784_7: hutvā na hotīti pucchati. Tassattho – nanu tayā taññeva paccuppannaṃ taṃ atītanti
atk-abh03a:784_8: vutte paṭhamapañhaṃ paṭikkhipantena paccuppannassa hotibhāvo, atītassa ca hutvābhāvo
atk-abh03a:784_9: paṭikkhittoti. Tena paccuppannaṃ nahoti nāma. Atītaṃ nahutvā nāma.
atk-abh03a:785_0: Dutiyapañhe ca te “taññeva paccuppannaṃ taṃ atīta”nti paṭiññātaṃ. Evaṃ sante paccuppannampi
atk-abh03a:785_1: na hutvā na hoti nāma, atītampi na hutvā na hotiyeva nāma. Tena taṃ pucchāma – “kiṃ
atk-abh03a:785_2: te etesu ekekaṃ na hutvā na hoti, na hutvā na hotī”ti. Paravādī sabbato andhakārena
atk-abh03a:785_3: pariyonaddho viya tesaṃ nahutvānahotibhāvaṃ apassanto na hevanti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:786_0: Tatiyavārepi yadi taññeva anāgataṃ taṃ paccuppannaṃ taṃ atītaṃ; anāgatapaccuppannānaṃ
atk-abh03a:786_1: paccuppannātītesu vutto hotibhāvo, paccuppannātītānañca anāgatapaccuppannesu vutto
atk-abh03a:786_2: hutvābhāvo āpajjati. Evaṃ sante anāgatampi hutvāhoti nāma. Paccuppannampi atītampi
atk-abh03a:786_3: hutvā hotiyeva nāma. Tena taṃ pucchāma – “kiṃ te tīsupi etesu ekekaṃ hutvā hoti hutvā
atk-abh03a:786_4: hotī”ti? Itaro “taññeva anāgataṃ, taṃ paccuppannaṃ, taṃ atīta”ntipañhe paṭikkhittanayeneva
atk-abh03a:786_5: paṭikkhipitvā puna puṭṭho dutiyapañhe paṭiññātanayeneva paṭijānāti. Atha naṃ sakavādī
atk-abh03a:786_6: “taññeva anāgataṃ, taṃ paccuppannaṃ, taṃ atīta”nti pañhāvasena tesu ekekaṃ hutvā
atk-abh03a:786_7: hoti, hutvā hotīti paṭijānantaṃ purimaṃ paṭikkhittapañhaṃ parivattitvā pucchanto
atk-abh03a:786_8: na hutvā na hoti na hutvā na hotīti pucchati. Tassattho – nanu tayā taññeva anāgataṃ,
atk-abh03a:786_9: taṃ paccuppannaṃ, taṃ atītanti vutte paṭhamapañhaṃ paṭikkhipantena anāgatapaccuppannānaṃ
atk-abh03a:786_10: hotibhāvo; paccuppannātītānañca hutvābhāvo paṭikkhittoti? Tena anāgataṃ paccuppannañca
atk-abh03a:786_11: na hoti nāma. Paccuppannañca atītañca na hutvā nāma.
atk-abh03a:787_0: Dutiyapañhe ca te “taññeva anāgataṃ, taṃ paccuppannaṃ, taṃ atīta”nti paṭiññātaṃ.
atk-abh03a:787_1: Evaṃ sante anāgatampi na hutvā na hoti nāma, paccuppannampi atītampi na hutvā na
atk-abh03a:787_2: hotiyeva nāma. Tena taṃ pucchāma – “kiṃ te etesu ekekaṃ na hutvā na hoti na hutvā
atk-abh03a:787_3: na hotī”ti? Paravādī sabbato andhakārena pariyonaddho viya tesaṃ na hutvā na hotibhāvaṃ
atk-abh03a:787_4: apassanto na hevanti paṭikkhipatīti. Niggahādīni panettha heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva yojetabbāni.
atk-abh03a:790: 289. Atītaṃ cakkhu atthītiādīsupi cakkhādibhāvāvijahaneneva atthitaṃ paṭijānāti. Passatītiādīni puṭṭho pana tesaṃ viññāṇānaṃ kiccābhāvavasena paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:792_0: 290. Tena ñāṇena ñāṇakaraṇīyaṃ karotīti pañhe tassa ñāṇassa niruddhattā kiccabhāvamassa
atk-abh03a:792_1: apassanto paṭikkhipati. Puna puṭṭho atītārammaṇaṃ paccuppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ atītānaṃ dhammānaṃ
atk-abh03a:792_2: jānanato atītaṃ ñāṇanti lesena paccuppannameva “atītaṃ ñāṇa”nti katvā tena ñāṇena
atk-abh03a:792_3: ñāṇakaraṇīyassa atthitāya paṭijānāti. Athassa sakavādī lesokāsaṃ adatvā tena ñāṇena
atk-abh03a:792_4: dukkhaṃ parijānātītiādimāha. Itaro atītārammaṇeneva ñāṇena imesaṃ catunnaṃ kiccānaṃ
atk-abh03a:792_5: abhāvā paṭikkhipati. Anāgatapañhepi eseva nayo. Paccuppannapañho ceva saṃsandanapañho ca uttānatthāyeva.
atk-abh03a:794: 291. Arahato atīto rāgo atthītiādīsupi rāgādibhāvāvijahanto evaṃ paṭijānāti. Sarāgotiādīsu suttavirodhabhayena ceva yuttivirodhabhayena ca paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:796_0: 295. Evaṃ sabbampi pāḷianusāreneva viditvā parato atthi siyā atītaṃ, siyā nvātītanti
atk-abh03a:796_1: ettha evamattho veditabbo. Yaṃ atītameva atthi, taṃ atītaṃ. Yaṃ paccuppannānāgataṃ
atk-abh03a:796_2: atthi, taṃ no atthi, taṃ no atītaṃ. Tenātītaṃ nvātītaṃ, nvātītaṃ atītanti tena kāraṇena
atk-abh03a:796_3: atītaṃ no atītaṃ, no atītaṃ atītanti. Anāgatapaccuppannapucchāsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a:798_0: 296. Na vattabbaṃ “atītaṃ atthi anāgataṃ atthī”ti suttasādhanāya pucchā paravādissa,
atk-abh03a:798_1: paṭiññā sakavādissa. Puna attano laddhiṃ nissāya yaṃkiñci, bhikkhave, rūpanti anuyogo
atk-abh03a:798_2: paravādisseva. Dutiyanaye pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Evaṃ sabbattha pucchā
atk-abh03a:798_3: ca paṭiññā ca veditabbā. Yaṃ panetaṃ paravādinā anāgatassa atthibhāvasādhanatthaṃ
atk-abh03a:798_4: “nanu vuttaṃ bhagavatā kabaḷīkāre, ce, bhikkhave”ti suttassa pariyosāne atthi tattha
atk-abh03a:798_5: āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattītiādi dassitaṃ na taṃ anāgatassa atthibhāvasādhakaṃ.
atk-abh03a:798_6: Tañhi hetūnaṃ pariniṭṭhitattā avassaṃ bhāvitaṃ sandhāya tattha vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ suttādhippāyo.
atk-abh03a:802_0: 297. Idāni “atītaṃ khandhā”tiādikathā hoti. Tattha khandhādibhāvāvijahanato atītānāgatānaṃ
atk-abh03a:802_1: atthitaṃ icchantassa atītaṃ khandhāti pucchā paravādissa, atītassa khandhasaṅgahitattā
atk-abh03a:802_2: āmantāti paṭiññā sakavādissa. Puna atītaṃ natthīti pucchā paravādissa, tassa niruttipathasuttena
atk-abh03a:802_3: atthitāya vāritattā paṭikkhepo sakavādissa. Āyatanadhātupucchāsupi anāgatapañhesupi
atk-abh03a:802_4: paccuppannena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā anulomapaṭilomato āgatapañhesupi “atītaṃ rūpa”ntiādipañhesupi
atk-abh03a:804_0: 298. Suttasādhane pana na vattabbanti pucchā sakavādissa. Tattha natthi ceteti natthi
atk-abh03a:804_1: ca ete dhammāti attho. Khandhādibhāve sati natthitaṃ anicchantassa āmantāti paṭiññā
atk-abh03a:804_2: paravādissa, atha nesaṃ natthibhāvasādhanatthaṃ suttāharaṇaṃ sakavādissa. Dutiyapucchāpi
atk-abh03a:804_3: paravādissa, paṭiññā sakavādissa, suttāharaṇaṃ paravādissa. Taṃ pana nesaṃ khandhādibhāvameva
atk-abh03a:808_0: 299. Idāni ekaccaṃ atthīti kathā hoti. Tattha ye “ekaccaṃ atītaṃ atthī”ti maññanti,
atk-abh03a:808_1: seyyathāpi kassapikā; tesaṃ laddhibhindanatthaṃ atītaṃ atthīti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:808_2: ekaccaṃ atthīti vissajjanaṃ paravādissa. Ayañhi adhippāyo – avipakkavipākaṃ atthi,
atk-abh03a:808_3: vipakkavipākaṃ natthīti. Ekaccaṃ niruddhanti anuyogo sakavādissa. Tassattho – yadi
atk-abh03a:808_4: te atītaṃ ekaccaṃ atthi ekaccaṃ natthi, evaṃ sante ekaccaṃ atītaṃ niruddhaṃ, ekaccaṃ
atk-abh03a:808_5: atītaṃ aniruddhaṃ, tatheva ṭhitanti āpajjati. Vigatantiādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a:809_0: Avipakkavipākadhammā ekacceti idaṃ yasmā yesaṃ so avipakkavipākānaṃ atthitaṃ icchati,
atk-abh03a:809_1: tepi atītāyeva. Tasmā yathā te atītaṃ ekaccaṃ atthi, kiṃ tathā avipakkavipākāpi dhammā
atk-abh03a:809_2: ekacce atthī ekacce natthīti codetuṃ vuttaṃ. Vipakkavipākāti idaṃ yesaṃ so natthitaṃ
atk-abh03a:809_3: icchati, tesaṃ vasena codetuṃ vuttaṃ. Avipākāti idaṃ abyākatānaṃ vasena codetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:809_4: Iti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ rāsīnaṃ vasena sabbesu anulomapaṭilomesu paṭiññā ca paṭikkhepo
atk-abh03a:809_5: ca veditabbā. Atītā ekadesaṃ vipakkavipākā, ekadesaṃ avipakkavipākāti vippakatavipākā
atk-abh03a:809_6: vuccanti. Yena hi kammena paṭisandhi nibbattitā, bhavaṅgampi cutipi tasseva vipāko.
atk-abh03a:809_7: Tasmā paṭisandhito yāva cuti, tāva taṃ vippakatavipākaṃ nāma hoti. Tathārūpe dhamme sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:810_0: Vipaccissantīti katvā te atthīti pucchā sakavādissa. Yathā dhammadharassa puggalassa
atk-abh03a:810_1: niddāyantassāpi bahupavattino dhammā atthīti vuccanti, evaṃ lokavohāravasena atthitaṃ
atk-abh03a:810_2: sandhāya paṭiññā paravādissa. Vipaccissantīti katvā paccupannāti dutiyapañhe “kammānaṃ
atk-abh03a:810_3: avināsasaṅkhāto kammūpacayo nāmeko atthī”ti laddhiyaṃ ṭhatvā paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:812: 300. Anāgataṃ atthītiādīsupi ekaccaṃ atthīti uppādino dhamme sandhāya vadati. Sesaṃ sabbattha heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a:815_0: 301. Idāni satipaṭṭhānakathā hoti. “Tattha – catunnaṃ, bhikkhave, satipaṭṭhānānaṃ
atk-abh03a:815_1: samudayañca atthaṅgamañca desessāmī”ti satipaṭṭhānasaṃyutte vuttanayeneva yesaṃ kāyādayo
atk-abh03a:815_2: satiyā ārammaṇadhamme gahetvā “sabbe dhammā satipaṭṭhānā”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi
atk-abh03a:815_3: andhakānaṃ. Andhakā nāma pubbaseliyā, aparaseliyā, rājagiriyā, siddhatthikāti ime
atk-abh03a:815_4: pacchā uppannanikāyā. Tesaṃ laddhivivecanatthaṃ pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:815_5: Tattha yasmā “patiṭṭhāti etesūti paṭṭhānā. Kā patiṭṭhāti? Sati. Satiyā paṭṭhānā satipaṭṭhānā”ti
atk-abh03a:815_6: iminā atthena satigocarāpi satipaṭṭhānā. “Patiṭṭhahantīti paṭṭhānā. Kā patiṭṭhahanti?
atk-abh03a:815_7: Satiyo. Satiyova paṭṭhānā satipaṭṭhānā”ti iminā atthena satiyova satipaṭṭhānā. Tasmā
atk-abh03a:815_8: dvepi vādā pariyāyena yujjanti. Ye pana taṃ pariyāyaṃ pahāya ekanteneva “sabbe dhammā
atk-abh03a:815_9: satipaṭṭhānā”ti vadanti, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, ārammaṇavasena paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:815_10: Sabbe dhammā satīti anuyuttassa pana sabbesaṃ satisabhāvābhāvato paṭikkhepo tasseva.
atk-abh03a:815_11: Tattha khayagāmītiādīni maggavisesanāni. Ekāyanamaggo hi kilesānaṃ khayabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ
atk-abh03a:815_12: gacchatīti khayagāmī. Cattāri saccāni bujjhanto gacchatīti bodhagāmī. Vaṭṭaṃ apacinanto
atk-abh03a:815_13: gacchatīti apacayagāmī. Evametehi padehi “kiṃ te sabbe dhammā evarūpo te ekāyano
atk-abh03a:815_14: maggo hotī”ti pucchati. Anāsavā asaṃyojaniyātiādīnipi lokuttarabhāvaṃ pucchanatthāya
atk-abh03a:816_0: Cakkhāyatanaṃ satipaṭṭhānantiādi sabbadhammānaṃ pabhedapucchāvasena vuttaṃ. Tatthāpi
atk-abh03a:816_1: sativasena paṭikkhepo, ārammaṇavasena paṭiññāti. Evaṃ sabbapañhesu attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:819_0: 304. Idāni hevatthikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ “sabbepi atītādibhedā dhammā rūpādivasena
atk-abh03a:819_1: atthi, atītaṃ anāgatapaccuppannavasena, anāgatapaccuppannāni vā atītādivasena natthi;
atk-abh03a:819_2: tasmā sabbamevidaṃ evaṃ atthi evaṃ natthī”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi vuttappabhedānaṃ
atk-abh03a:819_3: andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya atītaṃ atthīti pucchā sakavādissa. Hevatthi heva natthīti
atk-abh03a:819_4: vissajjanaṃ paravādissa. Tattha hevāti evaṃ. Atha naṃ sakavādī “yadi atītova evaṃ
atk-abh03a:819_5: atthi, evaṃ natthīti laddhi, evaṃ sante soyeva atthi, soyeva natthi nāmā”ti pucchanto
atk-abh03a:819_6: sevatthi, seva natthīti āha. Itaro teneva sabhāvena atthitaṃ, teneva natthitaṃ sandhāya
atk-abh03a:819_7: paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho sakabhāveneva atthitaṃ, parabhāveneva natthitaṃ sandhāya
atk-abh03a:819_8: paṭijānāti. Tato paraṃ atthaṭṭho natthaṭṭhoti atthisabhāvo natthisabhāvo nāma hotīti
atk-abh03a:819_9: pucchati. Imināvupāyena sabbavāresu attho veditabbo. Pariyosāne pana “tena hi atītaṃ
atk-abh03a:819_10: hevatthi, heva natthī”ti ca “tena hi rūpaṃ hevatthi, heva natthī”ti cātiādīni vatvā
atk-abh03a:819_11: kiñcāpi paravādinā laddhi patiṭṭhāpitā, ayoniso patiṭṭhāpitattā panesā appatiṭṭhāpitāyevāti.
atk-abh03a:824_0: 307. Idāni parūpahārakathā nāma hoti. Tattha ye arahattaṃ paṭijānantānaṃ appatte
atk-abh03a:824_1: pattasaññīnaṃ adhimānikānaṃ kuhakānaṃ vā arahattaṃ paṭijānantānaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ
atk-abh03a:824_2: disvā “mārakāyikā devatā arahato asuciṃ upasaṃharantī”ti maññanti; seyyathāpi etarahi
atk-abh03a:824_3: pubbaseliyā ca aparaseliyā ca; te sandhāya atthi arahatoti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā
atk-abh03a:824_4: itarassa. Idāni yasmā sukkavissaṭṭhi nāma rāgasamuṭṭhānā hoti, tasmā atthi arahato
atk-abh03a:824_5: rāgoti anuyogo āraddho. So sabbopi uttānatthoyeva.
atk-abh03a:825_0: Mārakāyikā devatā attanotiādipañhe yasmā tāsaṃ devatānaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhi nāma natthi,
atk-abh03a:825_1: aññesampi sukkaṃ gahetvā na upasaṃharanti, arahato pana sukkameva natthi, tasmā na
atk-abh03a:826: Neva attanotipañhe pana nimminitvā upasaṃharantīti laddhiyā paṭijānāti. Lomakūpehītipañhe sappitelānaṃ viya lomakūpehi upasaṃharaṇābhāvaṃ disvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:827_0: 308. Handa hīti vacasāyatthe nipāto. “Arahā nu kho ahaṃ, no”ti evaṃ vimatiṃ gāhayissāmāti
atk-abh03a:827_1: evaṃ vacasāyaṃ katvā upasaṃharantīti attho. Atthi arahato vimatīti puṭṭho aṭṭhavatthukaṃ
atk-abh03a:827_2: vicikicchaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati, dutiyaṃ puṭṭho itthipurisānaṃ nāmagottādīsu sanniṭṭhānābhāvaṃ
atk-abh03a:828: 309. Atthi tassa āsayoti tassa sukkassa uccārapassāvānaṃ viya patiṭṭhānokāso atthīti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:829_1: sandhāyevaṃ vadati. Paradhammakusalassāti sadhammato parasmiṃ aṭṭhasamāpattidhammepi
atk-abh03a:829_2: kusalassa. Ubhatobhāgavimuttaṃ sandhāyevaṃ vadati. Sesamettha pāḷianusāreneva veditabbanti.
atk-abh03a:832_0: 314. Idāni aññāṇaṃ, kaṅkhā, paravitaraṇāti tisso kathā nāma honti. Tattha yesaṃ “arahato
atk-abh03a:832_1: itthipurisādīnaṃ nāmagottādīsu ñāṇappavattiyā abhāvena atthi aññāṇaṃ, tattheva sanniṭṭhānābhāvena
atk-abh03a:832_2: atthi kaṅkhā. Yasmā ca nesaṃ tāni vatthūni pare vitaranti pakāsenti ācikkhanti, tasmā
atk-abh03a:832_3: nesaṃ atthi paravitaraṇā”ti imā laddhiyo, seyyathāpi etarahi pubbaseliyādīnaṃ; tesaṃ
atk-abh03a:832_4: tā laddhiyo bhindituṃ tīsupi kathāsu pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā ca paṭikkhepo ca
atk-abh03a:832_5: itarassa. Tattha sabbesupi pañhesu ceva vissajjanesu ca pāḷiṃ anugantvāva attho veditabboti.
atk-abh03a:835_0: 326. Idāni vacībhedakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ “sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe paṭhamaṃ
atk-abh03a:835_1: jhānaṃ samāpannassa dukkhanti vācā bhijjatī”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi pubbaseliyādīnaṃ;
atk-abh03a:835_2: te sandhāya samāpannassa atthi vacībhedoti pucchā sakavādissa, laddhiyaṃ ṭhatvā paṭiññā
atk-abh03a:835_3: paravādissa. Puna sabbatthāti tayo bhave sandhāya puṭṭho arūpaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:835_4: Sabbadāti kālavasena puṭṭho paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe paṭhamajjhānikasamāpattito aññaṃ sabbaṃ
atk-abh03a:835_5: samāpattikālaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Sabbesaṃ samāpannānanti puṭṭho lokiyasamāpattiyo
atk-abh03a:835_6: samāpanne sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Sabbasamāpattīsūti puṭṭho dutiyajjhānādikaṃ lokuttaraṃ
atk-abh03a:836_0: Kāyabhedoti abhikkamādivasena pavattakāyaviññatti. Idaṃ “yāni cittāni vacīviññattiṃ
atk-abh03a:836_1: samuṭṭhāpenti, tāneva kāyaviññattiṃ. Evaṃ sante kasmā kāyabhedopi na hotī”ti codanatthaṃ
atk-abh03a:836_2: pucchati. Itaro laddhivasena paṭikkhipati ceva paṭijānāti ca. Idāni yadi so maggakkhaṇe
atk-abh03a:836_3: “dukkha”nti vācaṃ bhāsati, “samudayo”tiādikampi bhāseyya. Yadi vā taṃ na bhāsati,
atk-abh03a:836_4: itarampi na bhāseyyāti codanatthaṃ dukkhanti jānantotiādayo pañhā vuttā. Itaro pana
atk-abh03a:836_5: attano laddhivaseneva paṭijānāti ceva paṭikkhipati ca. Lokuttaraṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ
atk-abh03a:837: 328. Ñāṇanti lokuttaraṃ catusaccañāṇaṃ. Sotanti sotaviññāṇaṃ adhippetaṃ, yena taṃ saddaṃ suṇāti. Dvinnaṃ phassānanti sotasamphassamanosamphassānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:838_0: 329. No vata re vattabbeti yadi avisesena yaṃkiñci samāpannassa natthi vacībhedo,
atk-abh03a:838_1: na avisesena vattabbaṃ “samāpannassa atthi vacībhedo”ti. Sesamettha uttānatthameva
atk-abh03a:838_2: saddhiṃ suttasādhanāya. Yaṃ panetena “sikhissa ānanda, bhagavato”ti pariyosāne suttaṃ
atk-abh03a:838_3: ābhataṃ, tattha yena samāpatticittena so vacībhedo samuṭṭhito, kāyabhedopi tena samuṭṭhātiyeva,
atk-abh03a:838_4: na ca taṃ lokuttaraṃ paṭhamajjhānacittaṃ, tasmā asādhakanti.
atk-abh03a:841_0: 334. Idāni dukkhāhārakathā nāma hoti. Tattha “dukkhaṃ dukkhanti vācaṃ bhāsanto dukkhe
atk-abh03a:841_1: ñāṇaṃ āharati, taṃ dukkhāhāro nāma vuccati. Tañca panetaṃ maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpanna”nti
atk-abh03a:841_2: yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi pubbaseliyānaṃ; te sandhāya dukkhāhāroti pucchā
atk-abh03a:841_3: sakavādissa, paṭiññā paravādissa. Ye kecīti paṭhamapañhe avipassake sandhāya paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a:841_4: dutiyapañhe vipassake sandhāya paṭijānāti, taṃ panassa laddhimattameva. Tasmā “sabbe
atk-abh03a:841_5: te”ti vādassa bhindanatthaṃ bālaputhujjanātiādimāha. Taṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a:844_0: 335. Idāni cittaṭṭhitikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ samāpatticittañceva bhavaṅgacittañca
atk-abh03a:844_1: anuppabandhena pavattamānaṃ disvā “ekameva cittaṃ ciraṃ tiṭṭhatī”ti laddhi seyyathāpi
atk-abh03a:844_2: etarahi heṭṭhā vuttappabhedānaṃ andhakānaṃ, taṃladdhivisodhanatthaṃ ekaṃ, cittaṃ
atk-abh03a:844_3: divasaṃ tiṭṭhatīti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā paravādissa. Upaḍḍhadivaso uppādakkhaṇoti
atk-abh03a:844_4: ettha ṭhitikkhaṇaṃ anāmasitvā “aniccā vata saṅkhārā, uppādavayadhammino”ti desanānayena
atk-abh03a:845_0: Te dhammā cittena lahuparivattāti puṭṭho cittato lahutaraparivattino dhamme apassanto
atk-abh03a:845_1: paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho yassa cittassa dīghaṭṭhitiṃ icchati, taṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:845_2: Yāvatāyukaṃ tiṭṭhatīti pañhe “cullāsītisahassāni, kappā tiṭṭhanti ye marū”tiādivacanavasena
atk-abh03a:845_3: āruppato aññatra paṭikkhipati, āruppe paṭijānāti. Muhuttaṃ muhuttaṃ uppajjatīti pañhe
atk-abh03a:848_0: 338. Idāni kukkuḷakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ “sabbaṃ, bhikkhave, ādittaṃ sabbe
atk-abh03a:848_1: saṅkhārā dukkhā”tiādīni suttāni ayoniso gahetvā “nippariyāyeneva sabbe saṅkhārā kukkuḷā
atk-abh03a:848_2: vītaccitaṅgārasammissā chārikanirayasadisā”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi gokulikānaṃ;
atk-abh03a:848_3: tesaṃ nānappakārasukhasandassanena taṃ laddhiṃ vivecetuṃ pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā
atk-abh03a:848_4: paravādissa. Tattha anodhiṃ katvāti odhiṃ mariyādaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ akaritvā, avisesena
atk-abh03a:848_5: sabbeyevāti attho. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ pāḷinayeneva veditabbaṃ saddhiṃ suttasādhanāyāti.
atk-abh03a:851: 339. Idāni anupubbābhisamayakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ –
atk-abh03a:854_0: Ādīni suttāni ayoniso gahetvā “sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno ekacce kilese
atk-abh03a:854_1: dukkhadassanena pajahati, ekacce samudayanirodhamaggadassanena, tathā sesāpīti evaṃ
atk-abh03a:854_2: soḷasahi koṭṭhāsehi anupubbena kilesappahānaṃ katvā arahattapaṭilābho hotī”ti evarūpā
atk-abh03a:854_4: tesaṃ laddhivivecanatthaṃ anupubbābhisamayoti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a:854_5: Anupubbena sotāpattimagganti puṭṭho pana ekassa maggassa bahubhāvāpattibhayena paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:854_6: Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho dukkhadassanādivasena paṭijānāti. Tāni vā cattāripi ñāṇāni eko sotāpattimaggoyevāti
atk-abh03a:854_7: paṭijānāti, phalaṃ pana ekameva icchati, tasmā paṭikkhipati. Sakadāgāmimaggādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a:855_0: 344. Magge diṭṭhe phale ṭhitoti pañhe yasmā dukkhadassanādīhi dassanaṃ apariniṭṭhitaṃ,
atk-abh03a:855_1: maggadassanena pariniṭṭhitaṃ nāma hoti, tadā so phale ṭhitoti saṅkhaṃ gacchati, tasmā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:856_0: 345. Dukkhe diṭṭhe cattāri saccānīti pucchā paravādissa, ekābhisamayavasena paṭiññā
atk-abh03a:856_1: sakavādissa. Puna dukkhasaccaṃ cattāri saccānīti anuyoge catunnampi nānāsabhāvattā paṭikkhepo tasseva.
atk-abh03a:857_0: Rūpakkhandhe aniccato diṭṭheti pucchā sakavādissa, samuddato ekabindussa rase paṭividdhe
atk-abh03a:857_1: sesaudakassa paṭivedho viya ekadhamme aniccādito paṭividdhe sabbepi paṭividdhā hontīti
atk-abh03a:858_0: Catūhi ñāṇehīti dukkhe ñāṇādīhi. Aṭṭhahi ñāṇehīti sāvakānaṃ sādhāraṇehi saccañāṇehi
atk-abh03a:858_1: ceva paṭisambhidāñāṇehi ca. Dvādasahi ñāṇehīti dvādasaṅgapaṭiccasamuppādañāṇehi.
atk-abh03a:858_2: Catucattārīsāya ñāṇehīti “jarāmaraṇe ñāṇaṃ, jarāmaraṇasamudaye ñāṇa”nti evaṃ nidānavagge
atk-abh03a:858_3: vuttañāṇehi. Sattasattatiyā ñāṇehīti “jarāmaraṇaṃ, bhikkhave, aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ
atk-abh03a:858_4: khayadhammaṃ vayadhammaṃ virāgadhammaṃ nirodhadhamma”nti evaṃ tattheva vuttañāṇehi.
atk-abh03a:861_0: 347. Idāni vohārakathā nāma hoti. Tattha buddho bhagavā lokuttarena vohārena voharatīti
atk-abh03a:861_1: yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, laddhivasena
atk-abh03a:861_2: paṭiññā paravādissa. Lokuttare sotetiādīni tassa ayuttavādībhāvadīpanatthaṃ vuttāni.
atk-abh03a:861_3: Ayañhettha adhippāyo – “saddāyatanameva te lokuttaraṃ, udāhu sotādīnipī”ti.
atk-abh03a:862_0: Hañci buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokiye sote paṭihaññatīti ettha yadi so lokuttare
atk-abh03a:862_1: paṭihaññeyya. Lokuttaro siyāti evamattho na gahetabbo. Lokiye paṭihaññamānassa pana
atk-abh03a:862_2: lokuttaratā nāma natthīti ayametthādhippāyo. Lokiyena viññāṇenāti etthāpi lokiyenevāti
atk-abh03a:862_3: attho. Itarathā anekantatā siyā. Lokuttarañhi lokiyenapi ñāṇena ñāyatī. Evaṃ sabbaṃ
atk-abh03a:862_4: yathānurūpato veditabbaṃ. Sabbe te maggaṃ bhāventīti pañhesu ye maggaṃ nappaṭilabhanti,
atk-abh03a:862_5: te sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Ye paṭilabhanti, te sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:864: Eḷaṇḍiyāyāti eḷaṇḍamayāya. Idaṃ sakavādissa udāharaṇaṃ. Lokiyaṃ voharantassa lokiyoti ayampi ekā laddhi. Sā etarahi ekaccānaṃ andhakānaṃ laddhi. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a:867_0: 353. Idāni nirodhakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ appaṭisaṅkhānirodhañca paṭisaṅkhānirodhañca
atk-abh03a:867_1: dvepi ekato katvā nirodhasaccanti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi mahisāsakānañceva andhakānañca;
atk-abh03a:867_2: te sandhāya dve nirodhāti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā paravādissa. Dve dukkhanirodhāti
atk-abh03a:867_3: pañhesu yasmā dve dukkhasaccāni na icchati, tasmā paṭikkhipati. Yasmā dvīhākārehi
atk-abh03a:867_4: dukkhaṃ nirujjhatīti icchati, tasmā paṭijānāti. Dve nirodhasaccānītipañhesu dvinnaṃ
atk-abh03a:867_5: dukkhasaccānaṃ nirodhavasenaanicchanto paṭikkhipati. Dvīhākārehi dukkhassa nirujjhanato
atk-abh03a:868: Atthi dvinnaṃ nibbānānantiādīsu pucchāsu uccanīcatādīni apassanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:869_0: Appaṭisaṅkhāniruddheti ye paṭisaṅkhāya lokuttarena ñāṇena aniruddhā suddhapakatikattā
atk-abh03a:869_1: vā uddesaparipucchādīnaṃ vā vasena na samudācaraṇato niruddhāti vuccanti, te saṅkhāre.
atk-abh03a:869_2: Paṭisaṅkhā nirodhentīti. Lokuttarañāṇena nirodhenti anuppattibhāvaṃ gamenti. Nanu
atk-abh03a:869_3: appaṭisaṅkhāniruddhā saṅkhārāti pucchā paravādissa. Tattha bhaggānaṃ puna abhañjanato
atk-abh03a:869_4: appaṭisaṅkhāniruddhānaṃ vā ariyamagge uppanne tathā nirujjhanatova sakavādī accantabhaggataṃ
atk-abh03a:874_0: 354. Idāni balakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ anuruddhasaṃyutte “imesañca panāhaṃ,
atk-abh03a:874_1: āvuso, catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca
atk-abh03a:874_2: aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ pajānāmī”tiādīni dasasuttāni ayoniso gahetvā “tathāgatabalaṃ
atk-abh03a:874_3: sāvakasādhāraṇa”nti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:874_4: laddhiyaṃ ṭhatvā paṭiññā paravādissa. Tathāgatabalañca nāmetaṃ sāvakehi sādhāraṇampi
atk-abh03a:874_5: atthi asādhāraṇampi sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇampi. Tattha āsavānaṃ khaye ñāṇaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ.
atk-abh03a:874_6: Indriyaparopariyattiñāṇaṃ asādhāraṇaṃ. Sesaṃ sādhāraṇañca asādhāraṇañca. Ṭhānāṭṭhānādīni
atk-abh03a:874_7: hi sāvakā padesena jānanti, tathāgatā nippadesena. Iti tāni uddesato sādhāraṇāni,
atk-abh03a:874_8: na niddesato. Ayaṃ pana avisesena sabbampi sādhāraṇanti āha. Tamenaṃ tato vivecetuṃ
atk-abh03a:874_9: tathāgatabalaṃ sāvakabalanti puna anuyogo āraddho. Tattha paṭhamapañhe niddesato
atk-abh03a:874_10: sabbākāravisayataṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Dutiyapañhe uddesato ṭhānāṭṭhānamattādijānanavasena
atk-abh03a:874_11: paṭijānāti. Taññevātiādipañhesu sabbākārena ninnānākaraṇatāya abhāvena paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:874_12: Pubbayogo ca pubbacariyā ca atthato ekaṃ, tathā dhammakkhānañca dhammadesanā ca.
atk-abh03a:875: Indriyaparopariyattipañhe ekadesena sādhāraṇataṃ sandhāya sāvakavisaye paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:876_0: 355. Idāni yasmā uddesato ṭhānāṭṭhānādīni sāvako jānāti, tasmā sāvakassa tathā jānanaṃ
atk-abh03a:876_1: pakāsetvā tena jānanamattasāmaññena tesaṃ sāvakasādhāraṇattaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ sāvako
atk-abh03a:876_2: ṭhānāṭṭhānaṃ jānātītiādayo paravādipañhā honti. Tattha indriyaparopariyattiñāṇaṃ
atk-abh03a:876_3: channaṃ asādhāraṇañāṇānaṃ aññataranti na gahitaṃ. Āsavakkhayena vā āsavakkhayanti
atk-abh03a:876_4: yaṃ tathāgatassa āsavakkhayena saddhiṃ sāvakassa āsavakkhayaṃ paṭicca vattabbaṃ siyā
atk-abh03a:876_5: nānākaraṇaṃ, taṃ natthi. Vimuttiyā vā vimuttinti padepi eseva nayo. Sesamettha uttānatthameva.
atk-abh03a:877_0: 356. Idāni yaṃ sakavādinā “āsavānaṃ khaye ñāṇaṃ sādhāraṇa”nti anuññātaṃ, tena saddhiṃ
atk-abh03a:877_1: saṃsanditvā sesānampi sādhāraṇabhāvaṃ pucchituṃ puna āsavānaṃ khayetiādayo paravādipañhāva
atk-abh03a:877_2: honti. Tesaṃ vissajjane sakavādinā āsavakkhaye visesābhāvena taṃ ñāṇaṃ sādhāraṇanti
atk-abh03a:877_3: anuññātaṃ. Itaresupi visesābhāvena sādhāraṇatā paṭikkhittā. Puna ṭhānāṭṭhānādīnaṃ
atk-abh03a:877_4: āsavakkhayeneva saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā asādhāraṇapucchā paravādisseva. Tattha āsavakkhayañāṇe
atk-abh03a:877_5: paṭikkhepo, sesesu ca paṭiññā sakavādissa. Tato indriyaparopariyattena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā
atk-abh03a:877_6: asādhāraṇapucchā paravādissa. Sā saṅkhipitvā dassitā. Tathāpi indriyaparopariyatte
atk-abh03a:877_7: paṭiññā, sesesu ca paṭikkhepo sakavādissa. Tato ṭhānāṭṭhānādīhi saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā
atk-abh03a:877_8: indriyaparopariyattassa sādhāraṇapucchā paravādissa. Sāpi saṅkhipitvāva dassitā.
atk-abh03a:877_9: Tattha indriyaparopariyatte paṭikkhepo. Sesesu ca paṭiññā sakavādissāti.
atk-abh03a:880_0: 357. Idāni ariyantikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ “na kevalaṃ āsavakkhayañāṇameva
atk-abh03a:880_1: ariyaṃ, atha kho purimānipi nava balāni ariyāni”cceva laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi
atk-abh03a:880_2: andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya ariyanti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Puna yadi
atk-abh03a:880_3: taṃ ariyaṃ, maggādīsu tena aññatarena bhavitabbanti maggādivasena pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:881_0: Puna suññatārammaṇādivasena pucchā sakavādissa. Tattha dve suññatā – sattasuññatā
atk-abh03a:881_1: ca saṅkhārasuññatā ca. Sattasuññatā nāma diṭṭhiyā parikappitena sattena suññā pañcakkhandhā.
atk-abh03a:881_2: Saṅkhārasuññatā nāma sabbasaṅkhārehi suññaṃ vivittaṃ nissaṭaṃ nibbānaṃ. Tattha paravādī
atk-abh03a:881_3: nibbānārammaṇataṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati, saṅkhārārammaṇataṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:881_4: Manasi karotīti puṭṭhopi nibbānameva sandhāya paṭikkhipati, saṅkhāre sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:881_6: imaṃ nayaṃ gahetvā “dvinnaṃ phassānaṃ dvinnaṃ cittānaṃ samodhānaṃ hotī”ti puṭṭho
atk-abh03a:881_7: lesokāsaṃ alabhanto paṭikkhipati. Animittāpaṇihitesupi eseva nayo. Sattanimittābhāvato
atk-abh03a:881_8: hi khandhā animittā. Saṅkhāranimittābhāvato nibbānaṃ. Ekadhammasmimpi āropetvā ṭhapetabbasaṅkhātena
atk-abh03a:881_9: ca paṇidahitabbaṭṭhena paṇihitasaṅkhaṃ gatena sattapaṇidhinā appaṇihitā khandhā.
atk-abh03a:881_10: Taṇhāpaṇidhinā taṇhāya vā ārammaṇabhūtena sabbasaṅkhārapaṇidhinā appaṇihitaṃ nibbānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:881_11: Tasmā idhāpi paṭikkhepo ca paṭiññā ca purimanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:882_0: 358. Tato “yathā satipaṭṭhānādayo lokuttaradhammā ariyā ceva suññatādiārammaṇā ca,
atk-abh03a:882_1: kiṃ te evaṃ ṭhānāṭṭhānañāṇa”nti anulomapaṭilomapucchā honti. Tattha sabbāpi paṭiññā
atk-abh03a:882_2: sabbe ca paṭikkhepā paravādisseva. Imināvupāyena sesañāṇesupi pucchāvissajjanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:882_3: Pāḷiyaṃ pana sesāni saṅkhipitvā avasāne cutūpapātañāṇameva vibhattaṃ. Tato paraṃ
atk-abh03a:882_4: sakasamayepi “ariya”nti siddhena āsavānaṃ khayañāṇena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā sesañāṇānaṃ
atk-abh03a:882_5: anulomato ca paṭilomato ca ariyabhāvapucchā honti. Tā sabbā paravādissa, paṭiññā
atk-abh03a:882_6: paṭikkhepo ca sakavādissa. Te uttānatthāyeva. Pāḷiyaṃ panettha paṭhamanavamāneva
atk-abh03a:885_0: 363. Idāni vimuttikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ “vītarāgacittānaṃ vimuttipayojanaṃ
atk-abh03a:885_1: nāma natthi. Yathā pana malīnaṃ vatthaṃ dhoviyamānaṃ malā vimuccati, evaṃ sarāgaṃ
atk-abh03a:885_2: cittaṃ rāgato vimuccatī”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya sarāganti
atk-abh03a:885_3: pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Tato rāgasahagatantiādinā nayena puṭṭho maggakkhaṇe
atk-abh03a:885_4: cittaṃ vimuccati nāma. Tadā ca evarūpaṃ cittaṃ natthīti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:886: Saphassantiādinā nayena puṭṭhopi yathā phasso ca cittañca ubho rāgato vimuccanti, evaṃ rāgassa vimuttiṃ apassamāno paṭikkhipati. Sadosādīsupi imināvupāyena attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:889_0: 366. Idāni vimuccamānakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ “jhānena vikkhambhanavimuttiyā
atk-abh03a:889_1: vimuttaṃ, maggakkhaṇe samucchedavimuttiyā vimuccamānaṃ nāma hotī”ti laddhi, te sandhāya
atk-abh03a:889_2: vimuttaṃ vimuccamānanti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarasa.
atk-abh03a:890_0: Puna ekadesanti pucchā sakavādissa. Tattha ekadesanti bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ. Yathā vimuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:890_1: ekadesena vā ekadese vā avimuttaṃ hoti kiṃ evaṃ ekadesaṃ vimuttaṃ, ekadesaṃ avimuttanti
atk-abh03a:890_2: pucchati. Kiṃ kāraṇā evaṃ pucchatīti? “Vimuttaṃ vimuccamāna”nti vippakatabhāvena
atk-abh03a:890_3: vuttattā. Yathā hi kariyamānā kaṭādayo vippakatattā ekadesena katā ekadesena akatā
atk-abh03a:890_4: honti, tathā idampi ekadesaṃ vimuttaṃ ekadesaṃ avimuttanti āpajjati. Tato paravādī
atk-abh03a:890_5: kaṭādīnaṃ viya cittassa ekadesābhāvā paṭhamapañhe paṭikkhipitvā dutiye vimuccamānassa
atk-abh03a:890_6: apariniṭṭhitavimuttitāya paṭijānāti. Lokiyajjhānakkhaṇaṃ vā sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:890_7: Na hi taṃ tadā samucchedavimuttiyā vimuccamānaṃ. Lokuttarajjhānakkhaṇaṃ sandhāya
atk-abh03a:890_8: paṭijānāti. Tañhi tadā samucchedavimuttiyā vimuttekadesena vimuccamānantissa laddhi.
atk-abh03a:890_9: Tato sakavādī “yadi te ekameva cittaṃ ekadesaṃ vimuttaṃ ekadesaṃ avimuttaṃ, evaṃ
atk-abh03a:890_10: sante yo ekeneva cittena sotāpanno hoti, sopi te ekadesaṃ sotāpanno, ekadesaṃ na
atk-abh03a:890_11: sotāpanno āpajjatī”ti codanatthaṃ ekadesaṃ sotāpannotiādimāha. Itaro taṃ vidhānaṃ
atk-abh03a:891: Uppādakkhaṇapañhe yadi ekameva cittaṃ vimuttañca vimuccamānañca, ekasmiṃ khaṇe vimuttaṃ ekasmiṃ vimuccamānaṃ āpajjati. Kiṃ te evarūpaṃ cittanti attho.
atk-abh03a:892_0: 367. Suttasādhane paṭhamasuttaṃ paravādissa. Tatrāssāyamadhippāyo – vimuccatīti vippakataniddeso.
atk-abh03a:892_1: Tasmā yaṃ tassa yogino evaṃ jānato evaṃ passato etehi āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccati, taṃ
atk-abh03a:892_2: vimuccamānaṃ nāma hotīti. Dutiyasuttaṃ sakavādissa. Tatrāssāyamadhippāyo – yadi te
atk-abh03a:892_3: vimuccatīti vacanato vimuttaṃ vimuccamānaṃ, idha vimuccatīti vacanābhāvato vimuttameva
atk-abh03a:893_0: Idāni “yathā te vippakatavimuttitāya vimuccamānaṃ, kiṃ evaṃ vippakatarāgāditāya rajjamānādīnipi
atk-abh03a:893_1: atthī”ti codanatthaṃ puna atthi cittantiādi āraddhaṃ. Paravādināpi tathārūpaṃ cittaṃ
atk-abh03a:893_2: apassantena sabbaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ. Atha naṃ sakavādī “dveyeva koṭiyo, tatiyā natthī”ti
atk-abh03a:893_3: anubodhento nanu rattañceva arattañcātiādimāha. Tassattho – nanu bhadramukha, rāgasampayuttaṃ
atk-abh03a:893_4: cittaṃ rattaṃ vippayuttaṃ arattanti dveva koṭiyo, rajjamānaṃ nāma tatiyā koṭi natthīti?
atk-abh03a:893_5: Duṭṭhādīsupi eseva nayo. Atha naṃ āmantāti paṭijānitvā ṭhitaṃ. Vimuttipakkhepi dveyeva
atk-abh03a:893_6: koṭiyo dassetuṃ hañci rattañcevātiādimāha. Tassattho – yadi etā dve koṭiyo sampaṭicchasi,
atk-abh03a:893_7: avimuttañceva vimuttañcā ti imāpi sampaṭiccha. Kilesasampayuttañhi cittaṃ avimuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:893_8: vippayuttaṃ vimuttaṃ. Vimuccamānaṃ nāmāti paramatthato tatiyā koṭi natthīti.
atk-abh03a:896_0: 368. Idāni aṭṭhamakakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ anulomagotrabhumaggakkhaṇe kilesānaṃ
atk-abh03a:896_1: samudācārābhāvato aṭṭhamakassa sotāpattimaggaṭṭhapuggalassa dve pariyuṭṭhānā pahīnāti
atk-abh03a:896_2: laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānañceva sammitiyānañca; tesaṃ aññataraṃ sandhāya
atk-abh03a:896_3: pucchā sakavādissa, maggakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya diṭṭhiyā anuppattiṃ sandhāya paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a:896_4: Tato yasmā diṭṭhi nāmesā sotāpannasseva pahīnā, na maggaṭṭhassa, tasmā aṭṭhamako
atk-abh03a:896_5: puggalo sotāpannoti anuyogo sakavādissa. Vicikicchāpañhepi eseva nayo. Anusayapañhe
atk-abh03a:896_6: pariyuṭṭhānato añño anusayoti tesaṃ laddhi, tasmā “na heva”nti paṭikkhittaṃ.
atk-abh03a:897: Sīlabbataparāmāsapañhepi sīlabbataparāmāsapariyuṭṭhānanti vohāraṃ na passati, tasmā paṭikkhipati. Pariyuṭṭhānamevassa pahīnanti laddhi.
atk-abh03a:898_0: 369. Maggo bhāvitoti pañhe tasmiṃ khaṇe bhāveti, na bhāvito. Tasmā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:898_1: Amaggenātiādianuyoge paṭhamamaggeneva pahīnabhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Yadi hi
atk-abh03a:898_2: amaggena pahīyetha, gotrabhupuggalādīnampi pahīyethāti āpajjanato. Uppajjissatīti
atk-abh03a:898_3: pucchā paravādissa, vissajjanaṃ sakavādissa. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a:901_0: 371. Idāni aṭṭhamakassa indriyakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ “aṭṭhamako maggakkhaṇe
atk-abh03a:901_1: indriyāni paṭilabhati nāma, no cassa paṭiladdhāni hontī”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi
atk-abh03a:901_2: andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya natthi saddhindriyanti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a:901_3: Natthi saddhāti puṭṭho pana saddhindriyato saddhāya nānattaṃ sallakkhetvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:901_4: Sesesupi eseva nayo. Yathā pana yassa atthi mano, tassa manindriyampi atthi; evaṃ
atk-abh03a:901_5: yassa saddhādayo atthi, tassa atthi saddhindriyādīnipīti dīpanatthaṃ atthi mano atthi
atk-abh03a:901_6: manindriyantiādi āraddhaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ uttānatthameva saddhiṃ suttasādhanenāti.
atk-abh03a:904_0: 373. Idāni dibbacakkhukathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ catutthajjhānadhammūpatthaddhaṃ
atk-abh03a:904_1: maṃsacakkhumeva dibbacakkhu nāma hotīti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānañceva
atk-abh03a:904_2: sammitiyānañca; te sandhāya maṃsacakkhunti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a:905: Puna “maṃsacakkhu dibbacakkhu, dibbacakkhu maṃsacakkhū”ti puṭṭho taṃ mattameva taṃ na hotīti paṭikkhipati. Yādisantiādipucchāsupi ubhinnaṃ ekasabhāvābhāveneva paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:906_0: Visayotiādīsu ubhinnampi rūpāyatanameva visayo. Maṃsacakkhu pana āpāthagatameva passati.
atk-abh03a:906_1: Itaraṃ anāpāthagataṃ tiropabbatādigatampi. Dibbacakkhussa ca atisukhumampi rūpaṃ
atk-abh03a:906_2: gocaro, na tādisaṃ itarassāti evametesaṃ ānubhāvagocarā asadisā.
atk-abh03a:907_0: Upādiṇṇaṃ hutvā anupādiṇṇaṃ hotīti puṭṭho yasmā maṃsacakkhu upādiṇṇaṃ, dibbacakkhu
atk-abh03a:907_1: anupādiṇṇaṃ, na ca maṃsacakkhumeva dibbacakkhūti icchati, tasmā paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ
atk-abh03a:907_2: puṭṭho yasmā “maṃsacakkhussa uppādo, maggo dibbassa cakkhuno”ti vacanaṃ nissāya maṃsacakkhupaccayā
atk-abh03a:907_3: dibbacakkhu uppajjati, tañca rūpāvacarikānaṃ catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ pasādoti icchati,
atk-abh03a:907_4: tasmā paṭijānāti. Kāmāvacaraṃ hutvāti puṭṭhopi yasmā na maṃsacakkhumeva dibbacakkhūti
atk-abh03a:907_5: icchati, tasmā paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho rūpāvacarajjhānapaccayena uppannattā
atk-abh03a:908_0: Rūpāvacaraṃ hutvā arūpāvacaranti puṭṭhopi tato paraṃ bhāvanāya arūpāvacarakkhaṇe
atk-abh03a:908_1: rūpāvacaracittassa abhāvā paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho arūpāvacarikānaṃ catunnaṃ
atk-abh03a:908_2: mahābhūtānaṃ pasādo hutvā uppajjatīti laddhiyā paṭijānāti. Apariyāpannabhāvaṃ panassa
atk-abh03a:909_0: 374. Dibbacakkhuṃ dhammupatthaddhanti kāmāvacaradhammena upatthambhitaṃ hutvā. Puna
atk-abh03a:909_1: dhammupatthaddhanti lokuttaradhammena upatthaddhaṃ. Dveva cakkhūnīti puṭṭho kiñcāpi
atk-abh03a:909_2: dibbacakkhuno dhammupatthaddhassa paññācakkhubhāvaṃ na icchati, paññācakkhussa pana
atk-abh03a:909_3: atthitāya paṭikkhipati. Puna puṭṭho maṃsacakkhu dhammupatthaddhaṃ dibbacakkhu hotīti
atk-abh03a:912_0: 375. Idāni dibbasotakathā nāma hoti. Tattha ekaṃyeva sotanti puṭṭho dvinnaṃ atthitāya
atk-abh03a:912_1: paṭikkhipati. Puna puṭṭho yasmā tadeva dhammupatthaddhaṃ dibbasotaṃ nāma hoti, tasmā
atk-abh03a:915_0: 377. Idāni yathākammūpagatañāṇakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ “iti dibbena cakkhunā
atk-abh03a:915_1: visuddhena…pe… yathākammūpage satte pajānātī”ti suttaṃ ayoniso gahetvā yathākammūpagatañāṇameva
atk-abh03a:915_2: dibbacakkhunti laddhi, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Puna yathākammūpagatañca
atk-abh03a:915_3: manasi karotīti puṭṭho ekacittassa ārammaṇadvayābhāvā paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho
atk-abh03a:915_4: nānācittavasena paṭijānāti. Puna lesokāsaṃ adatvā dvinnaṃ phassānanti puṭṭho paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:915_5: Iti yathā iminā yathākammūpagatapadena, evameva ime vata bhonto, sattātiādipadehipi
atk-abh03a:916_0: 378. Āyasmā sāriputto yathākammūpagataṃ ñāṇaṃ jānātīti idaṃ sakavādī yasmā thero
atk-abh03a:916_1: appicchatāya abhiññāñāṇāni na vaḷañjetīti ekacce na jānanti, tāni panassa neva atthīti
atk-abh03a:916_2: maññanti, tasmā taṃ “dibbacakkhuno alābhī thero”ti maññamānaṃ pucchati. Teneva kāraṇena
atk-abh03a:916_3: “atthāyasmato sāriputtassa dibbacakkhū”ti parato puṭṭho paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho
atk-abh03a:916_4: yaṃkiñci sāvakena pattabbaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ therena anuppattanti paṭijānāti. Idānissa
atk-abh03a:916_5: vikkhepaṃ karonto sakavādī nanu āyasmā sāriputtotiādimāha. Imañhi gāthaṃ thero vaḷañjanapaṇidhiyā
atk-abh03a:916_6: eva abhāvena āha, na abhiññāñāṇassa abhāvena. Paravādī pana abhāvenevāti atthaṃ sallakkheti.
atk-abh03a:916_7: Tasmā tassa laddhiyā therassa yathākammūpagatañāṇameva atthi, no dibbacakkhu. Tena
atk-abh03a:916_8: vuttaṃ “tena hi na vattabbaṃ yathākammūpagatañāṇaṃ dibbacakkhū”ti.
atk-abh03a:919_0: 379. Idāni saṃvarakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ tāvatiṃse deve upādāya tatuttari
atk-abh03a:919_1: devesu yasmā te pañca verāni na samācaranti, tasmā saṃvaro atthīti laddhi, te sandhāya
atk-abh03a:919_2: pucchā sakavādissa, verasamudācāraṃ apassato paṭiññā itarassa. Tato yasmā saṃvaro
atk-abh03a:919_3: nāma saṃvaritabbe asaṃvare sati hoti, tasmā asaṃvarapucchā sakavādissa, devesu pāṇātipātādīnaṃ
atk-abh03a:920: Atthi manussesūtiādi saṃvare sati asaṃvarassa asaṃvare ca sati saṃvarassa pavattidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:921: 380. Pāṇātipātā veramaṇīti ādipañhesu pāṇātipātādīnaṃ asamācaraṇavasena paṭiññā, pāṇātipātādīnaṃ natthitāya paṭikkhepo veditabbo. Paṭilomapañhā uttānatthāyeva.
atk-abh03a:922_0: Avasāne natthi devesu saṃvarotipañhe pāṇātipātādīni katvā puna tato saṃvarābhāvaṃ
atk-abh03a:922_1: sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādissa. Tato chalavasena yadi saṃvaro natthi, sabbe devā pāṇātipātinotiādipucchā
atk-abh03a:922_2: paravādissa. Devānaṃ verasamudācārassa abhāvena paṭikkhepo sakavādissa. Nahevanti
atk-abh03a:922_3: vacanamattaṃ gahetvā laddhipatiṭṭhāpanaṃ paravādissa. Evaṃ patiṭṭhitā pana laddhi
atk-abh03a:925_0: 381. Idāni asaññakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ “saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇa”nti vacanato
atk-abh03a:925_1: vinā viññāṇena paṭisandhi nāma natthi. “Saññuppādā ca pana te devā tamhā kāyā cavantī”ti
atk-abh03a:925_2: vacanato asaññasattānampi cutipaṭisandhikkhaṇe saññā atthīti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi
atk-abh03a:925_3: andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Tato naṃ sakavādī “kiṃ
atk-abh03a:925_4: te taṃ ṭhānaṃ saññābhavo”tiādīhi codetuṃ saññābhavo saññāgatītiādimāha. Taṃ sabbaṃ
atk-abh03a:928_0: 384. Idāni nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ “nevasaññānāsaññāyatana”nti
atk-abh03a:928_1: vacanato na vattabbaṃ “tasmiṃ bhave saññā atthī”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānaṃ;
atk-abh03a:928_2: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamettha sabbaṃ pāḷinayeneva veditabbanti.
atk-abh03a:933_0: 387. Idāni gihissa arahāti kathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ yasakulaputtādīnaṃ gihibyañjane
atk-abh03a:933_1: ṭhitānaṃ arahattappattiṃ disvā “gihi assa arahā”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi uttarāpathakānaṃ;
atk-abh03a:933_2: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa. Tattha gihissāti yo gihisaṃyojanasampayuttatāya gihi,
atk-abh03a:933_3: so arahaṃ assāti attho. Paravādī pana adhippāyaṃ asallakkhetvā gihibyañjanamattameva
atk-abh03a:933_4: passanto paṭijānāti. Idānissa “gihi nāma gihisaṃyojanena hoti, na byañjanamattena. Yathāha bhagavā –
atk-abh03a:937: So brāhmaṇo so samaṇo sa bhikkhū”’ti. ;
atk-abh03a:938: Imaṃ nayaṃ dassetuṃ atthi arahatotiādi āraddhaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a:941_0: 388. Idāni upapattikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ “opapātiko hoti tatthaparinibbāyī”tivacanāni
atk-abh03a:941_1: ayoniso gahetvā suddhāvāsesu upapattiyā arahāti laddhi, “yesaṃ vā upahaccaparinibbāyī”ti
atk-abh03a:941_2: padaṃ parivattitvā “upapajjaparinibbāyī”ti pariyāpuṇantānaṃ saha upapattiyā arahā
atk-abh03a:941_3: hotīti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi uttarāpathakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:941_4: paṭiññā itarassa. Tattha yasmā upapatticittaṃ nāma lokiyaṃ, tena sotāpannādayopi
atk-abh03a:941_5: na honti, pageva arahā. Tasmāssa imaṃ nayaṃ dassetuṃ saha upapattiyā sotāpannotiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:942: 389. Sāriputtotiādi imesu mahātheresu ko ekopi saha upapattiyā arahā nāmāti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:943: 390. Upapattesiyenāti paṭisandhicittena. Tañhi upapattiṃ esati gavesati, tasmā upapattesiyanti vuccati. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a:946_0: 391. Idāni anāsavakathā nāma hoti. Tattha ye dhammā anāsavassa arahato, sabbe te
atk-abh03a:946_1: anāsavāti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi uttarāpathakānaṃ; te sandhāya arahatoti
atk-abh03a:946_2: pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ anāsavā nāma maggādayo, kiṃ tassa
atk-abh03a:946_3: teyeva uppajjantīti codanatthaṃ maggo phalantiādi āraddhaṃ. Cakkhu anāsavanti puṭṭho
atk-abh03a:946_4: tassa sāsavattā paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho anāsavassetanti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:947_0: 392. Cīvarapañhe ekova dhammo anāsavo sāsavo ca hotīti lakkhaṇavirodhabhayā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:947_1: Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho anāsavassa hutvā sāsavassa hotīti paṭijānāti. Taññeva anāsavanti pañhādvayepi
atk-abh03a:947_2: eseva nayo. Sakavādī pana taññevāti anuññātattā “maggo anāsavo hutvā”tiādīhi codeti.
atk-abh03a:950_0: 393. Idāni samannāgatakathā nāma hoti. Tattha dve samannāgamā paccuppannakkhaṇe samaṅgībhāvasamannāgamo
atk-abh03a:950_1: ca rūpāvacarādīsu aññatarabhūmippattito paṭilābhasamannāgamo ca. So yāva adhigatavisesā
atk-abh03a:950_2: na parihāyati, tāvadeva labbhati. Yesaṃ pana ṭhapetvā ime dve samannāgame añño upapattidhammavasena
atk-abh03a:950_3: eko samannāgamo nāma hotīti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi uttarāpathakānaṃ, tesaṃ pattidhammo
atk-abh03a:950_4: nāma koci natthīti anubodhanatthaṃ arahā catūhi phalehi samannāgatoti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:950_5: pattiṃ sandhāya paṭiññā itarassa. Athassa “yadi te arahā catūhi khandhehi viya catūhi
atk-abh03a:950_6: phalehi samannāgato, evaṃ sante ye catūsu phalesu cattāro phassādayo, tehi te arahato
atk-abh03a:950_7: samannāgatatā pāpuṇātī”ti codanatthaṃ arahā catūhi phassehītiādi āraddhaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ
atk-abh03a:950_8: paravādinā ekakkhaṇe catunnaṃ phassādīnaṃ abhāvā paṭikkhittaṃ. Anāgāmipañhādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a:951_0: 395. Sotāpattiphalaṃ vītivattoti na paṭhamajjhānaṃ viya dutiyajjhānalābhī; puna anuppattiyā
atk-abh03a:951_1: pana vītivattoti pucchati. Sotāpattimaggantiādi yaṃ vītivatto, tenassa puna asamannāgamaṃ dassetuṃ āraddhaṃ.
atk-abh03a:952_0: 396. Tehi ca aparihīnoti pañhe yasmā yathā paccanīkasamudācārena lokiyajjhānadhammā
atk-abh03a:952_1: parihāyanti, na evaṃ lokuttarā. Maggena hi ye kilesā pahīyanti, phalena ca paṭippassambhanti,
atk-abh03a:952_2: te tathā pahīnāva tathā paṭippassaddhāyeva ca honti, tasmā sakavādinā āmantāti paṭiññātaṃ.
atk-abh03a:952_3: Svāyamattho parato “arahatā cattāro maggā paṭiladdhā”tiādīsu pakāsitoyeva. Sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a:955_0: 397. Arahā chahi upekkhāhīti kathāyapi imināva nayena attho veditabbo. Arahā hi chasu
atk-abh03a:955_1: dvāresu upekkhānaṃ uppattibhabbatāya tāhi samannāgatoti vuccati, na ekakkhaṇe sabbāsaṃ uppattibhāvenāti.
atk-abh03a:958_0: 398. Idāni bodhiyā buddhotikathā nāma hoti. Tattha bodhīti catumaggañāṇassāpi sabbaññutaññāṇassāpi
atk-abh03a:958_1: adhivacanaṃ. Tasmā yesaṃ yathā odātena vaṇṇena odāto, sāmena vaṇṇena sāmo, evaṃ bodhiyā
atk-abh03a:958_2: buddhoti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi uttarāpathakānaṃyeva; te sandhāya pucchā ca anuyogo
atk-abh03a:958_3: ca sakavādissa, paṭiññā ca paṭikkhepo ca itarassa.
atk-abh03a:959_0: Atītāyāti pañhe tasmiṃ khaṇe abhāvato paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho paṭilābhaṃ sandhāya
atk-abh03a:959_1: paṭijānāti. Puna kiccavasena puṭṭho kiccābhāvato paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho yaṃ
atk-abh03a:959_2: tena tāya karaṇīyaṃ kataṃ, tattha sammohābhāvaṃ paṭijānāti. Lesokāsaṃ pana adatvā
atk-abh03a:959_3: dukkhaṃ parijānātītiādinā nayena puṭṭho tassa kiccassa abhāvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:960_0: Anāgatapañhe tasmiṃ khaṇe maggañāṇassa abhāvā paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho “agamā
atk-abh03a:960_1: rājagahaṃ buddho”ti anāgatāya bodhiyā buddhabhāvaṃ maññamāno paṭijānāti. Bodhikaraṇīyaṃ
atk-abh03a:960_2: karotīti puṭṭho tasmiṃ khaṇe kiccābhāvena paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho yadi na kareyya,
atk-abh03a:960_3: buddhoti na vucceyya. Yasmā avassaṃ karissati, tasmā karotiyeva nāmāti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:960_4: Puna lesokāsaṃ adatvā puṭṭho paṭikkhipati. Paccuppannapañho saddhiṃ saṃsandanāya uttānatthova.
atk-abh03a:961_0: 399. Tisso bodhiyo ekato katvā puṭṭho sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ sandhāya tīhipi buddhoti vattabbabhāvato
atk-abh03a:961_1: paṭijānāti. Puna tīhiti puṭṭho sabbāsaṃ ekakkhaṇe abhāvā paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho
atk-abh03a:961_2: atītānāgatapaccuppannassa sabbaññutaññāṇassa vasena paṭijānāti. Puna lesokāsaṃ adatvā
atk-abh03a:962_0: Na battabbaṃ bodhiyāti pucchā paravādissa, bodhiyā abhāvakkhaṇe abuddhabhāvāpattito
atk-abh03a:962_1: paṭiññā sakavādissa. Nanu bodhipaṭilābhāti pañhe pana yasmiṃ santāne bodhisaṅkhātaṃ
atk-abh03a:962_2: maggañāṇaṃ uppannaṃ, tattha buddhoti sammutisabbhāvato paṭiññā tasseva. Tassa adhippāyaṃ
atk-abh03a:962_3: ajānitvā hañcīti laddhiṭṭhapanā paravādissa. Idānissa asallakkhaṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ
atk-abh03a:962_4: bodhipaṭilābhā buddhoti bodhiyā buddhoti pucchā sakavādissa. Tassattho – “kiṃ te
atk-abh03a:962_5: yasmā bodhipaṭilābhā buddho, tasmā bodhiyā buddho”ti. Itaro “bodhipaṭilābho nāma
atk-abh03a:962_6: bodhiyā uppajjitvā niruddhāyapi santāne uppannabhāvoyeva. Bodhi nāma maggakkhaṇe
atk-abh03a:962_7: ñāṇa”nti imaṃ vibhāgaṃ asallakkhentova puna paṭijānāti. Tato sakavādinā bodhipaṭilābhā
atk-abh03a:966_0: 400. Idāni lakkhaṇakathā nāma hoti. Tattha “yehi samannāgatassa mahāpurisassa dveva
atk-abh03a:966_1: gatiyo bhavantī”ti imaṃ suttaṃ ayoniso gahetvā lakkhaṇasamannāgato bodhisattova hotīti
atk-abh03a:966_2: yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi uttarāpathakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a:967: Cakkavattisattoti pañhesu yasmā cakkavattī sattopi ca bodhisattopi, tasmā abodhisattaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Bodhisattaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:968: 402. Dvattiṃsimānītisuttaṃ bodhisattameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. So hi pacchime bhave buddho hoti, itaresu cakkavattī, tasmā ābhatampi anābhatasadisamevāti.
atk-abh03a:971_0: 403. Idāni niyāmokkantikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ ghaṭikārasutte jotipālassa pabbajjaṃ
atk-abh03a:971_2: laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya bodhisattoti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:971_3: laddhiyaṃ ṭhatvā paṭiññā itarassa. Tato yasmā niyāmoti vā brahmacariyanti vā ariyamaggassa
atk-abh03a:971_4: nāmaṃ, bodhisattānañca ṭhapetvā pāramīpūraṇaṃ aññā niyāmokkanti nāma natthi. Yadi
atk-abh03a:971_5: bhaveyya, bodhisatto sotāpanno sāvako bhaveyya. Na cetamevaṃ. Kevalañhi naṃ buddhā
atk-abh03a:971_6: attano ñāṇabale ṭhatvā – “ayaṃ buddho bhavissatī”ti byākaronti, tasmā puna bodhisattoti
atk-abh03a:971_7: anuyogo sakavādissa. Pacchimabhavaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhepo itarassa. Dutiyapañhe jotipālakālaṃ
atk-abh03a:971_8: sandhāya paṭiññā tasseva. Sāvako hutvātiādīsupi eseva nayo. Anussaviyoti anussavena
atk-abh03a:971_9: paṭividdhadhammo. Pacchimabhavaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipitvā jotipālakāle anussavaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:972: 404. Aññaṃ satthārantiāḷārañca rāmaputtañca sandhāya vuttaṃ. Āyasmā ānandotiādi “okkantaniyāmāva sāvakā honti, na itare okkantaniyāmā evarūpā hontī”ti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:973_0: Sāvako jātiṃ vītivattoti yāya jātiyā sāvako, taṃ vītivatto aññasmiṃ bhave asāvako
atk-abh03a:973_1: hotīti pucchati. Itaro sotāpannādīnaṃ sotāpannādisāvakabhāvato paṭikkhipati. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a:976_0: 406. Idāni aparāpi samannāgatakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ “catutthamaggaṭṭho puggalo
atk-abh03a:976_1: pattidhammavasena tīhi phalehi samannāgato”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānaṃ;
atk-abh03a:976_2: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamettha heṭṭhā catūhi phalehi
atk-abh03a:979_0: 413. Idāni saṃyojanappahānakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ “nippariyāyeneva sabbasaṃyojanappahānaṃ
atk-abh03a:979_1: arahatta”nti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:979_2: paṭiññā itarassa. Puna sabbe saṃyojanāti puṭṭho heṭṭhā vuttamaggattayena pahīne sandhāya
atk-abh03a:979_3: paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho tena maggena appahīnassa abhāvā paṭijānāti. Sakkāyadiṭṭhiādīsupi
atk-abh03a:979_4: paṭhamamaggena pahīnabhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati, catutthamaggena anavasesappahānaṃ
atk-abh03a:984_0: 418. Idāni vimuttikathā nāma hoti. Tattha vipassanā, maggo, phalaṃ, paccavekkhaṇanti
atk-abh03a:984_1: catunnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ vimuttiñāṇanti nāmaṃ. Tesu vipassanāñāṇaṃ niccanimittādīhi vimuttattā,
atk-abh03a:984_2: tadaṅgavimuttibhāvena vā vimuttattā vimuttiñāṇaṃ. Maggo samucchedavimutti, phalaṃ
atk-abh03a:984_3: paṭippassaddhivimutti, paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ pana vimuttiṃ jānātīti vimuttiñāṇaṃ. Evaṃ
atk-abh03a:984_4: catubbidhe vimuttiñāṇe nippariyāyena phalañāṇameva vimutti. Sesāni “vimuttānī”ti
atk-abh03a:984_5: vā “avimuttānī”ti vā na vattabbāni. Tasmā “idaṃ nāma vimuttiñāṇaṃ vimutta”nti avatvā
atk-abh03a:984_6: aviseseneva “vimuttiñāṇaṃ vimutta”nti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya
atk-abh03a:984_7: pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā paravādissa. Puna yaṃkiñcīti puṭṭho paccavekkhaṇādīni
atk-abh03a:984_8: sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Paṭipannassāti puṭṭho maggañāṇassa anāsavataṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:984_9: Yasmā pana taṃ sotāpannassa phale ṭhitassa ñāṇaṃ na hoti, tasmā vimuttaṃ nāma na
atk-abh03a:984_10: hotīti codanatthaṃ puna sakavādī sotāpannassātiādimāha. Iminā upāyena sabbattha attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:987_0: 421. Idāni asekhakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā ānandattherādayo sekhā “uḷāro bhagavā”tiādinā
atk-abh03a:987_1: nayena asekhe jānanti, tasmā “sekhassa asekhañāṇaṃ atthī”ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi
atk-abh03a:987_2: uttarāpathakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Jānāti passatīti
atk-abh03a:987_3: idaṃ attanā adhigatassa jānanavasena vuttaṃ. Gotrabhunotiādi heṭṭhimāya bhūmiyaṃ
atk-abh03a:987_4: ṭhitassa uparūpariñāṇassa abhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Nanu āyasmā ānando sekho “uḷāro
atk-abh03a:987_5: bhagavā”ti jānātīti paravādī asekhe bhagavati pavattattā taṃ asekhañāṇanti icchati,
atk-abh03a:987_6: na panetaṃ asekhaṃ. Tasmā evaṃ patiṭṭhāpitāpi laddhi appatiṭṭhāpitāva hotīti.
atk-abh03a:990_0: 424. Idāni viparītakathā nāma hoti. Tattha “yvāyaṃ pathavīkasiṇe pathavīsaññī samāpajjati,
atk-abh03a:990_1: tassa taṃ ñāṇaṃ viparītañāṇa”nti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ, te sandhāya
atk-abh03a:990_2: pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Pathaviṃ nissāya uppannanimittañhi na pathavīyeva,
atk-abh03a:990_3: tatra cāyaṃ pathavīsaññī. Tasmā viparītañāṇanti ayametassa adhippāyo. Tato sakavādī
atk-abh03a:990_5: tāsu pathavīti ñāṇaṃ viparītaṃ na hoti. Anicce niccantiādivipariyeso pana viparītañāṇaṃ
atk-abh03a:990_6: nāma. Kiṃ te idaṃ etesu aññatara”nti codetuṃ anicce niccantiādimāha. Itaro vipallāsalakkhaṇābhāvaṃ
