atk-abh03a:991_0: Kusalanti sekkhaputhujjanānaṃ ñāṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Atthi arahatoti pañhesupi vipallāsalakkhaṇābhāvena
atk-abh03a:991_1: paṭikkhipati. Pathavīnimittaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Sabbeva pathavīti sabbaṃ taṃ pathavīkasiṇaṃ
atk-abh03a:991_2: lakkhaṇapathavīyeva hotīti pucchati. Sakavādī tathā abhāvato paṭikkhipati. Nanu pathavī
atk-abh03a:991_3: atthi, atthi ca koci pathaviṃ pathavito samāpajjatīti pucchā sakavādissa. Tassattho
atk-abh03a:991_4: – nanu nimittapathavī atthi, atthi ca koci taṃ pathaviṃ pathavitoyeva samāpajjati,
atk-abh03a:991_5: na āpato vā tejato vāti. Pathavī atthītiādi “yadi yaṃ yathā atthi, taṃ tathā samāpajjantassa
atk-abh03a:991_6: ñāṇaṃ viparītaṃ hoti, nibbānaṃ atthi, tampi samāpajjantassa sabbavipariyesasamugghātanaṃ
atk-abh03a:991_7: maggañāṇampi te viparītaṃ hotū”ti dassanatthaṃ vuttanti.
atk-abh03a:994_0: 428-431. Idāni niyāmakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yo puggalo sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamissati,
atk-abh03a:994_1: taṃ “bhabbo esa dhammaṃ abhisametu”nti yasmā bhagavā jānāti, tasmā “aniyatassa puthujjanasseva
atk-abh03a:994_2: sato puggalassa niyāmagamanāya ñāṇaṃ atthī”ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi uttarāpathakānaṃ;
atk-abh03a:994_3: te sandhāya aniyatassāti pucchā sakavādissa. Tattha niyāmagamanāyāti niyāmo vuccati
atk-abh03a:994_4: maggo, maggagamanāya maggokkamanāyāti attho. Yaṃ panassa ñāṇaṃ disvā bhagavā “bhabbo
atk-abh03a:994_5: aya”nti jānāti, taṃ sandhāya paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a:995_0: Athassa sakavādī ayuttavāditaṃ dīpetuṃ niyatassāti viparītānuyogamāha. Tattha paṭhamapañhe
atk-abh03a:995_1: maggena niyatassa aniyāmagamanāya ñāṇaṃ nāma natthīti paṭikkhipati. Dutiye natthibhāvena
atk-abh03a:995_2: paṭijānāti. Tatiye aniyatassa natthīti puṭṭhattā laddhivirodhena paṭikkhipati. Puna
atk-abh03a:995_3: paṭhamapañhameva catutthaṃ katvā niyatassa niyāmagamanādivasena tayo pañhā katā.
atk-abh03a:995_4: Tesu paṭhame yasmā ādimaggena niyatassa puna tadatthāya ñāṇaṃ natthi, tasmā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:995_5: Dutiye natthibhāveneva paṭijānāti. Tatiye laddhivirodheneva paṭikkhipati. Puna paṭhamapañhaṃ
atk-abh03a:995_6: aṭṭhamaṃ katvā aniyatassa aniyāmagamanādivasena tayo pañhā katā. Tesaṃ attho vuttanayeneva
atk-abh03a:995_7: veditabbo. Puna paṭhamapañhameva dvādasamaṃ katvā taṃmūlakā atthi niyāmotiādayo pañhā
atk-abh03a:995_8: katā. Tattha yasmā niyāmagamanāya ñāṇaṃ nāma maggañāṇameva hoti, tasmā taṃ sandhāya
atk-abh03a:995_9: atthi niyāmoti vuttaṃ. Itaro pana niyāmoti vutte paṭikkhipati, ñāṇanti vutte paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:995_10: Satipaṭṭhānādīsupi eseva nayo. Paccanīkaṃ uttānatthameva. Gotrabhunotiādi yena yaṃ
atk-abh03a:995_11: appattaṃ, tassa taṃ natthīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Bhagavā jānātīti attano ñāṇabalena
atk-abh03a:995_12: jānāti, na tassa niyāmagamanañāṇasabbhāvato. Tasmā iminā kāraṇena patiṭṭhitāpissa
atk-abh03a:998_0: 432-433. Idāni paṭisambhidākathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ “yaṃkiñci ariyānaṃ ñāṇaṃ,
atk-abh03a:998_1: sabbaṃ lokuttaramevā”ti gahetvā “sabbaṃ ñāṇaṃ paṭisambhidā”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi
atk-abh03a:998_2: andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sammutiñāṇapañhesu
atk-abh03a:998_3: pathavīkasiṇasammutiyaṃ samāpattiñāṇaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati, niruttiñāṇaṃ sandhāya
atk-abh03a:998_4: paṭijānāti. Ye keci sammutinti pañhe puthujjane sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Cetopariyāyapañhesu
atk-abh03a:998_5: puthujjanassa ñāṇaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati, ariyassa ñāṇaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Sabbā
atk-abh03a:998_6: paññātipañhesu kasiṇasamāpattipañhaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati, lokuttaraṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:998_7: Pathavīkasiṇasamāpattintiādi “yā etesu ettakesu ṭhānesu paññā, kiṃ sabbā sā paṭisambhidā”ti
atk-abh03a:998_8: pucchanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tena hi sabbaṃ ñāṇanti yasmā sabbā lokuttarapaññā paṭisambhidā,
atk-abh03a:998_9: tasmā sabbanti vacanaṃ sāmaññaphalena saddhiṃ patiṭṭhāpetīti.
atk-abh03a:1001_0: 434-435. Idāni sammutiñāṇakathā nāma hoti. Tattha sammutisaccaṃ paramatthasaccanti
atk-abh03a:1001_1: dve saccāni. Ye pana evaṃ vibhāgaṃ akatvā saccanti vacanasāmaññena sammutiñāṇampi
atk-abh03a:1001_2: “saccārammaṇamevā”ti vadanti, seyyathāpi andhakā; te ayuttavādinoti tesaṃ vādavisodhanatthaṃ
atk-abh03a:1001_3: ayaṃ kathā āraddhā. Tattha na vattabbanti pucchā paravādissa, paramatthasaccaṃ sandhāya
atk-abh03a:1001_4: paṭiññā sakavādissa. Sammutisaccamhīti sammutiṃ anupaviṭṭhe saccamhi. Paccatte vā
atk-abh03a:1001_5: bhummavacanaṃ, sammutisaccanti attho. Sammutiñāṇaṃ saccārammaṇaññevāti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1001_6: paṭiññā itarassa. Tato naṃ “yadi taṃ avisesena saccārammaṇaññeva, tena ñāṇena dukkhapariññādīni
atk-abh03a:1004_0: 436-438. Idāni cittārammaṇakathā nāma hoti. Tattha cetopariyāye ñāṇanti vacanamattameva
atk-abh03a:1004_1: gahetvā “taṃ ñāṇaṃ cittārammaṇamevā”ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānaṃ;
atk-abh03a:1004_2: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Athassa “yo sarāgādivasena cittaṃ
atk-abh03a:1004_3: jānāti, tassa rāgādayopi ārammaṇā honti, tasmā na vattabbaṃ taṃ cittārammaṇaññevā”ti
atk-abh03a:1004_4: codanatthaṃ nanu atthi kocītiādi āraddhaṃ. Phassārammaṇeti phassasaṅkhāte ārammaṇe.
atk-abh03a:1004_5: Vedanārammaṇetiādīsupi eseva nayo. Puna phassārammaṇe ñāṇaṃ na vattabbanti puṭṭho
atk-abh03a:1004_6: phassassa phusanalakkhaṇaṃ manasikaroto phassovārammaṇaṃ hotīti paṭijānāti. Kiṃ panetaṃ
atk-abh03a:1004_7: phassapariyāye ñāṇanti puṭṭho pana tādisassa suttapadassa abhāvā paṭikkhipati. Vedanādīsupi
atk-abh03a:1004_8: eseva nayo. Idāni yaṃ nissāya laddhi, tadeva dassetvā laddhiṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ nanu
atk-abh03a:1004_9: cetopariyāye ñāṇantiādimāha. Sā panesā vacanamattābhinivesena patiṭṭhāpitāpi appatiṭṭhāpitāva hotīti.
atk-abh03a:1007_0: 439-440. Idāni anāgatañāṇakathā nāma hoti. Tattha anāgataṃ nāma antarampi atthi,
atk-abh03a:1007_1: anantarampi. Tesu anantare ekanteneva ñāṇaṃ natthi. Yathā ca anantare, tathā ekavīthiekajavanapariyāpannepi.
atk-abh03a:1007_2: Tattha ye sabbasmimpi anāgate ñāṇaṃ icchanti, seyyathāpi andhakā; te sandhāya pucchā
atk-abh03a:1007_3: sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ “yaṃ te anāgate ñāṇaṃ, kiṃ tena anantaraṃ
atk-abh03a:1007_4: anāgataṃ mūlādivasena jānātī”ti codetuṃ anāgataṃ mūlatotiādimāha. Tattha mūlatotiādīni
atk-abh03a:1007_5: sabbāni kāraṇavevacanāneva. Kāraṇañhi yaṃ attano phalaṃ karoti, taṃ tattha mūlayati
atk-abh03a:1007_6: patiṭṭhātīti mūlaṃ. Tato ca taṃ hinoti pavattayatīti hetu. Tadeva taṃ nideti “handa
atk-abh03a:1007_7: naṃ gaṇhathā”ti. Niyyāteti viyāti nidānaṃ. Tato taṃ sambhavatīti sambhavo. Pabhavatīti
atk-abh03a:1007_8: pabhavo. Tattha ca taṃ samuṭṭhāti, taṃ vā naṃ samuṭṭhāpetīti samuṭṭhānaṃ. Tadeva
atk-abh03a:1007_9: naṃ āharatīti āhāro. Tañcassa apariccajitabbaṭṭhena ārammaṇaṃ. Tadeva cetaṃ paṭicca
atk-abh03a:1007_10: etīti paccayo. Tato naṃ samudetīti samudayoti vuccati. Yasmā pana anantaraṃ cittaṃ
atk-abh03a:1007_11: etehākārehi na sakkā jānituṃ, tasmā na hevanti paṭikkhipati. Anāgataṃ hetupaccayatanti
atk-abh03a:1007_12: yā anantarānāgate citte hetupaccayatā, taṃ jānāti. Ye tattha dhammā hetupaccayā honti,
atk-abh03a:1007_13: te jānātīti attho. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Gotrabhunotiādi yasmiṃ anāgate ñāṇaṃ
atk-abh03a:1007_14: na uppajjati, taṃ sarūpato dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Pāṭaliputtassāti suttaṃ yasmiṃ anāgate
atk-abh03a:1007_15: ñāṇaṃ uppajjati, taṃ dassetuṃ āhaṭaṃ. Yasmā panetaṃ na sabbasmiṃ anāgate ñāṇassa
atk-abh03a:1010_0: 441-442. Idāni paṭuppannañāṇakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ “sabbasaṅkhāresu aniccato
atk-abh03a:1010_1: diṭṭhesu tampi ñāṇaṃ aniccato diṭṭhaṃ hotī”ti vacanaṃ nissāya “avisesena sabbasmiṃ
atk-abh03a:1010_2: paccuppanne ñāṇaṃ atthī”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya paṭuppanneti
atk-abh03a:1010_3: pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ “yadi avisesena paṭuppanne ñāṇaṃ atthi,
atk-abh03a:1010_4: khaṇapaccuppannepi tena bhavitabbaṃ. Evaṃ sante dvinnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ ekato abhāvā teneva
atk-abh03a:1010_5: ñāṇena taṃ jānitabbaṃ hotī”ti codanatthaṃ tenāti anuyogo sakavādissa. Tattha paṭhamapañhe
atk-abh03a:1010_6: teneva taṃ jānituṃ na sakkāti paṭikkhepo itarassa. Dutiyapañhe santatiṃ sandhāya
atk-abh03a:1010_7: paṭiññā tasseva. Paṭipāṭito bhaṅgaṃ passanto bhaṅgānupassaneneva bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇaṃ
atk-abh03a:1010_8: passatīti adhippāyo. Tena ñāṇena taṃ ñāṇaṃ jānātītiādīsupi eseva nayo. Tena phassena
atk-abh03a:1010_9: taṃ phassantiādīnissa lesokāsanivāraṇatthaṃ vuttāni. Yaṃ panetena laddhipatiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ
atk-abh03a:1010_10: nanu sabbasaṅkhāretiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha nayato taṃ ñāṇaṃ diṭṭhaṃ hoti, na ārammaṇatoti
atk-abh03a:1010_11: adhippāyena paṭiññā sakavādissa. Tasmā evaṃ patiṭṭhitāpissa laddhi appatiṭṭhitāva hoti.
atk-abh03a:1013_0: 443-444. Idāni phale ñāṇakathā nāma hoti. Tattha “buddhāpi sattānaṃ ariyaphalappattiyā
atk-abh03a:1013_1: dhammaṃ desenti sāvakāpi, iti iminā sāmaññena buddhānaṃ viya sāvakānampi tena tena
atk-abh03a:1013_2: sattena pattabbe phale ñāṇaṃ atthī”ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya
atk-abh03a:1013_3: sāvakassāti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ “yadi sāvakassa phale
atk-abh03a:1013_4: ñāṇaṃ atthi, yathā buddhā samānepi sotāpattiphale attano ñāṇabalena ‘ayaṃ ekabījī,
atk-abh03a:1013_5: ayaṃ kolaṃkolo, ayaṃ sattakkhattuparamo’ti phalassakataṃ paññapenti, kiṃ te evaṃ
atk-abh03a:1013_6: sāvakopī”ti codetuṃ sāvako phalassa kataṃ paññapetīti āha. Itaro paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1014_0: Atthi sāvakassa phalaparopariyattītiādi phale ñāṇassa atthitāya paccayapucchanatthaṃ
atk-abh03a:1014_1: vuttaṃ. Ayañhettha adhippāyo – buddhānaṃ “idaṃ phalaṃ paraṃ, idaṃ opara”nti evaṃ
atk-abh03a:1014_2: phalānaṃ uccāvacabhāvajānanasaṅkhātā phale paropariyatti nāma atthi. Tathā indriyapuggalaparopariyattiyo,
atk-abh03a:1014_3: tāsaṃ atthitāya tassa tassa puggalassa tesaṃ tesaṃ indriyānaṃ vasena taṃ taṃ phalaṃ
atk-abh03a:1014_4: jānanti, kiṃ te sāvakassāpi etā paropariyattiyo atthīti.
atk-abh03a:1015_0: Atthi sāvakassa khandhapaññattītiādīnipi “yadi te sāvakassa buddhānaṃ viya phale
atk-abh03a:1015_1: ñāṇaṃ atthi, imā hi pissa paññattīhi bhavitabbaṃ. Kimassa tā atthi, sakkoti so etā
atk-abh03a:1015_2: paññattiyo attano balena jānituṃ vā paññapetuṃ vā”ti codanatthaṃ vuttāni. Sāvako
atk-abh03a:1015_3: jinotiādi “yadi sāvakassa buddhānaṃ viya phale ñāṇaṃ atthi, evaṃ sante sveva jino”ti
atk-abh03a:1015_4: codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Sāvako anuppannassāti pañhepi ayameva nayo. Aññāṇīti pañhe avijjāsaṅkhātassa
atk-abh03a:1015_5: aññāṇassa vihatattā paṭikkhitto, na panassa buddhānaṃ viya phale ñāṇaṃ atthi. Tasmā
atk-abh03a:1021_0: 445-447. Idāni niyāmakathā nāma hoti. Tattha niyāmoti “bhabbo niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu
atk-abh03a:1021_1: dhammesu sammatta”nti vacanato ariyamaggo vuccati. Yasmā pana tasmiṃ uppajjitvā niruddhepi
atk-abh03a:1021_2: puggalo aniyato nāma na hoti, tasmā “so niyāmo niccaṭṭhena asaṅkhato”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1021_3: seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Tato “yadi
atk-abh03a:1021_4: so asaṅkhato, evarūpena tena bhavitabba”nti dīpento nibbānantiādimāha. Saṃsandanapucchā uttānatthāyeva.
atk-abh03a:1022_0: Atthi kecītiādi niyāmassa saṅkhatabhāvadīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Maggo asaṅkhatotipañhe
atk-abh03a:1022_1: tassa uppādanirodhabhāvato paṭikkhipatīti. Niyāmo saṅkhatotipañhe niruddhepi magge
atk-abh03a:1022_2: niyāmassa atthitaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Sotāpattiniyāmotiādipañhesupi anulomato
atk-abh03a:1022_3: ca paṭilomato ca imināva nayena attho veditabbo. Pañca asaṅkhatānīti puṭṭho pañcannaṃ
atk-abh03a:1022_4: asaṅkhatānaṃ āgataṭṭhānaṃ apassanto paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho catunnaṃ sammattaniyāmānaṃ
atk-abh03a:1022_5: niyāmavacanato nibbānassa ca asaṅkhatabhāvato paṭijānāti. Micchattaniyāmapañho niyāmavacanamattena
atk-abh03a:1025_0: 448. Idāni paṭiccasamuppādakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ nidānavagge “uppādā vā tathāgatānaṃ
atk-abh03a:1025_1: anuppādā vā tathāgatānaṃ ṭhitāva sā dhātu dhammaṭṭhitatā”tiādivacanato “paṭiccasamuppādo
atk-abh03a:1025_2: asaṅkhato”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi pubbaseliyānañca mahisāsakānañca; te sandhāya pucchā
atk-abh03a:1026_0: 449. Avijjā asaṅkhatāti ādayo pañhā avijjādīnaṃyeva paṭiccasamuppādabhāvadassanatthaṃ
atk-abh03a:1026_1: vuttā. Yena panatthena tattha ekekaṃ aṅgaṃ “paṭiccasamuppādo”ti vuccati, so paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅge vuttoyeva.
atk-abh03a:1027_0: 451. Avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārāti yā tattha dhammaṭṭhitatātiādi yena suttena laddhi patiṭṭhāpitā,
atk-abh03a:1027_1: tasseva atthadassanena laddhibhindanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Ayañhettha attho – yā ayaṃ heṭṭhā
atk-abh03a:1027_2: “ṭhitāva sā dhātu dhammaṭṭhitatā dhammaniyāmatā”ti vuttā na sā aññatra avijjādīhi
atk-abh03a:1027_3: visuṃ ekā atthi. Avijjādīnaṃ pana paccayānaṃyevetaṃ nāmaṃ. Uppannepi hi tathāgate
atk-abh03a:1027_4: anuppannepi avijjāto saṅkhārā sambhavanti, saṅkhārādīhi ca viññāṇādīni, tasmā “avijjāpaccayā
atk-abh03a:1027_5: saṅkhārā”ti yā etasmiṃ pade saṅkhāradhammānaṃ kāraṇaṭṭhena ṭhitatāti dhammaṭṭhitatā.
atk-abh03a:1027_6: Tesaṃyeva ca dhammānaṃ kāraṇaṭṭheneva niyāmatāti dhammaniyāmatāti avijjā vuccati.
atk-abh03a:1027_7: Sā ca asaṅkhatā, nibbānañca asaṅkhatanti pucchati. Paravādī laddhivasena paṭijānitvā
atk-abh03a:1027_8: puna dve asaṅkhatānīti puṭṭho suttābhāvena paṭikkhipitvā laddhivaseneva paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1027_9: Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Heṭṭhā vuttasadisaṃ pana tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
atk-abh03a:1030_0: 452-454. Idāni saccakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ “cattārimāni, bhikkhave, tathāni
atk-abh03a:1030_1: avitathānī”ti suttaṃ nissāya “cattāri saccāni niccāni asaṅkhatānī”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi
atk-abh03a:1030_2: pubbaseliyānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Ayañhissa adhippāyo
atk-abh03a:1030_3: – dukkhasamudayamaggesu vatthusaccaṃ saṅkhataṃ, lakkhaṇasaccaṃ asaṅkhataṃ. Nirodhe
atk-abh03a:1030_4: vatthusaccaṃ nāma natthi asaṅkhatameva tanti. Tasmā āmantāti āha. Taṃ panassa laddhimattameva.
atk-abh03a:1030_5: So hi dukkhaṃ vatthusaccaṃ icchati, tathā samudayaṃ maggañca. Yāni pana nesaṃ bādhanapabhavaniyyānikalakkhaṇāni,
atk-abh03a:1030_6: tāni lakkhaṇasaccaṃ nāmāti, na ca bādhanalakkhaṇādīhi aññāni dukkhādīni nāma atthīti.
atk-abh03a:1031_0: Dukkhasaccanti pañhe laddhivasena lakkhaṇaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Dukkhanti pañhe
atk-abh03a:1031_1: vatthuṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Ito paraṃ suddhikapañhā ca saṃsandanapañhā ca sabbe
atk-abh03a:1031_2: pāḷianusāreneva veditabbā. Avasāne laddhipatiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ āhaṭasuttaṃ atthassa micchā
atk-abh03a:1034_0: 455-456. Idāni āruppakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ “cattāro āruppā āneñjā”ti vacanaṃ
atk-abh03a:1034_1: nissāya “sabbepi te dhammā asaṅkhatā”ti laddhi, te sandhāya ākāsānañcāyatananti pucchā
atk-abh03a:1034_2: sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti. Sādhakasuttampi atthaṃ
atk-abh03a:1037_0: 457-459. Idāni nirodhasamāpattikathā nāma hoti. Tattha nirodhasamāpattīti catunnaṃ
atk-abh03a:1037_1: khandhānaṃ appavatti. Yasmā pana sā kariyamānā kariyati, samāpajjiyamānā samāpajjiyati,
atk-abh03a:1037_2: tasmā nipphannāti vuccati. Saṅkhatāsaṅkhatalakkhaṇānaṃ pana abhāvena na vattabbā
atk-abh03a:1037_3: “saṅkhatāti vā asaṅkhatā”ti vā. Tattha yesaṃ “yasmā saṅkhatā na hoti, tasmā asaṅkhatā”ti
atk-abh03a:1037_4: laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānañceva uttarāpathakānañca; te sandhāya nirodhasamāpattīti
atk-abh03a:1037_5: pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Uppādentītiādi samāpajjanapaṭilābhavaseneva
atk-abh03a:1037_6: vuttaṃ. Yathā pana rūpādayo asaṅkhatadhamme uppādenti; na tathā taṃ keci uppādenti
atk-abh03a:1037_7: nāma. Nirodhā vodānaṃ vuṭṭhānanti phalasamāpatti veditabbā. Asaṅkhatā pana taṃ natthiyeva,
atk-abh03a:1037_8: tasmā paṭikkhipati. Tena hīti yasmā saṅkhatā na hoti, tasmā asaṅkhatāti laddhi. Idaṃ
atk-abh03a:1037_9: pana asaṅkhatabhāve kāraṇaṃ na hotīti vuttampi avuttasadisamevāti.
atk-abh03a:1040_0: 460-462. Idāni ākāsakathā nāma hoti. Tattha tividho ākāso – paricchedākāso, kasiṇugghāṭimākāso,
atk-abh03a:1040_1: ajaṭākāso. “Tucchākāso”tipi tasseva nāmaṃ. Tesu paricchedākāso saṅkhato, itare dve
atk-abh03a:1040_2: paññattimattā. Yesaṃ pana “duvidhopi yasmā saṅkhato na hoti, tasmā asaṅkhato”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1040_3: seyyathāpi uttarāpathakānaṃ mahisāsakānañca; te sandhāya ākāsoti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1043_0: 463-464. Idāni ākāso sanidassanotikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ tāḷacchiddādīsu ñāṇappavattiṃ
atk-abh03a:1043_1: nissāya “sabbopi ajaṭākāso sanidassano”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya
atk-abh03a:1043_2: ākāso sanidassanoti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ “yadi sanidassano,
atk-abh03a:1043_3: evaṃvidho bhaveyyā”ti codanatthaṃ rūpantiādi vuttaṃ. Cakkhuñca paṭiccātipañhesu evarūpassa
atk-abh03a:1043_4: suttassa abhāvena paṭikkhipitvā tulantarikādīnaṃ upaladdhiṃ nissāya paṭijānāti. Dvinnaṃ
atk-abh03a:1043_5: rukkhānaṃ antaranti ettha rukkharūpaṃ cakkhunā disvā antare rūpābhāvato ākāsanti
atk-abh03a:1043_6: manodvāraviññāṇaṃ uppajjati, na cakkhuviññāṇaṃ. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Tasmā asādhakametanti.
atk-abh03a:1046_0: 465-470. Idāni pathavīdhātu sanidassanātiādikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ pāsāṇaudakajālarukkhacalanānañceva
atk-abh03a:1046_2: “pathavīdhātuādayo sanidassanā”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya sabbakathāsu
atk-abh03a:1046_3: ādipucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesaṃ sabbattha pāḷianusārena ceva heṭṭhā
atk-abh03a:1046_4: vuttanayena ca veditabbanti. Pathavīdhātu sanidassanāti ādiṃ katvā kāyakammaṃ sanidassananti
atk-abh03a:1050_0: 471-472. Idāni saṅgahitakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā dāmādīhi balibaddādayo viya
atk-abh03a:1050_1: keci dhammā kehici dhammehi saṅgahitā nāma natthi, tasmā “natthi keci dhammā kehici
atk-abh03a:1050_2: dhammehi saṅgahitā, evaṃ sante ekavidhena rūpasaṅgahotiādi niratthaka”nti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1050_3: seyyathāpi rājagirikānañceva siddhatthikānañca; te sandhāya aññenatthena saṅgahabhāvaṃ
atk-abh03a:1050_4: dassetuṃ pucchā sakavādissa, attano laddhivasena paṭiññā itarassa. Idāni yenatthena
atk-abh03a:1050_5: saṅgaho labbhati, taṃ dassetuṃ nanu atthi keci dhammātiādi āraddhaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ heṭṭhā
atk-abh03a:1050_6: vuttanayattā uttānatthameva. Yā panesā paravādinā laddhipatiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ yathā dāmena
atk-abh03a:1050_7: vātiādikā upamā āhaṭā, sakavādinā taṃ anabhinanditvā appaṭikkositvā “hañci dāmena
atk-abh03a:1050_8: vā”ti tassa laddhi bhinnāti veditabbā. Ayañhettha attho – yadi te dāmādīhi balibaddādayo
atk-abh03a:1050_9: saṅgahitā nāma, atthi keci dhammā kehici dhammehi saṅgahitāti.
atk-abh03a:1053_0: 473-474. Idāni sampayuttakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā tilamhi telaṃ viya na vedanādayo
atk-abh03a:1053_1: saññādīsu anupaviṭṭhā, tasmā “natthi keci dhammā kehici dhammehi sampayuttā, evaṃ
atk-abh03a:1053_2: sante ñāṇasampayuttantiādi niratthakaṃ hotī”ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi rājagirikasiddhatthikānaññeva;
atk-abh03a:1053_3: te sandhāya aññenevatthena sampayuttataṃ dassetuṃ pucchā sakavādissa, attano laddhivasena
atk-abh03a:1053_4: paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamidhāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānatthameva. Yo panesa paravādinā
atk-abh03a:1053_5: “yathā tilamhi tela”ntiādiko upamāpañho āhaṭo, so yasmā vedanāsaññānaṃ viya tilatelānaṃ
atk-abh03a:1053_6: lakkhaṇato nānattavavatthānaṃ natthi. Sabbesupi hi tilaaṭṭhitacesu tiloti vohāramattaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1053_7: teneva tilaṃ nibbattetvā gahite purimasaṇṭhānena tilo nāma na paññāyati, tasmā anāhaṭasadisova hotīti.
atk-abh03a:1056_0: 475-477. Idāni cetasikakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā phassikādayo nāma natthi, tasmā
atk-abh03a:1056_1: “cetasikenāpi na bhavitabbaṃ, iti natthi cetasiko dhammo”ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi
atk-abh03a:1056_2: rājagirikasiddhatthikānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sahajātoti
atk-abh03a:1056_3: sampayuttasahajātaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Phassikāti tādisaṃ vohāraṃ apassantassa pucchā
atk-abh03a:1056_4: paravādissa. Kiṃ vohārena, yathā cittanissitakoti cetasiko, evaṃ sopi phassanissitattā
atk-abh03a:1056_5: phassikoti vutte doso natthīti paṭiññā sakavādissa. Sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a:1059_0: 478. Idāni dānakathā nāma hoti. Tattha dānaṃ nāma tividhaṃ – cāgacetanāpi, viratipi,
atk-abh03a:1059_1: deyyadhammopi. “Saddhā hiriyaṃ kusalañca dāna”nti āgataṭṭhāne cāgacetanā dānaṃ. “Abhayaṃ
atk-abh03a:1059_2: detī”ti āgataṭṭhāne virati. “Dānaṃ deti annaṃ pāna”nti āgataṭṭhāne deyyadhammo. Tattha
atk-abh03a:1059_3: cāgacetanā “deti vā deyyadhammaṃ, denti vā etāya deyyadhamma”nti dānaṃ. Virati avakhaṇḍanaṭṭhena
atk-abh03a:1059_4: lavanaṭṭhena vā dānaṃ. Sā hi uppajjamānā bhayabheravādisaṅkhātaṃ dussīlyacetanaṃ
atk-abh03a:1059_5: dāti khaṇḍeti lunāti vāti dānaṃ. Deyyadhammo diyyatīti dānaṃ. Evametaṃ tividhampi
atk-abh03a:1059_6: atthato cetasiko ceva dhammo deyyadhammo cāti duvidhaṃ hoti. Tattha yesaṃ “cetasikova
atk-abh03a:1059_7: dhammo dānaṃ, na deyyadhammo”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi rājagirikasiddhatthikānaṃ; te
atk-abh03a:1059_8: sandhāya cetasikoti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ deyyadhammavasena
atk-abh03a:1059_9: codetuṃ labbhāti pucchā sakavādissa, annādīni viya so na sakkā dātunti paṭikkhepo
atk-abh03a:1059_10: itarassa. Puna daḷhaṃ katvā puṭṭhe “abhayaṃ detī”ti suttavasena paṭiññā tasseva.
atk-abh03a:1059_11: Phassapañhādīsu pana phassaṃ detītiādivohāraṃ apassanto paṭikkhipateva.
atk-abh03a:1060_0: 479. Aniṭṭhaphalantiādi acetasikassa dhammassa dānabhāvadīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Na hi
atk-abh03a:1060_1: acetasiko annādidhammo āyatiṃ vipākaṃ deti, iṭṭhaphalabhāvaniyamanatthaṃ panetaṃ
atk-abh03a:1060_2: vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Ayampi hettha adhippāyo – yadi acetasiko annādidhammo dānaṃ
atk-abh03a:1060_3: bhaveyya, hitacittena aniṭṭhaṃ akantaṃ bhesajjaṃ dentassa nimbabījādīhi viya nimbādayo
atk-abh03a:1060_4: aniṭṭhameva phalaṃ nibbatteyya. Yasmā panettha hitapharaṇacāgacetanā dānaṃ, tasmā
atk-abh03a:1061_0: Evaṃ paravādinā cetasikadhammassa dānabhāve patiṭṭhāpite sakavādī itarena pariyāyena
atk-abh03a:1061_1: deyyadhammassa dānabhāvaṃ sādhetuṃ dānaṃ iṭṭhaphalaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatātiādimāha. Paravādī
atk-abh03a:1061_2: pana cīvarādīnaṃ iṭṭhavipākataṃ apassanto paṭikkhipati. Suttasādhanaṃ paravādīvādepi
atk-abh03a:1061_3: yujjati sakavādīvādepi, na pana ekenatthena. Deyyadhammo iṭṭhaphaloti iṭṭhaphalabhāvamattameva
atk-abh03a:1061_4: paṭikkhittaṃ. Tasmā tena hi na vattabbanti iṭṭhaphalabhāveneva na vattabbatā yujjati.
atk-abh03a:1061_5: Dātabbaṭṭhena pana deyyadhammo dānameva. Dinnañhi dānānaṃ saṅkarabhāvamocanatthameva ayaṃ kathāti.
atk-abh03a:1064_0: 483. Idāni paribhogamayapuññakathā nāma hoti. Tattha “tesaṃ divā ca ratto ca, sadā
atk-abh03a:1064_1: puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatī”ti ca “yassa bhikkhave, bhikkhu cīvaraṃ paribhuñjamāno”ti ca evamādīni
atk-abh03a:1064_2: suttāni ayoniso gahetvā yesaṃ paribhogamayaṃ nāma puññaṃ atthī”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi
atk-abh03a:1064_3: rājagirikasiddhatthikasammitiyānaṃ; te sandhāya paribhogamayanti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1064_4: paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ “puññaṃ nāma phassādayo kusalā dhammā, na tato paraṃ,
atk-abh03a:1064_5: tasmā phassādīhi te vaḍḍhitabba”nti codetuṃ paribhogamayo phassotiādi āraddhaṃ. Taṃ
atk-abh03a:1064_6: sabbaṃ itarena tesaṃ avaḍḍhanato paṭikkhittaṃ. Latāviyātiādīni “kiriyāya vā bhāvanāya
atk-abh03a:1064_7: vā vināpi yathā latādīni sayameva vaḍḍhanti, kiṃ te evaṃ vaḍḍhantī”ti codanatthaṃ
atk-abh03a:1064_8: vuttāni. Tathā panassa avaḍḍhanato na hevāti paṭikkhittaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1065_0: 484. Na samannāharatīti pañhe paṭiggāhakānaṃ paribhogena purimacetanā vaḍḍhati, evaṃ
atk-abh03a:1065_1: taṃ hoti puññanti laddhivasena paṭijānāti. Tato anāvaṭṭentassātiādīhi puṭṭho dāyakassa
atk-abh03a:1065_2: cāgacetanaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Tattha anāvaṭṭentassāti dānacetanāya purecārikena
atk-abh03a:1065_3: āvajjanena bhavaṅgaṃ anāvaṭṭentassa aparivaṭṭentassa. Anābhogassāti nirābhogassa.
atk-abh03a:1065_4: Asamannāharantassāti na samannāharantassa. Āvajjanañhi bhavaṅgaṃ vicchinditvā attano
atk-abh03a:1065_5: gatamagge uppajjamānaṃ dānacetanaṃ samannāharati nāma. Evaṃkiccena iminā cittena
atk-abh03a:1065_6: asamannāharantassa puññaṃ hotīti pucchati. Amanasikarontassāti manaṃ akarontassa.
atk-abh03a:1065_7: Āvajjanena hi tadanantaraṃ uppajjamānaṃ manaṃ karoti nāma. Evaṃ akarontassāti attho.
atk-abh03a:1065_8: Upayogavacanasmiñhi etaṃ bhummaṃ. Acetayantassāti cetanaṃ anuppādentassa. Apatthentassāti
atk-abh03a:1065_10: cittaṃ aṭṭhapentassāti attho. Nanu āvaṭṭentassāti vāre ābhogassāti ābhogavato. Atha
atk-abh03a:1065_11: vā ābhogā assa, ābhogassa vā anantaraṃ taṃ puññaṃ hotīti attho.
atk-abh03a:1066_0: 485. Dvinnaṃ phassānantiādīsupi ekakkhaṇe dāyakassa dvinnaṃ phassādīnaṃ abhāvā paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a:1066_1: dāyakassa ca paribhuñjantassa cāti ubhinnaṃ phassādayo sandhāya paṭijānāti. Apicassa
atk-abh03a:1066_2: pañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ samodhānaṃ hotīti laddhi, tassāpi vasena paṭijānāti. Atha naṃ
atk-abh03a:1066_3: sakavādī pariyāyassa dvāraṃpidahitvā ujuvipaccanīkavasena codetuṃ kusalādipañhaṃ
atk-abh03a:1066_4: pucchati. Tatrāpi kusalākusalānaṃ ekassekakkhaṇe sampayogābhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1066_5: Paribhogamayaṃ pana cittavippayuttaṃ uppajjatīti laddhiyā paṭijānāti. Atha naṃ sakavādī suttena niggaṇhāti.
atk-abh03a:1067_1: puññaṃ sandhāya sadā puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti vuttaṃ. Appamāṇo tassa puññābhisandoti idaṃ
atk-abh03a:1067_2: appamāṇavihārino dinnapaccayattā ca “evarūpo me cīvaraṃ paribhuñjatī”ti anumodanavasena
atk-abh03a:1067_3: ca vuttaṃ. Taṃ so paribhogamayanti sallakkheti. Yasmā pana paṭiggāhakena paṭiggahetvā
atk-abh03a:1067_4: aparibhuttepi deyyadhamme puññaṃ hotiyeva, tasmā sakavādīvādova balavā, tattha paṭiggāhakena
atk-abh03a:1070_0: 488-491. Idāni ito dinnakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ “ito dinnena yāpenti, petā
atk-abh03a:1070_1: kālaṅkatā tahi”nti vacanaṃ nissāya “yaṃ ito cīvarādi dinnaṃ teneva yāpentī”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1070_2: seyyathāpi rājagirikasiddhatthikānaṃ; te sandhāya ito dinnenāti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1070_3: paṭiññā itarassa. Puna cīvarādivasena anuyutto paṭikkhipati. Añño aññassa kārakoti
atk-abh03a:1070_4: aññassa vipākadāyakānaṃ kammānaṃ añño kārako, na attanāva attano kammaṃ karotīti
atk-abh03a:1070_5: vuttaṃ hoti. Evaṃ puṭṭho pana itaro suttavirodhabhayena paṭikkhipati. Dānaṃ dentanti
atk-abh03a:1070_6: dānaṃ dadamānaṃ disvāti attho. Tattha yasmā attano anumoditattā ca tesaṃ tattha bhogā
atk-abh03a:1070_7: uppajjanti, tasmāssa iminā kāraṇena laddhiṃ patiṭṭhapentassāpi appatiṭṭhitāva hoti.
atk-abh03a:1070_8: Na hi te ito dinneneva vatthunā yāpenti. Sesesupi suttasādhanesu eseva nayoti.
atk-abh03a:1073_0: 492. Idāni pathavī kammavipākotikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā “atthi issariyasaṃvattaniyaṃ
atk-abh03a:1073_1: kammaṃ, ādhipaccasaṃvattaniyaṃ kamma”nti ettha issarānaṃ bhāvo issariyaṃ nāma, adhipatīnañca
atk-abh03a:1073_2: bhāvo ādhipaccaṃ nāma, pathavissariyaādhipaccasaṃvattanikañca kammaṃ atthīti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1073_3: Tasmā yesaṃ “pathavī kammavipāko”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya pathavīti
atk-abh03a:1073_4: pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sukhavedanīyātiādi kammavipākasabhāvadassanavasena
atk-abh03a:1073_5: vuttaṃ. “Phasso hotī”tiādinā nayena niddiṭṭhesu vipākesu phasso sukhavedanīyādibhedo
atk-abh03a:1073_6: hoti. So ca saññādayo ca sukhavedanādīhi sampayuttā, vedanādayo saññādīhi, sabbepi
atk-abh03a:1073_7: sārammaṇā, atthi ca nesaṃ purecārikaāvaṭṭanādisaṅkhātaṃ āvajjanaṃ, kammapaccayabhūtā
atk-abh03a:1073_8: cetanā, yo tattha iṭṭhavipāko, tassa patthanā, paṇidhānavasena pavattā mūlataṇhā,
atk-abh03a:1073_9: kiṃ te evarūpā pathavīti pucchati. Itaro paṭikkhipati. Paṭilomapucchādīni uttānatthāneva.
atk-abh03a:1074_0: 493. Kammavipāko paresaṃ sādhāraṇoti pañhe phassādayo sandhāya paṭikkhipati, kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh03a:1074_1: rūpañca pathavīādīnaṃyeva ca sādhāraṇabhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Asādhāraṇamaññesanti
atk-abh03a:1074_2: suttaṃ parasamayato āharitvā dassitaṃ. Sabbe sattā pathaviṃ paribhuñjantīti pañhe
atk-abh03a:1074_3: pathaviṃ anissite sandhāya paṭikkhipati, nissite sandhāya paṭijānāti. Pathaviṃ aparibhuñjitvā
atk-abh03a:1074_4: parinibbāyantīti pañhe āruppe parinibbāyantānaṃ vasena paṭijānāti. Kammavipākaṃ akhepetvāti
atk-abh03a:1074_5: idaṃ parasamayavasena vuttaṃ. Kammavipākañhi khepetvāva parinibbāyantīti tesaṃ laddhi.
atk-abh03a:1074_6: Sakasamaye pana katokāsassa kammassa uppannaṃ vipākaṃ akhepetvā parinibbānaṃ natthi.
atk-abh03a:1074_7: Tesañca laddhiyā pathavī sādhāraṇavipākattā uppannavipākoyeva hoti. Taṃ vipākabhāvena
atk-abh03a:1074_8: ṭhitaṃ akhepetvā parinibbānaṃ na yujjatīti codetuṃ vaṭṭati. Itaro laddhivasena paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1074_9: Cakkavattisattassa kammavipākanti pañhe asādhāraṇaṃ phassādiṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a:1074_10: sādhāraṇaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Pathavīsamuddasūriyacandimādayo hi sabbesaṃ sādhāraṇakammavipākoti tesaṃ laddhi.
atk-abh03a:1075_0: 494. Issariyasaṃvattaniyanti ettha issariyaṃ nāma bahudhanatā. Ādhipaccaṃ nāma sesajane
atk-abh03a:1075_1: attano vase vattetvā tehi garukātabbaṭṭhena adhipatibhāvo. Tattha kammaṃ paṭilābhavasena
atk-abh03a:1075_2: taṃsaṃvattanikaṃ nāma hoti, na janakavasena. Tasmā vipākabhāve asādhakametanti.
atk-abh03a:1078_0: 495. Idāni jarāmaraṇaṃ vipākotikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ “atthi dubbaṇṇasaṃvattaniyaṃ
atk-abh03a:1078_1: kammaṃ appāyukasaṃvattaniyaṃ kamma”nti ettha dubbaṇṇatā nāma jarā. Appāyukatā nāma
atk-abh03a:1078_2: maraṇaṃ. Taṃsaṃvattaniyañca kammaṃ atthi. Tasmā jarāmaraṇaṃ vipākoti laddhi, seyyathāpi
atk-abh03a:1078_3: andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Paṭilomapañhe anārammaṇanti
atk-abh03a:1078_4: rūpadhammānaṃ tāva anārammaṇameva, arūpānaṃ pana jarāmaraṇaṃ sampayogalakkhaṇābhāvā anārammaṇameva.
atk-abh03a:1079_0: 496. Akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ vipākoti pañhe jarāmaraṇena
atk-abh03a:1079_1: nāma aniṭṭhavipākena bhavitabbanti laddhiyā paṭijānāti. Teneva kāraṇena kusalānaṃ
atk-abh03a:1079_2: dhammānaṃ jarāmaraṇassa kusalavipākataṃ paṭikkhipati. Parato cassa akusalavipākataññeva paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1080_0: Kusalānañca akusalānañcāti pucchāvasena ekato kataṃ, ekakkhaṇe pana taṃ natthi. Abyākatānaṃ
atk-abh03a:1080_1: avipākānaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ vipākoti vattabbatāya pariyāyo natthi, tasmā abyākatavasena pucchā na katā.
atk-abh03a:1081_0: 497. Dubbaṇṇasaṃvattaniyanti ettha dubbaṇṇiyaṃ nāma aparisuddhavaṇṇatā. Appāyukatā
atk-abh03a:1081_1: nāma āyuno ciraṃ pavattituṃ asamatthatā. Tattha akusalakammaṃ kammasamuṭṭhānassa
atk-abh03a:1081_2: dubbaṇṇarūpassa kammapaccayo hoti, asadisattā panassa taṃvipāko na hoti. Utusamuṭṭhānādino
atk-abh03a:1081_3: pana taṃpaṭilābhavasena āyuno ca upacchedakavasena paccayo hoti. Evametaṃ pariyāyena
atk-abh03a:1081_4: taṃsaṃvattanikaṃ nāma hoti, na vipākaphassādīnaṃ viya janakavasena, tasmā vipākabhāve
atk-abh03a:1084_0: 498. Idāni ariyadhammavipākakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ kilesappahānamattameva
atk-abh03a:1084_1: sāmaññaphalaṃ, na cittacetasikā dhammāti laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya
atk-abh03a:1084_2: natthi ariyadhammavipākoti pucchā sakavādissa. Tattha ariyadhammavipākoti maggasaṅkhātassa
atk-abh03a:1084_3: ariyadhammassa vipāko. Kilesakkhayamattaṃ ariyaphalanti laddhiyā paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a:1084_4: Sāmaññanti samaṇabhāvo, maggassetaṃ nāmaṃ. “Sāmaññañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi sāmaññaphalañcā”ti
atk-abh03a:1085_0: Sotāpattiphalaṃ na vipākotiādīsu sotāpattimaggādīnaṃ apacayagāmitaṃ sandhāya ariyaphalānaṃ
atk-abh03a:1085_1: navipākabhāvaṃ paṭijānāti, dānaphalādīnaṃ paṭikkhipati. So hi ācayagāmittikassa evaṃ
atk-abh03a:1085_2: atthaṃ dhāreti – vipākasaṅkhātaṃ ācayaṃ gacchanti, taṃ vā ācinantā gacchantīti ācayagāmino,
atk-abh03a:1085_3: vipākaṃ apacinantā gacchantīti apacayagāminoti. Tasmā evaṃ paṭijānāti ca paṭikkhipati ca.
atk-abh03a:1086_0: 500. Kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ savipākaṃ ācayagāmītiādikā pucchā paravādissa, paṭiññā ca
atk-abh03a:1086_1: paṭikkhepo ca sakavādissa. Lokiyañhi kusalaṃ vipākacutipaṭisandhiyo ceva vaṭṭañca
atk-abh03a:1086_2: ācinantaṃ gacchatīti ācayagāmi. Lokuttarakusalaṃ cutipaṭisandhiyo ceva vaṭṭañca apacinantaṃ
atk-abh03a:1086_3: gacchatīti apacayagāmi. Evametaṃ savipākameva hoti, na apacayagāmivacanamattena avipākaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1086_4: Imamatthaṃ sandhāyettha sakavādino paṭiññā ca paṭikkhepo ca veditabbāti.
atk-abh03a:1089_0: 501. Idāni vipāko vipākadhammadhammotikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā vipāko vipākassa
atk-abh03a:1089_1: aññamaññādipaccayavasena paccayo hoti, tasmā vipākopi vipākadhammadhammoti yesaṃ
atk-abh03a:1089_2: laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a:1089_3: Tassa vipākoti tassa vipākadhammadhammassa vipākassa yo vipāko, sopi te vipākadhammadhammo
atk-abh03a:1089_4: hotīti pucchati. Itaro āyatiṃ vipākadānābhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho
atk-abh03a:1089_5: tappaccayāpi aññassa vipākassa uppattiṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Evaṃ sante panassa kusalākusalassa
atk-abh03a:1089_6: viya tassāpi vipākassa vipāko, tassāpi vipākoti vaṭṭānupacchedo āpajjatīti puṭṭho
atk-abh03a:1090_0: Vipākoti vātiādimhi vacanasādhane pana yadi vipākassa vipākadhammadhammena ekatthatā
atk-abh03a:1090_1: bhaveyya, kusalākusalabyākatānaṃ ekatthataṃ āpajjeyyāti paṭikkhipati. Vipāko ca vipākadhammadhammo
atk-abh03a:1090_2: cāti ettha ayaṃ adhippāyo – so hi catūsu vipākakkhandhesu ekekaṃ aññamaññapaccayādīsu
atk-abh03a:1090_3: paccayaṭṭhena vipākadhammadhammataṃ paccayuppannaṭṭhena ca vipākaṃ maññamāno “vipāko
atk-abh03a:1090_4: vipākadhammadhammo”ti puṭṭho āmantāti paṭijānāti. Atha naṃ sakavādī “yasmā tayā ekakkhaṇe
atk-abh03a:1090_5: catūsu khandhesu vipāko vipākadhammadhammopi anuññāto, tasmā tesaṃ sahagatādibhāvo
atk-abh03a:1090_6: āpajjatī”ti codetuṃ evamāha. Itaro kusalākusalasaṅkhātaṃ vipākadhammadhammaṃ sandhāya
atk-abh03a:1090_7: paṭikkhipati. Taññeva akusalanti yadi te vipāko vipākadhammadhammo, yo akusalavipāko,
atk-abh03a:1090_8: so akusalaṃ āpajjati. Kasmā? Vipākadhammadhammena ekattā. Taññeva kusalantiādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a:1091: 502. Aññamaññapaccayāti idaṃ sahajātānaṃ paccayamattavasena vuttaṃ, tasmā asādhakaṃ. Mahābhūtānampi ca aññamaññapaccayatā vuttā, na ca tāni vipākāni, na ca vipākadhammadhammānīti.
atk-abh03a:1096_0: 503-504. Idāni chagatikathā nāma hoti. Tattha asurakāyena saddhiṃ chagatiyoti yesaṃ
atk-abh03a:1096_1: laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānañceva uttarāpathakānañca; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1096_2: paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ sakavādī “pañca kho panimā, sāriputta, gatiyo”ti lomahaṃsanapariyāye
atk-abh03a:1096_3: paricchinnānaṃ gatīnaṃ vasena codetuṃ nanu pañca gatiyotiādimāha. Itaro suttavirodhabhayena
atk-abh03a:1096_4: paṭijānāti. Kasmā pana sakavādī cha gatiyo na sampaṭicchati, nanu “catūhāpāyehi ca
atk-abh03a:1096_5: vippamutto”ti ettha asurakāyopi gahitoti. Saccaṃ gahito, na panesā gati. Kasmā? Visuṃ
atk-abh03a:1096_6: abhāvato. Asurakāyasmiñhi kālakañcikā asurā petagatiyā saṅgahitā, vepacittiparisā
atk-abh03a:1096_7: devagatiyā, asurakāyoti visuṃ ekā gati nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a:1097_0: Idāni etameva atthaṃ dassetuṃ nanu kālakañcikātiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha samānavaṇṇāti
atk-abh03a:1097_1: sadisarūpasaṇṭhānā bībhacchā virūpā duddassikā. Samānabhogāti sadisamethunasamācārā.
atk-abh03a:1097_3: Āvāhavivāhanti kaññāgahaṇañceva kaññādānañca. Sukkapakkhe samānavaṇṇāti sadisarūpasaṇṭhānā
atk-abh03a:1097_4: abhirūpā pāsādikā dassanīyā pabhāsampannā. Samānabhogāti sadisapañcakaāmaguṇabhogā.
atk-abh03a:1097_5: Samānāhārāti sadisasudhābhojanādiāhārā. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Nanu atthi asurakāyoti
atk-abh03a:1097_6: idaṃ asurakāyasseva sādhakaṃ. Tassa pana visuṃ gatiparicchedābhāvena na gatisādhakanti.
atk-abh03a:1100_0: 505. Idāni antarābhavakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ “antarā parinibbāyī”ti suttapadaṃ
atk-abh03a:1100_1: ayoniso gahetvā “antarābhavo nāma atthi, yattha satto dibbacakkhuko viya adibbacakkhuko,
atk-abh03a:1100_2: iddhimā viya aniddhimā mātāpitisamāgamañceva utusamayañca olokayamāno sattāhaṃ vā
atk-abh03a:1100_3: atirekasattāhaṃ vā tiṭṭhatī”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi pubbaseliyānañceva sammitiyānañca;
atk-abh03a:1100_4: te sandhāya atthīti pucchā sakavādissa, laddhiyaṃ ṭhatvā paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ
atk-abh03a:1100_5: ye ca bhagavatā tayo bhavā vuttā, tesaṃ vasena codetuṃ kāmabhavotiādimāha. Tatrāyaṃ
atk-abh03a:1100_6: adhippāyo – yadi te antarābhavo nāma koci bhavo atthi, tena kāmabhavādīnaṃyeva aññatarena
atk-abh03a:1100_7: bhavitabbaṃ pañcavokārabhavādinā viya, tena taṃ pucchāmi – “kiṃ te ayaṃ antarābhavo
atk-abh03a:1100_8: nāma kāmabhavo, udāhu rūpabhavo arūpabhavo vā”ti? Itaro tathā anicchanto sabbaṃ paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1100_9: Kāmabhavassa cātiādi yadi antarābhavo nāma atthi, imesaṃ bhavānaṃ antarā dvinnaṃ
atk-abh03a:1100_10: sīmānaṃ sīmantarikā viya bhaveyyāti codetuṃ āraddhaṃ. Paravādī pana tathā anicchanto
atk-abh03a:1100_11: sabbapañhe paṭikkhipati kevalaṃ laddhiyā, na sahadhammena. Teneva naṃ sakavādī ‘no
atk-abh03a:1101_0: 506. Pañcamī sā yonītiādīnipi yathāparicchinnayoniādīsu so samodhānaṃ na gacchati,
atk-abh03a:1101_1: atha tena tato tato atirekena bhavitabbanti codetuṃ vuttāni. Antarābhavūpagaṃ kammanti
atk-abh03a:1101_2: yadi sopi eko bhavo, yathā kāmabhavūpagādīni kammāni atthīti satthārā vibhajitvā
atk-abh03a:1101_3: dassitāni, evaṃ tadupagenāpi kammena bhavitabbanti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana
atk-abh03a:1101_4: parasamaye antarābhavūpagaṃ nāma pāṭiyekkaṃ kammaṃ natthi, yaṃ yaṃ bhavaṃ upapajjissati,
atk-abh03a:1101_5: tadupageneva kammena antarābhave nibbattatīti tesaṃ laddhi, tasmā ‘naheva’nti paṭikkhittaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1101_6: Atthi antarābhavūpagā sattāti puṭṭhopi kāmabhavūpagāyeva nāma teti laddhiyā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1101_7: Jāyantītiādīni puṭṭhopi tattha jātijarāmaraṇāni ceva cutipaṭisandhiparamparañca anicchanto
atk-abh03a:1101_8: paṭikkhipati. Rūpādivasena puṭṭhopi yasmā antarābhavasattassa anidassanaṃ rūpaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1101_9: vedanādayopi aññesaṃ viya na oḷārikāti tassa laddhi, tasmā paṭikkhipati. Imināva
atk-abh03a:1102_0: 507. Idāni kāmabhavo bhavo gatītiādi bhavasaṃsandanaṃ nāma hoti. Tatrāyaṃ adhippāyo
atk-abh03a:1102_1: – yadi te antarābhavo nāma koci bhavo bhaveyya, yathā kāmabhavādīsu bhavagatiādibhedo
atk-abh03a:1102_2: labbhati, tathā tatrāpi labbhetha. Yathā vā tattha na labbhati, tathā imesupi na
atk-abh03a:1102_3: labbhetha. Samānasmiñhi bhavabhāve etesvevesa vibhāgo atthi, na itarasminti ko ettha
atk-abh03a:1102_4: visesahetūti. Itaro puna laddhimattavasena taṃ taṃ paṭijānāti ceva paṭikkhipati ca.
atk-abh03a:1103_0: 508. Sabbesaññeva sattānaṃ atthi antarābhavoti puṭṭho yasmā nirayūpagaasaññasattūpagaarūpūpagānaṃ
atk-abh03a:1103_1: antarābhavaṃ na icchati, tasmā paṭikkhipati. Teneva kāraṇena paṭilome paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1103_2: Ānantariyassātiādi yesaṃ so antarābhavaṃ na icchati, te tāva vibhajitvā dassetuṃ
atk-abh03a:1103_3: vuttaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ pāḷianusāreneva veditabbaṃ saddhiṃ suttasādhanenāti.
atk-abh03a:1106_0: 510. Idāni kāmaguṇakathā nāma hoti. Tattha sakasamaye tāva kāmadhātūti vatthukāmāpi
atk-abh03a:1106_1: vuccanti – kilesakāmāpi kāmabhavopi. Etesu hi vatthukāmā kamanīyaṭṭhena kāmā, sabhāvanissattasuññataṭṭhena
atk-abh03a:1106_2: dhātūti kāmadhātu. Kilesakāmā kamanīyaṭṭhena ceva kamanaṭṭhena ca kāmā, yathāvuttenevatthena
atk-abh03a:1106_3: dhātūti kāmadhātu. Kāmabhavo kamanīyaṭṭhena kamanaṭṭhena vatthukāmapavattidesaṭṭhenāti
atk-abh03a:1106_4: tīhi kāraṇehi kāmo, yathāvuttenevatthena dhātūti kāmadhātu. Parasamaye pana – “pañcime,
atk-abh03a:1106_5: bhikkhave, kāmaguṇā”ti vacanamattaṃ nissāya pañceva kāmaguṇā kāmadhātūti gahitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1106_6: Tasmā yesaṃ ayaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi pubbaseliyānaṃ; te sandhāya kāmadhātunānattaṃ
atk-abh03a:1106_7: bodhetuṃ pañcevāti pucchā sakavādissa, laddhivasena paṭiññā itarassa. Nanu atthītiādi
atk-abh03a:1106_8: kilesakāmadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha tappaṭisaṃyuttoti kāmaguṇapaṭisaṃyutto, kāmaguṇārammaṇoti
atk-abh03a:1106_9: attho. No ca vata re vattabbe pañcevāti imesu tappaṭisaṃyuttachandādīsu sati pañceva
atk-abh03a:1106_10: kāmaguṇā kāmadhātūti na vattabbaṃ. Etepi hi chandādayo kamanīyaṭṭhena kāmā ca dhātu
atk-abh03a:1106_11: cātipi kāmadhātu. Kamanaṭṭhena kāmasaṅkhātā dhātūtipi kāmadhātūti attho.
atk-abh03a:1107_0: Manussānaṃ cakkhuntiādi vatthukāmadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha paravādī channampi
atk-abh03a:1107_1: āyatanānaṃ vatthukāmabhāvena nakāmadhātubhāvaṃ paṭikkhipitvā puna manoti puṭṭho mahaggatalokuttaraṃ
atk-abh03a:1107_2: sandhāya nakāmadhātubhāvaṃ paṭijānāti. Yasmā pana sabbopi tebhūmakamano kāmadhātuyeva,
atk-abh03a:1108_0: 511. Kāmaguṇā bhavotiādi bhavassa kāmadhātubhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana kāmaguṇamatte
atk-abh03a:1108_1: bhavoti vohāro natthi, tasmā paravādī nahevāti paṭikkhipati. Kāmaguṇūpagaṃ kammantiādi
atk-abh03a:1108_3: hi kammaṃ atthi, kāmabhavūpagā eva ca sattā honti. Tattha jāyanti jiyanti miyanti
atk-abh03a:1108_4: cavanti upapajjanti, na kāmaguṇesūti iminā upāyena sabbattha attho veditabboti.
atk-abh03a:1111_0: 513-514. Idāni kāmakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ “pañcime, bhikkhave, kāmaguṇā”ti
atk-abh03a:1111_1: vacanamattaṃ nissāya rūpāyatanādīni pañcevāyatanāni kāmāti laddhi, seyyathāpi pubbaseliyānaṃ;
atk-abh03a:1111_2: tesaṃ kilesakāmasseva nippariyāyena kāmabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ pañcevāti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1114_0: 515-516. Idāni rūpadhātukathā nāma hoti. Tattha “rūpino dhammā rūpadhātu nāmā”ti
atk-abh03a:1114_1: yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya rūpinoti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā
atk-abh03a:1114_2: itarassa. Atha naṃ sakavādī yasmā rūpadhātu nāma rūpabhavo, na rūpamattameva, tasmā
atk-abh03a:1114_3: tenatthena codetuṃ rūpadhātūtiādimāha. Taṃ sabbaṃ kāmaguṇakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva
atk-abh03a:1114_4: veditabbaṃ. Sāva kāmadhātūti puṭṭho bhūmiparicchedena virodhaṃ passamāno paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1114_5: Puna daḷhaṃ katvā puṭṭho attano laddhivasena paṭijānāti. Evaṃ sante pana dvīhi bhavehi
atk-abh03a:1114_6: samannāgatatā āpajjati, tena taṃ sakavādī kāmabhavena cāti ādimāha. Itaro ekassa
atk-abh03a:1117_0: 517-518. Arūpadhātukathāyapi imināvupāyena attho veditabbo. Arūpadhammesu pana vedanākkhandhameva
atk-abh03a:1117_1: gahetvā vedanā bhavotiādinā nayenettha desanā katā. Tattha kiṃ te arūpino dhammāti
atk-abh03a:1117_2: saṅkhaṃ gatā vedanādīsu aññatarā hotīti evamattho daṭṭhabbo. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
atk-abh03a:1120_0: 519. Idāni rūpadhātuyā āyatanakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ “rūpī manomayo sabbaṅgapaccaṅgī
atk-abh03a:1120_1: ahīnindriyo”ti suttaṃ nissāya brahmakāyikānaṃ ghānādinimittānipi āyatanānevāti kappetvā
atk-abh03a:1120_2: saḷāyataniko tesaṃ attabhāvoti laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānañceva sammitiyānañca;
atk-abh03a:1120_3: te sandhāya saḷāyatanikoti pucchā sakavādissa, laddhivasena paṭiññā itarassa. Atha
atk-abh03a:1120_4: naṃ yaṃ tattha āyatanaṃ natthi, tassa vasena codetuṃ atthi tattha ghānāyatanantiādi
atk-abh03a:1120_5: āraddhaṃ. Tato paravādī yaṃ tattha ajjhattikānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ āyatanānaṃ ghānādikaṃ saṇṭhānanimittaṃ
atk-abh03a:1120_6: tadeva āyatananti laddhiyā paṭijānāti. Bāhirānaṃ gandhāyatanādīnaṃ vasena puṭṭho
atk-abh03a:1120_7: ghānappasādādayo tattha na icchati, tasmā tesaṃ gocaraṃ paṭisedhento paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1121_0: 521. Atthi tattha ghānāyatanaṃ atthi gandhāyatanaṃ tena ghānena taṃ gandhaṃ ghāyatīti
atk-abh03a:1121_1: tasmiṃyeva parasamaye ekacce ācariye sandhāya vuttaṃ. Te kira tattha cha ajjhattikāni
atk-abh03a:1121_2: āyatanāni paripuṇṇāni icchanti, āyatanena ca nāma sakiccakena bhavitabbanti tehi
atk-abh03a:1121_3: ghānādīhi te gandhādayo ghāyanti sāyanti phusantītipi icchanti. Taṃ laddhiṃ sandhāya
atk-abh03a:1122_0: 522. Atthi tattha mūlagandhotiādīni pana puṭṭho atthibhāvaṃ sādhetuṃ asakkonto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1122_1: Nanu atthi tattha ghānanimittantiādi saṇṭhānamattasseva sādhakaṃ, na āyatanassa,
atk-abh03a:1125_0: 524-526. Idāni arūpe rūpakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ “viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpa”nti
atk-abh03a:1125_1: vacanato āruppabhavepi oḷārikarūpā nissaṭaṃ sukhumarūpaṃ atthīti laddhi, seyyathāpi
atk-abh03a:1125_2: andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya atthi rūpanti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a:1128_0: 527-537. Idāni rūpaṃ kammantikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ kāyavacīviññattisaṅkhātaṃ
atk-abh03a:1128_1: rūpameva kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma, tañca kusalasamuṭṭhānaṃ kusalaṃ, akusalasamuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh03a:1128_2: akusalanti laddhi, seyyathāpi mahisāsakānañceva sammitiyānañca; te sandhāya kusalena
atk-abh03a:1128_3: cittena samuṭṭhitanti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ sace taṃ kusalaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1128_4: yvāyaṃ sārammaṇādibhedo kusalassa labbhati, atthi te so tassāti codetuṃ sārammaṇantiādi
atk-abh03a:1128_5: āraddhaṃ. Tattha patthanā paṇidhīti cetanāyevetaṃ vevacanaṃ. Kusalacetanāyeva hi
atk-abh03a:1128_6: pakappayamānā patthanāti. Pakappanavasena ṭhitattā paṇidhīti ca vuccati. Parato pana
atk-abh03a:1128_7: kusalena cittena samuṭṭhitā vedanā saññā cetanā saddhātiādīsu vedanādīnaññeva cettha
atk-abh03a:1128_8: patthanā paṇidhīti labbhati, na cetanāya. Kasmā? Dvinnaṃ cetanānaṃ ekato abhāvā,
atk-abh03a:1128_9: sotapatitattā pana evaṃ tanti gatāti veditabbā. Rūpāyatanantiādi purimavāre “sabbantaṃ
atk-abh03a:1128_10: kusala”nti saṃkhittassa pabhedadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Sesā saṃsandananayā, vacīkammakathā
atk-abh03a:1128_12: Asucīti panettha sukkaṃ adhippetaṃ. Suttasādhanaṃ uttānatthameva.
atk-abh03a:1131_0: 540. Idāni jīvitindriyakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ nāma cittavippayutto
atk-abh03a:1131_1: arūpadhammo, tasmā rūpajīvitindriyaṃ natthīti laddhi, seyyathāpi pubbaseliyānañceva
atk-abh03a:1131_2: sammitiyānañca; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Natthi rūpīnaṃ
atk-abh03a:1131_3: dhammānaṃ āyūti pañhe upādinnarūpānampi tiṇakaṭṭhādīnampi santānavasena pavattimeva
atk-abh03a:1131_4: āyu ṭhiti yapanā yāpanā iriyanā vattanā pālanāti icchati, tasmā paṭikkhipati. Atthīti
atk-abh03a:1131_5: pañhepi iminā kāraṇena paṭijānāti. Atthi arūpajīvitindriyanti pañhe arūpadhammānaṃ
atk-abh03a:1131_6: cittavippayuttaṃ jīvitindriyasantānaṃ nāma atthīti icchati, tasmā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1132: 541. Rūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ āyu arūpajīvitindriyanti pañhe sattasantāne rūpino vā hontu arūpino vā, sabbesaṃ cittavippayuttaṃ arūpajīvitindriyameva icchati, tasmā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1133_1: ca paṭijānāti ca. Sakavādī pana taṃ asampaṭicchanto yaṃ arūpapavatte asati atthi,
atk-abh03a:1133_2: rūpena tena bhavitabbanti codetuṃ hañcītiādimāha. Saṅkhārakkhandhapañhe phassādisaṅkhārakkhandhaṃ
atk-abh03a:1133_3: sandhāya paṭikkhipati, kāyakammādisaṅkhārakkhandhaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Kāyaviññatti
atk-abh03a:1133_4: vacīviññatti sammāvācā sammākammanto jīvitindriyanti evamādayopi dhammā saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannātissa
atk-abh03a:1133_5: laddhi. Sakavādī pana taṃ asampaṭicchanto yadi niruddhepi arūpapavatte saṅkhārakkhandho
atk-abh03a:1133_6: atthi, catunnampi khandhānaṃ atthitā hotūti codetuṃ atthi vedanākkhandhoti ādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1133_7: Itaro antosamāpattiṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati, samāpajjantassa ca vuṭṭhahantassa ca
atk-abh03a:1134_0: 543. Asaññasattavārepi eseva nayo. Tassa hi laddhiyā asaññasattānaṃ paṭisandhikāle
atk-abh03a:1134_1: cittaṃ uppajjitvā nirujjhati, tena saha cittavippayuttaarūpajīvitindriyaṃ uppajjitvā
atk-abh03a:1134_2: yāvatāyukaṃ pavattati. Tasmā tesaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ natthīti puṭṭho paṭikkhipati, atthīti
atk-abh03a:1134_3: puṭṭho paṭijānāti. Vedanākkhandhādayopi tesaṃ pavattivasena paṭikkhipati, cutipaṭisandhivasena
atk-abh03a:1134_4: paṭijānāti. Sakavādī pana taṃ anicchanto “sace tattha ekakkhaṇepi vedanādayo atthi,
atk-abh03a:1134_5: pañcavokārabhavattaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti codetuṃ pañcavokārabhavoti āha. Itaro suttavirodhabhayā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1135_0: 544-545. Ekadesaṃ bhijjatīti pañhe sampayuttaṃ bhijjati, vippayuttaṃ tiṭṭhatīti tassa
atk-abh03a:1135_1: laddhi, tasmā paṭijānāti. Dve jīvitindriyānīti pucchā paravādissa, paṭiññā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:1135_2: Rūpārūpavasena hi dve jīvitindriyāni, tehiyeva satto jīvati, tesaṃ bhaṅgena maratīti
atk-abh03a:1135_3: vuccati. Cutikkhaṇasmiñhi dvepi jīvitāni saheva bhijjanti.
atk-abh03a:1138_0: 546. Idāni kammahetukathā nāma hoti. Tattha yena arahatā purimabhave arahā abbhācikkhitapubbo,
atk-abh03a:1138_1: so tassa kammassa hetu arahattā parihāyatīti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi pubbaseliyānañceva
atk-abh03a:1138_2: sammitiyānañca; te sandhāya kammahetūti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesaṃ
atk-abh03a:1139_0: Handa hi arahantānaṃ abbhācikkhatīti idaṃ yassa kammassa hetu parihāyati, taṃ sampaṭicchāpetuṃ
atk-abh03a:1139_1: vadati. Atha naṃ sakavādī taṃ pakkhaṃ paṭijānāpetvā “yadi evaṃ yehi arahanto na abbhācikkhitapubbā,
atk-abh03a:1139_2: te sabbe arahattaṃ pāpuṇeyyu”nti codetuṃ ye kecītiādimāha. Itaro tassa kammassa arahattaṃ
atk-abh03a:1144_0: 547. Idāni ānisaṃsadassāvīkathā nāma hoti. Tattha sakasamaye saṅkhāre ādīnavato nibbānañca
atk-abh03a:1144_1: ānisaṃsato passantassa saṃyojanappahānaṃ hotīti nicchayo. Yesaṃ pana tesu dvīsupi
atk-abh03a:1144_2: ekaṃsikavādaṃ gahetvā “ānisaṃsadassāvinova saṃyojanappahānaṃ hotī”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi
atk-abh03a:1144_3: andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Athassa “ekaṃsikavādo
atk-abh03a:1144_4: tayā gahito, ādīnavopi daṭṭhabboyevā”ti vibhāgadassanatthaṃ sakavādī saṅkhāretiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1145_0: Saṅkhāre ca aniccato manasikaroti, nibbāne ca ānisaṃsadassāvī hotīti pañhasmiṃ ayamadhippāyo
atk-abh03a:1145_1: – ānisaṃsadassāvissa saṃyojanānaṃ pahānaṃ hotīti tesaṃ laddhi. Nanu saṅkhāre aniccato
atk-abh03a:1145_2: manasikaroto saṃyojanā pahīyantīti ca puṭṭho āmantāti paṭijānāti. Tena te saṅkhāre
atk-abh03a:1145_3: ca aniccato manasikaroti, nibbāne ca ānisaṃsadassāvī hotīti idaṃ āpajjati, kiṃ sampaṭicchasi
atk-abh03a:1145_4: etanti. Tato paravādī ekacittakkhaṇaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati, dutiyaṃ puṭṭho nānācittavasena
atk-abh03a:1145_5: paṭijānāti. Sakavādī panassa adhippāyaṃ madditvā aniccamanasikārassa ānisaṃsadassāvitāya
atk-abh03a:1145_6: ca ekato paṭiññātattā dvinnaṃ phassānaṃ dvinnaṃ cittānaṃ samodhānaṃ hotīti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:1145_7: Itaro dvinnaṃ samodhānaṃ apassanto paṭikkhipati. Dukkhatotiādipañhesupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a:1145_8: Kiṃ panettha sanniṭṭhānaṃ, kiṃ aniccādito manasikaroto saṃyojanā pahīyanti, udāhu
atk-abh03a:1145_9: nibbāne ānisaṃsadassāvissa, udāhu dvepi ekato karontassāti. Yadi tāva aniccādito
atk-abh03a:1145_10: manasikaroto pahānaṃ bhaveyya, vipassanācitteneva bhaveyya. Atha ānisaṃsadassāvino,
atk-abh03a:1145_11: anussavavasena nibbāne ānisaṃsaṃ passantassa vipassanācitteneva bhaveyya, atha dvepi
atk-abh03a:1145_12: ekato karontassa bhaveyya, dvinnaṃ phassādīnaṃ samodhānaṃ bhaveyya. Yasmā pana ariyamaggakkhaṇe
atk-abh03a:1145_13: aniccādimanasikārassa kiccaṃ nipphattiṃ gacchati puna niccatotiādigahaṇassa anuppattidhammabhāvato,
atk-abh03a:1145_14: nibbāne ca paccakkhatova ānisaṃsadassanaṃ ijjhati, tasmā kiccanipphattivasena aniccādito
atk-abh03a:1145_15: manasikaroto ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattivasena ca nibbāne ānisaṃsadassāvissa saṃyojanānaṃ
atk-abh03a:1146: 548. Nibbāne sukhānupassīti suttaṃ nibbāne sukhānupassanādibhāvameva sādheti, na ānisaṃsadassāvitāmattena saṃyojanānaṃ pahānaṃ. Tasmā ābhatampi anābhatasadisamevāti.
atk-abh03a:1149_0: 549. Idāni amatārammaṇakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ “nibbānaṃ maññatī”tiādīnaṃ ayoniso
atk-abh03a:1149_1: atthaṃ gahetvā amatārammaṇaṃ saṃyojanaṃ hotīti laddhi, seyyathāpi pubbaseliyānaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1149_2: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ sace amatārammaṇaṃ saṃyojanaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1149_3: amatassa saṃyojaniyādibhāvo āpajjatīti codetuṃ amataṃ saṃyojaniyantiādimāha. Itaro
atk-abh03a:1149_4: suttavirodhabhayena sabbaṃ paṭikkhipati. Iminā upāyena sabbavāresu attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:1149_5: Nibbānaṃ nibbānatoti āhaṭasuttaṃ pana diṭṭhadhammanibbānaṃ sandhāya bhāsitaṃ, tasmā asādhakanti.
atk-abh03a:1152_0: 552-553. Idāni rūpaṃ sārammaṇantikathā nāma hoti. Tattha rūpaṃ sappaccayaṭṭhena sārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh03a:1152_1: nāma hoti, na aññaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karotīti ārammaṇapaccayavasena. Yesaṃ pana avisesena
atk-abh03a:1152_2: rūpaṃ sārammaṇanti laddhi, seyyathāpi uttarāpathakānaṃ; te sandhāya ārammaṇatthassa
atk-abh03a:1152_3: vibhāgadassanatthaṃ pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamettha pāḷianusāreneva
atk-abh03a:1152_4: veditabbaṃ. Na vattabbanti pañhe olubbhārammaṇaṃ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādissa. Dutiyapañhepi
atk-abh03a:1152_5: paccayārammaṇaṃ sandhāya paṭiññā tasseva. Iti sappaccayaṭṭhenevettha sārammaṇatā siddhāti.
atk-abh03a:1155_0: 554-556. Idāni anusayā anārammaṇātikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ anusayā nāma cittavippayuttā
atk-abh03a:1155_1: ahetukā abyākatā, teneva ca anārammaṇāti laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānañceva ekaccānañca
atk-abh03a:1155_2: uttarāpathakānaṃ; te sandhāya anusayāti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha
atk-abh03a:1155_3: naṃ anārammaṇena nāma evaṃvidhena bhavitabbanti codetuṃ rūpantiādimāha. Kāmarāgotiādi
atk-abh03a:1155_4: kāmarāgānusayato anaññattā dassitaṃ. Saṅkhārakkhandho anārammaṇoti pañhe cittasampayuttasaṅkhārakkhandhaṃ
atk-abh03a:1155_5: sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Anusayaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ kāyakammādirūpañca saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1155_6: taṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Imināvupāyena sabbavāresu attho veditabbo. Sānusayoti pañhe
atk-abh03a:1155_7: pana appahīnānusayattā sānusayatā anuññātā. Na anusayānaṃ pavattisabbhāvā. Yo hi
atk-abh03a:1155_8: appahīno, na so atīto, nānāgato, na paccuppanno ca. Maggavajjhakileso panesa appahīnattāva
atk-abh03a:1155_9: atthīti vuccati. Evarūpassa ca idaṃ nāma ārammaṇanti na vattabbaṃ. Tasmā taṃ paṭikkhittaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1155_10: Taṃ panetaṃ na kevalaṃ anusayassa, rāgādīnampi tādisameva, tasmā anusayānaṃ anārammaṇatāsādhakaṃ na hotīti.
atk-abh03a:1158_0: 557-558. Idāni ñāṇaṃ anārammaṇantikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā arahā cakkhuviññāṇasamaṅgī
atk-abh03a:1158_1: ñāṇīti vuccati, tassa ñāṇassa tasmiṃ khaṇe ārammaṇaṃ natthi, tasmā ñāṇaṃ anārammaṇanti
atk-abh03a:1158_2: yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a:1161_0: 559-561. Idāni atītānāgatārammaṇakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā atītānāgatārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh03a:1161_1: nāma natthi, tasmā tadārammaṇena cittena ārammaṇassa natthitāya anārammaṇena bhavitabbanti
atk-abh03a:1161_2: atītaṃ anārammaṇanti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi uttarāpathakānaṃ, te sandhāya atītārammaṇanti
atk-abh03a:1161_3: pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamettha yathāpāḷimeva niyyātīti.
atk-abh03a:1164_0: 562. Idāni vitakkānupatitakathā nāma hoti. Tattha vitakkānupatitā nāma duvidhā –
atk-abh03a:1164_1: ārammaṇato ca sampayogato ca. Tattha asukacittaṃ nāma vitakkassārammaṇaṃ na hotīti
atk-abh03a:1164_2: niyamābhāvato siyā sabbaṃ cittaṃ vitakkānupatitaṃ, vitakkavippayuttacittasabbhāvato
atk-abh03a:1164_3: pana na sabbaṃ cittaṃ vitakkānupatitaṃ. Iti imaṃ vibhāgaṃ akatvā aviseseneva sabbaṃ
atk-abh03a:1164_4: cittaṃ vitakkānupatitanti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi uttarāpathakānaṃ, te sandhāya
atk-abh03a:1164_5: pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamettha pāḷivaseneva niyyātīti.
atk-abh03a:1167_0: 563. Idāni vitakkavipphārasaddakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā “vitakkavicārā vacīsaṅkhārā”ti
atk-abh03a:1167_1: vuttā, tasmā sabbaso vitakkayato vicārayato antamaso manodhātupavattikālepi vitakkavipphāro
atk-abh03a:1167_2: saddoyevāti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi pubbaseliyānaṃ; te sandhāya sabbasoti pucchā
atk-abh03a:1167_3: sakavādissa paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ yadi vitakkavipphāramattaṃ saddo, phassādivipphāropi
atk-abh03a:1167_4: saddo bhaveyyāti codetuṃ sabbaso phusayatotiādimāha. Itaro tādisaṃ suttalesaṃ apassanto
atk-abh03a:1167_5: paṭikkhipati. Vitakkavipphāro saddo sotaviññeyyoti vitakkassa vipphāramattameva saddoti
atk-abh03a:1167_6: katvā pucchati, na vitakkavipphārasamuṭṭhitaṃ suttapamattānaṃ saddaṃ, itaro paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1167_7: Nanu vitakkavipphārasaddo na sotaviññeyyoti idaṃ tasseva laddhiyā dasseti. So hi
atk-abh03a:1167_8: vitakkavipphāramattameva saddaṃ vadati, so na sotaviññeyyoti. Itaro pana “vitakkavipphārasaddaṃ
atk-abh03a:1167_9: sutvā ādisatī” ti vacanato sotaviññeyyovāti vadati.
atk-abh03a:1170_0: 564. Idāni nayathācittassa vācātikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā koci aññaṃ bhaṇissāmīti
atk-abh03a:1170_1: aññaṃ bhaṇati, tasmā nayathācittassa vācā cittānurūpā cittānugatikā na hoti, vināpi
atk-abh03a:1170_2: cittena pavattatīti yesaṃ laddhi; seyyathāpi pubbaseliyānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1170_3: paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ “yadi taṃsamuṭṭhāpakaṃ cittaṃ na siyā, phassādayopi tasmiṃ
atk-abh03a:1170_4: khaṇe na siyu”nti codetuṃ aphassakassātiādimāha. Na bhaṇitukāmotiādīsu yasmā aññaṃ
atk-abh03a:1170_5: bhaṇissāmīti aññaṃ bhaṇantopi bhaṇitukāmoyeva nāma hoti, tasmā na hevāti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1171_0: 565. Nanu atthi koci aññaṃ bhaṇissāmītiādīsu cīvaranti bhaṇitukāmo cīranti bhaṇeyya.
atk-abh03a:1171_1: Tattha aññaṃ bhaṇitukāmatācittaṃ, aññaṃ bhaṇanacittaṃ, iti pubbabhāgena cittena asadisattā
atk-abh03a:1171_2: ayathācitto nāma hoti, tenassa kevalaṃ anāpatti nāma hoti, na pana cīranti vacanasamuṭṭhāpakacittaṃ
atk-abh03a:1171_3: natthi, iti acittakā sā vācāti atthaṃ sandhāya iminā udāharaṇena “nayathācittassa
atk-abh03a:1174_0: 566-567. Idāni nayathācittassa kāyakammantikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā koci aññatra
atk-abh03a:1174_1: gacchissāmīti aññatra gacchati, tasmā nayathācittassa kāyakammaṃ cittānurūpaṃ cittānugatikaṃ
atk-abh03a:1174_2: na hoti, vināpi cittena pavattatīti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi pubbaseliyānaṃyeva,
atk-abh03a:1174_3: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamettha heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
atk-abh03a:1177_0: 568-570. Idāni atītānāgatehi samannāgatakathā nāma hoti. Tattha samannāgatapaññatti
atk-abh03a:1177_1: paṭilābhapaññattīti dve paññattiyo veditabbā. Tāsu paccuppannadhammasamaṅgī samannāgatoti
atk-abh03a:1177_2: vuccati. Aṭṭha samāpattilābhino pana samāpattiyo kiñcāpi na ekakkhaṇe pavattanti,
atk-abh03a:1177_3: aññā atītā honti, aññā anāgatā, aññā paccuppannā, paṭivijjhitvā aparihīnatāya pana
atk-abh03a:1177_4: lābhīti vuccati. Tattha yesaṃ imaṃ vibhāgaṃ aggahetvā yasmā jhānalābhīnaṃ atītānāgatāni
atk-abh03a:1177_5: jhānānipi atthi, tasmā “te atītenapi anāgatenapi samannāgatā”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi
atk-abh03a:1177_6: andhakānaṃ. Te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a:1182_0: 571-572. Idāni nirodhakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ “upapattesiyanti saṅkhaṃ gatassa
atk-abh03a:1182_1: bhavaṅgacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇena saheva kiriyāti saṅkhaṃ gatā kusalā vā akusalā vā
atk-abh03a:1182_2: cattāro khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānarūpañcāti pañcakkhandhā uppajjanti. Tesu hi anuppannesu
atk-abh03a:1182_3: bhavaṅge niruddhe santativicchedo bhaveyyā”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya
atk-abh03a:1182_4: upapattesiyeti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Tattha upapattesiyeti catūsupi
atk-abh03a:1182_5: padesu bahuvacanabhummatthe ekavacanabhummaṃ. Upapattesiyesu pañcasu khandhesu aniruddhesūti
atk-abh03a:1182_6: ayañhettha attho. Dasannanti upapattesiyakhandhānañca kiriyakhandhānañca vasena vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1182_7: Tattha paṭhamapañhe khandhalakkhaṇavasena kiriyavasena ca pañceva nāma te khandhāti
atk-abh03a:1182_8: paṭikkhipati. Dutiyapañhe purimapacchimavasena upapattesiyakiriyavasena ca nānattaṃ
atk-abh03a:1182_9: sandhāya paṭijānāti. Dvinnaṃ pana phassānaṃ cittānañca samodhānaṃ puṭṭho suttalesābhāvena paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1183_0: Kiriyā cattāroti rūpena vinā kusalā akusalā vā cattāro gahitā. Kiriyāñāṇanti paravādinā
atk-abh03a:1183_1: cakkhuviññāṇasamaṅgikkhaṇe arahato anuññātaṃ anārammaṇañāṇaṃ. Niruddhe maggo uppajjatīti
atk-abh03a:1183_2: pucchā paravādissa, aniruddhe anuppajjanato paṭiññā sakavādissa. Mato maggaṃ bhāvetīti
atk-abh03a:1183_3: chalena pucchā paravādissa. Yasmā pana paṭisandhito yāva cuticittā satto jīvatiyeva
atk-abh03a:1183_4: nāma, tasmā sakavādī na hevanti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1186_0: 573-575. Idāni rūpaṃ maggotikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ “sammāvācākammantājīvā
atk-abh03a:1186_1: rūpa”nti laddhi, seyyathāpi mahisāsakasammitiyamahāsaṃghikānaṃ; te sandhāya maggasamaṅgissāti
atk-abh03a:1186_2: pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ “yadi te sammāvācādayo rūpaṃ, na viratiyo,
atk-abh03a:1186_3: yathā sammādiṭṭhādimaggo sārammaṇādisabhāvo, evaṃ tampi rūpaṃ siyā”ti codetuṃ sārammaṇotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1186_4: Tattha paṭikkhepo ca paṭiññā ca paravādino laddhianurūpena veditabbā. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a:1189_0: 576. Idāni pañcaviññāṇasamaṅgissa maggakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ “cakkhunā rūpaṃ
atk-abh03a:1189_1: disvā na nimittaggāhī hotī”ti suttaṃ nissāya “pañcaviññāṇasamaṅgissa atthi maggabhāvanā”ti
atk-abh03a:1189_2: laddhi, seyyathāpi mahāsaṃghikānaṃ, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a:1189_3: Atha naṃ “sace tassa maggabhāvanā atthi, pañcaviññāṇagatikena vā maggena, maggagatikehi
atk-abh03a:1189_4: vā pañcaviññāṇehi bhavitabbaṃ, na ca tāni maggagatikāni anibbānārammaṇattā alokuttarattā
atk-abh03a:1189_5: ca, na maggo pañcaviññāṇagatiko tesaṃ lakkhaṇena asaṅgahitattā”ti codetuṃ nanu pañcaviññāṇā
atk-abh03a:1189_6: uppannavatthukātiādimāha. Tatrāyaṃ adhippāyo – yadi pañcaviññāṇasamaṅgissa maggabhāvanā
atk-abh03a:1189_7: siyā, yena manoviññāṇena maggo sampayutto, tampi pañcaviññāṇasamaṅgissa siyā. Evaṃ
atk-abh03a:1189_8: sante yadidaṃ “pañcaviññāṇā uppannavatthukā”tiādi lakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ evaṃ avatvā
atk-abh03a:1189_9: “cha viññāṇā”ti vattabbaṃ siyā. Tathā pana avatvā “pañcaviññāṇā”tveva vuttaṃ, tasmā
atk-abh03a:1189_10: na vatabbaṃ “pañcaviññāṇasamaṅgissa atthi maggabhāvanā”ti. Yasmā cettha ayameva adhippāyo,
atk-abh03a:1189_11: tasmā sakavādī taṃ lakkhaṇaṃ paravādiṃ sampaṭicchāpetvā no ca vata re vattabbe pañcaviññāṇasamaṅgissa
atk-abh03a:1190_0: Aparo nayo – pañcaviññāṇā uppannavatthukā, maggo avatthukopi hoti. Te ca uppannārammaṇā,
atk-abh03a:1190_1: maggo navattabbārammaṇo. Te purejātavatthukāva maggo avatthukopi. Te purejātārammaṇā,
atk-abh03a:1190_2: maggo apurejātārammaṇo. Te ajjhattikavatthukāva maggo avatthukopi hoti. Te ca rūpādivasena
atk-abh03a:1190_3: bāhirārammaṇā, maggo nibbānārammaṇo. Te aniruddhaṃ vatthuṃ nissayaṃ katvā pavattanato
atk-abh03a:1190_4: asambhinnavatthukā, maggo avatthukopi. Te aniruddhāneva rūpādīni ārabbha pavattanato
atk-abh03a:1190_5: asambhinnārammaṇā, maggo nibbānārammaṇo. Te nānāvatthukā, maggo avatthuko vā ekavatthuko
atk-abh03a:1190_6: vā. Te nānārammaṇā maggo ekārammaṇo. Te attano attanova rūpādigocare pavattanato
atk-abh03a:1190_7: na aññamaññassa gocaravisayaṃ paccanubhonti, maggo rūpādīsu ekampi gocaraṃ na karoti.
atk-abh03a:1190_8: Te kiriyamanodhātuṃ purecārikaṃ katvā uppajjanato na asamannāhārā na amanasikārā
atk-abh03a:1190_9: uppajjanti, maggo nirāvajjanova. Te sampaṭicchanādīhi vokiṇṇā uppajjanti, maggassa
atk-abh03a:1190_10: vokāroyeva natthi. Te aññamaññaṃ pubbacarimabhāvena uppajjanti, maggassa tehi saddhiṃ
atk-abh03a:1190_11: purimapacchimatāva natthi, tesaṃ anuppattikāle tikkhavipassanāsamaye, tesaṃ anuppattidese
atk-abh03a:1190_12: āruppepi ca uppajjanato. Te sampaṭicchanādīhi antaritattā na aññamaññassa samanantarā
atk-abh03a:1190_13: uppajjanti, maggassa sampaṭicchanādīhi antaritabhāvova natthi. Tesaṃ aññatra abhinipātā
atk-abh03a:1190_14: ābhogamattampi kiccaṃ natthi, maggassa kilesasamugghātanaṃ kiccanti. Yasmā cettha
atk-abh03a:1190_15: ayampi adhippāyo, tasmā sakavādī imehākārehi paravādiṃ maggassa apañcaviññāṇagatikabhāvaṃ
atk-abh03a:1190_16: sampaṭicchāpetvā no ca vata re vattabbe pañcaviññāṇasamaṅgissa atthi maggabhāvanāti āha.
atk-abh03a:1191_0: 577. Suññataṃ ārabbhāti “yathā lokuttaramaggo suññataṃ nibbānaṃ ārabbha, lokiyo suddhasaṅkhārapuñjaṃ
atk-abh03a:1191_1: ārabbha uppajjati, kiṃ te evaṃ cakkhuviññāṇa”nti pucchati. Itaro “cakkhuñca paṭicca
atk-abh03a:1191_2: rūpe cā”ti vacanato paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho “na nimittaggāhī”ti vacanato yaṃ
atk-abh03a:1191_3: tattha animittaṃ, tadeva suññatanti sandhāya paṭijānāti. Cakkhuñca paṭiccāti pañhadvayepi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a:1192_0: 578-579. Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ atītānāgataṃ ārabbhāti ettha ayamadhippāyo – manoviññāṇasamaṅgissa
atk-abh03a:1192_1: atthi maggabhāvanā, manoviññāṇañca atītānāgatampi ārabbha uppajjati, kiṃ te evaṃ
atk-abh03a:1192_2: cakkhuviññāṇampīti. Phassaṃ ārabbhātiādīsupi eseva nayo. Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā na
atk-abh03a:1192_3: nimittaggāhīti ettha javanakkhaṇe na nimittaggāhitā vuttā, na cakkhuviññāṇakkhaṇe.
atk-abh03a:1195: 580-583. Idāni pañcaviññāṇā kusalāpītikathā nāma hoti. Sā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva atthato veditabbāti.
atk-abh03a:1198_0: 584-586. Idāni pañcaviññāṇā sābhogātikathā nāma hoti. Tattha ābhogo nāma kusalākusalavasena
atk-abh03a:1198_1: hoti satthārā ca “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā nimittaggāhī hoti, na nimittaggāhī hotī”tiādi
atk-abh03a:1198_2: vuttaṃ, taṃ ayoniso gahetvā “pañcaviññāṇā sābhogā”ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi mahāsaṃghikānaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1198_3: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamettha purimakathāsadisamevāti.
atk-abh03a:1201_0: 587-589. Idāni dvīhi sīlehītikathā nāma hoti. Tattha “sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño”tiādivacanato
atk-abh03a:1201_1: yasmā lokiyena sīlena sīlavā lokuttaraṃ maggaṃ bhāveti, tasmā “purimena ca lokiyena
atk-abh03a:1201_2: maggakkhaṇe lokuttarena cāti dvīhi sīlehi samannāgato nāma hotī”ti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1201_3: seyyathāpi mahāsaṃghikānaṃyeva, te sandhāya maggasamaṅgīti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā
atk-abh03a:1201_4: itarassa. Atha naṃ “yadi so ekakkhaṇe lokiyalokuttarehi dvīhi sīlehi samannāgato,
atk-abh03a:1201_5: dvīhi phassādīhipi tena samannāgatena bhavitabba”nti codetuṃ dvīhi phassehītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1201_6: Itaro tathārūpaṃ nayaṃ apassanto paṭikkhipati. Lokiyena ca lokuttarena cāti pañhe
atk-abh03a:1201_7: pubbe samādinnañca maggakkhaṇe uppannasammāvācādīni ca sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1202_0: Lokiye sīle niruddheti pucchā paravādissa, khaṇabhaṅganirodhaṃ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:1202_1: Itaro pana taṃ vītikkamaṃ viya sallakkhento dussīlotiādimāha. Laddhipatiṭṭhāpanaṃ
atk-abh03a:1202_2: panassa pubbe abhinnasīlataṃyeva dīpeti, na dvīhi samannāgatataṃ. Tasmā appatiṭṭhitāva laddhīti.
atk-abh03a:1205_0: 590-594. Idāni sīlaṃ acetasikantikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā sīle uppajjitvā niruddhepi
atk-abh03a:1205_1: samādānahetuko sīlopacayo nāma atthi, yena so sīlavāyeva nāma hoti, tasmā “sīlaṃ
atk-abh03a:1205_2: acetasika”nti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi mahāsaṃghikānaṃ, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1205_3: paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamettha “dānaṃ acetasika”ntikathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1208: 595-597. Idāni sīlaṃ na cittānuparivattītikathā nāma hoti. Tattha na cittānuparivattīti bhāsantarameva nānaṃ, sesaṃ purimakathāsadisamevāti.
atk-abh03a:1211_0: 598-600. Idāni samādānahetukathā nāma hoti. Tattha “ārāmaropā”ti gāthāya atthaṃ ayoniso
atk-abh03a:1211_1: gahetvā “sadā puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatī”ti vacanato “samādānahetukaṃ sīlaṃ vaḍḍhatī”ti yesaṃ
atk-abh03a:1211_2: laddhi, seyyathāpi mahāsaṃghikānaññeva, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, cittavippayuttaṃ
atk-abh03a:1211_3: sīlopacayaṃ sandhāya paṭiññā paravādissa. Sesaṃ purimakathāsadisamevāti.
atk-abh03a:1214_0: 601-602. Idāni viññatti sīlantikathā nāma hoti. Tattha kāyaviññatti kāyakammaṃ, vacīviññatti
atk-abh03a:1214_1: vacīkammanti gahitattā “viññatti sīla”nti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi mahāsaṃghikānañceva
atk-abh03a:1214_2: sammitiyānañca; te sandhāya viññattīti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha
atk-abh03a:1214_3: naṃ yasmā sīlaṃ nāma virati, na rūpadhammo, tasmā tenatthena codetuṃ pāṇātipātā veramaṇītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1214_4: Abhivādanaṃ sīlantiādi yathārūpaṃ viññattiṃ so “sīla”nti maññati taṃ uddharitvā dassetuṃ
atk-abh03a:1214_5: vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana sā virati na hoti, tasmā puna pāṇātipātātiādimāha. Laddhi panassa
atk-abh03a:1217_0: 603-604. Idāni aviññatti dussīlyantikathā nāma hoti. Tattha cittavippayuttaṃ apuññūpacayañceva
atk-abh03a:1217_1: āṇattiyā ca pāṇātipātādīsu aṅgapāripūriṃ sandhāya “aviññatti dussīlya”nti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1217_2: seyyathāpi mahāsaṃghikānaṃ, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha
atk-abh03a:1217_3: naṃ “sace sā dussīlyaṃ, pāṇātipātādīsu aññatarā siyā”ti codetuṃ pāṇātipātotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1217_4: Pāpakammaṃ samādiyitvāti “asukaṃ nāma ghātessāmi, asukaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ avaharissāmī”ti
atk-abh03a:1217_5: evaṃ pāpasamādānaṃ katvā. Ubho vaḍḍhantīti puṭṭho dānakkhaṇe pāpassa anuppattiṃ sandhāya
atk-abh03a:1217_6: paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho cittavippayuttaṃ pāpūpacayaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Sesamettha
atk-abh03a:1223_0: 605-613. Idāni anusayā abyākatā, ahetukā, cittavippayuttāti tissopi anusayakathā
atk-abh03a:1223_1: nāma honti. Tattha yasmā puthujjano kusalābyākate citte vattamāne “sānusayo”ti vattabbo,
atk-abh03a:1223_2: yo cassa tasmiṃ khaṇe hetu, na tena hetunā anusayā sahetukā, na tena cittena sampayuttā,
atk-abh03a:1223_3: tasmā “te abyākatā, ahetukā, cittavippayuttā”ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi mahāsaṃghikānañceva
atk-abh03a:1223_4: sammitiyānañca; te sandhāya tīsupi kathāsu pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a:1223_5: Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā sakkā pāḷimaggeneva jānitunti, tasmā na vitthāritanti.
atk-abh03a:1226_0: 614-615. Idāni ñāṇakathā nāma hoti. Tattha maggañāṇena aññāṇe vigatepi puna cakkhuviññāṇādivasena
atk-abh03a:1226_1: ñāṇavippayuttacitte vattamāne yasmā taṃ maggacittaṃ na pavattati, tasmā “na vattabbaṃ
atk-abh03a:1226_2: ñāṇī”ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi mahāsaṃghikānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1226_3: paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ “yadi aññāṇe vigate ‘ñāṇī’ti paññatti na siyā, rāgādīsu
atk-abh03a:1226_4: vigatesu vītarāgādipaññattipi na siyāti puggalapaññattiyaṃ akovidosī”ti codetuṃ rāge
atk-abh03a:1226_5: vigatetiādimāha. Itaro tesu vigatesu sarāgādibhāve yuttiṃ apassanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1226_6: Pariyosāne yasmā ñāṇapaṭilābhena so ñāṇīti vattabbataṃ arahati, tasmā na hevanti
atk-abh03a:1229_0: 616-617. Idāni ñāṇaṃ cittavippayuttantikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā arahā cakkhuviññāṇādisamaṅgī
atk-abh03a:1229_1: paṭiladdhaṃ maggañāṇaṃ sandhāya “ñāṇī”ti vuccati, na cassa taṃ tena cittena sampayuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1229_2: tasmā “ñāṇaṃ cittavippayutta”nti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi pubbaseliyānaṃ; te sandhāya
atk-abh03a:1229_3: pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ “yadi te ñāṇaṃ cittavippayuttaṃ cittavippayuttesu
atk-abh03a:1229_4: rūpādīsu aññataraṃ siyā”ti codetuṃ rūpantiādimāha. Itaro paṭikkhipati. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā
atk-abh03a:1229_5: vuttanayameva. Pariyosāne pana paññavāti puṭṭho paṭilābhavasena taṃ pavattiṃ icchati, tasmā paṭijānātīti.
atk-abh03a:1232_0: 618-820. Idāni idaṃ dukkhantikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ “lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe
atk-abh03a:1232_1: yogāvacaro idaṃ dukkhanti vācaṃ bhāsati, evamassa idaṃ dukkhanti vācaṃ bhāsato ca
atk-abh03a:1232_2: idaṃ dukkhanti ñāṇaṃ pavattatī”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā
atk-abh03a:1232_3: sakavādissa, maggakkhaṇe tathā vācābhāsanaṃ ñāṇappavattiñca sandhāya paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a:1232_4: Yasmā pana so sesasaccapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ vācaṃ puthujjanova bhāsati, na ca tassa tathā
atk-abh03a:1232_5: ñāṇappavattīti icchati, tasmā samudayādipañhesu paṭikkhipati. Rūpaṃ aniccantiādi
atk-abh03a:1232_6: dukkhapariyāyadassanavasena vuttaṃ. Itaro pana sakasamaye tādisaṃ vohāraṃ apassanto
atk-abh03a:1232_7: paṭikkhipati. Iti ca danti cātiādi yadi tassa dukkhe ñāṇaṃ pavattati, i-kāra daṃ-kāra
atk-abh03a:1232_8: du-kāra kha-kāresu paṭipāṭiyā catūhi ñāṇehi pavattitabbanti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Itaro
atk-abh03a:1232_9: pana tathā na icchati, tasmā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1235_0: 621-624. Idāni iddhibalakathā nāma hoti. Tattha iddhipādabhāvanānisaṃsassa atthaṃ
atk-abh03a:1235_1: ayoniso gahetvā “iddhibalena samannāgato kappaṃ tiṭṭheyyā”ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi
atk-abh03a:1235_2: mahāsaṃghikānaṃ; te sandhāya iddhibalena samannāgato kappaṃ tiṭṭheyyāti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:1235_3: Tattha kappo nāma mahākappo, kappekadeso, āyukappoti tividho. “Cattārimāni, bhikkhave,
atk-abh03a:1235_4: kappassa asaṅkhyeyyānī”ti ettha hi mahākappova kappoti vutto. “Brahmakāyikānaṃ devānaṃ
atk-abh03a:1235_5: kappo āyuppamāṇa”nti ettha kappekadesā. “Kappaṃ nirayamhi paccati, kappaṃ saggamhi
atk-abh03a:1235_6: modatī”ti ettha āyukappo. Āyukappanaṃ āyuvidhānaṃ kammassa vipākavasena vā vassagaṇanāya
atk-abh03a:1235_7: vā āyuparicchedoti attho. Tesu mahākappaṃ sandhāya pucchati, itaro paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1236_0: Atha naṃ sakavādī “sace te iddhibalena samannāgato, ‘yo ciraṃ jīvati, so vassasataṃ
atk-abh03a:1236_1: appaṃ vā bhiyyo’ti evaṃ paricchinnā āyukappā uddhaṃ mahākappaṃ vā mahākappekadesaṃ
atk-abh03a:1236_2: vā jīveyya iddhimayikenassa āyunā bhavitabba”nti codetuṃ iddhimayiko so āyūtiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1236_3: Itaro “jīvitindriyaṃ nāma iddhimayikaṃ natthi, kammasamuṭṭhānamevā”ti vuttattā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1236_4: Ko panettha iddhimato viseso, nanu aniddhimāpi āyukappaṃ tiṭṭheyyāti? Ayaṃ viseso
atk-abh03a:1236_5: – iddhimā hi yāvatāyukaṃ jīvitappavattiyā antarāyakare dhamme iddhibalena paṭibāhitvā
atk-abh03a:1236_6: antarā akālamaraṇaṃ nivāretuṃ sakkoti, aniddhimato etaṃ balaṃ natthi. Ayametesaṃ viseso.
atk-abh03a:1237_0: Atītaṃ anāgatanti idaṃ avisesena kappaṃ tiṭṭheyyāti paṭiññātattā codeti. Dve kappetiādi
atk-abh03a:1237_1: “yadi iddhimā jīvitaparicchedaṃ atikkamituṃ sakkoti, na kevalaṃ ekaṃ anekepi kappe
atk-abh03a:1237_2: tiṭṭheyyā”ti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Uppanno phassotiādi na sabbaṃ iddhiyā labbhati,
atk-abh03a:1237_3: iddhiyā avisayopi atthīti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a:1240_0: 625-626. Idāni samādhikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ ekacittakkhaṇe uppannāpi ekaggatā
atk-abh03a:1240_1: samādhānaṭṭhena samādhīti aggahetvā “satta rattindivāni ekantasukhapaṭisaṃvedī viharitu”ntiādivacanaṃ
atk-abh03a:1240_2: nissāya “cittasantati samādhī”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi sabbatthivādānañceva uttarāpathakānañca;
atk-abh03a:1240_3: te sandhāya cittasantatīti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ “yadi cittasantati
atk-abh03a:1240_4: samādhi, cittasantati nāma atītāpi atthi, anāgatāpi atthi. Na hi ekaṃ paccuppannacittameva
atk-abh03a:1240_5: cittasantati nāma hoti, kiṃ te sabbāpi sā samādhī”ti codetuṃ atītātiādimāha, itaro
atk-abh03a:1241_0: Nanu atītaṃ niruddhantiādi “cittasantatiyaṃ paccuppannameva cittaṃ kiccakaraṃ, atītānāgataṃ
atk-abh03a:1241_1: niruddhattā anuppannattā ca natthi, kathaṃ taṃ samādhi nāma hotī”ti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1241_2: Ekacittakkhaṇikoti pucchā paravādissa. Tato yā sakasamaye “samādhiṃ, bhikkhave, bhāvethā”tiādīsu
atk-abh03a:1241_3: paccuppannakusalacittasampayuttā ekaggatā samādhīti vuttā, taṃ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:1241_5: teneva sakavādinā paṭikkhittaṃ. Nanu vuttaṃ bhagavatāti suttaṃ purimapacchimavasena
atk-abh03a:1241_6: pavattamānassa samādhissa abbokiṇṇataṃ sādheti, na santatiyā samādhibhāvaṃ, tasmā asādhakanti.
atk-abh03a:1244_0: 627. Idāni dhammaṭṭhitatākathā nāma hoti. Tattha “ṭhitāva sā dhātū”ti vacanaṃ nissāya
atk-abh03a:1244_1: “paṭiccasamuppādasaṅkhātā dhammaṭṭhitatā nāma ekā atthi, sā ca parinipphannā”ti yesaṃ
atk-abh03a:1244_2: laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a:1244_3: Atha naṃ “yadi parinipphannānaṃ avijjādīnaṃ aññā dhammaṭṭhitatā nāma parinipphannā
atk-abh03a:1244_4: atthi, tāyapi ca te dhammaṭṭhitatāya aññā ṭhitatā parinipphannā āpajjatī”ti codetuṃ
atk-abh03a:1244_5: tāya ṭhitatātiādimāha. Paravādī evarūpāya laddhiyā abhāvena paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ
atk-abh03a:1244_6: puṭṭho anantarapaccayatañceva aññamaññapaccayatañca sandhāya paṭijānāti. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā
atk-abh03a:1247_0: 628. Idāni aniccatākathā nāma hoti. Tattha “aniccānaṃ rūpādīnaṃ aniccatāpi rūpādayo
atk-abh03a:1247_1: viya parinipphannā”ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1247_2: paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ “yadi te rūpādayo viya aniccatā parinipphannā, tassāpi
atk-abh03a:1247_3: aññāya parinipphannāya aniccatāya bhavitabba”nti codetuṃ tāya aniccatāyātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1247_4: Itaro dvinnaṃ aniccatāya ekato abhāvena paṭikkhipitvā puna yasmā sā aniccatā niccā
atk-abh03a:1247_5: na hoti, teneva aniccena saddhiṃ antaradhāyati, tasmā paṭijānāti. Athassa sakavādī
atk-abh03a:1247_6: lesokāsaṃ adatvā yā tena dutiyā aniccatā paṭiññātā, tāyapi tato parāyapīti paramparavasena
atk-abh03a:1247_7: anupacchedadosaṃ āropento tāya tāyevātiādimāha. Jarā parinipphannātiādi yasmā uppannassa
atk-abh03a:1247_8: jarāmaraṇato aññā aniccatā nāma natthi, tasmā aniccatāvibhāgānuyuñjanavasena vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1247_9: Tatrāpi paravādino purimanayeneva paṭiññā ca paṭikkhepo ca veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:1248_0: 629. Rūpaṃ parinipphannantiādi yesaṃ sā aniccatā, tehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1248_1: Tattha “yathā parinipphannānaṃ rūpādīnaṃ aniccatājarāmaraṇāni atthi, evaṃ parinipphannānaṃ
atk-abh03a:1248_2: aniccatādīnaṃ tāni natthī”ti maññamāno ekantena paṭikkhipatiyevāti.
atk-abh03a:1253_0: 630-632. Idāni saṃvaro kammantikathā nāma hoti. Tattha “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā nimittaggāhī
atk-abh03a:1253_1: hoti, na nimittaggāhī hotī”ti suttaṃ nissāya “saṃvaropi asaṃvaropi kamma”nti yesaṃ
atk-abh03a:1253_2: laddhi, seyyathāpi mahāsaṃghikānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a:1254_0: Atha naṃ yā sakasamaye cetanā “kamma”nti vuttā yathā sā kāyavacīmanodvāresu pavattamānā
atk-abh03a:1254_1: kāyakammādināmaṃ labhati, tathā “yadi te saṃvaro kammaṃ, sopi cakkhundriyādīsu pavattamāno
atk-abh03a:1254_3: Itaro tādisaṃ suttapadaṃ apassanto catūsu dvāresu paṭikkhipitvā pañcame kāyadvāre
atk-abh03a:1254_4: pasādakāyaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati, viññattikāyaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. So hi pasādakāyampi
atk-abh03a:1254_5: viññattikāyampi kāyindriyantveva icchati. Manodvārepi vipākadvāraṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a:1254_6: kammadvāraṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Asaṃvarepi eseva nayo. “Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā”ti
atk-abh03a:1254_7: suttaṃ tesu dvāresu saṃvarāsaṃvarameva dīpeti, na tassa kammabhāvaṃ, tasmā asādhakanti.
atk-abh03a:1257_0: 633-635. Idāni kammakathā nāma hoti. Tattha “nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sañcetanikānaṃ kammāna”nti
atk-abh03a:1257_1: suttapadaṃ nissāya “sabbaṃ kammaṃ savipāka”nti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi mahāsaṃghikānaṃ;
atk-abh03a:1257_2: tesaṃ “cetanāhaṃ, bhikkhave, kammaṃ vadāmī”ti satthārā avisesena cetanā “kamma”nti
atk-abh03a:1257_3: vuttā; sā ca kusalākusalāva savipākā, abyākatā avipākāti imaṃ vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ sabbaṃ
atk-abh03a:1257_4: kammanti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Puna sabbā cetanāti pañhesu abyākataṃ
atk-abh03a:1257_5: sandhāya paṭikkhepo, kusalākusale sandhāya paṭiññā veditabbā. Vipākābyākatātiādi
atk-abh03a:1257_6: savipākāvipākacetanaṃ sarūpena dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Sesamettha uttānatthameva. “Nāhaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1257_7: bhikkhave”ti suttaṃ sati paccaye diṭṭhadhammādīsu vipākapaṭisaṃvedanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, tasmā asādhakanti.
atk-abh03a:1260_0: 636-637. Idāni saddo vipākotikathā nāma hoti. Tattha “so tassa kammassa katattā upacitattā
atk-abh03a:1260_1: ussannattā vipulattā brahmassaro hotī”tiādīni ayoniso gahetvā “saddo vipāko”ti yesaṃ
atk-abh03a:1260_2: laddhi, seyyathāpi mahāsaṃghikānaṃ; tesaṃ “kammasamuṭṭhānā arūpadhammāva vipākāti
atk-abh03a:1260_3: nāmaṃ labhanti. Rūpadhammesu panāyaṃ vohāro natthī”ti dassetuṃ pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1260_4: paṭiññā itarassa. Sukhavedanīyotiādi “vipāko nāma evarūpo hotī”ti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1260_5: “So tassa kammassā”ti suttaṃ lakkhaṇapaṭilābhadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Mahāpuriso hi
atk-abh03a:1260_6: kammassa katattā suciparivāropi hoti, na ca parivāro vipāko, tasmā asādhakametanti.
atk-abh03a:1263_0: 638-640. Idāni saḷāyatanakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā saḷāyatanaṃ kammassa katattā
atk-abh03a:1263_1: uppannaṃ, tasmā “vipāko”ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi mahāsaṃghikānaṃ; te sandhāya
atk-abh03a:1263_2: cakkhāyatanaṃ vipākoti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
atk-abh03a:1263_3: Saḷāyatanaṃ vipākoti ettha manāyatanaṃ siyā vipāko. Sesāni kevalaṃ kammasamuṭṭhānāni,
atk-abh03a:1266_0: 541-545. Idāni sattakkhattuparamakathā nāma hoti, tattha yasmā “sattakkhattuparamo”ti
atk-abh03a:1266_1: vuttaṃ, tasmā “sattakkhattuparamo puggalo sattakkhattuparamatāya niyato”ti yesaṃ
atk-abh03a:1266_2: laddhi, seyyathāpi uttarāpathakānaṃ; tesaṃ ṭhapetvā “ariyamaggaṃ añño tassa niyamo
atk-abh03a:1266_3: natthi, yena so sattakkhattuparamatāya niyato bhaveyyā”ti imaṃ vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ
atk-abh03a:1267_0: Mātā jīvitātiādīsu ayamadhippāyo – dve niyāmā sammattaniyāmo ca micchattaniyāmo ca.
