atk-abh03a:1267_1: Sammattaniyāmo ariyamaggo. So avinipātadhammatañceva phaluppattiñca niyameti. Micchattaniyāmo
atk-abh03a:1267_2: ānantariyakammaṃ. Taṃ anantarā nirayūpapattiṃ niyameti. Tattha sattakkhattuparamo
atk-abh03a:1267_3: sotāpattimaggena avinipātadhammatāya ca phaluppattiyā ca niyamito. Sesamagganiyāmo
atk-abh03a:1267_4: panassa natthi anadhigatattā, ānantariyampi kātuṃ so abhabbo. Tvaṃ panassa niyāmaṃ
atk-abh03a:1267_5: icchasi, tena taṃ vadāma – “kiṃ te so iminā micchattaniyāmena niyamito”ti.
atk-abh03a:1268_0: Abhabbo antarāti pañhesu ānantariyābhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati, sattakkhattuparamaṃ
atk-abh03a:1268_1: sandhāya paṭijānāti. Atthi so niyāmoti pañhe sattakkhattuparamatāya niyāmaṃ apassanto
atk-abh03a:1268_2: paṭikkhipati. Atthi te satipaṭṭhānātiādi niyāmasaṅkhāte maggadhamme dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1268_3: Tassa pana puna paṭhamamaggānuppattito tepi natthi, tasmā paṭikkhipati. Sesamettha
atk-abh03a:1268_4: uttānatthameva. Nanu so sattakkhattuparamoti ettha bhagavā “ayaṃ puggalo ettake bhave
atk-abh03a:1268_5: sandhāvitvā parinibbāyissati, ayaṃ ettake”ti attano ñāṇabalena byākaroti, na bhavaniyāmaṃ
atk-abh03a:1268_6: nāma kiñci tena sattakkhattuparamo, kolaṃkolo, ekabījī vāti vuttaṃ, tasmā asādhakametanti.
atk-abh03a:1273_0: 648-649. Idāni jīvitāvoropanakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā dosasampayuttena cittena
atk-abh03a:1273_1: pāṇātipāto hoti, doso ca diṭṭhisampannassa appahīno, tasmā “diṭṭhisampanno sañcicca
atk-abh03a:1273_2: pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropeyyā”ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi pubbaseliyāparaseliyānaṃ; te sandhāya
atk-abh03a:1273_3: diṭṭhisampannoti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sañcicca mātarantiādipañhesu
atk-abh03a:1273_4: pana “aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso”ti suttabhayena paṭikkhipati. Satthari agāravotiādi
atk-abh03a:1273_5: satthārādīsu sagāravassa sikkhāpadassa vītikkamābhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Itaro pana
atk-abh03a:1273_6: akusalavasena tassa agāravo nāma natthīti paṭikkhipitvā sagāravabhāvañca sampaṭicchitvā
atk-abh03a:1273_7: puna agāravoti puṭṭho tesu tesu kiccesu pasutatāya vikkhittānaṃ asatiyā amanasikārena
atk-abh03a:1273_8: cetiye abhivādanapadakkhiṇakaraṇābhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Puna ohadeyyātiādinā
atk-abh03a:1273_9: nayena puṭṭho tādisāya kiriyāya sañcicca akaraṇato paṭikkhipati. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a:1276_0: 650-652. Idāni duggatikathā nāma hoti. Tattha ye duggatiñca duggatisattānaṃ rūpādiārammaṇaṃ
atk-abh03a:1276_1: taṇhañcāti ubhayampi duggatīti gahetvā puna tathā avibhajitvā aviseseneva “diṭṭhisampannassa
atk-abh03a:1276_2: pahīnā duggatī”ti vadanti, seyyathāpi uttarāpathakā; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1276_3: paṭiññā itarassa. Āpāyike rūpe rajjeyyātiādi paravādino laddhiyā diṭṭhisampannassa
atk-abh03a:1276_4: duggati appahīnā, tassa vasena codetuṃ vuttaṃ. Sesamettha uttānatthameva. Nirayaṃ
atk-abh03a:1276_5: upapajjeyyātiādi duggatipahānameva duggatigāminitaṇhāpahānaṃ vā dīpeti, na duggatisattānaṃ
atk-abh03a:1282_0: 654-657. Idāni kappaṭṭhakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ “saṅghaṃ samaggaṃ bhetvāna,
atk-abh03a:1282_1: kappaṃ nirayamhi paccatī”ti “sakalampi kappaṃ saṅghabhedako niraye tiṭṭhatī”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1282_2: seyyathāpi rājagirikānaṃ; te sandhāya kappaṭṭhoti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a:1282_3: Buddho ca loketi idaṃ vinā buddhuppādena saṅghabhedassa abhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1282_4: Kappo ca saṇṭhāti saṅgho ca bhijjatītiādi “yadi so sakalaṃ kappaṃ tiṭṭhati, saṇṭhahanato
atk-abh03a:1282_5: paṭṭhāya taṃ kammaṃ katvā tattha uppajjitvā tiṭṭheyyā”ti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Atītantiādi
atk-abh03a:1282_6: heṭṭhā vuttādhippāyameva. Kappaṭṭho iddhimāti pañhe bhāvanāmayaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a:1282_7: parasamaye panassa jātimayaṃ iddhiṃ icchanti, taṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Chandiddhipādotiādi
atk-abh03a:1282_8: “jātimayāya iddhiyā iddhimāti laddhimattametaṃ, kiṃ tena, yadi panassa iddhi atthi,
atk-abh03a:1282_9: iminā nayena iddhipādā bhāvitā bhaveyyu”nti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Āpāyiko nerayikoti
atk-abh03a:1282_10: suttaṃ yaṃ so ekaṃ kappaṃ asītibhāge katvā tato ekabhāgamattaṃ kālaṃ tiṭṭheyya, taṃ
atk-abh03a:1285_0: 658-659. Idāni kusalapaṭilābhakathā nāma hoti. Tattha kappaṭṭho sakasamaye kāmāvacarakusalameva
atk-abh03a:1285_1: paṭilabhati. Yena pana taṃ upapattiṃ paṭibāheyya, taṃ mahaggataṃ lokuttaraṃ vā na
atk-abh03a:1285_2: paṭilabhati. Yesaṃ pana imaṃ vibhāgaṃ akatvā aviseseneva “so kusalacittaṃ na paṭilabhatī”ti
atk-abh03a:1285_3: laddhi, seyyathāpi uttarāpathakānaṃ; tesaṃ vibhāgadassanena taṃ laddhiṃ bhindituṃ
atk-abh03a:1285_4: pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a:1288_0: 660-662. Idāni anantarāpayuttakathā nāma hoti. Tattha anantarāpayutto nāma yena khandhabhedato
atk-abh03a:1288_1: anantarā vipākadāyakaṃ mātughātādi ānantariyakammaṃ āṇattaṃ. Tattha yassa niyatāya
atk-abh03a:1288_2: āṇattiyā āṇatto taṃ kammaṃ karissati, so atthasādhikāya cetanāya uppāditattā micchattaniyato
atk-abh03a:1288_3: hoti, abhabbo sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamituṃ. Yassa aniyatāya āṇattiyā āṇatto taṃ kammaṃ
atk-abh03a:1288_4: karissati, so atthasādhikāya cetanāya anuppāditattā na micchattaniyato, bhabbo sammattaniyāmaṃ
atk-abh03a:1288_5: okkamitunti idaṃ sakasamaye sanniṭṭhānaṃ. Yesaṃ pana “aniyatāyapi āṇattiyā abhabboyeva
atk-abh03a:1288_6: sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamitu”nti laddhi, seyyathāpi uttarāpathakānaṃ; tesaṃ taṃ laddhiṃ
atk-abh03a:1288_7: bhindituṃ sakavādī pubbapakkhaṃ datvā anantarāpayuttoti paravādinā attānaṃ pucchāpeti.
atk-abh03a:1288_8: Tenettha paṭhamapucchā paravādissa, atthasādhikacetanāya abhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭiññā
atk-abh03a:1288_9: sakavādissa. Tato paravādī mātughātādikammassa āṇattattāva “so micchattaniyato”ti
atk-abh03a:1288_10: maññati. Tasmā micchattaniyāmañcāti pañhaṃ pucchati. Sakavādī pana ekassa puggalassa
atk-abh03a:1288_11: dvinnaṃ niyāmānaṃ anokkantimattameva sandhāya na hevanti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1289_0: Nanu taṃ kammanti mātughātādikammaṃ. Tattha aniyatāṇattiṃ sandhāya “āmantā”ti paṭiññā
atk-abh03a:1289_1: sakavādissa. Aniyatampi hi āṇattiṃ payojetvā ṭhitassa “ananucchavikaṃ mayā kata”nti
atk-abh03a:1289_2: kukkuccaṃ uppajjateva, vippaṭisāro jāyateva. Hañcītiādi kukkuccuppattimattaṃ gahetvā
atk-abh03a:1290_0: 661. Idāni yassa aniyatāṇattikassāpi anantarāpayuttassa paravādinā sammattaniyāmokkamanaṃ
atk-abh03a:1290_1: paṭisiddhaṃ, tameva puggalaṃ gahetvā anantarāpayutto puggalo abhabboti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1290_2: attano laddhivasena paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ sakavādī “abhabbo nāma mātughātādikammānaṃ
atk-abh03a:1290_3: kārako, kiṃ te tena tāni kammāni katānī”ti codetuṃ mātā jīvitā voropitātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1290_4: Itaro tesaṃ vatthūnaṃ arogatāya tathārūpaṃ kiriyaṃ apassanto “na heva”nti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1291_0: Taṃ kammaṃ paṭisaṃharitvāti aniyatāṇattikammaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tañhi “mā kho mayā
atk-abh03a:1291_1: āṇattaṃ ākāsī”ti āṇattaṃ nivārentena paṭisaṃhaṭaṃ nāma hoti. Paṭisaṃhaṭattāyeva cettha
atk-abh03a:1291_2: kukkuccaṃ paṭivinoditaṃ, vippaṭisāro paṭivinīto nāma hoti. Evaṃ santepi panettha
atk-abh03a:1291_3: purimāṇattiyāyeva niyatabhāvaṃ maññamāno paravādī “āmantā”ti paṭijānāti. Atha naṃ
atk-abh03a:1291_4: sakavādī tassa kammassa paṭisaṃhaṭabhāvaṃ sampaṭicchāpetvā attano laddhiṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā hañcītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1292_0: 662. Puna anantarāpayuttoti pariyosānapañhe paṭhamapañhe viya pucchā paravādissa,
atk-abh03a:1292_1: paṭiññā sakavādissa. Nanu taṃ kammanti anuyogo paravādissa, paṭisaṃhaṭakālato pubbe
atk-abh03a:1292_2: payuttakālaṃ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādissa. Payuttapubbatāmattaṃ gahetvā aniyatāṇattivasena
atk-abh03a:1292_3: hañcīti laddhipatiṭṭhāpanaṃ paravādissa. Ayaṃ pana laddhi ayoniso patiṭṭhitattā appatiṭṭhitāva hotīti.
atk-abh03a:1295_0: 663-664. Idāni niyatassa niyāmakathā nāma hoti. Tattha duvidho niyāmo – micchattaniyāmo
atk-abh03a:1295_1: ca ānantariyakammaṃ, sammattaniyāmo ca ariyamaggo. Ime dve niyāme ṭhapetvā añño niyāmo
atk-abh03a:1295_2: nāma natthi. Sabbepi hi sesā tebhūmakadhammā aniyatā nāma. Tehi samannāgatopi aniyatoyeva.
atk-abh03a:1295_3: Buddhehi pana attano ñāṇabalena “ayaṃ satto anāgate bodhiṃ pāpuṇissatī”ti byākato
atk-abh03a:1295_4: bodhisatto puññussadattā niyatoti vuccati. Iti imaṃ vohāramattaṃ gahetvā “pacchimabhaviko
atk-abh03a:1295_5: bodhisatto tāya jātiyā bhabbo dhammaṃ abhisametu”nti adhippāyena “niyato niyāmaṃ
atk-abh03a:1295_6: okkamatī”ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi pubbaseliyāparaseliyānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā
atk-abh03a:1295_7: sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Micchattaniyatotiādi aññena niyāmena niyatassa aññaniyāmābhāvadassanatthaṃ
atk-abh03a:1295_8: vuttaṃ. Pubbe maggaṃ bhāvetvātiādi niyāmappabhedadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Satipaṭṭhānantiādi
atk-abh03a:1295_9: ekasmimpi niyāme dhammappabhedadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Bhabbo bodhisattoti vacanaṃ kevalaṃ
atk-abh03a:1295_10: bodhisattassa bhabbataṃ dīpeti, na niyatassa niyāmokkamanaṃ, tasmā asādhakaṃ. So
atk-abh03a:1295_11: hi pubbe ekenapi niyatadhammena aniyato bodhimūle saccadassanena niyāmaṃ okkantoti.
atk-abh03a:1298_0: 665-667. Idāni nivutakathā nāma hoti. Tattha suddhassa suddhakiccābhāvato nīvaraṇehi
atk-abh03a:1298_1: nivuto ophuṭo pariyonaddho ca nīvaraṇaṃ jahatīti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi uttarāpathakānaṃ;
atk-abh03a:1298_2: te sandhāya nivutotipucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Ratto rāgantiādi nivutassa
atk-abh03a:1298_3: nīvaraṇajahane dosadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Parisuddhe pariyodātetiādi vikkhambhanavisuddhiyā
atk-abh03a:1298_4: visuddhassa samucchedavisuddhidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tassa evaṃ jānatotiādi jānato
atk-abh03a:1298_5: passato āsavakkhayaṃ dīpeti, na nivutassa nīvaraṇajahanaṃ, tasmā asādhakanti.
atk-abh03a:1301: 668-670. Idāni sammukhībhūtakathā nāma hoti. Tattha sammukhībhūtoti saṃyojanānaṃ sammukhībhāvaṃ tehi samaṅgībhāvaṃ upagato. Sesamettha nivutakathāsadisamevāti.
atk-abh03a:1304_0: 671-673. Idāni samāpanno assādetītikathā nāma hoti. Tattha “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja
atk-abh03a:1304_1: viharati, so tadassādetī”tiādivacanaṃ nissāya “samāpanno assādeti, sā cassa jhānanikanti
atk-abh03a:1304_2: jhānārammaṇā hotī”ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ, te sandhāya samāpannoti
atk-abh03a:1304_3: pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Taṃ jhānaṃ tassa jhānassa ārammaṇanti pañhesu
atk-abh03a:1304_5: paṭijānāti. So tadassādetīti suttaṃ jhānalābhino jhānā vuṭṭhāya jhānassādaṃ sādheti,
atk-abh03a:1304_6: na antosamāpattiyaṃyeva jhānanikantiyā jhānārammaṇataṃ, tasmā asādhakanti.
atk-abh03a:1307_0: 674. Idāni asātarāgakathā nāma hoti. Tattha “yaṃkiñci vedanaṃ vedeti sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ
atk-abh03a:1307_1: vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā, so taṃ vedanaṃ abhinandati abhivadatī”ti sutte diṭṭhābhinandanavasena
atk-abh03a:1307_3: hoti. Tasmā atthi asātarāgo”ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi uttarāpathakānaṃ; te sandhāya
atk-abh03a:1307_4: atthi asātarāgoti pucchā sakavādissa. Tattha asātarāgoti asāte dukkhavedayite “aho
atk-abh03a:1307_5: vata me etadeva bhaveyyā”ti rajjanā. Āmantāti laddhivasena paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamettha uttānatthameva.
atk-abh03a:1308_0: 675. So taṃ vedanaṃ abhinandatīti sutte pana vinivaṭṭetvā dukkhavedanameva ārabbha
atk-abh03a:1308_1: rāguppatti nāma natthi, samūhaggahaṇena pana vedayitalakkhaṇaṃ dhammaṃ dukkhavedanameva
atk-abh03a:1308_2: vā attato samanupassanto diṭṭhimaññanāsaṅkhātāya diṭṭhābhinandanāya vedanaṃ abhinandati,
atk-abh03a:1308_3: dukkhāya vedanāya vipariṇāmaṃ abhinandati, dukkhāya vedanāya abhibhūto tassā paṭipakkhaṃ
atk-abh03a:1308_4: kāmasukhaṃ patthayantopi dukkhavedanaṃ abhinandati nāma. Evaṃ dukkhavedanāya abhinandanā
atk-abh03a:1311_0: 676-680. Idāni dhammataṇhā abyākatātikathā nāma hoti. Tattha rūpataṇhā…pe… dhammataṇhāti
atk-abh03a:1311_1: imāsu chasu taṇhāsu yasmā sabbapacchimā taṇhā dhammataṇhāti vuttā, tasmā sā abyākatāti
atk-abh03a:1311_2: yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi pubbaseliyānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā
atk-abh03a:1311_3: itarassa. Sesapañhānaṃ pāḷiyā attho niyyāti. Kāmataṇhātiādīhi tīhi koṭṭhāsehi chapi
atk-abh03a:1311_4: taṇhā saṅkhipitvā dassitā. Rūpādīsu hi chasu ārammaṇesu kāmassādavasena pavattā taṇhā
atk-abh03a:1311_5: kāmataṇhā. “Bhavissati attā ca loko cā”ti sassatadiṭṭhisahagatā taṇhā bhavataṇhā.
atk-abh03a:1311_6: “Na bhavissatī”ti ucchedadiṭṭhisahagatā taṇhā vibhavataṇhāti. Nanu sā dhammataṇhāti
atk-abh03a:1311_7: padaṃ taṇhāya dhammārammaṇaṃ ārabbha pavattiṃ dīpeti, na abyākatabhāvaṃ tasmā asādhakanti.
atk-abh03a:1314_0: 681-685. Idāni dhammataṇhā nadukkhasamudayotikathā nāma hoti. Tatrāpi yasmā sā dhammataṇhāti
atk-abh03a:1314_1: vuttā, tasmā na dukkhasamudayoti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi pubbaseliyānaṃyeva; te
atk-abh03a:1314_2: sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesaṃ purimakathāsadisamevāti.
atk-abh03a:1319_0: 686-690. Idāni kusalākusalapaṭisandahanakathā nāma hoti. Tattha kusalaṃ vā akusalassa,
atk-abh03a:1319_1: akusalaṃ vā kusalassa anantarā uppajjanakaṃ nāma natthīti tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ paṭisandhānaṃ
atk-abh03a:1319_2: na yujjati. Ye pana yasmā ekavatthusmiññeva rajjati virajjati ca, tasmā taṃ aññamaññaṃ
atk-abh03a:1319_3: paṭisandahatīti laddhiṃ gahetvā ṭhitā, seyyathāpi mahāsaṅghikā; te sandhāya pucchā
atk-abh03a:1319_4: sakavādissa; paṭiññā itarassa. Āvaṭṭanā paṇidhīti ubhayaṃ āvajjanasseva nāmaṃ. Tañhi
atk-abh03a:1319_5: bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭetīti āvaṭṭanā. Bhavaṅgārammaṇato aññasmiṃ ārammaṇe cittaṃ paṇidahati
atk-abh03a:1319_6: ṭhapetīti paṇidhi. Kusalaṃ anāvaṭṭentassāti yaṃ taṃ akusalānantaraṃ paṭisandahantaṃ
atk-abh03a:1319_7: kusalaṃ uppajjati, taṃ anāvaṭṭentassa uppajjatīti pucchati. Itaro pana vinā āvajjanena
atk-abh03a:1319_8: kusalassa uppattiṃ apassanto paṭikkhipati. Kusalaṃ ayoniso manasikarototi idaṃ yadi
atk-abh03a:1319_9: akusalānantaraṃ kusalaṃ uppajjeyya, akusalasseva āvajjanena ayoniso manasikaroto
atk-abh03a:1319_10: uppajjeyyāti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Sesaṃ yathāpāḷimeva niyyāti. Nanu yasmiṃyeva vatthusminti
atk-abh03a:1319_11: vacanaṃ ekārammaṇe sarāgavirāguppattiṃ dīpeti, na kusalākusalānaṃ anantarataṃ, tasmā asādhakanti.
atk-abh03a:1322_0: 691-692. Idāni saḷāyatanuppattikathā nāma hoti. Tattha upapattesiyena paṭisandhicittena
atk-abh03a:1322_1: saheva opapātikānaṃ saḷāyatanaṃ uppajjati. Gabbhaseyyakānaṃ ajjhattikāyatanesu manāyatanakāyāyatanāneva
atk-abh03a:1322_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe uppajjanti. Sesāni cattāri sattasattatirattimhi. Tāni ca kho yena
atk-abh03a:1322_3: kammunā paṭisandhi gahitā, tasseva aññassa vā katattāti ayaṃ sakasamaye vādo. Yesaṃ
atk-abh03a:1322_4: pana ekakammasambhavattā sampannasākhāviṭapānaṃ rukkhādīnaṃ aṃkuro viya bījamattaṃ
atk-abh03a:1322_5: saḷāyatanaṃ mātukucchismiṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇeyeva uppajjatīti laddhi, seyyathāpi pubbaseliyānaṃ;
atk-abh03a:1322_6: te sandhāya saḷāyatananti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sabbaṅgapaccaṅgītiādi
atk-abh03a:1322_7: saḷāyatane sati evarūpo hutvā okkameyyāti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Mātukucchigatassāti
atk-abh03a:1322_8: pucchā paravādissa. Parato mātukucchigatassa pacchā kesāti pucchā sakavādissa. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a:1325_0: 693-697. Idāni anantarapaccayakathā nāma hoti. Tattha naccagītādīsu rūpadassanasaddasavanādīnaṃ
atk-abh03a:1325_1: lahuparivattitaṃ disvā “imāni viññāṇāni aññamaññassa anantarā uppajjantī”ti yesaṃ
atk-abh03a:1325_2: laddhi, seyyathāpi uttarāpathakānaṃ; te sandhāya cakkhuviññāṇassāti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1325_3: paṭiññā itarassa. Sotaviññāṇaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃyevāti yadi cakkhuviññāṇassa anantarā
atk-abh03a:1325_4: uppajjeyya, vipākamanodhātu viya rūpārammaṇaṃ siyāti codetuṃ vuttaṃ. Cakkhuñca paṭicca
atk-abh03a:1325_5: rūpe ca uppajjati sotaviññāṇanti pañhesu suttābhāvena paṭikkhipitvā anantaruppattiṃ
atk-abh03a:1325_6: sallakkhento laddhivasena paṭijānāti. Taññeva cakkhuviññāṇaṃ taṃ sotaviññāṇanti yathā
atk-abh03a:1325_7: paṭhamajavanānantaraṃ dutiyajavanaṃ manoviññāṇabhāvena taññeva hoti, kiṃ te tathā
atk-abh03a:1325_8: etampi dvayaṃ ekamevāti pucchati. Iminā nayena sabbavāresu attho veditabbo. Naccati
atk-abh03a:1325_9: gāyatītiādivacanaṃ ārammaṇasamodhāne lahuparivattitāya vokiṇṇabhāvaṃ dīpeti, na anantarapaccayataṃ, tasmā asādhakanti.
atk-abh03a:1328_0: 698-699. Idāni ariyarūpakathā nāma hoti. Tattha sammāvācākammantā rūpaṃ, tañca kho
atk-abh03a:1328_1: “sabbaṃ rūpaṃ cattāri ca mahābhūtāni catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpa”nti vacanato
atk-abh03a:1328_2: upādāyarūpanti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi uttarāpathakānaṃ; te sandhāya ariyarūpaṃ
atk-abh03a:1328_3: mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyāti pucchā sakavādissa. Tattha ariyānaṃ rūpaṃ, ariyaṃ vā rūpanti
atk-abh03a:1328_4: ariyarūpaṃ. Āmantāti laddhiyaṃ ṭhatvā paṭiññā itarassa. Kusalanti puṭṭho laddhivaseneva
atk-abh03a:1328_5: paṭijānāti. Anāsavapucchādīsupi eseva nayo. Yaṃ kiñci rūpanti suttaṃ ṭhapetvā bhūtāni
atk-abh03a:1328_6: sesarūpassa upādābhāvaṃ dīpeti, na sammāvācākammantānaṃ. Tesañhi rūpamattaññeva asiddhaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1331_0: 700-701. Idāni añño anusayotikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā puthujjano kusalābyākate
atk-abh03a:1331_1: citte vattamāne sānusayoti vattabbo, na pariyuṭṭhitoti tasmā añño anusayo, aññaṃ
atk-abh03a:1331_2: pariyuṭṭhānanti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya añño kāmarāgānusayoti
atk-abh03a:1331_3: pucchā sakavādissa paṭiññā itarassa. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā anusayakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1331_4: Sānusayotiādi pana tasmiṃ samaye anusayassa appahīnattā sānusayoti vattabbataṃ, anuppannattā
atk-abh03a:1331_5: ca pariyuṭṭhitoti avattabbataṃ dīpeti, na anusayapariyuṭṭhānānaṃ aññattaṃ, tasmā asādhakanti.
atk-abh03a:1334_0: 702. Idāni pariyuṭṭhānaṃ cittavippayuttantikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā aniccādito
atk-abh03a:1334_1: manasikarotopi rāgādayo uppajjanti. Vuttampi cetaṃ – “appekadā, bho bhāradvāja, asubhato
atk-abh03a:1334_2: manasikarissāmīti subhatova manasikarotī”ti. Tasmā pariyuṭṭhānaṃ cittavippayuttanti
atk-abh03a:1334_3: yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃyeva; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā
atk-abh03a:1337_0: 703-705. Idāni pariyāpannakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā kāmarāgo kāmadhātuṃ anuseti,
atk-abh03a:1337_1: kāmadhātupariyāpannoti ca vuccati, tasmā rūparāgārūparāgāpi rūpadhātuarūpadhātuyo
atk-abh03a:1337_2: anusenti. Rūpadhātuarūpadhātupariyāpannāyeva ca nāma hontīti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi
atk-abh03a:1337_3: andhakānañceva sammitiyānañca; te sandhāya rūparāgoti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā
atk-abh03a:1337_4: itarassa. Tattha anusetīti yathā kāmarāgo kāmavitakkasaṅkhātaṃ kāmadhātuṃ sahajātavasena
atk-abh03a:1337_5: anuseti, kiṃ te evaṃ rūparāgo rūpadhātunti pucchati. Pariyāpannoti yathā ca so tividhāya
atk-abh03a:1337_6: kāmadhātuyā kilesakāmavasena pariyāpannattā kāmadhātupariyāpanno, kiṃ te evaṃ rūparāgopi
atk-abh03a:1337_7: rūpadhātupariyāpannoti pucchati. Itaro panassa adhippāyaṃ asallakkhento kevalaṃ laddhivasena
atk-abh03a:1337_8: āmantāti paṭijānāti. Atha naṃ tamatthaṃ sallakkhāpetuṃ kusalavipākakiriyasaṅkhātehi
atk-abh03a:1337_9: samāpattesiyādīhi saṃsanditvā pucchituṃ samāpattesiyotiādimāha. Sesamettha yathāpāḷimeva
atk-abh03a:1337_10: niyyāti. Nanu kāmarāgotiādivacanampi kāmarāgasseva kāmadhātuyaṃ anusayabhāvaṃ pariyāpannatañca
atk-abh03a:1340_0: 706-708. Idāni abyākatakathā nāma hoti. Tattha vipākakiriyarūpanibbānasaṅkhātaṃ catubbidhaṃ
atk-abh03a:1340_1: abyākataṃ avipākattā abyākatanti vuttaṃ. Diṭṭhigataṃ “sassato lokoti kho, vaccha,
atk-abh03a:1340_2: abyākatameta”nti sassatādibhāvena akathitattā. Yesaṃ pana imaṃ vibhāgaṃ aggahetvā
atk-abh03a:1340_3: purimābyākataṃ viya diṭṭhigatampi abyākatanti laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānañceva uttarāpathakānañca;
atk-abh03a:1340_4: tesaṃ taṃ vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ diṭṭhigataṃ abyākatanti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a:1343_0: 709-710. Idāni apariyāpannakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā puthujjano jhānalābhī kāmesu
atk-abh03a:1343_1: vītarāgoti vattabbo hoti, na pana vigatadiṭṭhikoti, tasmā diṭṭhigataṃ apariyāpannanti
atk-abh03a:1343_2: yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi pubbaseliyānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā
atk-abh03a:1348_0: 711-717. Idāni paccayatākathā nāma hoti. Tattha yo dhammo hetupaccayena paccayo,
atk-abh03a:1348_1: so yesaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo, tesaññeva yasmā ārammaṇānantarasamanantarapaccayena
atk-abh03a:1348_2: paccayo na hoti, yo vā ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo, so yasmā tesaṃyeva anantarasamanantarapaccayena
atk-abh03a:1348_3: paccayo na hoti, tasmā paccayatā vavatthitāti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi mahāsaṅghikānaṃ;
atk-abh03a:1348_4: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamettha yathāpāḷimeva niyyātīti.
atk-abh03a:1351_0: 718-719. Idāni aññamaññapaccayakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ samaye “avijjāpaccayā
atk-abh03a:1351_1: saṅkhārā”ti ayameva tanti, “saṅkhārapaccayāpi avijjā”ti ayaṃ natthi, tasmā avijjāva
atk-abh03a:1351_2: saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo, na pana saṅkhārā avijjāyāti laddhi, seyyathāpi mahāsaṅghikānaṃ;
atk-abh03a:1351_3: te sandhāya avijjāsaṅkhārādīnaṃ aññamaññapaccayatāpi atthīti dassetuṃ pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1351_4: paṭiññā itarassa. Avijjā saṅkhārenāti ettha apuññābhisaṅkhārova gahito. Tasmā saṅkhārapaccayāpi
atk-abh03a:1351_6: Upādānapaccayāpi taṇhāti ettha ṭhapetvā kāmupādānaṃ sesāni tīṇi upādānāni avijjāya
atk-abh03a:1351_7: saṅkhārā viya taṇhāya paccayā hontīti veditabbāni. Sesaṃ yathāpāḷimeva niyyāti. Jarāmaraṇapaccayāti
atk-abh03a:1354_0: 720-721. Idāni addhākathā nāma hoti. Tattha “tīṇimāni, bhikkhave, kathāvatthūnī”ti
atk-abh03a:1354_1: suttaṃ nissāya kālasaṅkhāto addhā nāma parinipphanno atthīti yesaṃ laddhi; tesaṃ
atk-abh03a:1354_2: “addhā nāma koci parinipphanno natthi aññatra kālapaññattimattā. Rūpādayo pana khandhāva
atk-abh03a:1354_3: parinipphannā”ti vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ addhā parinipphannoti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā
atk-abh03a:1354_4: itarassa. Atha naṃ “sace so parinipphanno, rūpādīsu anena aññatarena bhavitabba”nti
atk-abh03a:1354_5: codetuṃ rūpantiādimāha. Itaro paṭikkhipati. Sesaṃ yathāpāḷimeva niyyātīti.
atk-abh03a:1357: 722-723. Khaṇalayamuhuttakathāsupi eseva nayo. Sabbepi hete khaṇādayo addhāpariyāyā evāti.
atk-abh03a:1360_0: 724-725. Idāni āsavakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā catūhi āsavehi uttari añño āsavo
atk-abh03a:1360_1: nāma natthi, yena cattāro āsavā sāsavā siyuṃ, tasmā cattāro āsavā anāsavāti yesaṃ
atk-abh03a:1360_2: laddhi, seyyathāpi hetuvādānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a:1360_3: Atha naṃ “yadi te āsavā anāsavā, evaṃ sante tehi maggādilakkhaṇappattehi bhavitabba”nti
atk-abh03a:1363_0: 726-727. Idāni jarāmaraṇakathā nāma hoti. Tattha jarāmaraṇaṃ nāma aparinipphannattā
atk-abh03a:1363_1: lokiyanti vā lokuttaranti vā na vattabbaṃ. “Lokiyā dhammā lokuttarā dhammā”ti hi
atk-abh03a:1363_2: duke jarāmaraṇaṃ neva lokiyapade, na lokuttarapade niddiṭṭhaṃ. Tattha yesaṃ imaṃ
atk-abh03a:1363_3: lakkhaṇaṃ anādiyitvā lokuttarānaṃ dhammānaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ lokuttaranti laddhi, seyyathāpi
atk-abh03a:1363_4: mahāsaṅghikānaṃ, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamettha yathāpāḷimeva niyyātīti.
atk-abh03a:1366_0: 728-729. Idāni saññāvedayitakathā nāma hoti. Tattha saññāvedayitanirodhasamāpatti
atk-abh03a:1366_1: nāma na koci dhammo, catunnaṃ pana khandhānaṃ nirodho. Iti sā neva lokiyā na lokuttarā.
atk-abh03a:1366_2: Yasmā pana lokiyā na hoti, tasmā lokuttarāti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi hetuvādānaṃyeva;
atk-abh03a:1366_3: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesaṃ purimakathāsadisamevāti.
atk-abh03a:1369: 730-731. Idāni yasmā sā lokuttarā na hoti, tasmā lokiyāti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi hetuvādānaṃ, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesaṃ purimasadisamevāti.
atk-abh03a:1372_0: 732. Idāni yasmā “asuko maraṇadhammo, asuko na maraṇadhammo”ti sattānaṃ maraṇadhammatāya
atk-abh03a:1372_1: niyāmo natthīti saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannopi kālaṃ kareyyāti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi
atk-abh03a:1372_2: rājagirikānaṃ; tesaṃ samāpannāyapi maraṇadhammatāya maraṇasamayañca amaraṇasamayañca
atk-abh03a:1372_3: dassetuṃ pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ yasmā kālaṃ karontassa nāma
atk-abh03a:1372_4: maraṇantikehi phassādīhi bhavitabbaṃ, tasmā tenākārena codetuṃ atthītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1373_0: Aphassakassa kālakiriyātiādīni puṭṭho sesasatte sandhāya paṭikkhipati visaṃ kameyyātiādīni
atk-abh03a:1373_1: puṭṭho samāpattiānubhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Dutiyavāre sarīrapakatiṃ sandhāya
atk-abh03a:1373_2: paṭijānāti. Evaṃ sante pana samāpattiānubhāvo nāma na hoti, teneva na nirodhasamāpannoti anuyuñjati.
atk-abh03a:1374_0: 733-734. Na kālaṃ kareyyāti pucchā paravādissa. Atthi so niyāmoti paravādissa pañhe
atk-abh03a:1374_1: pana yasmā evarūpo niyāmo nāma natthi, tasmā paṭikkhipati. Cakkhuviññāṇasamaṅgītiādi
atk-abh03a:1374_2: sakavādinā “niyāme asantepi maraṇasamayeneva marati, nāsamayenā”ti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1374_3: Tatrāyamadhippāyo – yadi niyāmābhāvena kālakiriyā bhaveyya, cakkhuviññāṇasamaṅginopi
atk-abh03a:1374_4: bhaveyya. Tato “pañcahi viññāṇehi na cavati, na upapajjatī”ti suttavirodho siyā.
atk-abh03a:1374_5: Yathā pana cakkhuviññāṇasamaṅgissa kālakiriyā na hoti, tathā nirodhasamāpannassāpīti.
atk-abh03a:1377_0: 735. Idāni asaññasattupikākathā nāma hoti. Tattha saññāvirāgavasena pavattabhāvanā
atk-abh03a:1377_1: asaññasamāpattipi nirodhasamāpattipi saññāvedayitanirodhasamāpatti nāma. Iti dve
atk-abh03a:1377_2: saññāvedayitanirodhasamāpattiyo lokiyā ca lokuttarā ca. Tattha lokiyā puthujjanassa
atk-abh03a:1377_3: asaññasattupikā hoti, lokuttarā ariyānaṃ, sā ca nāsaññasattupikā. Imaṃ pana vibhāgaṃ
atk-abh03a:1377_4: akatvā avisesena saññāvedayitanirodhasamāpatti asaññasattupikāti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi
atk-abh03a:1377_5: hetuvādānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ yasmā asaññasamāpattiṃ
atk-abh03a:1377_6: samāpannassa alobhādayo atthi, na nirodhasamāpattiṃ, tasmā tesaṃ vasena codetuṃ atthītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1378_0: 736. Idhāpi asaññīti pañhe idha saññāvirāgavasena samāpannattā asaññitā anuññātā,
atk-abh03a:1378_1: tatrāpi asaññasatteneva. Tasmā imaṃ paṭiññaṃ gahetvā laddhiṃ patiṭṭhapentena chalena
atk-abh03a:1378_2: patiṭṭhāpitā hoti. Idha vā nirodhasamāpattiṃ sandhāya asaññitā anuññātā. Tatrāpi
atk-abh03a:1378_3: ito cutassa anāgāmino nirodhasamāpattimeva tasmāpi imāya paṭiññāya patiṭṭhāpitā laddhi appatiṭṭhitāyevāti.
atk-abh03a:1381_0: 737. Idāni kammūpacayakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ kammūpacayo nāma kammato añño
atk-abh03a:1381_1: cittavippayutto abyākato anārammaṇoti laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānañceva sammitiyānañca;
atk-abh03a:1381_2: te sandhāya aññaṃ kammanti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ “yadi kammato
atk-abh03a:1381_3: añño kammūpacayo, phassāditopi aññena phassūpacayādinā bhavitabba”nti codetuṃ añño
atk-abh03a:1382_0: 738-739. Kammena sahajātoti pañhesu cittavippayuttaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati, cittasampayuttaṃ
atk-abh03a:1382_1: sandhāya paṭijānāti. Kusaloti pañhesupi cittavippayuttaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Parato
atk-abh03a:1383_0: 740. Sārammaṇoti puṭṭho pana ekantaṃ anārammaṇameva icchati, tasmā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1383_1: Cittaṃ bhijjamānanti yadā cittaṃ bhijjamānaṃ hoti, tadā kammaṃ bhijjatīti attho.
atk-abh03a:1383_2: Bhummatthe vā paccattaṃ, citte bhijjamāneti attho. Ayameva vā pāṭho. Tattha yasmā
atk-abh03a:1383_3: sampayutto bhijjati, vippayutto na bhijjati, tasmā paṭijānāti ceva paṭikkhipati ca.
atk-abh03a:1384_0: 741. Kammamhi kammūpacayoti kamme sati kammūpacayo, kamme vā patiṭṭhite kammūpacayo,
atk-abh03a:1384_1: kammūpacayatova vipāko nibbattati. Tasmiṃ pana kamme niruddhe yāva aṃkuruppādā bījaṃ
atk-abh03a:1384_2: viya yāva vipākuppādā kammūpacayo tiṭṭhatītissa laddhi, tasmā paṭijānāti. Taññeva
atk-abh03a:1384_3: kammaṃ, so kammūpacayo, so kammavipākoti yasmā kammamhi kammūpacayo, so ca yāva vipākuppādā
atk-abh03a:1384_4: tiṭṭhatītissa laddhi, tasmā naṃ tesaṃ tiṇṇampi ekattaṃ pucchati vipāko sārammaṇoti
atk-abh03a:1384_5: idaṃ vipāko viya vipākadhammadhammopi ārammaṇapaṭibaddhoyevāti codanatthaṃ pucchati.
atk-abh03a:1384_6: Itaro pana laddhivasenekaṃ paṭijānāti, ekaṃ paṭikkhipati. Paṭilomepi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a:1390_0: 743-744. Idāni niggahakathā nāma hoti. Tattha ye loke balappattā vasībhūtā, te yadi
atk-abh03a:1390_1: parassa cittaṃ niggaṇhituṃ na sakkuṇeyyuṃ, kā tesaṃ balappatti, ko vasībhāvo. Balappattiyā
atk-abh03a:1390_2: pana vasībhāvena ca addhā te parassa cittaṃ niggaṇhantīti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi
atk-abh03a:1390_3: mahāsaṅghikānaṃ; te sandhāya paro parassāti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a:1390_4: Tattha niggaṇhātīti saṃkilesāpattito nivāreti. Sesamettha yathāpāḷimeva niyyātīti.
atk-abh03a:1393_0: 747-748. Idāni sukhānuppadānakathā nāma hoti. Tattha “bahūnaṃ vata no bhagavā sukhadhammānaṃ
atk-abh03a:1393_1: upahattā”ti suttaṃ nissāya paro parassa sukhaṃ anuppadetīti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi
atk-abh03a:1393_2: hetuvādānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Dukkhaṃ anuppadetīti
atk-abh03a:1393_3: puṭṭho pana tādisaṃ suttapadaṃ apassanto paṭikkhipati. Attano sukhantiādipañhe yaṃ
atk-abh03a:1393_4: attano parassa vā, taṃ anuppadātuṃ na sakkā. Yaṃ tasseva, kiṃ tattha anuppadānaṃ
atk-abh03a:1393_5: nāmāti paṭikkhipati. Nevattanotiādipañhe pana yaṃ evarūpaṃ, na taṃ anuppadinnaṃ nāma
atk-abh03a:1393_6: bhavitumarahatīti laddhiyāpaṭijānāti. No ca vata retitādisassa sukhassa abhāvā vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1393_7: Sukhadhammānaṃ upahattātivacanaṃ bhagavato paresaṃ sukhuppattiyā paccayabhāvaṃ dīpeti,
atk-abh03a:1393_8: na annādīnaṃ viya sukhassa anuppadānaṃ, tasmā asādhakanti.
atk-abh03a:1396_0: 749-753. Idāni adhigayha manasikārakathā nāma hoti. Tattha duvidho manasikāro nayato
atk-abh03a:1396_1: ca ārammaṇato ca. Tattha ekasaṅkhārassāpi aniccatāya diṭṭhāya sabbe saṅkhārā aniccāti
atk-abh03a:1396_2: avasesesu nayato manasikāro hoti. Atīte pana saṅkhāre manasikaronto na anāgate manasikātuṃ
atk-abh03a:1396_3: sakkoti. Atītādīsu aññataraṃ manasikaroto ārammaṇato manasikāro hoti. Tattha paccuppanne
atk-abh03a:1396_4: manasikaronto yena cittena te manasikaroti, taṃ paccuppannakkhaṇe manasikātuṃ na
atk-abh03a:1396_5: sakkoti. Tattha yesaṃ “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”tiādivacanaṃ nissāya “manasikaronto
atk-abh03a:1396_6: nāma adhigayha adhigaṇhitvā saṅgaṇhitvā sabbe saṅkhāre ekato manasikarotī”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1396_7: seyyathāpi pubbaseliyāparaseliyānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a:1397_0: Atha naṃ yasmā sabbe ekato manasikarontena yena cittena te manasikaroti, tampi manasikātabbaṃ
atk-abh03a:1397_1: hoti. Tasmā taṃcittatāya codetuṃ tena cittenāti āha. Itaro ārammaṇaṃ katvā na sakkā
atk-abh03a:1397_2: jānitunti sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Evaṃlakkhaṇaṃ cittanti ñātattā pana tampi cittaṃ
atk-abh03a:1397_3: ñātameva hotīti sandhāya paṭijānāti. Atha vā taññeva tassa ārammaṇaṃ na hotīti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1397_4: “Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā, yadā paññāya passatī”tiādīni nissāya uppannaladdhivasena
atk-abh03a:1397_5: paṭijānāti. Sesapañhadvayepi eseva nayo. Tena phassenātiādīsu pana tathārūpaṃ suttaṃ
atk-abh03a:1397_6: apassanto paṭikkhipateva. Atītādipañhesu heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva paṭikkhepapaṭiññā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:1397_7: Sesaṃ yathāpāḷimeva niyyātīti. Sabbe saṅkhārātiādivacanaṃ nayato dassanaṃ sandhāya
atk-abh03a:1397_8: vuttaṃ, na ekakkhaṇe ārammaṇato, tasmā asādhakanti.
atk-abh03a:1400_0: 754-756. Idāni rūpaṃ hetūti kathānāma hoti. Tattha hetūti kusalamūlādino hetuhetussāpi
atk-abh03a:1400_1: nāmaṃ, yassa kassaci paccayassāpi. Imaṃ pana vibhāgaṃ akatvā “cattāro mahābhūtā hetū”ti
atk-abh03a:1400_2: vacanamattaṃ nissāya aviseseneva rūpaṃ hetūti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi uttarāpathakānaṃ;
atk-abh03a:1400_3: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Alobho hetūti kiṃ te rūpaṃ alobhasaṅkhāto
atk-abh03a:1400_4: hetūti pucchati, itaro paṭikkhipati. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Mahābhūtā upādāyarūpānaṃ
atk-abh03a:1400_5: upādāyahetūti ettha paccayaṭṭhena hetubhāvo vutto, na mūlaṭṭhena, tasmā asādhakanti.
atk-abh03a:1405_0: 760-764. Idāni rūpaṃ kusalākusalantikathā nāma hoti. Tattha “kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ
atk-abh03a:1405_2: kusalampi akusalampīti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi mahisāsakānañceva sammitiyānañca;
atk-abh03a:1405_3: te sandhāya rūpaṃ kusalanti pucchā sakavādissa paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ “yadi te
atk-abh03a:1405_4: rūpaṃ kusalaṃ, evaṃvidhena anena bhavitabba”nti codetuṃ sārammaṇanti ādimāha. Parato
atk-abh03a:1408_0: 765-767. Idāni rūpaṃ vipākotikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yaṃ kammassa katattā uppannā
atk-abh03a:1408_1: cittacetasikā viya kammassa katattā uppannaṃ taṃ rūpampi vipākoti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi
atk-abh03a:1408_2: andhakānañceva sammitiyānañca; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a:1408_3: Atha naṃ “yadi te rūpaṃ vipāko, evaṃvidhena anena bhavitabba”nti codetuṃ sukhavedanīyantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1411_0: 768-770. Idāni rūpaṃ rūpāvacarārūpāvacarantikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yaṃ kāmāvacarakammassa
atk-abh03a:1411_1: katattā rūpaṃ, taṃ yasmā kāmāvacaraṃ, tasmā rūpāvacarārūpāvacarakammānampi katattā
atk-abh03a:1411_2: rūpena rūpāvacarārūpāvacarena bhavitabbanti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ;
atk-abh03a:1411_3: te sandhāya atthi rūpaṃ rūpāvacarārūpāvacaranti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a:1414_0: 771-775. Idāni rūparāgo rūpadhātupariyāpanno arūparāgo arūpadhātupariyāpannoti kathā
atk-abh03a:1414_1: nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā kāmarāgo kāmadhātupariyāpanno, tasmā rūparāgārūparāgehipi
atk-abh03a:1414_2: rūpadhātuarūpadhātupariyāpannehi bhavitabbanti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1414_3: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1414_4: Kevalañhi tattha “rūpadhātuṃ anuseti, arūpadhātuṃ anusetī”ti padaṃ viseso. Sā ca
atk-abh03a:1420_0: 776-779. Idāni atthi arahato puññūpacayotikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ arahato dānasaṃvibhāgacetiyavandanādīni
atk-abh03a:1420_1: kammāni disvā atthi arahato puññūpacayoti laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya
atk-abh03a:1420_2: pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ “arahā nāma pahīnapuññapāpo, so yadi
atk-abh03a:1420_3: puññaṃ kareyya, pāpampi kareyyā”ti codetuṃ apuññūpacayoti āha. Itaro pāṇātipātādikiriyaṃ
atk-abh03a:1420_4: apassanto paṭikkhipati. Puññābhisaṅkhārantiādīsu bhavagāmikammaṃ arahato natthīti
atk-abh03a:1420_5: paṭikkhipati. Dānaṃ dadeyyātiādīsu kiriyacittena dānādipavattisabbhāvato sakavādī
atk-abh03a:1420_6: paṭijānāti. Itaro cittaṃ anādiyitvā kiriyāpavattimattadassaneneva laddhiṃ patiṭṭhapeti.
atk-abh03a:1420_7: Sā pana ayoniso patiṭṭhāpitattā appatiṭṭhāpitā hotīti.
atk-abh03a:1423_0: 780. Idāni natthi arahato akālamaccūtikathā nāma hoti. Tattha “nāhaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-abh03a:1423_1: sañcetanikānaṃ kammānaṃ katānaṃ upacitānaṃ apaṭisaṃveditvā byantībhāvaṃ vadāmī”ti
atk-abh03a:1423_2: suttassa atthaṃ ayoniso gahetvā “arahatā nāma sabbakammavipākaṃ paṭisaṃvedayitvāva
atk-abh03a:1423_3: parinibbāyitabbaṃ, tasmā natthi, arahato akālamaccū”ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi rājagirikānañceva
atk-abh03a:1423_4: siddhatthikānañca; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ “sace
atk-abh03a:1423_5: tassa natthi akālamaccu, arahantaghātakena nāma na bhavitabba”nti codetuṃ natthi
atk-abh03a:1423_6: arahantaghātakoti āha. Itaro ānantariyakammassa ceva tādisānañca puggalānaṃ sabbhāvato paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1424: 781. Visaṃ na kameyyāti pañhe “yāva pubbe katakammaṃ parikkhayaṃ na gacchati, tāva na kamatī”ti laddhiyā paṭikkhipati. Sesamettha yathāpāḷimeva niyyāti.
atk-abh03a:1425_0: 782. Nāhaṃ, bhikkhaveti suttaṃ idaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – sañcetanikānaṃ kammānaṃ katānaṃ
atk-abh03a:1425_1: vipākaṃ apaṭisaṃveditvā avinditvā ananubhavitvā byantībhāvaṃ tesaṃ kammānaṃ parivaṭumaparicchinnabhāvaṃ
atk-abh03a:1425_2: na vadāmi, tañca kho diṭṭhadhammavedanīyānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme, na tato paraṃ, upapajjavedanīyānaṃ
atk-abh03a:1425_3: anantaraṃ upapattiṃ upapajjitvāva na tato paraṃ, aparāpariyavedanīyānaṃ yadā vipākokāsaṃ
atk-abh03a:1425_4: labhanti, tathārūpe aparāpare vā pariyāye. Evaṃ sabbathāpi saṃsārapavatte sati laddhavipākavāre
atk-abh03a:1425_5: kamme na vijjateso jagatippadeso, yatthaṭṭhito mucceyya pāpakammāti. Evaṃ sante yadetaṃ
atk-abh03a:1425_7: arahato akālamaccū”ti laddhipatiṭṭhāpanaṃ kataṃ, taṃ dukkaṭamevāti.
atk-abh03a:1428_0: 783. Idāni sabbamidaṃ kammatotikathā nāma hoti. Tattha “kammunā vattati loko”ti suttaṃ
atk-abh03a:1428_1: nissāya “sabbamidaṃ kammakilesavipākavaṭṭaṃ kammatova hotī”ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi
atk-abh03a:1428_2: rājagirikānañceva siddhatthikānañca; te sandhāya sabbamidanti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1428_3: paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ “evaṃ sante kammampi kammato āpajjatī”ti codetuṃ kammampi
atk-abh03a:1428_4: kammatoti āha. Itaro yadi kammampi kammatova nāma taṃ kammaṃ vipākoyeva siyāti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1428_5: Pubbekatahetūti “yadi sabbamidaṃ kammato, pubbekatahetunā tena bhavitabba”nti codetuṃ
atk-abh03a:1429_0: 784. Kammavipākatoti “yadi sabbamidaṃ kammato, yaṃ atītabhave pavattassa hetubhūtaṃ
atk-abh03a:1429_1: kammaṃ, tampi purimatare bhave kammatoti kammavipāko sampajjati, tena te sabbamidaṃ
atk-abh03a:1429_2: kammavipākato āpajjatī”ti codetuṃ pucchati. Itaro bījato aṃkurasseva paccuppannapavattassa
atk-abh03a:1429_3: kammato nibbattiṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho tassāpi kammassa bījassa
atk-abh03a:1429_4: purimabījato viya purimakammato pavattattā paṭijānāti. Pāṇaṃ haneyyātiādi “yadi sabbaṃ
atk-abh03a:1429_5: kammavipākato, pāṇātipātādīni kammavipākeneva kareyyā”ti codetuṃ vuttaṃ. Itaro dussīlyacetanāpi
atk-abh03a:1429_6: purimakammanibbattā ekena pariyāyena vipākoyevāti laddhiyā paṭijānāti. Atha naṃ “yadi
atk-abh03a:1429_7: te pāṇātipāto kammavipākato nibbattati, pāṇātipāto viya vipākopi saphalo āpajjatī”ti
atk-abh03a:1429_8: codetuṃ saphaloti āha. Itaro pāṇātipātassa nirayasaṃvattanikādibhāvato saphalataṃ
atk-abh03a:1429_9: passanto paṭijānāti. Kammavipākassa pana idaṃ nāma phalanti vuttaṭṭhānaṃ apassanto
atk-abh03a:1429_10: paṭikkhipati. Adinnādānādīsupi eseva nayo. Gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāro saphaloti
atk-abh03a:1429_11: deyyadhammavasena dānaphalaṃ pucchati. Kammunā vattatīti suttaṃ “natthi kamma”nti
atk-abh03a:1429_12: akammavāditaṃ paṭikkhipitvā “atthi kamma”nti kammavāditaṃ kammassakataṃ dīpeti. Na
atk-abh03a:1432_0: 786-787. Idāni indriyabaddhakathā nāma hoti. Tattha duvidhaṃ dukkhaṃ – indriyabaddhaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1432_1: anindriyabaddhañca. Indriyabaddhaṃ dukkhavatthutāya dukkhaṃ, anindriyabaddhaṃ udayabbayapaṭipīḷanaṭṭhena
atk-abh03a:1432_2: “yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkha”nti saṅgahitattā dukkhaṃ. Imaṃ vibhāgaṃ aggahetvā “yassa pariññāya
atk-abh03a:1432_3: bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussati, taṃ indriyabaddhameva dukkhaṃ, na itara”nti yesaṃ
atk-abh03a:1432_4: laddhi, seyyathāpi hetuvādānaṃ, tesaṃ itarassāpi dukkhabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ indriyabaddhaññevāti
atk-abh03a:1432_5: pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ “yasmā bhagavatā ‘yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkha’nti
atk-abh03a:1432_6: vuttaṃ, tasmā indriyabaddheneva tena aniccena bhavitabba”nti codetuṃ indriyabaddhaññeva
atk-abh03a:1432_7: aniccantiādimāha. Nanu anindriyabaddhaṃ aniccanti nanu pathavīpabbatapāsāṇādi anindriyabaddhampi aniccanti attho.
atk-abh03a:1433_0: 788. Na vattabbaṃ indriyabaddhaññeva dukkhanti pañhe āmantāti paṭiññā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:1433_1: Anindriyabaddhañhi dukkhadomanassānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Uṇhakālasmiñhi aggi sītakāle
atk-abh03a:1433_2: ca vāto dukkhassa ārammaṇaṃ, niccampi bhogavināsādayo domanassassa. Tasmā vināpi
atk-abh03a:1433_3: aniccaṭṭhena anindriyabaddhaṃ dukkhanti vattabbaṃ. Kammakilesehi pana anibbattattā
atk-abh03a:1433_4: dukkhaṃ ariyasaccanti na vattabbaṃ, tathā maggena apariññeyyattā. Yasmā pana tiṇakaṭṭhādinirodho
atk-abh03a:1433_5: vā utubījādinirodho vā dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ nāma na hoti, tasmā indriyabaddhaṃ
atk-abh03a:1433_6: dukkhañceva ariyasaccañca, itaraṃ pana dukkhamevāti idaṃ nānattaṃ dassetuṃ paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1433_7: Yathā indriyabaddhassātiādivacanaṃ indriyabaddhassa pariññāya brahmacariyavāsaṃ pariññātassa
atk-abh03a:1433_8: puna anuppattiṃ dīpeti. Tenevettha sakavādinā paṭikkhepo kato. “Yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkha”nti
atk-abh03a:1433_9: vacanena pana saṅgahitassa anindriyabaddhassa dukkhabhāvaṃ paṭisedhetuṃ na sakkāti, tasmā asādhakanti.
atk-abh03a:1436_0: 789-790. Idāni ṭhapetvā ariyamaggantikathā nāma hoti. Tattha “yasmā ariyamaggo ‘dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadā’ti
atk-abh03a:1436_1: vutto, tasmā ṭhapetvā ariyamaggaṃ avasesā saṅkhārā dukkhā”ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi
atk-abh03a:1436_2: hetuvādānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ “yadi evaṃ
atk-abh03a:1436_3: samudayassāpi dukkhabhāvo āpajjatī”ti codetuṃ dukkhasamudayopīti āha. Itaro hetulakkhaṇaṃ
atk-abh03a:1436_4: sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Puna puṭṭho pavattapariyāpannabhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1436_5: Tīṇevāti pañhesu suttavirodhabhayena paṭikkhipati, laddhivasena paṭijānāti. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a:1439_0: 791-792. Idāni na vattabbaṃ saṅgho dakkhiṇaṃ paṭiggaṇhātītikathā nāma hoti. Tattha
atk-abh03a:1439_1: “paramatthato maggaphalāneva saṅgho, maggaphalehi añño saṅgho nāma natthi, maggaphalāni
atk-abh03a:1439_2: ca na kiñci paṭiggaṇhanti, tasmā na vattabbaṃ saṅgho dakkhiṇaṃ paṭiggaṇhātī”ti yesaṃ
atk-abh03a:1439_3: laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi mahāpuññavādīsaṅkhātānaṃ vetullakānaṃ; te sandhāya na
atk-abh03a:1439_4: vattabbanti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ “yadi saṅgho na paṭiggaṇheyya,
atk-abh03a:1439_5: na naṃ satthā āhuneyyātiādīhi thomeyyā”ti codetuṃ nanu saṅgho āhuneyyotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1439_6: Saṅghassa dānaṃ dentīti “ye te saṅghassa denti, te paṭiggāhakesu asati kassa dadeyyu”nti
atk-abh03a:1439_7: codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Āhutiṃ jātavedo vāti suttaṃ parasamayato āgataṃ. Tattha mahāmeghanti
atk-abh03a:1439_8: meghavuṭṭhiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Vuṭṭhiñhi medanī paṭiggaṇhāti, na meghameva. Maggo
atk-abh03a:1439_9: paṭiggaṇhātīti “maggaphalāni saṅgho”ti laddhiyā vadati, na ca maggaphalāneva saṅgho.
atk-abh03a:1439_10: Maggaphalapātubhāvaparisuddhe pana khandhe upādāya paññattā aṭṭha puggalā saṅgho,
atk-abh03a:1442_0: 793-794. Idāni na vattabbaṃ saṅgho dakkhiṇaṃ visodhetītikathā nāma hoti. Tattha “maggaphalāneva
atk-abh03a:1442_1: saṅgho nāma, na ca tāni dakkhiṇaṃ visodhetuṃ sakkonti, tasmā na vattabbaṃ saṅgho
atk-abh03a:1442_2: dakkhiṇaṃ visodhetī”ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi tesaññeva; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1442_3: paṭiññā itarassa. Āhuneyyotiādi “yadi saṅgho dakkhiṇaṃ visodhetuṃ na sakkuṇeyya,
atk-abh03a:1442_4: na naṃ satthā evaṃ thomeyyā”ti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Visodhetīti mahapphalaṃ karoti.
atk-abh03a:1442_5: Saṅghasmiñhi appaṃ dinnaṃ bahu hoti, bahu dinnaṃ bahutaraṃ. Dakkhiṇeyyāti dakkhiṇārahā
atk-abh03a:1442_6: dakkhiṇāya anucchavikā, dakkhiṇaṃ visodhetuṃ samatthāti attho. Dakkhiṇaṃ ārādhentīti
atk-abh03a:1442_7: sampādenti, appamattikāyapi dakkhiṇāya mahantaṃ phalaṃ pāpuṇantīti attho. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayamevāti.
atk-abh03a:1445_0: 795-796. Idāni na vattabbaṃ saṅgho bhuñjatītikathā nāma hoti. Tatrāpi “maggaphalāneva
atk-abh03a:1445_1: saṅgho nāma, na ca tāni kiñci bhuñjanti, tasmā na vattabbaṃ saṅgho bhuñjati, pivati,
atk-abh03a:1445_2: khādati, sāyatī”ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi tesaṃyeva; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1445_3: paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ “yadi saṅgho na bhuñjeyya, saṅghabhattādikaraṇaṃ niratthakaṃ
atk-abh03a:1445_4: bhaveyyā”ti codetuṃ nanu atthi keci saṅghabhattāni karontītiādimāha. Gaṇabhojanantiādi
atk-abh03a:1445_5: “yadi saṅgho na bhuñjeyya, kassa gaṇabhojanādīni siyu”nti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Aṭṭha
atk-abh03a:1445_6: pānānīti idampi “yadi saṅgho na piveyya, kassetāni pānāni satthā anujāneyyā”ti codanatthaṃ
atk-abh03a:1448_0: 797-798. Idāni na vattabbaṃ saṅghassa dinnaṃ mahapphalantikathā nāma hoti. Tatrāpi
atk-abh03a:1448_1: “maggaphalāneva saṅgho nāma, na ca sakkā tesaṃ kiñci dātuṃ, na ca tehi paṭiggaṇhituṃ,
atk-abh03a:1448_2: nāpi tesaṃ dānena koci upakāro ijjhati, tasmā na vattabbaṃ saṅghassa dinnaṃ mahapphala”nti
atk-abh03a:1448_3: yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi tesaṃyeva; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a:1448_4: Āhuneyyotiādi “yadi saṅghassa dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ na bhaveyya, na naṃ satthā evaṃ
atk-abh03a:1448_5: thomeyyā”ti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Sesaṃ yathāpāḷimeva niyyātīti.
atk-abh03a:1451_0: 799. Idāni na vattabbaṃ buddhassa dinnaṃ mahapphalantikathā nāma hoti. Tattha “buddho
atk-abh03a:1451_1: bhagavā na kiñci paribhuñjati, lokānuvattanatthaṃ pana paribhuñjamānaṃ viya attānaṃ
atk-abh03a:1451_2: dasseti, tasmā nirupakārattā na vattabbaṃ tasmiṃ dinnaṃ mahapphala”nti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1451_3: seyyathāpi tesaṃyeva; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Dvipadānaṃ
atk-abh03a:1451_4: aggotiādi “manussadussīlepi dānaṃ sahassaguṇaṃ hoti, kimaṅgaṃ pana evarūpe aggapuggale”ti
atk-abh03a:1454_0: 800-801. Idāni dakkhiṇāvisuddhikathā nāma hoti. Tattha “yadi paṭiggāhakato dakkhiṇā
atk-abh03a:1454_1: visujjheyya, mahapphalā bhaveyya. Dāyakena dānaṃ dinnaṃ, paṭiggāhakena vipāko nibbattitoti
atk-abh03a:1454_2: añño aññassa kārako bhaveyya, paraṃkataṃ sukhadukkhaṃ āpajjeyya, añño kareyya, añño
atk-abh03a:1454_3: paṭisaṃvedeyya. Tasmā dāyakatova dānaṃ visujjhati, no paṭiggāhakato, dāyakasseva
atk-abh03a:1454_4: cittavisuddhi vipākadāyikā hotī”ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi uttarāpathakānaṃ; te
atk-abh03a:1454_5: sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Āhuneyyātiādi “yadi paṭiggāhakato
atk-abh03a:1454_6: dānaṃ na visujjheyya, kimassa āhuneyyādibhāvo kareyyā”ti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Añño
atk-abh03a:1454_7: aññassa kārakoti yadi dāyakassa dānacetanā paṭiggāhakena katā bhaveyya, yuttarūpaṃ
atk-abh03a:1454_8: siyā. Tassa pana dānacetanā parisuddhā paṭiggāhakasaṅkhātaṃ vatthuṃ paṭicca mahāvipākaṭṭhena
atk-abh03a:1454_9: visujjhati, tasmā acodanā esā “paṭiggāhakato dānaṃ visujjhatī”ti.
atk-abh03a:1459_0: 802-803. Idāni manussalokakathā nāma hoti. Tattha “tathāgato loke, jāto loke saṃvaḍḍho,
atk-abh03a:1459_1: lokaṃ abhibhuyya viharati anupalitto lokenā”ti suttaṃ ayoniso gahetvā “bhagavā tusitabhavane
atk-abh03a:1459_2: nibbatto tattheva vasati, na manussalokaṃ āgacchati, nimmitarūpamattakaṃ panettha
atk-abh03a:1459_3: dassetī”ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi vetullakānaṃyeva, te sandhāya pucchā
atk-abh03a:1459_4: sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ puṭṭhokāsena ceva suttasādhanena ca saññāpetuṃ
atk-abh03a:1459_5: nanu atthītiādimāha. Loke jātoti paravādī tusitapuraṃ sandhāya vadati. Satthārā panetaṃ
atk-abh03a:1459_6: manussalokaññeva sandhāya lokaṃ vuttaṃ. Lokaṃ abhibhuyyāti paravādī manussalokaṃ
atk-abh03a:1459_7: abhibhavitvāti diṭṭhiyā vadati, satthā pana ārammaṇalokaṃ abhibhavitvā vihāsi. Anupalitto
atk-abh03a:1459_8: lokenāti paravādī manussalokena anupalittataṃva sandhāya vadati, satthā pana lokadhammesu
atk-abh03a:1462_0: 804-806. Idāni dhammadesanākathā nāma hoti. Tattha “tusitapure ṭhito bhagavā dhammadesanatthāya
atk-abh03a:1462_1: abhinimmitaṃ pesesi, tena ceva tassa ca desanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā āyasmatā ānandena
atk-abh03a:1462_2: dhammo desito, na buddhena bhagavatā”ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi vetullakānaññeva;
atk-abh03a:1462_3: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ “yadi tena dhammo desito,
atk-abh03a:1462_4: sveva satthā bhaveyyā”ti codetuṃ abhinimmito jinotiādimāha. Itaro tathā asampaṭicchanto
atk-abh03a:1465_0: 807-808. Idāni karuṇākathā nāma hoti. Tattha piyāyitānaṃ vatthūnaṃ vipattiyā sarāgānaṃ
atk-abh03a:1465_1: rāgavasena karuṇāpatirūpikaṃ pavattiṃ disvā “rāgova karuṇā nāma, so ca bhagavato
atk-abh03a:1465_2: natthi, tasmā natthi buddhassa bhagavato karuṇā”ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi uttarāpathakānaṃ;
atk-abh03a:1465_3: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ “karuṇā nāmesā nikkilesatāya
atk-abh03a:1465_4: ceva sattārammaṇatāya ca cetovimuttitāya ca ekādasānisaṃsatāya ca mettādīhi samānajātikā,
atk-abh03a:1465_5: tasmā yadi bhagavato karuṇā natthi, mettādayopissa na siyu”nti codanatthaṃ natthi
atk-abh03a:1465_6: buddhassa bhagavato mettātiādimāha. Ākāruṇikoti pañhe tathārūpaṃ vohāraṃ apassanto
atk-abh03a:1468_0: 809. Idāni gandhajātakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ buddhe bhagavati ayoniso pemavasena
atk-abh03a:1468_1: “bhagavato uccārapassāvo aññe gandhajāte ativiya adhigaṇhāti, natthi tato ca sugandhataraṃ
atk-abh03a:1468_2: gandhajāta”nti laddhi, seyyathāpi ekaccānaṃ andhakānañceva uttarāpathakānañca; te
atk-abh03a:1468_3: sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamettha yathāpāḷimeva niyyātīti.
atk-abh03a:1471_0: 810-811. Idāni ekamaggakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ buddhe bhagavati ayoniso pemavaseneva
atk-abh03a:1471_1: “bhagavā sotāpanno hutvā sakadāgāmī, sakadāgāmī hutvā anāgāmī, anāgāmī hutvā arahattaṃ
atk-abh03a:1471_2: sacchākāsi, ekeneva pana ariyamaggena cattāri phalāni sacchākāsī”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi
atk-abh03a:1471_3: tesaññeva; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ catūhi phalehi
atk-abh03a:1471_4: saddhiṃ uppannānaṃ catunnaṃ phassādīnaṃ ekato samodhānavasena codetuṃ catunnaṃ phassānantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1471_6: ca vutte tena sakkāyadiṭṭhiādīnaṃ pahānābhāvavasena codeti. Bhagavā sotāpannoti buddhabhūtassa
atk-abh03a:1471_7: sotāpannabhāvo natthīti paṭikkhipati. Parato pañhadvayepi eseva nayo. Sesamettha
atk-abh03a:1474_0: 813-816. Idāni jhānasaṅkantikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ “idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu
atk-abh03a:1474_1: vivicceva kāmehi paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā
atk-abh03a:1474_2: dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ, tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ, catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatī”ti imaṃ paṭipāṭidesanaṃ
atk-abh03a:1474_3: nissāya “tassa tassa jhānassa upacārappavattiṃ vināva jhānā jhānaṃ saṅkamatī”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1474_4: seyyathāpi mahisāsakānañceva ekaccānañca andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1474_5: paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ “yadi te dutiyajjhānūpacāraṃ appatvā uppaṭipāṭiyā paṭhamajjhānā
atk-abh03a:1474_6: dutiyajjhānameva saṅkamati, paṭhamato tatiyaṃ, dutiyato catutthampi saṅkameyyā”ti
atk-abh03a:1474_7: codetuṃ paṭhamā jhānātiādimāha. Yā paṭhamassātiādi “yadi paṭhamato anantaraṃ dutiyaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1474_8: dutiyādīhi vā tatiyādīni samāpajjati, ekāvajjanena samāpajjeyyā”ti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1474_9: Kāme ādīnavatoti paṭhamaṃ kāme ādīnavato manasi karoto pacchā uppajjati. Jhānakkhaṇe
atk-abh03a:1474_10: panesa nimittameva manasi karoti. Taññeva paṭhamanti “yadi purimajavanato pacchimajavanaṃ
atk-abh03a:1474_11: viya anantaraṃ uppajjeyya, ṭhapetvā purimapacchimabhāvaṃ lakkhaṇato taññeva taṃ bhaveyyā”ti
atk-abh03a:1474_12: codetuṃ pucchati. Iminā upāyena sabbattha attho veditabbo. Vivicceva kāmehītiādīhi
atk-abh03a:1474_13: paṭipāṭiyā jhānānaṃ desitabhāvaṃ dīpeti, na anantaruppattiṃ, tasmā asādhakanti.
atk-abh03a:1477_0: 817-818. Idāni jhānantarikakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ samaye “pañcakanaye pañca
atk-abh03a:1477_1: jhānāni vibhattāni, kevalaṃ tayo samādhī uddiṭṭhā”ti avitakkavicāramattassa samādhino
atk-abh03a:1477_2: okāsaṃ ajānantānaṃ “paṭhamassa ca dutiyassa ca jhānassa antare jhānantarikā nāma
atk-abh03a:1477_3: esā”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi sammitiyānañceva ekaccānañca andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā
atk-abh03a:1477_4: sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ “jhānampi cetasikā dhammā, phassādayopi,
atk-abh03a:1477_5: tasmā yadi jhānantarikā nāma bhaveyya, phassantarikādīhipi bhavitabba”nti codanatthaṃ
atk-abh03a:1478_0: Dutiyassa ca jhānassāti “yadi jhānantarikā nāma bhaveyya, dutiyatatiyādīnipi jhānāneva,
atk-abh03a:1478_1: tesampi antarikāya bhavitabba”nti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. So kevalaṃ laddhiyā abhāvena
atk-abh03a:1478_2: paṭikkhipati ceva paṭijānāti ca. Paṭhamassa cāti puṭṭho laddhivasena paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a:1479: 819. Savitakko savicārotiādi “tiṇṇampi samādhīnaṃ samādhibhāve samāne avitakko vicāramattova samādhi jhānantariko, na itaroti ko ettha visesahetū”ti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1480_0: 820-822. Dvinnaṃ jhānānaṃ paṭuppannānanti paṭhamadutiyāni sandhāya pucchati. Itaro
atk-abh03a:1480_1: “tesaṃ paccuppannānaṃyeva antare avitakko vicāramatto samādhi jhānantariko nāma hotī”ti
atk-abh03a:1480_2: laddhiyā paṭijānāti. Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ niruddhanti puṭṭho tiṇṇaṃ ekakkhaṇe pavatti
atk-abh03a:1480_3: na yuttāti paṭijānāti. Avitakko vicāramatto samādhi paṭhamaṃ jhānanti catukkanayavasena
atk-abh03a:1480_4: pucchati. Sakavādī tasmiṃ naye tassa abhāvā paṭikkhipati. Nanu tayo samādhīti etthāyamadhippāyo
atk-abh03a:1480_5: – yathā tesu tīsu samādhīsu dve samādhī jhānāneva, na jhānantarikā, evaṃ itarenapi
atk-abh03a:1483_0: 823-825. Idāni samāpanno saddaṃ suṇātītikathā nāma hoti. Tattha “yasmā paṭhamassa
atk-abh03a:1483_1: jhānassa saddo kaṇḍako vutto bhagavatā, yadi ca samāpanno taṃ na suṇeyya, kathaṃ
atk-abh03a:1483_2: kaṇḍako siyā. Tasmā samāpanno saddaṃ, suṇātī”ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi pubbaseliyānaṃ;
atk-abh03a:1483_3: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Cakkhunā rūpaṃ passatītiādi “samāpannassa
atk-abh03a:1483_4: tāva pañcadvārappavattaṃ natthi, tasmiṃ asati yadi so saddaṃ suṇeyya, rūpampi passeyyā”ti
atk-abh03a:1483_5: codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Saddo kaṇḍakoti vikkhepakarattā vuttaṃ. Oḷārikena hi saddena
atk-abh03a:1483_6: sote ghaṭṭite paṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti, tenetaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā asādhakaṃ. Dutiyassa
atk-abh03a:1483_7: jhānassātiādi “yathā aññopi kaṇḍako antosamāpattiyaṃ natthi, evaṃ saddassavanampī”ti
atk-abh03a:1486_0: 826-827. Idāni cakkhunā rūpaṃ passatītikathā nāma hoti. Tattha “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā”ti
atk-abh03a:1486_1: vacanaṃ nissāya “pasādacakkhumeva rūpaṃ passatī”ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi mahāsaṅghikānaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1486_2: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ “yadi cakkhunā rūpaṃ passeyya,
atk-abh03a:1486_3: rūpena rūpaṃ passeyyātī”ti codetuṃ rūpena rūpaṃ passatīti āha. Itaro rūpāyatanaṃ
atk-abh03a:1486_4: sandhāya paṭikkhipitvā puna puṭṭho cakkhumeva sandhāya paṭijānāti. Paṭivijānātīti
atk-abh03a:1486_5: ettha ayamadhippāyo – passatīti hi mayaṃ paṭijānanaṃ sandhāya pucchāma, na cakkhūpasaṃhāramattaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1486_6: Tasmā vadehi tāva “kiṃ te cakkhumā rūpena rūpaṃ paṭivijānātī”ti. Itaro purimanayeneva
atk-abh03a:1486_7: paṭikkhipati ceva paṭijānāti ca. Atha naṃ “evaṃ sante rūpaṃ manoviññāṇaṃ āpajjati,
atk-abh03a:1486_8: tañhi paṭivijānāti nāmā”ti codetuṃ rūpaṃ manoviññāṇanti āha. Itaro lesaṃ alabhanto
atk-abh03a:1486_9: paṭikkhipateva. Atthi cakkhussa āvaṭṭanātiādi “yadi cakkhu paṭivijānanaṭṭhena passati,
atk-abh03a:1486_10: cakkhuviññāṇassa viya tassāpi āvajjanāya bhavitabba”nti codetuṃ pucchati. Itaro yasmā
atk-abh03a:1486_11: na āvajjanapaṭibaddhaṃ cakkhu, na taṃ āvajjanānantaraṃ uppajjati, tasmā na hevanti
atk-abh03a:1486_12: paṭikkhipati. Sotena saddantiādīsupi eseva nayo. Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhunā
atk-abh03a:1486_13: rūpaṃ passatīti sasambhārakathānayena vuttaṃ. Yathā hi usunā vijjhantopi “dhanunā
atk-abh03a:1486_14: vijjhatī”ti vuccati, evaṃ cakkhuviññāṇena passantopi “cakkhunā passatī”ti vutto,
atk-abh03a:1491_0: 828-831. Idāni kilesapajahanakathā nāma hoti. Tattha “yasmā kilesapahānaṃ nāma atthi,
atk-abh03a:1491_1: pahīnakilesassa ca atītāpi kilesā pahīnāva honti, anāgatāpi, paccuppannāpi, tasmā
atk-abh03a:1491_2: atītepi kilese pajahati, anāgatepi, paccuppannepī”ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi ekaccānaṃ
atk-abh03a:1491_3: uttarāpathakānaṃ; te sandhāya atītetiādipucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesaṃ
atk-abh03a:1491_4: yathāpāḷimeva niyyāti. Natthi kilese jahatīti imasmiṃ pana paravādissa pañhe yasmā
atk-abh03a:1491_5: kacavaraṃ pajahantassa kacavare chaḍḍanavāyāmo viya kilese pajahantassa na atītādibhedesu
atk-abh03a:1491_6: kilesesu vāyāmo atthi, nibbānārammaṇe pana ariyamagge pavattite kilesā anuppannāyeva
atk-abh03a:1491_7: nuppajjantīti pahīnā nāma honti, tasmā na hevanti paṭikkhipati. Tena hi atīte kilese
atk-abh03a:1491_8: pajahatītiādi pana yasmā “natthi kilesapajahanā”ti na vattabbaṃ, tasmā atītādibhede
atk-abh03a:1494_0: 832. Idāni suññatakathā nāma hoti. Tattha suññatāti dve suññatā khandhānañca anattalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-abh03a:1494_1: nibbānañca. Tesu anattalakkhaṇaṃ tāva ekaccaṃ ekena pariyāyena siyā saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1494_2: nibbānaṃ, apariyāpannameva. Imaṃ pana vibhāgaṃ aggahetvā “suññatā saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannā”ti
atk-abh03a:1494_3: yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a:1494_4: Animittanti sabbanimittarahitaṃ nibbānaṃ. “Appaṇihito”tipi tasseva nāmaṃ. Kasmā panetaṃ
atk-abh03a:1494_5: ābhatanti? Avibhajjavādīvāde dosāropanatthaṃ. Yassa hi avibhajitvā “ekadeseneva suññatā
atk-abh03a:1494_7: āpajjati. Imassa dosassāropanatthaṃ “animittaṃ appaṇihita”nti ābhataṃ. Itaro tassa
atk-abh03a:1494_8: pariyāpannabhāvaṃ anicchanto paṭikkhipati. Saṅkhārakkhandho na aniccotiādi nibbānasaṅkhātāya
atk-abh03a:1495_0: 833. Saṅkhārakkhandhassa suññatāti “yadi aññassa khandhassa suññatā aññakkhandhapariyāpannā,
atk-abh03a:1495_2: vuttaṃ. Saṅkhārakkhandhassa suññatā na vattabbātiādi “yadi saṅkhārakkhandhasuññatā
atk-abh03a:1496_0: 834. Suññamidaṃ, bhikkhave, saṅkhārāti suttaṃ parasamayato ābhataṃ. Tattha saṅkhārāti
atk-abh03a:1496_1: “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”ti āgataṭṭhāne viya pañcakkhandhā, te ca attattaniyasuññattā
atk-abh03a:1496_2: suññatāti sāsanāvacaraṃ hoti, na virujjhati, tasmā anuññātaṃ. Yasmā panetaṃ na suññatāya
atk-abh03a:1499_0: 835-836. Idāni sāmaññaphalakathā nāma hoti. Tattha maggavīthiyampi phalasamāpattivīthiyampi
atk-abh03a:1499_1: ariyamaggassa vipākacittaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ nāmāti sakasamaye sanniṭṭhānaṃ. Yesaṃ pana
atk-abh03a:1499_2: tathā aggahetvā “kilesapahānañceva phaluppatti ca sāmaññaphalaṃ, tasmā asaṅkhata”nti
atk-abh03a:1499_3: laddhi, seyyathāpi pubbaseliyānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a:1499_4: Sesamettha heṭṭhā vuttanayattā yathā pāḷimeva niyyātīti.
atk-abh03a:1502_0: 837-840. Idāni pattikathā nāma hoti. Tattha “yaṃ yaṃ paṭilabbhati, tassa tassa paṭilābho
atk-abh03a:1502_1: patti nāma. Sā ca asaṅkhatā”ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi pubbaseliyānaññeva; te sandhāya
atk-abh03a:1502_2: pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamidhāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayattā yathāpāḷimeva
atk-abh03a:1502_3: niyyātīti. Na vattabbantiādi yāya laddhiyā patti asaṅkhatāti maññati, taṃ pakāsetuṃ
atk-abh03a:1502_4: vuttaṃ. Tattha sakavādī “na hevaṃ vattabbe”ti paṭikkhipanto kevalaṃ pattiyā rūpādibhāvaṃ
atk-abh03a:1502_5: na sampaṭicchati. Na hi patti nāma koci dhammo atthi, na pana asaṅkhatabhāvaṃ anujānāti.
atk-abh03a:1502_6: Itaro pana paṭikkhepamatteneva asaṅkhatāti laddhiṃ patiṭṭhapeti, sā ayoniso patiṭṭhāpitattā appatiṭṭhitāyevāti.
atk-abh03a:1505_0: 841-843. Idāni tathatākathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ “rūpādīnaṃ sabbadhammānaṃ rūpādisabhāvatāsaṅkhātā
atk-abh03a:1505_1: tathatā nāma atthi, sā ca saṅkhatesu rūpādīsu apariyāpannattā asaṅkhatā”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1505_2: seyyathāpi ekaccānaṃ uttarāpathakānaṃ, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a:1508_0: 844-846. Idāni kusalakathā nāma hoti. Tattha anavajjampi kusalaṃ iṭṭhapākampi. Anavajjaṃ
atk-abh03a:1508_1: nāma kilesavippayuttaṃ. Ayaṃ nayo ṭhapetvā akusalaṃ sabbadhamme bhajati. Iṭṭhavipākaṃ
atk-abh03a:1508_2: nāma āyatiṃ upapattipavattesu iṭṭhaphalanipphādakaṃ puññaṃ. Ayaṃ nayo kusalattike
atk-abh03a:1508_3: ādipadameva bhajati. Yesaṃ pana imaṃ vibhāgaṃ aggahetvā anavajjabhāvamatteneva nibbānaṃ
atk-abh03a:1508_4: kusalanti laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ, tesaṃ iṭṭhavipākaṭṭhena nibbānassa kusalatābhāvaṃ
atk-abh03a:1508_5: dīpetuṃ pucchā sakavādissa, attano laddhivasena paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamidhāpi heṭṭhā
atk-abh03a:1511_0: 847. Idāni accantaniyāmakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ “sakiṃ nimuggo nimuggova hotī”ti
atk-abh03a:1511_1: suttaṃ nissāya “atthi puthujjanassa accantaniyāmatā”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi ekaccānaṃ
atk-abh03a:1511_2: uttarāpathakānaṃ, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Mātughātakotiādi
atk-abh03a:1511_4: te accantaniyatehi bhavitabba”nti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Itaro “niyatamicchādiṭṭhiko
atk-abh03a:1511_5: saṃsārakhāṇuko bhavantarepi niyatova ime pana ekasmiññeva attabhāve”ti laddhiyā na
atk-abh03a:1512_0: 848. Vicikicchā uppajjeyyāti “ayaṃ niyato vā no vā”ti evaṃ uppajjeyyāti pucchati.
atk-abh03a:1512_1: Itaro anuppattikāraṇaṃ apassanto paṭijānāti. Nuppajjeyyāti puṭṭho pana yaṃ diṭṭhiṃ
atk-abh03a:1512_2: āsevanto niyāmaṃ okkanto, tattha anuppattiṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Tato pahīnāti puṭṭho
atk-abh03a:1512_3: maggena appahīnattā paṭikkhipati, taṃ diṭṭhiṃ ārabbha asamudācārato paṭijānāti. Atha
atk-abh03a:1512_4: naṃ yasmā pahānaṃ nāma vinā ariyamaggena natthi, tasmā tassa vasena codetuṃ sotāpattimaggenātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1512_5: So ekamaggenāpi appahīnattā paṭikkhipati. Puna katamenāti puṭṭho micchāmaggaṃ sandhāya akusalenātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1513_0: 849. Ucchedadiṭṭhi uppajjeyyāti dutiyaniyāmuppattiṃ pucchati. Itaro yasmā “yepi te
atk-abh03a:1513_1: okkalā vayabhiññā natthikavādā akiriyavādā ahetukavādā”ti vacanato tissopi niyatamicchādiṭṭhiyo
atk-abh03a:1514_0: 850. Atha naṃ “na ca nāma so accantaniyāmo”ti codetuṃ hañcītiādimāha. Accantaniyatassa
atk-abh03a:1514_1: hi dutiyaniyāmo niratthako. Nuppajjeyyāti pañhe yaṃ sassatadiṭṭhiyā sassatanti gahitaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1514_2: tadeva ucchijjissatīti gahetvā anuppattiṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Pahīnāti puṭṭho maggena
atk-abh03a:1514_3: appahīnattā paṭikkhipati, vuttanayena anuppajjanato paṭijānāti. Sassatadiṭṭhi uppajjeyyātiādīsupi
atk-abh03a:1515_0: 851-852. Na vattabbanti pucchā paravādissa, suttassa atthitāya paṭiññā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:1515_1: Na pana so bhavantarepi nimuggova. Imasmiññeva hi bhave abhabbo so taṃ diṭṭhiṃ pajahitunti
atk-abh03a:1515_2: ayamettha adhippāyo, tasmā asādhakametanti. Sabbakālaṃ ummujjitvā nimujjatītiādi
atk-abh03a:1515_3: vacanamatte abhinivesaṃ akatvā attho pariyesitabboti dassanatthaṃ vuttanti.
atk-abh03a:1518_0: 853-856. Idāni indriyakathā nāma hoti. Tattha lokiyā saddhā saddhā eva nāma, na saddhindriyaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1518_1: Tathā lokiyaṃ vīriyaṃ…pe… sati… samādhi… paññā paññāyeva nāma, na paññindriyanti
atk-abh03a:1518_2: yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi hetuvādānañceva mahisāsakānañca; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a:1518_3: paṭiññā itarassa. Natthi lokiyā saddhātiādi yasmā lokiyāpi saddhādayova dhammā adhipatiyaṭṭhena
atk-abh03a:1518_4: indriyaṃ, na saddhādīhi aññaṃ saddhindriyādi nāma atthi, tasmā lokiyānampi saddhādīnaññeva
atk-abh03a:1518_5: saddhindriyādibhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Atthi lokiyo manotiādi yathā te lokiyāpi
atk-abh03a:1518_6: manādayo dhammā manindriyādīni, evaṃ lokiyā saddhādayopi saddhindriyānīti upamāya
atk-abh03a:1518_7: tassatthassa vibhāvanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Sesamettha yathāpāḷimeva niyyātīti.
atk-abh03a:1523_0: 857-862. Idāni asañciccakathā nāma hoti. Tattha “ānantariyavatthūni nāma garūni bhāriyāni,
atk-abh03a:1523_1: tasmā asañciccāpi tesu vatthūsu vikopitesu ānantariko hotī”ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi
atk-abh03a:1523_2: ekaccānaṃ uttarāpathakānaṃ; te sandhāya asañciccāti pucchā sakavādissa, laddhivasena
atk-abh03a:1523_3: paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ “yasmā ānantariyakammaṃ nāma kammapathappattaṃ. Yadi ca
atk-abh03a:1523_4: asañcicca kammapathabhedo siyā, avasesā pāṇātipātādayopi asañcicca bhaveyyu”nti codanatthaṃ
atk-abh03a:1523_5: asañciccapāṇaṃ hantvātiādimāha. Itaro tathārūpāya laddhiyā abhāvena paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1523_6: Sesaṃ yathāpāḷimeva niyyāti. Na vattabbaṃ mātughātakoti pucchā paravādissa, rogapaṭikārādikāle
atk-abh03a:1523_7: asañcicca ghātaṃ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādissa. Nanu mātā jīvitā voropitāti pañhepi
atk-abh03a:1523_8: asañcicca voropitaṃ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādisseva. Evaṃ adhippāyaṃ pana aggahetvā
atk-abh03a:1523_9: hañcīti laddhipatiṭṭhāpanaṃ itarassa. Taṃ ayoniso patiṭṭhāpitattā appatiṭṭhitameva.
atk-abh03a:1523_10: Pitughātakādīsupi eseva nayo. Saṅghabhedake pana dhammasaññiṃ sandhāya saṅghabhedo
atk-abh03a:1523_11: ānantarikoti pucchā sakavādissa, “saṅghaṃ samaggaṃ bhetvāna, kappaṃ nirayamhi paccatī”ti
atk-abh03a:1523_12: vacanaṃ ayoniso gahetvā paṭiññā paravādissa. Puna sabbeti puṭṭho sakapakkhe dhammasaññiṃ
atk-abh03a:1523_13: sandhāya paṭikkhipati, parapakkhe dhammasaññiṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Dhammasaññīti
atk-abh03a:1523_14: pañhadvayepi eseva nayo. Nanu vuttaṃ bhagavatāti suttaṃ ekanteneva dhammavādissa
atk-abh03a:1523_15: ānantarikabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Āpāyiko nerayikoti gāthāyapi adhammavādīyeva
atk-abh03a:1523_16: adhippeto. Itaro pana adhippāyaṃ aggahetvā laddhiṃ patiṭṭhapeti. Sā ayoniso patiṭṭhāpitattā appatiṭṭhitāyevāti.
atk-abh03a:1526_0: 863-865. Idāni ñāṇakathā nāma hoti. Tattha duvidhaṃ ñāṇaṃ – lokiyañca lokuttarañca.
atk-abh03a:1526_1: Lokiyaṃ samāpattiñāṇampi hoti dānādivasena pavattaṃ kammassakatañāṇampi; lokuttaraṃ
atk-abh03a:1526_2: saccaparicchedakaṃ maggañāṇampi phalañāṇampi. Imaṃ pana vibhāgaṃ akatvā “saccaparicchedakameva
atk-abh03a:1526_3: ñāṇaṃ na itaraṃ, tasmā natthi puthujjanassa ñāṇa”nti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi hetuvādānaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1526_4: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Paññātiādi ñāṇavevacanadassanatthaṃ
atk-abh03a:1526_5: vuttaṃ. Tenetaṃ dīpeti – yadi tassa ñāṇaṃ natthi, paññādayopi natthi. Atha paññādayo
atk-abh03a:1526_6: atthi, ñāṇampi atthi. Kasmā? Paññādīnaṃ ñāṇato anaññattāti. Paṭhamaṃ jhānantiādi
atk-abh03a:1526_7: samāpattiñāṇassa dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Dānaṃ dadeyyātiādi kammassakatañāṇassa. Dukkhaṃ
atk-abh03a:1526_8: parijānātīti lokuttaramaggañāṇameva dīpeti, na ca lokuttarameva ñāṇanti.
atk-abh03a:1529_0: 866. Idāni nirayapālakathā nāma hoti. Tattha “niraye nerayikakammāneva nirayapālarūpavasena
atk-abh03a:1529_1: vadhenti, natthi nirayapālā nāma sattā”ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ; te
atk-abh03a:1529_2: sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ “yadi tattha nirayapālā na
atk-abh03a:1529_3: siyuṃ, kammakāraṇāpi na bhaveyyuṃ. Kāraṇikesu hi sati kāraṇā”ti codetuṃ natthi nirayesūtiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1530_0: 867-868. Atthi manussesūti paccakkhena ñāpanatthaṃ. Yathā hi manussesu sati kāraṇikesu
atk-abh03a:1530_1: kāraṇā, evaṃ tatthāpīti ayamettha adhippāyo. Atthi nirayesūti pucchā paravādissa,
atk-abh03a:1530_2: paṭiññā itarassa. Na vessabhū nopi ca pettirājāti paravādinā sakasamayato suttaṃ
atk-abh03a:1530_3: ābhataṃ. Taṃ pana sāsanāvacarikanti sakavādinā anuññātaṃ. Tattha vessabhūti eko devo.
atk-abh03a:1530_4: Pettirājāti pettivisaye petamahiddhiko. Somādayo pākaṭā eva. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – attano
atk-abh03a:1530_5: kammehi ito paṇunnaṃ paralokaṃ pattaṃ purisaṃ na ete vessabhūādayo hananti. Yehi
atk-abh03a:1530_6: pana so kammehi tattha paṇunno, tāni sakāni kammāniyeva naṃ tattha hanantīti kammassakataṃ
atk-abh03a:1530_7: dīpeti, na nirayapālānaṃ abhāvaṃ. Sakavādinā pana tamenaṃ, bhikkhaveti ābhatāni suttapadāni nītatthānevāti.
atk-abh03a:1533_0: 869-871. Idāni tiracchānakathā nāma hoti. Tattha devesu erāvaṇādayo devaputtā hatthivaṇṇaṃ
atk-abh03a:1533_1: assavaṇṇaṃ vikubbanti, natthi tattha tiracchānagatā. Yesaṃ pana tiracchānavaṇṇino
atk-abh03a:1533_2: devaputte disvā “atthi devesu tiracchānagatā”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ; te
atk-abh03a:1533_3: sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ “yadi devayoniyaṃ tiracchānagatā
atk-abh03a:1533_4: siyuṃ, tiracchānayoniyampi devā siyu”nti codetuṃ atthi tiracchānagatesūtiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1533_5: Kīṭātiādi yesaṃ so abhāvaṃ icchati, te dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Erāvaṇoti pañhe tassa atthitāya
atk-abh03a:1533_6: paṭiññā sakavādissa, na tiracchānagatassa. Hatthibandhātiādi “yadi tattha hatthiādayo
atk-abh03a:1533_7: siyuṃ, hatthibandhādayopi siyu”nti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha yāvasikāti yavassa
atk-abh03a:1533_8: dāyakā. Kāraṇikāti hatthācariyādayo, yehi te nānāvidhaṃ kāraṇaṃ kareyyuṃ. Bhattakārakāti
atk-abh03a:1533_9: hatthiādīnaṃ bhattarandhakā. Na hevanti tathā anicchanto paṭikkhipatīti.
atk-abh03a:1536_0: 872-875. Idāni maggakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ “pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṃ
atk-abh03a:1536_1: vacīkammaṃ ājīvo suparisuddho hotī”ti idañceva suttaṃ sammāvācākammantājīvānañca
atk-abh03a:1536_2: cittavippayuttataṃ nissāya “nippariyāyena pañcaṅgikova maggo”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi
atk-abh03a:1536_3: mahisāsakānaṃ, te sandhāya pañcaṅgikoti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sammāvācā
atk-abh03a:1536_4: maggaṅgaṃ, sā ca na maggotiādi parasamayavasena vuttaṃ. Parasamayasmiñhi sammāvācādayo
atk-abh03a:1536_5: maggaṅganti āgatā. Rūpattā pana maggo na hotīti vaṇṇitā. Sammādiṭṭhi maggaṅgantiādi
atk-abh03a:1536_6: maggaṅgassa amaggatā nāma natthīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Pubbeva kho panassāti sutte
atk-abh03a:1536_7: parisuddhasīlassa maggabhāvanā nāma hoti, na itarassāti āgamaniyapaṭipadāya visuddhibhāvadassanatthaṃ
atk-abh03a:1536_8: “kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ ājīvo suparisuddho hotī”ti vuttaṃ, na imehi vinā pañcaṅgikabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1536_9: Tenevāha “evamassāyaṃ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchatī”ti. Sakavādinā
atk-abh03a:1539_0: 876-877. Idāni ñāṇakathā nāma hoti. Tattha dhammacakkappavattane dvādasākārañāṇaṃ
atk-abh03a:1539_1: sandhāya “dvādasavatthukaṃ ñāṇaṃ lokuttara”nti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi pubbaseliyānaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1539_2: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ “sace taṃ dvādasavatthukaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1539_3: dvādasahi maggañāṇehi bhavitabba”nti codetuṃ dvādasātiādimāha. Itaro maggassa ekattaṃ
atk-abh03a:1539_4: sandhāya paṭikkhipati, ekekasmiṃ sacce saccañāṇakiccañāṇakatañāṇānaṃ vasena ñāṇanānattaṃ
atk-abh03a:1539_5: sandhāya paṭijānāti. Dvādasa sotāpattimaggātiādīsupi eseva nayo. Nanu vuttaṃ bhagavatāti
atk-abh03a:1539_6: suttaṃ saddhiṃ pubbabhāgaparabhāgehi ñāṇanānattaṃ dīpeti, na ariyamaggassa dvādasa
atk-abh03a:1545_0: 878. Idāni sāsanakathā nāma hoti. Tattha tisso saṅgītiyo sandhāya “sāsanaṃ navaṃ
atk-abh03a:1545_1: kata”nti ca “atthi koci tathāgatassa sāsanaṃ navaṃ karotī”ti ca “labbhā tathāgatassa
atk-abh03a:1545_2: sāsanaṃ navaṃ kātu”nti ca yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi ekaccānaṃ uttarāpathakānaṃ; te
atk-abh03a:1545_3: sandhāya tīsupi kathāsu pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Satipaṭṭhānātiādi sāsanaṃ
atk-abh03a:1545_4: nāma satipaṭṭhānādayo ceva ariyadhammā, kusalādīnañca desanā. Tattha yesaṃ bhagavatā
atk-abh03a:1545_5: desitā satipaṭṭhānādayo, ṭhapetvā te aññesaṃ vā satipaṭṭhānādīnaṃ karaṇena akusalādīnaṃ
atk-abh03a:1545_6: vā kusalādibhāvakaraṇena sāsanaṃ navaṃkataṃ nāma bhaveyya, kiṃ taṃ evaṃ kataṃ kenaci,
atk-abh03a:1545_7: atthi vā koci evaṃ karoti, labbhā vā evaṃ kātunti tīsupi pucchāsu codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:1548_0: 879-880. Idāni avivittakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yassa puggalassa yo dhammo paccuppanno,
atk-abh03a:1548_1: so tena avivitto nāmāti idaṃ sakasamaye sanniṭṭhānaṃ. Yasmā pana puthujjanena tedhātukā
atk-abh03a:1548_2: dhammā apariññātā, tasmā so ekakkhaṇeyeva sabbehipi tedhātukehi dhammehi avivittoti
atk-abh03a:1548_3: yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi tesaññeva, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a:1548_4: Phassehītiādi sabbesaṃ phassādīnaṃ ekakkhaṇe pavattidosadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Sesaṃ
atk-abh03a:1551_0: 881-882. Idāni saññojanakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā arahā sabbaṃ buddhavisayaṃ
atk-abh03a:1551_1: na jānāti, tasmā tassa tattha avijjāvicikicchāhi appahīnāhi bhavitabbanti saññāya
atk-abh03a:1551_2: “atthi kiñci saññojanaṃ appahāya arahattappattī”ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi mahāsaṅghikānaṃ,
atk-abh03a:1551_3: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atthi kiñci sakkāyadiṭṭhītiādi
atk-abh03a:1551_4: arahato sabbasaṃyojanappahānadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Sabbaṃ buddhavisayanti pañhadvaye
atk-abh03a:1551_5: arahato sabbaññutaññāṇābhāvena paṭisedho kato, na avijjāvicikicchānaṃ appahānena.
atk-abh03a:1551_6: Itaro pana tesaṃ appahīnataṃ sandhāya tena hīti laddhiṃ patiṭṭhapeti. Sā ayoniso
atk-abh03a:1554_0: 883-884. Idāni iddhikathā nāma hoti. Tattha iddhi nāmesā katthaci ijjhati, katthaci
atk-abh03a:1554_1: na ijjhati, aniccādīnaṃ niccādikaraṇe ekanteneva na ijjhati. Sabhāgasantatiṃ pana
atk-abh03a:1554_3: vā yesaṃ atthāya kariyati, tesaṃ puññādīni kāraṇāni nissāya katthaci ijjhati, bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-abh03a:1554_4: atthāya pānīyassa sappikhīrādikaraṇe viya mahādhātunidhāne dīpādīnaṃ cirasantānappavattane
atk-abh03a:1554_5: viya cāti idaṃ sakasamaye sanniṭṭhānaṃ. Yaṃ pana āyasmā pilindavaccho rañño pāsādaṃ
atk-abh03a:1554_6: suvaṇṇantveva adhimucci, taṃ nissāya yesaṃ “atthi adhippāyaiddhī”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi
atk-abh03a:1554_7: andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya atthi adhippāyaiddhīti pucchā sakavādissa. Tattha adhippāyaiddhīti
atk-abh03a:1554_8: adhippāyaiddhi, yathādhippāyaṃ ijjhanaiddhīti attho. Āmantāti laddhimatte ṭhatvā
atk-abh03a:1554_9: paṭiññā paravādissa. Atha naṃ aniccādīnaṃ niccāditāya anuyuñjituṃ niccapaṇṇā rukkhā
atk-abh03a:1554_10: hontūtiādimāha. Sesamettha uttānatthameva. Laddhipatiṭṭhāpane suvaṇṇo ca panāsīti
atk-abh03a:1554_11: rañño puññūpanissayena āsi, na kevalaṃ therassa adhippāyeneva. Tasmā asādhakametanti.
atk-abh03a:1557_0: 885. Idāni buddhakathā nāma hoti. Tattha ṭhapetvā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle sarīravemattataṃ
atk-abh03a:1557_1: āyuvemattataṃ pabhāvemattatañca sesehi buddhadhammehi buddhānaṃ buddhehi hīnātirekatā
atk-abh03a:1557_2: nāma natthi. Yesaṃ pana aviseseneva atthīti laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya
atk-abh03a:1557_3: atthi buddhānanti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ buddhadhammehi anuyuñjituṃ
atk-abh03a:1557_4: satipaṭṭhānatotiādimāha. Itaro tesaṃ vasena hīnātirekataṃ apassanto paṭikkhipatiyevāti.
atk-abh03a:1560_0: 886. Idāni sabbadisākathā nāma hoti. Tattha catūsu disāsu heṭṭhā uparīti samantato
atk-abh03a:1560_1: lokadhātusannivāsaṃ, sabbalokadhātūsu ca buddhā atthīti attano vikappasippaṃ uppādetvā
atk-abh03a:1560_2: “sabbadisāsu buddhā tiṭṭhantī”ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi mahāsaṅghikānaṃ; te sandhāya
atk-abh03a:1560_3: pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Puratthimāyāti puṭṭho sakyamuniṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a:1560_4: Puna puṭṭho laddhivasena aññalokadhātuyaṃ ṭhitaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Kinnāmo so
atk-abh03a:1560_5: bhagavātiādi “sace tvaṃ jānāsi, nāmādivasena naṃ kathehī”ti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Iminā
atk-abh03a:1563_0: 887-888. Idāni dhammakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā rūpādayo rūpādisabhāvena niyatā
atk-abh03a:1563_1: na taṃ sabhāvaṃ vijahanti, tasmā sabbadhammā niyatāti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānañceva
atk-abh03a:1563_2: ekaccānañca uttarāpathakānaṃ; te sandhāya sabbe dhammāti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā
atk-abh03a:1563_3: itarassa. Atha naṃ “sace te niyatā, micchattaniyatā vā siyuṃ sammattaniyatā vā, ito
atk-abh03a:1563_4: añño niyāmo nāma natthī”ti codetuṃ micchattaniyatātiādimāha. Tattha paṭikkhepo ca
atk-abh03a:1563_5: paṭiññā ca paravādissa. Rūpaṃ rūpaṭṭhenātiādi yenatthena niyatāti vadati, tassa vasena
atk-abh03a:1563_6: codetuṃ vuttaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ adhippāyo – rūpañhi rūpaṭṭhena niyatanti rūpaṃ rūpameva,
atk-abh03a:1563_7: na vedanādisabhāvanti adhippāyena vattabbaṃ, ito aññathā na vattabbaṃ. Kasmā? Rūpaṭṭhato
atk-abh03a:1563_8: aññassa rūpassa abhāvā. Rūpasabhāvo hi rūpaṭṭho, rūpasabhāvo ca rūpameva, na rūpato
atk-abh03a:1563_9: añño. Vedanādīhi panassa nānattapaññāpanatthaṃ esa vohāro hotīti. Tasmā “rūpaṃ rūpaṭṭhena
atk-abh03a:1563_10: niyata”nti vadantena rūpaṃ niyatanti vuttaṃ hoti. Niyatañca nāma micchattaniyataṃ
atk-abh03a:1563_11: vā siyā sammattaniyataṃ vā, ito añño niyāmo nāma natthīti. Atha kasmā paṭijānātīti?
atk-abh03a:1563_12: Atthantaravasena. Rūpaṃ rūpaṭṭhena niyatanti ettha hi rūpaṃ rūpameva, na vedanādisabhāvanti
atk-abh03a:1563_13: ayamattho. Tasmā paṭijānāti. Ito aññathā panassa niyatattaṃ natthīti puna teneva
atk-abh03a:1563_14: nayena codetuṃ micchattaniyatantiādimāha. Taṃ sabbaṃ uttānatthameva. Tena hi rūpanti
atk-abh03a:1566_0: 889-891. Idāni kammakathā nāma hoti. Tattha “yasmā diṭṭhadhammavedanīyādīni diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṭṭhādīhi
atk-abh03a:1566_1: niyatāni, tasmā sabbe kammā niyatā”ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi tesaññeva; te sandhāya
atk-abh03a:1566_2: pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṭṭhena niyatanti ettha
atk-abh03a:1566_3: diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṭṭhameva. Sace diṭṭheva dhamme vipākaṃ
atk-abh03a:1566_4: dātuṃ sakkoti deti, no ce ahosikammaṃ nāma hotīti imamatthaṃ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a:1566_5: Micchattasammattaniyāmavasena panetaṃ aniyatamevāti sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
atk-abh03a:1571_0: 892. Idāni parinibbānakathā nāma hoti. Tattha “yasmā arahā sabbaññuvisaye appahīnasaṃyojanova
atk-abh03a:1571_1: parinibbāyati, tasmā atthi kiñci saṃyojanaṃ appahāya parinibbāna”nti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1571_2: seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamettha
atk-abh03a:1574_0: 894-895. Idāni kusalacittakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā arahā sativepullappatto parinibbāyantopi
atk-abh03a:1574_1: sato sampajānova parinibbāti, tasmā kusalacitto parinibbāyatīti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi
atk-abh03a:1574_2: andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ yasmā kusalacitto
atk-abh03a:1574_3: nāma puññābhisaṅkhārābhisaṅkharaṇādivasena hoti, tasmā tenatthena codetuṃ arahā puññābhisaṅkhārantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:1574_4: Sesamettha yathāpāḷimeva niyyāti. Sato sampajānoti idaṃ javanakkhaṇe kiriyasatisampajaññānaṃ
atk-abh03a:1574_5: vasena asammohamaraṇadīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, na kusalacittadīpanatthaṃ. Tasmā asādhakanti.
atk-abh03a:1577_0: 896. Idāni āneñjakathā nāma hoti. Tattha bhagavā catutthajjhāne ṭhito parinibbāyīti
atk-abh03a:1577_1: sallakkhetvā “arahā āneñje ṭhito parinibbāyatī”ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi ekaccānaṃ
atk-abh03a:1577_2: uttarāpathakānaṃ, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Pakaticitteti
atk-abh03a:1577_3: bhavaṅgacitte. Sabbe hi saññino sattā bhavaṅgacitte ṭhatvā bhavaṅgapariyosānena cuticittena
atk-abh03a:1577_4: kālaṃ karonti. Iti naṃ iminā atthena codetuṃ evamāha. Tattha kiñcāpi catuvokārabhave
atk-abh03a:1577_5: arahato pakaticittampi āneñjaṃ hoti, ayaṃ pana pañho pañcavokārabhavavasena uddhaṭo.
atk-abh03a:1577_6: Tasmā no ca vata re vattabbeti āha. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a:1580_0: 897. Idāni dhammābhisamayakathā nāma hoti. Tattha atītabhave sotāpannaṃ mātukucchiyaṃ
atk-abh03a:1580_1: vasitvā nikkhantaṃ disvā “atthi gabbhaseyyāya dhammābhisamayo”ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi
atk-abh03a:1580_2: ekaccānaṃ uttarāpathakānaṃ, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha
atk-abh03a:1580_3: naṃ “yadi tattha dhammābhisamayo atthi, dhammābhisamayassa kāraṇehi dhammadesanādīhi
atk-abh03a:1580_4: bhavitabba”nti codetuṃ atthi gabbhaseyyāya dhammadesanātiādimāha. Suttassātiādi bhavaṅgavāraṃ
atk-abh03a:1580_5: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Gabbhaseyyāya hi yebhuyyena bhavaṅgameva pavattati. Teneva satto
atk-abh03a:1580_6: kiriyamayappavattābhāvā sutto, bhāvanānuyogassa abhāvā pamatto, kammaṭṭhānapariggāhakānaṃ
atk-abh03a:1580_7: satisampajaññānaṃ abhāvā muṭṭhassati asampajāno nāma hoti, tathārūpassa kuto dhammābhisamayoti?
atk-abh03a:1583_0: 898-900. Idāni tissopikathā nāma honti. Tattha acirajātānaṃ pana sotāpannānaṃ arahattappattiṃ
atk-abh03a:1583_1: suppavāsāya ca upāsikāya sattavassikaṃ gabbhaṃ disvā “atthi gabbhaseyyāya arahattappattī”ti
atk-abh03a:1583_2: ca supine ākāsagamanādīni disvā “atthi dhammābhisamayo”ti ca “atthi tattha arahattappattī”ti
atk-abh03a:1583_3: ca idhāpi yesaṃ laddhiyo, seyyathāpi tesaññeva; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā
atk-abh03a:1586_0: 901-902. Idāni abyākatakathā nāma hoti. Tattha “atthesā, bhikkhave, cetanā, sā ca
atk-abh03a:1586_1: kho abbohārikā”ti vacanato “sabbaṃ supinagatassa cittaṃ abyākata”nti yesaṃ laddhi,
atk-abh03a:1586_2: seyyathāpi ekaccānaṃ uttarāpathakānaññeva, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā
atk-abh03a:1586_3: itarassa. Sesamettha yathā pāḷimeva niyyāti. Supinagatassa cittaṃ abbohārikanti idaṃ
atk-abh03a:1586_4: āpattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Supinagatassa hi pāṇātipātādivasena kiñcāpi akusalacittaṃ
atk-abh03a:1586_5: pavattati, vatthuvikopanaṃ pana natthīti na sakkā tattha āpattiṃ paññapetuṃ. Iminā
atk-abh03a:1589_0: 903-905. Idāni āsevanapaccayakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā sabbe dhammā khaṇikā,
atk-abh03a:1589_1: na koci muhuttampi ṭhatvā āsevanapaccayaṃ āsevati nāma. Tasmā natthi kiñci āsevanapaccayatā.
atk-abh03a:1589_2: Āsevanapaccayatāya uppannaṃ pana na kiñci atthīti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi tesaññeva;
atk-abh03a:1589_3: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ suttavaseneva paññāpetuṃ
atk-abh03a:1589_4: nanu vuttaṃ bhagavatā pāṇātipātotiādi ābhataṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a:1592_0: 906-907. Idāni khaṇikakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā sabbasaṅkhatadhammā aniccā, tasmā
atk-abh03a:1592_1: ekacittakkhaṇikāyeva. Samānāya hi aniccatāya eko lahuṃ bhijjati, eko cirenāti ko
atk-abh03a:1592_2: ettha niyāmoti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi pubbaseliyāparaseliyānaṃ; te sandhāya ekacittakkhaṇikāti
