atk-abh03a:2045_2: āhāroti avatvā “kabaḷīkāro āhāro”ti vuttaṃ. Kabaḷaṃ karitvā ajjhoharitabbavatthukattā
atk-abh03a:2045_3: vā kabaḷīkāroti nāmametaṃ tassa. Arūpino āhārāti phassacetanāviññāṇāhārā. Taṃsamuṭṭhānānanti
atk-abh03a:2045_4: idhāpi kammasamuṭṭhānāni gahitāneva. Vuttañhetaṃ pañhāvāre – paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākatā
atk-abh03a:2045_5: āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayoti. Ayaṃ
atk-abh03a:2046_0: Ayaṃ pana āhārapaccayo saṅkhepato kabaḷīkāro āhāro, phasso, cetanā, viññāṇanti cattārova
atk-abh03a:2046_1: dhammā honti. Tattha ṭhapetvā kabaḷīkārāhāraṃ sesā tayo arūpāhārā jātivasena kusalākusalavipākakiriyabhedato
atk-abh03a:2046_2: catudhā bhijjanti. Puna bhūmibhedena kusalo catudhā, akusalo ekadhā, vipāko catudhā,
atk-abh03a:2046_3: kiriyā tidhāti evaṃ anekadhā bhijjanti. Kabaḷīkārāhāro pana jātito abyākato, bhūmito
atk-abh03a:2047_0: Evaṃ bhinne panettha catubhūmakāpi tayo kusalāhārā pañcavokāre attanā sampayuttadhammānañceva
atk-abh03a:2047_1: cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca āhārapaccayena paccayo, ṭhapetvā pana rūpāvacaraṃ avasesā
atk-abh03a:2047_2: āruppe sampayuttadhammānaññeva āhārapaccayena paccayo. Akusalāhāresupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a:2047_3: Catubhūmakavipākāhārā pana sabbattha sampayuttakānaṃ āhārapaccayā honti. Kāmāvacararūpāvacaravipākā
atk-abh03a:2047_4: panettha pañcavokāre uppajjamānā pavatte cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa paṭisandhiyaṃ kaṭattārūpassāpi
atk-abh03a:2047_5: āhārapaccayā honti. Lokuttarā pana cittasamuṭṭhānarūpasseva, āruppe uppannā rūpassa
atk-abh03a:2047_6: paccayā na honti. Tebhūmakāpi tayo kiriyāhārā pañcavokāre sampayuttadhammānañceva
atk-abh03a:2047_7: cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca, kāmāvacarārūpāvacarā pana āruppe sampayuttadhammānaññeva
atk-abh03a:2047_8: āhārapaccayena paccayo. Catusantatisamuṭṭhāno kabaḷīkārāhāro kiñcāpi “imassa kāyassā”ti
atk-abh03a:2047_9: avisesato vutto, visesato panāyamettha āhārasamuṭṭhānarūpassa janako ceva anupālako
atk-abh03a:2047_10: ca hutvā āhārapaccayena paccayo hoti, sesatisantatisamuṭṭhānassa anupālakova hutvā
atk-abh03a:2047_11: āhārapaccayena paccayo hotīti evamettha paccayuppannatopi viññātabbo vinicchayoti.
atk-abh03a:2050_1: sayaṃ purejāto hutvā arūpadhammānaṃ uppādato paṭṭhāya yāva bhaṅgā indriyapaccayena
atk-abh03a:2050_2: paccayo hoti. Sotindriyādīsupi eseva nayo. Arūpino indriyāti ettha arūpajīvitindriyampi
atk-abh03a:2050_3: saṅgahitaṃ. Taṃsamuṭṭhānānanti ettha heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva kaṭattārūpampi saṅgahitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2050_4: Vuttañhetaṃ pañhāvāre – paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākatā indriyā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ
atk-abh03a:2050_5: kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayoti. Evaṃ tāvettha pāḷivaṇṇanā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:2051_0: Ayaṃ pana indriyapaccayo itthindriyapurisindriyavajjānaṃ samavīsatiyā indriyānaṃ
atk-abh03a:2051_1: vasena ṭhito. Itthindriyapurisindriyāni hi kiñcāpi itthiliṅgapurisaliṅgādīnaṃ bījabhūtāni,
atk-abh03a:2051_2: kalalādikāle pana vijjamānesupi tesu itthiliṅgapurisaliṅgādīnaṃ abhāvā tāni neva
atk-abh03a:2051_3: tesaṃ, na aññesaṃ indriyapaccayataṃ pharanti. Indriyapaccayo hi attano vijjamānakkhaṇe
atk-abh03a:2051_4: avinibbhuttadhammānaṃ indriyapaccayataṃ apharanto nāma natthi, tasmā tāni indriyapaccayā
atk-abh03a:2051_5: na honti. Yesaṃ panetāni bījabhūtāni, tesaṃ tāni suttantikapariyāyena pakatūpanissayabhāvaṃ
atk-abh03a:2051_6: bhajanti. Iti indriyapaccayo samavīsatiyā indriyānaṃ vasena ṭhitoti veditabbo. So
atk-abh03a:2051_7: jātito kusalākusalavipākakiriyarūpavasena pañcadhā bhijjati. Tattha kusalo bhūmivasena
atk-abh03a:2051_8: catudhā, akusalo kāmāvacarova vipāko catudhāva kiriyāsaṅkhāto tidhā, rūpaṃ kāmāvacaramevāti
atk-abh03a:2051_9: evaṃ anekadhā bhijjatīti evaṃ tāvettha nānappakārabhedato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2052_0: Evaṃ bhinne panettha catubhūmakopi kusalindriyapaccayo pañcavokāre sampayuttadhammānañceva
atk-abh03a:2052_1: cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca indriyapaccayena paccayo, tathā akusalo. Ṭhapetvā pana
atk-abh03a:2052_2: rūpāvacarakusalaṃ avasesā kusalākusalā āruppe sampayuttadhammānaññeva indriyapaccayena
atk-abh03a:2052_3: paccayo. Catubhūmako vipākindriyapaccayo ekanteneva sampayuttakānaṃ indriyapaccayena
atk-abh03a:2052_4: paccayo. Kāmāvacararūpāvacarā panettha pañcavokāre uppajjanato pavatte cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa,
atk-abh03a:2052_5: paṭisandhiyaṃ kaṭattārūpassāpi indriyapaccayena paccayā honti. Lokuttarā cittasamuṭṭhānarūpasseva.
atk-abh03a:2052_6: Āruppe uppannā lokuttaravipākā indriyā rūpassa paccayā na honti. Tebhūmakā kiriyindriyā
atk-abh03a:2052_8: pana āruppe sampayuttadhammānaññeva indriyapaccayataṃ pharanti. Cakkhundriyādivasena
atk-abh03a:2052_9: chabbidhe rūpindriye cakkhundriyaṃ kusalākusalavipākato sampayuttadhammānaṃ dvinnaṃ
atk-abh03a:2052_11: attanā sahajātarūpānaṃ ṭhitikkhaṇe indriyapaccayena paccayo. Sahajātapaccayatā pana
atk-abh03a:2052_12: tassa natthīti evamettha paccayuppannatopi viññātabbo vinicchayoti.
atk-abh03a:2055_2: pana viññāṇakāyānaṃ abhinipātamattattā tesu vijjamānānipi upekkhāsukhadukkhāni upanijjhānākārassa
atk-abh03a:2055_3: abhāvato jhānaṅgānīti na uddhaṭāni. Tattha pacchinnattā pana sesāhetukesupi jhānaṅgaṃ
atk-abh03a:2055_4: na uddhaṭameva. Taṃsamuṭṭhānānanti idhāpi kaṭattārūpaṃ saṅgahitanti veditabbaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ
atk-abh03a:2055_6: kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ jhānapaccayena paccayo”ti. Ayaṃ tāvettha pāḷivaṇṇanā. Ayaṃ pana
atk-abh03a:2055_7: jhānapaccayo sattannaṃ jhānaṅgānaṃ vasena ṭhitopi jātibhedato kusalākusalavipākakiriyavasena
atk-abh03a:2055_8: catudhā bhijjati, puna bhūmivasena catudhā; ekadhā, catudhā, tidhāti dvādasadhā bhijjatīti
atk-abh03a:2056_0: Evaṃ bhinne panettha catubhūmakampi kusalajhānaṅgaṃ pañcavokāre sampayuttadhammānañceva
atk-abh03a:2056_1: cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca, ṭhapetvā rūpāvacaraṃ avasesaṃ āruppe sampayuttadhammānaññeva
atk-abh03a:2056_2: jhānapaccayena paccayo. Akusalepi eseva nayo. Kāmāvacararūpāvacaravipākaṃ pavatte
atk-abh03a:2056_4: kaṭattārūpassa ca, āruppavipākaṃ sampayuttadhammānaññeva, yañca āruppe lokuttaravipākaṃ
atk-abh03a:2056_5: uppajjati, tañca. Pañcavokāre pana taṃ cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassapi jhānapaccayena paccayo
atk-abh03a:2056_6: hoti. Tebhūmakampi kiriyajhānaṅgaṃ pañcavokāre sampayuttadhammānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa
atk-abh03a:2056_7: ca. Yaṃ panettha āruppe uppajjati, taṃ sampayuttadhammānaññeva jhānapaccayena paccayoti
atk-abh03a:2059_1: paññā, vitakko, sammāvācākammantājīvā, vīriyaṃ, sati, samādhi, micchādiṭṭhi, micchāvācākammantājīvāti
atk-abh03a:2059_2: imāni dvādasaṅgāni. Maggassa pana hetupacchimakattā ahetukacittesu maggaṅgāni na
atk-abh03a:2059_3: uddhaṭāni. Taṃsamuṭṭhānānanti idhāpi kaṭattārūpaṃ saṅgahitameva. Vuttañhetaṃ pañhāvāre
atk-abh03a:2059_5: ca rūpānaṃ maggapaccayena paccayo”ti. Ayaṃ tāvettha pāḷivaṇṇanā.
atk-abh03a:2060_0: Ayaṃ pana maggapaccayo dvādasannaṃ maggaṅgānaṃ vasena ṭhitopi jātibhedato kusalādivasena
atk-abh03a:2060_1: catudhā, kusalādīnañca kāmāvacarādibhūmibhedato dvādasadhā bhijjatīti evamettha nānappakārabhedato
atk-abh03a:2060_2: viññātabbo vinicchayo. Evaṃ bhinne panettha catubhūmakampi kusalamaggaṅgaṃ pañcavokāre
atk-abh03a:2060_3: sampayuttadhammānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca, ṭhapetvā rūpāvacaraṃ avasesaṃ
atk-abh03a:2060_4: āruppe sampayuttadhammānaññeva maggapaccayena paccayoti sabbaṃ jhānapaccaye viya
atk-abh03a:2063_0: 19. Sampayuttapaccayaniddese pāḷi uttānatthā eva. Ayaṃ pana sampayuttapaccayo nāma
atk-abh03a:2063_1: saṅkhepato sabbepi arūpino khandhā. Pabhedato panesa jātito kusalādīnaṃ, bhūmito
atk-abh03a:2063_2: ca kāmāvacarādīnaṃ vasena anekadhā bhijjatīti evamettha nānappakārabhedato viññātabbo
atk-abh03a:2063_3: vinicchayo. Evaṃ bhinne panettha catubhūmakesupi kusalakkhandhesu eko khandho tiṇṇaṃ
atk-abh03a:2063_4: khandhānaṃ, tayo ekassa, dve dvinnanti evaṃ sabbepi aññamaññaṃ sampayuttapaccayena
atk-abh03a:2063_5: paccayo. Akusalavipākakiriyakkhandhesupi eseva nayoti evamettha paccayuppannatopi
atk-abh03a:2066_0: 20. Vippayuttapaccayaniddese rūpino dhammā arūpīnanti idaṃ tāva hadayavatthuno ceva
atk-abh03a:2066_1: cakkhundriyādīnañca vasena veditabbaṃ. Rūpadhammesu hi eteyeva cha koṭṭhāsā arūpakkhandhānaṃ
atk-abh03a:2066_2: vippayuttapaccayena paccayā honti. Rūpāyatanādayo pana ārammaṇadhammā kiñcāpi vippayuttadhammā,
atk-abh03a:2066_3: vippayuttapaccayā pana na honti. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Sampayogāsaṅkāya abhāvato. Arūpino hi
atk-abh03a:2066_4: khandhā cakkhādīnaṃ vatthūnaṃ abbhantarato nikkhamantā viya uppajjanti. Tattha āsaṅkā
atk-abh03a:2066_5: hoti – “kiṃ nu kho ete etehi sampayuttā, udāhu vippayuttā”ti. Ārammaṇadhammā pana
atk-abh03a:2066_6: vatthunissayena uppajjamānānaṃ ārammaṇamattā hontīti natthi tesu sampayogāsaṅkā.
atk-abh03a:2066_7: Iti sampayogāsaṅkāya abhāvato na te vippayuttapaccayā. Hadayavatthuādīsu eva panāyaṃ
atk-abh03a:2066_8: vippayuttapaccayatā veditabbā. Vuttampi cetaṃ pañhāvāre – vatthu kusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ
atk-abh03a:2066_9: vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Vatthu akusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
atk-abh03a:2066_10: Cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Sota… ghāna… jivhā… kāyāyatanaṃ
atk-abh03a:2066_11: kāyaviññāṇassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Vatthu vipākābyākatānaṃ kiriyābyākatānaṃ
atk-abh03a:2067_0: Arūpino dhammā rūpīnanti idaṃ pana catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ vasena veditabbaṃ. Arūpadhammesu
atk-abh03a:2067_1: hi cattāro khandhāva sahajātapurejātānaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ vippayuttapaccayā honti, nibbānaṃ
atk-abh03a:2067_2: pana arūpampi samānaṃ rūpassa vippayuttapaccayo na hoti. “Catūhi sampayogo catūhi
atk-abh03a:2067_3: vippayogo”ti hi vuttaṃ. Iti catunnaṃ arūpakkhandhānaṃyeva vippayuttapaccayatā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:2067_4: Vuttampi cetaṃ pañhāvāre – sahajātā kusalā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena
atk-abh03a:2067_5: paccayo. Pacchājātā kusalā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena
atk-abh03a:2067_6: paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākatā khandhā kaṭattārūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena
atk-abh03a:2067_7: paccayo, khandhā vatthussāti. Evaṃ tāvettha pāḷivaṇṇanā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:2068_0: Ayaṃ pana vippayuttapaccayo nāma saṅkhepato pañcavokārabhave vattamānā rūpārūpadhammā.
atk-abh03a:2068_1: Tesu rūpaṃ vatthuno cakkhādīnañca vasena chadhā bhinnaṃ, arūpaṃ pañcavokārabhave
atk-abh03a:2068_2: uppannakusalākusalavipākakiriyavasena catudhā bhinnaṃ. Tassa bhūmito kāmāvacarādivasena
atk-abh03a:2068_3: catudhā, ekadhā, tidhā, tidhāti ekadasadhā bhedo hoti. Āruppavipākañhi vippayuttapaccayo
atk-abh03a:2068_4: na hotīti evamettha nānappakārabhedato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2069_0: Evaṃ bhinne panettha pañcavokārabhave uppannaṃ catubhūmakampi kusalaṃ akusalañca
atk-abh03a:2069_2: Uppādakkhaṇaṃ pana atikkamitvā ṭhitikkhaṇaṃ pattassa purejātassa catusamuṭṭhānikatisamuṭṭhānikarūpakāyassa
atk-abh03a:2069_3: pacchājātavippayuttapaccayena paccayo hoti. Ettha ca tisamuṭṭhānikakāyoti āhārasamuṭṭhānassa
atk-abh03a:2069_4: abhāvato brahmapārisajjādīnaṃ kāyo veditabbo. Kāmāvacararūpāvacaravipākaṃ pana pavatte
atk-abh03a:2069_6: paccayo hoti. Lokuttaravipākaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānarūpasseva. Tividhampi panetaṃ purejātassa
atk-abh03a:2069_8: kiriyaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānassa sahajātavippayuttapaccayena paccayo, purejātassa catusamuṭṭhānikatisamuṭṭhānikakāyassa
atk-abh03a:2069_9: pacchājātavippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Chadhā ṭhitesu pana rūpesu vatthurūpaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe
atk-abh03a:2072_0: 21. Atthipaccayaniddese cattāro khandhātiādīhi sahajātavasena atthipaccayo niddiṭṭho.
atk-abh03a:2072_1: Cakkhāyatanantiādīhi purejātavasena. Yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāyāti ettha sahajātapurejātavasena
atk-abh03a:2072_2: atthipaccayo niddiṭṭho. Evamayaṃ pāḷi sahajātapurejātānaññeva atthipaccayānaṃ vasena
atk-abh03a:2072_3: āgatā. Pañhāvāre pana sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyanti imesaṃ
atk-abh03a:2072_4: vasena āgatattā pacchājātaāhārindriyavasenāpi atthipaccayo labbhati. Idha pana sāvasesavasena
atk-abh03a:2073_0: Ayaṃ pana atthipaccayo nāma duvidho – aññamaññato, na aññamaññato. Tattha aññamaññaṃ
atk-abh03a:2073_1: tividhaṃ – arūpaṃ arūpena, rūpaṃ rūpena, rūpārūpaṃ rūpārūpena. “Cattāro khandhā arūpino”ti
atk-abh03a:2073_2: ettha hi sabbacittuppattivasena arūpaṃ arūpena vuttaṃ. “Cattāro mahābhūtā”ti ettha
atk-abh03a:2073_3: sabbasantativasena rūpaṃ rūpena. “Okkantikkhaṇe nāmarūpa”nti ettha paṭisandhikhandhānañceva
atk-abh03a:2073_4: vatthuno ca vasena rūpārūpaṃ rūpārūpena vuttaṃ. Na aññamaññampi tividhaṃ – “arūpaṃ
atk-abh03a:2073_5: rūpassa, rūpaṃ rūpassa, rūpaṃ arūpassa cittacetasikā dhammā”ti ettha hi pañcavokāravasena
atk-abh03a:2073_6: arūpaṃ rūpassa vuttaṃ. “Mahābhūtā upādārūpāna”nti ettha sabbasantativasena rūpaṃ
atk-abh03a:2074_0: Apicesa atthipaccayo nāma saṅkhepato khaṇattayappattaṃ nāmañceva rūpañca, vattamānā
atk-abh03a:2074_1: pañcakkhandhātipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati. So jātibhedato kusalākusalavipākakiriyarūpavasena
atk-abh03a:2074_2: pañcadhā bhijjati. Tattha kusalo sahajātapacchājātavasena duvidho hoti, tathā akusalo
atk-abh03a:2074_3: vipākakiriyasaṅkhāto ca. Tesu kusalo kāmāvacarādibhedena catudhā bhijjati, akusalo
atk-abh03a:2074_4: kāmāvacarova vipāko catubhūmako, kiriyāsaṅkhāto tibhūmako. Rūpasaṅkhāto atthipaccayo
atk-abh03a:2074_5: kāmāvacarova. So pana sahajātapurejātavasena duvidho. Tattha pañca vatthūni ārammaṇāni
atk-abh03a:2074_6: ca purejātāneva, hadayavatthu sahajātaṃ vā hoti purejātaṃ vā. Pañhāvāre pana āgato
atk-abh03a:2074_7: āhāro indriyañca sahajātādibhedaṃ na labhatīti evamettha nānappakārabhedato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2075_0: Evaṃ bhinne panettha catubhūmakakusalopi sahajāto atthipaccayo pañcavokāre “eko khandho
atk-abh03a:2075_1: tiṇṇannaṃ khandhāna”ntiādinā nayena aññamaññaṃ khandhānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa
atk-abh03a:2075_2: ca ṭhapetvā pana rūpāvacarakusalaṃ avaseso āruppe sampayuttakkhandhānaññeva sahajātakusalo
atk-abh03a:2075_3: atthipaccayena paccayo hoti. Catubhūmako panesa pañcavokāre catusamuṭṭhānikatisamuṭṭhānikakāyassa
atk-abh03a:2075_4: pacchājāto kusalo atthipaccayena paccayo hoti. Akusalepi eseva nayo. Sopi hi pañcavokāre
atk-abh03a:2076_0: Vipākato pana kāmāvacararūpāvacaro atthipaccayo niyameneva paṭisandhikkhaṇe khandhānañceva
atk-abh03a:2076_1: kaṭattārūpassa ca sahajātatthipaccayena paccayo. Pavatte pana sampayuttakkhandhānañceva
atk-abh03a:2076_2: cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca sahajātatthipaccayena paccayo, ṭhitippattassa catusamuṭṭhānikatisamuṭṭhānikakāyassa
atk-abh03a:2076_3: pacchājātatthipaccayena paccayo. Arūpāvacaravipāko pana āruppe uppannalokuttaravipāko
atk-abh03a:2076_4: ca attanā sampayuttakkhandhānaññeva sahajātatthipaccayena paccayo. Pañcavokāre lokuttaravipāko
atk-abh03a:2076_9: pana āruppe sampayuttakkhandhānaññeva, pañcavokāre cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassāpi sahajātatthipaccayena
atk-abh03a:2077_0: Rūpasaṅkhāto pana atthipaccayo sahajāto, purejāto, āhāro, indriyanti catubbidho.
atk-abh03a:2077_1: Tattha sahajātarūpatthipaccayo catusamuṭṭhānavasena catudhā ṭhito. Tattha kammasamuṭṭhāno
atk-abh03a:2077_2: ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ tiṇṇannaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ, tīṇi ekassa, dve dvinnaṃ, mahābhūtā upādārūpānanti
atk-abh03a:2077_3: evaṃ sahajātatthipaccayena paccayo hoti. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthurūpaṃ kāmāvacararūpāvacaravipākakkhandhānaṃ
atk-abh03a:2077_4: sahajātatthipaccayena paccayo hoti. Tesampi tisamuṭṭhānikarūpaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ tiṇṇannaṃ
atk-abh03a:2077_5: mahābhūtānaṃ, tīṇi ekassa, dve dvinnaṃ, mahābhūtā upādārūpānanti evaṃ sahajātatthipaccayena
atk-abh03a:2077_6: paccayo hoti. Purejātatthipaccayo pana vatthupurejātaārammaṇapurejātavasena duvidho
atk-abh03a:2077_7: hoti. So duvidhopi heṭṭhā purejātapaccaye vuttanayeneva yojetvā gahetabbo. Āhāratthipaccayopi
atk-abh03a:2077_8: heṭṭhā kabaḷīkārāhārapaccaye yojitanayeneva yojetabbo. Idha panesa attano aniruddhakkhaṇe
atk-abh03a:2077_9: paccayabhāvena atthipaccayoti vutto. Rūpajīvitindriyampi heṭṭhā indriyapaccaye rūpajīvitindriyayojanāyaṃ
atk-abh03a:2077_10: vuttanayeneva yojetabbaṃ. Idha panetampi attano aniruddhakkhaṇeyeva paccayabhāvena
atk-abh03a:2077_11: atthipaccayoti vuttanti evamettha paccayuppannatopi viññātabbo vinicchayoti.
atk-abh03a:2080_0: 22. Natthipaccayaniddese samanantaraniruddhāti aññena cittuppādena anantarikā hutvā
atk-abh03a:2080_1: samanantaraniruddhā. Paṭuppannānanti paccuppannānaṃ. Iminā natthipaccayassa okāsadānaṭṭhena
atk-abh03a:2080_2: natthipaccayabhāvaṃ sādheti. Purimesu hi nirodhavasena pacchimānaṃ pavattanokāsaṃ
atk-abh03a:2080_3: adentesu tesaṃ paṭuppannabhāvo na siyāti ayamettha pāḷivaṇṇanā. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ anantarapaccaye
atk-abh03a:2080_4: vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Paccayalakkhaṇameva hettha nānaṃ, paccayānaṃ pana paccayuppannānañca
atk-abh03a:2080_5: nānākaraṇaṃ natthi. Kevalaṃ pana tattha “cakkhuviññāṇadhātu taṃsampayuttakā ca dhammā
atk-abh03a:2080_6: manodhātuyā”tiādinā nayena paccayā ca paccayuppannā ca sarūpato dassitā. Idha pana
atk-abh03a:2083_0: 23. Vigatapaccayaniddese samanantaravigatāti samanantarameva vigatā. Iminā vigatapaccayassa
atk-abh03a:2083_1: vigacchamānabhāveneva paccayabhāvaṃ dasseti. Iti natthipaccayassa ca imassa ca byañjanamatteyeva
atk-abh03a:2086_1: vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo. Imassapi hi paccayassa atthipaccayena saddhiṃ byañjanamatteyeva
atk-abh03a:2089_0: Idāni evaṃ uddesaniddesato dassitesu imesu catuvīsatiyā paccayesu ñāṇacārassa visadabhāvatthaṃ
atk-abh03a:2089_4: dasannaṃ padānaṃ vasena pakiṇṇakavinicchayo veditabbo. Tattha anekadhammānaṃ ekapaccayabhāvatoti
atk-abh03a:2089_5: etesu hi ṭhapetvā kammapaccayaṃ avasesesu tevīsatiyā paccayesu anekadhammā ekato
atk-abh03a:2089_6: paccayā honti. Kammapaccayo pana eko cetanādhammoyevāti evaṃ tāvettha anekadhammānaṃ
atk-abh03a:2090_0: Ekadhammassa anekapaccayabhāvatoti hetupaccaye tāva amoho eko dhammo. So purejātakammāhārajhānapaccayova
atk-abh03a:2090_1: na hoti, sesānaṃ vīsatiyā paccayānaṃ vasena paccayo hoti. Alobhādosā indriyamaggapaccayāpi
atk-abh03a:2090_2: na honti, sesānaṃ aṭṭhārasannaṃ paccayānaṃ vasena paccayā honti. Lobhamohā vipākapaccayāpi
atk-abh03a:2090_3: na honti, sesānaṃ sattarasannaṃ paccayānaṃ vasena paccayā honti. Doso adhipatipaccayopi
atk-abh03a:2090_4: na hoti, sesānaṃ soḷasannaṃ paccayānaṃ vasena paccayo hoti. Ārammaṇapaccaye rūpāyatanaṃ
atk-abh03a:2090_5: cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇapurejātaatthiavigatavasena catudhā paccayo; tathā manodhātuyā
atk-abh03a:2090_7: paccayo hoti. Iminā nayena sabbesaṃ ārammaṇapaccayadhammānaṃ anekapaccayabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2091_1: veditabbo. Sahajātādhipatīsu vīmaṃsā amohahetu viya vīsatidhā paccayo hoti. Chando
atk-abh03a:2091_3: vasena paccayo hoti. Cittaṃ hetupurejātakammajhānamaggapaccayo na hoti, sesānaṃ ekūnavīsatiyā
atk-abh03a:2091_4: paccayānaṃ vasena paccayo hoti. Vīriyaṃ hetupurejātakammāhārajhānapaccayo na hoti,
atk-abh03a:2092_0: Anantarapaccaye “cakkhuviññāṇadhātū”tiādinā nayena vuttesu catūsu khandhesu vedanākkhandho
atk-abh03a:2092_1: hetupurejātakammāhāramaggapaccayo na hoti, sesānaṃ ekūnavīsatiyā vasena paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2092_2: Saññākkhandho indriyajhānapaccayopi na hoti, sesānaṃ sattarasannaṃ vasena paccayo
atk-abh03a:2092_3: hoti. Saṅkhārakkhandhe hetū hetupaccaye vuttanayena, chandavīriyāni adhipatipaccaye
atk-abh03a:2092_4: vuttanayeneva paccayā honti. Phasso hetupurejātakammaindriyajhānamaggapaccayo na
atk-abh03a:2092_5: hoti, sesānaṃ aṭṭhārasannaṃ vasena paccayo hoti. Cetanā hetupurejātaindriyajhānamaggapaccayo
atk-abh03a:2092_6: na hoti. Sesānaṃ ekūnavīsatiyā vasena paccayo hoti. Vitakko hetupurejātakammāhārindriyapaccayo
atk-abh03a:2092_7: na hoti, sesānaṃ ekūnavīsatiyā vasena paccayo hoti. Vicāro maggapaccayopi na hoti,
atk-abh03a:2092_8: sesānaṃ aṭṭhārasannaṃ vasena paccayo hoti. Pīti tesaññeva vasena paccayo hoti. Cittekaggatā
atk-abh03a:2092_9: hetupurejātakammāhārapaccayo na hoti, sesānaṃ vīsatiyā vasena paccayo hoti. Saddhā
atk-abh03a:2092_10: hetupurejātakammāhārajhānamaggapaccayo na hoti, sesānaṃ aṭṭhārasannaṃ vasena paccayo
atk-abh03a:2092_11: hoti. Sati tehi ceva maggapaccayena cāti ekūnavīsatiyā vasena paccayo hoti. Jīvitindriyaṃ
atk-abh03a:2092_12: saddhāya vuttānaṃ aṭṭhārasannaṃ vasena paccayo hoti. Hirottappaṃ tato indriyapaccayaṃ
atk-abh03a:2092_13: apanetvā sesānaṃ sattarasannaṃ vasena paccayo hoti. Tathā kāyapassaddhādīni yugaḷakāni,
atk-abh03a:2092_14: yevāpanakesu adhimokkhamanasikāratatramajjhattatā karuṇāmuditā ca. Viratiyo pana
atk-abh03a:2092_15: tehi ceva maggapaccayena cāti aṭṭhārasadhā paccayā honti. Micchādiṭṭhi tato vipākapaccayaṃ
atk-abh03a:2092_16: apanetvā sattarasadhā, micchāvācākammantājīvā tehi ceva kammāhārapaccayehi cāti ekūnavīsatidhā.
atk-abh03a:2092_17: Ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ māno thinaṃ middhaṃ uddhaccanti ime hetupurejātakammavipākāhārindriyajhānamaggapaccayā
atk-abh03a:2092_18: na honti, sesānaṃ pana soḷasannaṃ paccayānaṃ vasena paccayā honti. Vicikicchāissāmacchariyakukkuccāni
atk-abh03a:2092_19: tato adhipatipaccayaṃ apanetvā pannarasadhā viññāṇakkhandhassa. Adhipatipaccaye vuttanayeneva
atk-abh03a:2093_0: Sahajātapaccaye catūsu tāva khandhesu ekekassa dhammassa anekapaccayabhāvo vuttanayeneva
atk-abh03a:2093_2: navadhā paccayā honti. Hadayavatthu tesañceva vippayuttassa ca vasena dasadhā paccayo
atk-abh03a:2093_3: hoti. Aññamaññapaccaye apubbaṃ natthi. Nissayapaccaye cakkhāyatanādīni ārammaṇaārammaṇādhipatinissayaupanissayapurejātaindriyavippayuttaatthiavigatavasena
atk-abh03a:2093_4: navadhā paccayā honti. Upanissaye apubbaṃ natthi. Purejātapaccaye rūpasaddagandharasāyatanāni
atk-abh03a:2093_6: Ettakamevettha apubbaṃ. Pacchājātādīsu apubbaṃ natthi. Āhārapaccaye kabaḷīkārāhāro
atk-abh03a:2093_8: apubbaṃ natthi. Evamettha ekadhammassa anekapaccayabhāvatopi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2094_0: Ekapaccayassa anekapaccayabhāvatoti hetupaccayādīsu yassa kassaci ekassa paccayassa
atk-abh03a:2094_1: yenākārena yenatthena yo paccayuppannānaṃ paccayo hoti, taṃ ākāraṃ taṃ atthaṃ avijahitvāva
atk-abh03a:2094_2: aññehipi yehākārehi yehi atthehi so tasmiññeva khaṇe tesaṃ dhammānaṃ anekapaccayabhāvaṃ
atk-abh03a:2094_3: gacchati, tato anekapaccayabhāvato tassa vinicchayo veditabboti attho. Seyyathidaṃ
atk-abh03a:2094_5: vasena aparehipi ekādasahākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchati. Alobhādosā tato adhipatiindriyamaggapaccaye
atk-abh03a:2094_6: tayo apanetvā sesānaṃ vasena anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchanti. Idaṃ vipākahetūsuyeva
atk-abh03a:2094_7: labbhati, kusalakiriyesu pana vipākapaccayatā parihāyati. Lobhadosamohā te tayo vipākañcāti
atk-abh03a:2094_8: cattāro apanetvā sesānaṃ vasena anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchanti.
atk-abh03a:2095_1: vasena aparehipi sattahākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchati. Ayamettha ukkaṭṭhaparicchedo,
atk-abh03a:2095_2: arūpadhammānaṃ pana atītānāgatānaṃ vā rūpadhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayabhāve sati ārammaṇādhipatiārammaṇūpanissayamattaññeva
atk-abh03a:2095_3: uttari labbhati. Adhipatipaccaye vīmaṃsā amohasadisā. Chando adhipatipaccayo adhipatipaccayattaṃ
atk-abh03a:2095_5: aparehipi aṭṭhahākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchati. Vīriyaṃ tesañceva indriyamaggapaccayānañcāti
atk-abh03a:2095_6: imesaṃ vasena aparehipi dasahākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchati. Cittaṃ tato maggapaccayaṃ
atk-abh03a:2095_7: apanetvā āhārapaccayaṃ pakkhipitvā imesaṃ vasena adhipatipaccayato uttari dasahākārehi
atk-abh03a:2095_8: anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchati. Ārammaṇādhipatino pana heṭṭhā ārammaṇapaccaye vuttanayeneva
atk-abh03a:2096_1: vasena aparehipi pañcahākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchanti. Ariyamaggacetanāyeva
atk-abh03a:2096_2: cettha kammapaccayataṃ labhati, na sesadhammā. Sahajātapaccayo sahajātapaccayattaṃ
atk-abh03a:2096_4: vasena aparehi cuddasahākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchati. Ayampi ukkaṭṭhaparicchedo
atk-abh03a:2096_5: vatthusahajātādīnaṃ pana vasenettha hetupaccayādīnaṃ abhāvopi veditabbo. Aññamaññapaccayepi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a:2097_0: Nissayapaccayo nissayapaccayattaṃ avijahantova catuvīsatiyā paccayesu attano nissayapaccayattañceva
atk-abh03a:2097_2: aparehipi sattarasahākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchati. Ayampi ukkaṭṭhaparicchedova
atk-abh03a:2097_3: vatthunissayādīnaṃ pana vasenettha hetupaccayādīnaṃ ābhāvopi veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2098_2: anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchati. Ariyamaggacetanāyeva cettha kammapaccayataṃ labhati,
atk-abh03a:2098_3: na sesadhammā. Pakatūpanissayo pakatūpanissayova. Purejātapaccayo attano purejātapaccayattaṃ
atk-abh03a:2098_5: vasena aparehipi aṭṭhahākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchati. Ayampi ukkaṭṭhaniddesova
atk-abh03a:2098_6: ārammaṇapurejāte panettha nissayaindriyavippayuttapaccayatā na labbhati. Ito uttaripi
atk-abh03a:2098_8: avijahantova vippayuttaatthiavigatānaṃ vasena aparehipi tīhākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ
atk-abh03a:2099_1: vasena aparehipi navahākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchati. Nānākkhaṇiko upanissayaanantarasamanantaranatthivigatānaṃ
atk-abh03a:2099_2: vasena aparehipi pañcahākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchati. Vipākapaccayo vipākapaccayattaṃ
atk-abh03a:2099_4: vasena aparehipi cuddasahākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchati. Āhārapaccaye kabaḷīkāro
atk-abh03a:2099_5: āhāro āhārapaccayattaṃ avijahantova atthiavigatānaṃ vasena aparehipi dvīhākārehi
atk-abh03a:2099_6: anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchati. Sesā tayo āhārapaccayattaṃ avijahantāva yathānurūpaṃ
atk-abh03a:2100_0: Indriyapaccaye rūpino pañcindriyā indriyapaccayattaṃ avijahantāva nissayapurejātavippayuttaatthiavigatānaṃ
atk-abh03a:2100_1: vasena aparehipi pañcahākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchanti. Rūpajīvitindriyampi
atk-abh03a:2100_2: indriyapaccayattaṃ avijahantaññeva atthiavigatānaṃ vasena aparehipi dvīhākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ
atk-abh03a:2100_3: gacchati. Arūpino indriyānipi yathānurūpaṃ indriyapaccayattaṃ avijahantāneva hetuadhipatisahajātaaññamaññanissayavipākaāhārajhānamaggasampayuttavippayuttaatthiavigatānaṃ
atk-abh03a:2100_4: vasena aparehipi terasahākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchanti. Jhānapaccayo jhānapaccayattaṃ
atk-abh03a:2100_6: vasena aparehipi dasahākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchati. Maggapaccayo maggapaccayattaṃ
atk-abh03a:2100_7: avijahantova yathānurūpaṃ jhānapaccaye vuttānaṃ dasannaṃ hetuadhipatīnañcāti imesaṃ
atk-abh03a:2101_1: vasena aparehipi terasahākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchati. Vippayuttapaccayo vippayuttapaccayattaṃ
atk-abh03a:2101_3: apanetvā sesānaṃ vasena yathānurūpaṃ aparehipi sattarasahākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ
atk-abh03a:2101_4: gacchati. Tattha rūpassa ca arūpassa ca paccayavibhāgo veditabbo. Atthipaccayo atthipaccayattaṃ
atk-abh03a:2101_6: sesānaṃ vasena yathānurūpaṃ aparehi aṭṭhārasahākārehi anekapaccayabhāvaṃ gacchati.
atk-abh03a:2103_0: Paccayavisabhāgatoti purejātapaccayo panettha pacchājātapaccayena visabhāgo, tathā
atk-abh03a:2103_2: avigatapaccayenāti iminā upāyenettha paccayavisabhāgatopi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2104_0: Yugaḷakatoti etesu ca atthasarikkhatāya, saddasarikkhatāya, kālapaṭipakkhatāya, hetuphalatāya,
atk-abh03a:2104_1: aññamaññapaṭipakkhatāyāti imehi kāraṇehi yugaḷakato viññātabbo vinicchayo. Anantarasamanantarā
atk-abh03a:2104_2: hi atthasarikkhatāya ekaṃ yugaḷakaṃ nāma; nissayūpanissayā saddasarikkhatāya, purejātapacchājātā
atk-abh03a:2104_4: aññamaññapaṭipakkhatāya ekaṃ yugaḷakaṃ nāma, tathā atthinatthipaccayā, vigatāvigatapaccayā
atk-abh03a:2104_5: cāti evamettha yugaḷakatopi viññātabbo vinicchayo. Janakājanakatoti etesu ca anantarasamanantarānantarūpanissayapakatūpanissayāsevanapaccayā
atk-abh03a:2104_6: nānākkhaṇiko, kammapaccayo, natthivigatapaccayāti ime paccayā janakāyeva, na ajanakā.
atk-abh03a:2104_7: Pacchājātapaccayo kevalaṃ upatthambhakoyeva, na janako. Sesā janakā ca ajanakā ca
atk-abh03a:2104_8: upatthambhakā cāti attho. Evamettha janakājanakatopi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a:2105_1: nāma, sabbesaṃ saṅkhatānaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ ṭhānabhūtā kāraṇabhūtāti attho. Etehi
atk-abh03a:2105_3: asabbaṭṭhānikā nāma. Na sabbesaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ ṭhānabhūtā, arūpakkhandhānaññeva
atk-abh03a:2105_4: pana ṭhānabhūtā kāraṇabhūtāti attho. Arūpadhammāyeva hi etehi uppajjanti, na rūpadhammā.
atk-abh03a:2105_6: Vuttāvasesāpi ekaccānaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ uppattihetuto na sabbaṭṭhānikāti evamettha
atk-abh03a:2106_0: Rūpaṃ rūpassātiādivikappatoti etesu ca catuvīsatiyā paccayesu ekapaccayopi ekantena
atk-abh03a:2106_1: rūpameva hutvā rūpasseva paccayo nāma natthi, ekantena pana rūpaṃ hutvā arūpasseva
atk-abh03a:2106_2: paccayo nāma atthi. Kataro panesoti? Purejātapaccayo. Purejātapaccayo hi ekantena
atk-abh03a:2106_3: rūpameva hutvā arūpasseva paccayo hoti. Ekantena rūpameva hutvā rūpārūpasseva paccayo
atk-abh03a:2106_4: nāmātipi natthi, ekantena pana arūpaṃ hutvā arūpasseva paccayo nāma atthi. Kataro
atk-abh03a:2106_6: sabbopi ekantena arūpameva hutvā arūpasseva paccayo hoti. Ekantena arūpameva hutvāpi
atk-abh03a:2106_7: ekantena rūpasseva paccayo nāmātipi atthi. Kataro panesoti? Pacchājātapaccayo. So
atk-abh03a:2106_8: hi ekantena arūpaṃ hutvā rūpasseva paccayo hoti; ekantena pana arūpadhammova hutvā
atk-abh03a:2106_9: rūpārūpānaṃ paccayopi atthi. Kataro panesoti? Hetukammavipākajhānamaggavasena pañcavidho.
atk-abh03a:2106_10: So hi sabbopi ekantena arūpameva hutvā rūpadhammānaṃ arūpadhammānampi paccayo hoti.
atk-abh03a:2106_11: Ekantena pana rūpārūpameva hutvā rūpasseva paccayo nāmātipi natthi, arūpasseva pana
atk-abh03a:2106_12: hoti. Kataro panesoti? Ārammaṇapaccayo ceva upanissayapaccayo ca. Idañhi dvayaṃ ekantena
atk-abh03a:2106_13: rūpārūpameva hutvā arūpasseva paccayo hoti. Ekantena rūpārūpameva hutvā pana rūpārūpasseva
atk-abh03a:2106_15: navavidho. So hi sabbopi ekantena rūpārūpameva hutvā rūpārūpasseva paccayo hotīti
atk-abh03a:2107_0: Bhavabhedatoti imesu pana catuvīsatiyā paccayesu pañcavokārabhave tāva na koci paccayo
atk-abh03a:2107_1: na labbhati nāma. Catuvokārabhave pana tayo purejātapacchājātavippayuttapaccaye apanetvā
atk-abh03a:2107_4: pañceva labbhantīti evamettha bhavabhedatopi viññātabbo vinicchayoti.
atk-abh03a:2111_1: paṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇe ye tikādayo nissāya niddiṭṭhattā etaṃ tikapaṭṭhānaṃ, dukapaṭṭhānaṃ…pe…
atk-abh03a:2111_2: dukadukapaṭṭhānanti vuttaṃ. Te anāmasitvā yesaṃ paccayānaṃ vasena te tikādayo vibhattā,
atk-abh03a:2111_3: te paccaye eva tāva iminā mātikānikkhepapaccayavibhaṅgasaṅkhātena vārena uddesato
atk-abh03a:2111_4: ca niddesato ca dassetvā, idāni ye tikādayo nissāya niddiṭṭhattā etaṃ tikapaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2111_5: dukapaṭṭhānaṃ…pe… dukadukapaṭṭhānanti vuttaṃ. Te tikādayo imesaṃ paccayānaṃ vasena
atk-abh03a:2111_6: vitthāretvā dassetuṃ ekekaṃ tikadukaṃ nissāya sattahi mahāvārehi desanā katā. Tesaṃ
atk-abh03a:2111_7: imāni nāmāni – paṭiccavāro, sahajātavāro, paccayavāro, nissayavāro, saṃsaṭṭhavāro,
atk-abh03a:2112_0: Tattha “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo”ti evaṃ paṭiccābhidhānavasena vutto
atk-abh03a:2112_1: paṭiccavāro nāma. Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ sahajāto kusalo dhammo”ti evaṃ sahajātābhidhānavasena
atk-abh03a:2112_2: vutto sahajātavāro nāma. So purimena paṭiccavārena atthato ninnānākaraṇo. Paṭiccābhidhānavasena
atk-abh03a:2112_3: bujjhanakānaṃ vasena pana paṭhamo vutto, sahajātābhidhānavasena bujjhanakānaṃ vasena
atk-abh03a:2112_4: dutiyo. Dvīsupi cetesu rūpārūpadhammavasena paccayā ceva paccayuppannadhammā ca veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:2112_5: Te ca kho sahajātāva, na purejātapacchājātā labbhanti. “Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo
atk-abh03a:2112_6: dhammo”ti evaṃ paccayābhidhānavasena vutto pana paccayavāro nāma. Sopi purimavāradvayaṃ
atk-abh03a:2112_7: viya rūpārūpadhammavaseneva veditabbo. Paccayo panettha purejātopi labbhati. Ayamassa
atk-abh03a:2112_8: purimavāradvayato viseso. Tadanantaro “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ nissāya kusalo dhammo”ti evaṃ
atk-abh03a:2112_9: nissayābhidhānavasena vutto nissayavāro nāma. So purimena paccayavārena atthato ninnānākaraṇo.
atk-abh03a:2112_10: Paccayābhidhānavasena bujjhanakānaṃ vasena pana paṭhamo vutto, nissayābhidhānavasena
atk-abh03a:2112_11: bujjhanakānaṃ vasena dutiyo. Tato paraṃ “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho kusalo dhammo”ti
atk-abh03a:2112_12: evaṃ saṃsaṭṭhābhidhānavasena vutto saṃsaṭṭhavāro nāma. “Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ sampayutto
atk-abh03a:2112_13: kusalo dhammo”ti evaṃ sampayuttābhidhānavasena vutto sampayuttavāro nāma. So purimena
atk-abh03a:2112_14: saṃsaṭṭhavārena atthato ninnānākaraṇo. Saṃsaṭṭhābhidhānavasena bujjhanakānaṃ vasena
atk-abh03a:2112_15: pana paṭhamo vutto, sampayuttābhidhānavasena dutiyo. Dvīsupi cetesu arūpadhammavaseneva
atk-abh03a:2112_16: paccayā paccayuppannā ca veditabbā. Sattamavāre pana yasmā “kusalo dhammo kusalassa
atk-abh03a:2112_17: dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo”tiādinā nayena te te pañhe uddharitvā puna “kusalā
atk-abh03a:2112_18: hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhāna”ntiādinā nayena sabbepi te pañhā nijjaṭā niggumbā
atk-abh03a:2112_19: ca katvā vibhattā, tasmā so vāro pañhānaṃ sādhukaṃ vibhattattā pañhāvārotveva saṅkhyaṃ
atk-abh03a:2112_20: gato. Rūpārūpadhammavaseneva panettha paccayāpi paccayuppannāpi veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:2113_0: Tattha yo tāva esa sabbapaṭhamo paṭiccavāro nāma, so uddesato niddesato ca duvidho
atk-abh03a:2113_1: hoti. Tattha uddesavāro paṭhamo, pucchāvārotipi vuccati. Paṇṇattivārotipi tasseva
atk-abh03a:2113_2: nāmaṃ. So hi kusalādayo paṭicca kusalādīnaṃ hetupaccayādīnaṃ vasena uddiṭṭhattā uddesavāro,
atk-abh03a:2113_3: kusalādayo paṭicca hetupaccayādivasena kusalādīnaṃ uppattiyā pucchitattā pucchāvāro,
atk-abh03a:2113_4: kusalādayo paṭicca hetupaccayādivasena kusalādīnaṃ uppattiyā paññāpitattā paṇṇattivārotipi vutto.
atk-abh03a:2114_0: 25-34. Tattha siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayāti
atk-abh03a:2114_1: parikappapucchā. Ayañhettha attho – yo kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā, kiṃ
atk-abh03a:2114_2: so kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca siyāti atha vā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca yo kusalo dhammo
atk-abh03a:2114_3: uppajjeyya, so hetupaccayā siyāti ayamettha attho. Tattha paṭīti sadisatthe vattati.
atk-abh03a:2114_4: Sadisapuggalo hi paṭipuggalo, sadisabhāgo ca paṭibhāgoti vuccati. Iccāti gamanussukkavacanametaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2114_5: Ubhayaṃ ekato katvā paṭiccāti paṭigantvā sahuppattisaṅkhātena sadisabhāvena patvā,
atk-abh03a:2114_6: tena saddhiṃ ekato uppattibhāvaṃ upagantvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Kusalo dhammoti evaṃ sahuppattibhāvena
atk-abh03a:2114_7: kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayāti pucchati. Atha vā
atk-abh03a:2114_8: paṭiccāti paccayaṃ katvā. Taṃ pana paccayakaraṇaṃ purejātepi paccaye labbhati sahajātepi.
atk-abh03a:2114_9: Idha sahajātaṃ adhippetaṃ. Siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalotiādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a:2114_10: Tattha kiñcāpi sahajātavasena kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo natthi, imasmiṃ pana
atk-abh03a:2114_11: pucchāvāre yampi vissajjiyamānaṃ atthato labbhati, yampi na labbhati, taṃ sabbaṃ
atk-abh03a:2114_12: pucchāvasena uddhaṭaṃ. Parato pana vissajjane yaṃ na labbhati, taṃ pahāya yaṃ labbhati, tadeva vissajjitaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2115_0: Evamettha pucchānaṃ atthañceva pucchāgatiñca ñatvā idāni gaṇanavasena pucchāparicchedo
atk-abh03a:2115_1: veditabbo. Ettha hi “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiccā”ti kusalapadaṃ ādiṃ katvā kusalākusalābyākatantā
atk-abh03a:2115_2: tisso pucchā, puna tadevādiṃ katvā kusalābyākatādivasena dukappabhedantā tisso, puna
atk-abh03a:2115_3: tadevādiṃ katvā tikantā ca ekā, evaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiccāti kusalādikā satta pucchā,
atk-abh03a:2115_4: tathā akusalādikā, tathā abyākatādikā, tathā kusalābyākatādikā, akusalābyākatādikā,
atk-abh03a:2115_5: kusalākusalādikā, kusalākusalābyākatādikāti sabbāpi sattannaṃ sattakānaṃ vasena kusalattikaṃ
atk-abh03a:2116_0: Tattha ekamūlakāvasānā nava, ekamūladukāvasānā nava, ekamūlatikāvasānā tisso, dukamūlaekāvasānā
atk-abh03a:2116_1: nava, dukamūladukāvasānā nava, dukamūlatikāvasānā tisso, tikamūlaekāvasānā tisso,
atk-abh03a:2116_2: tikamūladukāvasānā tisso, tikamūlatikāvasānā ekāti evametā mūlavasenāpi veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:2116_3: Yathā ca hetupaccaye ekūnapaññāsaṃ, ārammaṇapaccayādīsupi tathevāti sabbesupi catuvīsatiyā paccayesu –
atk-abh03a:2119_0: 35-36. Tato paraṃ hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayāti dumūlakanayo āraddho. Tattha hetārammaṇaduko…pe…
atk-abh03a:2119_1: hetuavigatadukoti hetupaccayena saddhiṃ tevīsati dukā honti. Tesu hetupaccaye viya
atk-abh03a:2119_2: hetārammaṇadukepi ekūnapaññāsaṃ pucchā, tāsu pāḷiyaṃ dveyeva dassitā. Yathā ca hetārammaṇaduke
atk-abh03a:2119_3: ekūnapaññāsaṃ tathā hetādhipatidukādīsupi. Tattha paṭhamapucchāvasena hetādhipatiduko,
atk-abh03a:2119_4: hetānantaraduko, hetusamanantaradukoti paṭipāṭiyā tayo duke dassetvā pariyosāne hetuavigataduko
atk-abh03a:2119_5: dassito, sesaṃ saṅkhittaṃ. Pucchāparicchedo panettha evaṃ veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2122_0: 37. Tato paraṃ hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā adhipatipaccayāti timūlakanayo āraddho.
atk-abh03a:2122_1: Tattha hetārammaṇadukena saddhiṃ adhipatipaccayādīsu bāvīsatiyā paccayesu ekamekassa
atk-abh03a:2122_2: yojanāvasena bāvīsati tikā honti. Tesu paṭhamapucchāvasena paṭhamattikañca dutiyattikañca
atk-abh03a:2122_3: dassetvā pariyosānatiko dassito, sesaṃ saṅkhittaṃ. Yathā pana dukesu, evaṃ tikesupi
atk-abh03a:2122_4: ekamekasmiṃ tike ekūnapaññāsaṃ katvā sabbesupi bāvīsatiyā tikesu –
atk-abh03a:2125_0: 38. Tato paraṃ hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā adhipatipaccayā anantarapaccayāti catumūlakanayo
atk-abh03a:2125_1: āraddho. Tattha paṭhamattikena saddhiṃ anantarapaccayādīsu ekavīsatiyā paccayesu
atk-abh03a:2125_2: ekamekassa yojanāvasena ekavīsati catukkā honti. Tesu dve catukke dassetvā sesaṃ
atk-abh03a:2125_3: saṅkhittaṃ. Idhāpi ekamekasmiṃ catukke ekūnapaññāsaṃ katvā sabbesupi ekavīsatiyā catukkesu –
atk-abh03a:2128_0: Tato paraṃ pañcamūlakaṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva sabbamūlakā desanā katā, taṃ sabbaṃ saṅkhipitvā
atk-abh03a:2128_1: heṭṭhā vuttañca upari vattabbañca ekato katvā pāḷiyaṃ “ekamūlakaṃ, dumūlakaṃ, timūlakaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2128_2: catumūlakaṃ, pañcamūlakaṃ, sabbamūlakaṃ asammuyhantena vitthāretabba”nti nayo dassito.
atk-abh03a:2128_3: Tattha ekamūlakādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ vuttameva. Pañcamūlake pana paṭhamacatukkena
atk-abh03a:2128_4: saddhiṃ samanantarapaccayādīsu samavīsatiyā paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena samavīsati
atk-abh03a:2128_5: pañcakā honti. Tesu ekamekasmiṃ ekūnapaññāsaṃ katvā –
atk-abh03a:2129: Satāni nava pucchānaṃ, asīti ca punāparā;
atk-abh03a:2131: Chamūlake paṭhamapañcakena saddhiṃ sahajātapaccayādīsu ekūnavīsatiyā paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena ekūnavīsati chakkā honti. Tesu ekamekasmiṃ ekūnapaññāsaṃ katvā –
atk-abh03a:2134: Sattamūlake paṭhamachakkena saddhiṃ aññamaññapaccayādīsu aṭṭhārasasu paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena aṭṭhārasa sattakā honti. Tesu ekamekasmiṃ ekūnapaññāsaṃ katvā –
atk-abh03a:2135: Satāni aṭṭha pucchānaṃ, dvāsīti ca tatoparā;
atk-abh03a:2137: Aṭṭhamūlake paṭhamasattakena saddhiṃ nissayapaccayādīsu sattarasasu paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena sattarasa aṭṭhakā honti. Tesu ekamekasmiṃ ekūnapaññāsaṃ katvā –
atk-abh03a:2138: Satāni aṭṭha pucchānaṃ, tettiṃsā ca tatoparā;
atk-abh03a:2140: Navamūlake paṭhamaaṭṭhakena saddhiṃ upanissayapaccayādīsu soḷasasu paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena soḷasa navakā honti. Tesu ekamekasmiṃ ekūnapaññāsaṃ katvā –
atk-abh03a:2143: Dasamūlake paṭhamanavakena saddhiṃ purejātapaccayādīsu pannarasasu paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena pannarasa dasakā honti. Tesu ekamekasmiṃ ekūnapaññāsaṃ katvā –
atk-abh03a:2146: Ekādasamūlake paṭhamadasakena saddhiṃ pacchājātapaccayādīsu cuddasasu paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena cuddasa ekādasakā honti. Tesu ekamekasmiṃ ekūnapaññāsaṃ katvā –
atk-abh03a:2147: Cha satāni ca pucchānaṃ, chaḷāsīti tatoparā;
atk-abh03a:2149: Dvādasamūlake paṭhamaekādasakena saddhiṃ āsevanapaccayādīsu terasasu paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena terasa dvādasakā honti. Tesu ekamekasmiṃ ekūnapaññāsaṃ katvā –
atk-abh03a:2150: Cha satāni ca pucchānaṃ, sattatiṃsa tatoparā;
atk-abh03a:2152: Terasamūlake paṭhamadvādasakena saddhiṃ kammapaccayādīsu dvādasasu paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena dvādasa terasakā honti. Tesu ekamekasmiṃ ekūnapaññāsaṃ katvā –
atk-abh03a:2155: Cuddasamūlake paṭhamaterasakena saddhiṃ vipākapaccayādīsu ekādasasu paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena ekādasa cuddasakā honti. Tesu ekamekasmiṃ ekūnapaññāsaṃ katvā –
atk-abh03a:2156: Satāni pañca pucchānaṃ, tiṃsa cātha navāparā;
atk-abh03a:2158: Pannarasamūlake paṭhamacuddasakena saddhiṃ āhārapaccayādīsu dasasu paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena dasa pannarasakā honti. Tesu ekamekasmiṃ ekūnapaññāsaṃ katvā –
atk-abh03a:2159: Satāni cattāri pucchānaṃ, navuti ca tatoparā;
atk-abh03a:2161: Soḷasamūlake paṭhamapannarasakena saddhiṃ indriyapaccayādīsu navasu paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena nava soḷasakā honti. Tesu ekamekasmiṃ ekūnapaññāsaṃ katvā –
atk-abh03a:2164: Sattarasamūlake paṭhamasoḷasakena saddhiṃ jhānapaccayādīsu aṭṭhasu paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena aṭṭha sattarasakā honti. Tesu ekamekasmiṃ ekūnapaññāsaṃ katvā –
atk-abh03a:2165: Satāni tīṇi pucchānaṃ, navuti dve punāparā;
atk-abh03a:2167: Aṭṭhārasamūlake paṭhamasattarasakena saddhiṃ maggapaccayādīsu sattasu paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena satta aṭṭhārasakā honti. Tesu ekamekasmiṃ ekūnapaññāsaṃ katvā –
atk-abh03a:2170: Ekūnavīsatimūlake paṭhamaaṭṭhārasakena saddhiṃ sampayuttapaccayādīsu chasu paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena cha ekūnavīsatikā honti. Tesu ekamekasmiṃ ekūnapaññāsaṃ katvā –
atk-abh03a:2171: Dve satā navuti ceva, catasso ca punāparā;
atk-abh03a:2173: Vīsatimūlake paṭhamaekūnavīsatikena saddhiṃ vippayuttapaccayādīsu pañcasu paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena pañcavīsatikā honti. Tesu ekamekasmiṃ ekūnapaññāsaṃ katvā –
atk-abh03a:2174: Dve satā honti pucchānaṃ, cattālīsā ca pañca ca;
atk-abh03a:2176: Ekavīsatimūlake paṭhamavīsatikena saddhiṃ atthipaccayādīsu catūsu paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena cattāro ekavīsatikā honti. Tesu ekamekasmiṃ ekūnapaññāsaṃ katvā –
atk-abh03a:2177: Sataṃ chanavuti ceva, pucchā honti sampiṇḍitā;
atk-abh03a:2179: Dvāvīsatimūlake paṭhamaekavīsatikena saddhiṃ natthipaccayādīsu tīsu paccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena tayo dvāvīsatikā honti. Tesu ekamekasmiṃ ekūnapaññāsaṃ katvā –
atk-abh03a:2182: Tevīsatimūlake paṭhamadvāvīsatikena saddhiṃ dvīsu vigatāvigatapaccayesu ekamekassa yojanāvasena dve tevīsatikā honti. Tesu ekamekasmiṃ ekūnapaññāsaṃ katvā –
atk-abh03a:2185_0: Catuvīsatimūlako pana sabbapaccayānaṃ samodhānavasena veditabbo, teneva sabbamūlakoti
atk-abh03a:2185_1: vutto. Tattha ekūnapaññāsameva pucchā hontīti sabbāpetā hetupaccayapadameva gahetvā
atk-abh03a:2185_2: ekamūlakādīnaṃ sabbamūlakapariyosānānaṃ vasena satthārā devaparisati vitthārato vibhattā
atk-abh03a:2186_0: Tāsaṃ pana sabbāsampi ayaṃ gaṇanapiṇḍo – ekamūlakanayasmiñhi ekādasa satāni chasattati
atk-abh03a:2186_1: ca pucchā āgatā. Hetupaccayanaye teneva mūlakena ekūnapaññāsaṃ katvā imasmiṃ hetupaccayamūlake
atk-abh03a:2186_2: gahetabbā, sesā sesapaccayamūlakesu pakkhipitabbā. Dumūlake sattavīsāni ekādasa satāni,
atk-abh03a:2186_3: timūlake sahassaṃ aṭṭhasattati ca, catumūlake sahassaṃ ekūnatiṃsañca, pañcamūlake
atk-abh03a:2186_4: asītādhikāni nava satāni, chamūlake ekatiṃsāni nava satāni, sattamūlake dvāsītāni
atk-abh03a:2186_5: aṭṭha satāni, aṭṭhamūlake tettiṃsāni aṭṭha satāni, navamūlake caturāsītāni satta
atk-abh03a:2186_6: satāni, dasamūlake pañcatiṃsāni satta satāni, ekādasamūlake chāsītāni cha satāni,
atk-abh03a:2186_7: dvādasamūlake sattatiṃsāni cha satāni, terasamūlake aṭṭhāsītāni pañca satāni, cuddasamūlake
atk-abh03a:2186_8: ekūnacattālīsāni pañca satāni, pannarasamūlake navutāni cattāri satāni, soḷasamūlake
atk-abh03a:2186_9: ekacattālīsāni cattāri sattāni, sattarasamūlake dvānavutāni tīṇi satāni, aṭṭhārasamūlake
atk-abh03a:2186_10: tecattālīsāni tīṇi satāni, ekūnavīsatimūlake catunavutāni dve satāni, vīsatimūlake
atk-abh03a:2186_11: pañcacattālīsāni dve satāni, ekavīsatimūlake chanavutisataṃ, dvāvīsatimūlake sattacattālīsasataṃ,
atk-abh03a:2186_12: tevīsatimūlake aṭṭhanavuti, sabbamūlake ekūnapaññāsāti evaṃ hetupadaṃ ādiṃ katvā
atk-abh03a:2187: Cuddaseva sahassāni, puna satta satāni ca;
atk-abh03a:2189_0: 39-40. Evaṃ hetupaccayaṃ ādiṃ katvā ekamūlakato paṭṭhāya yāva sabbamūlakanayā pucchābhedaṃ
atk-abh03a:2189_1: dassetvā idāni ārammaṇapaccayaṃ ādiṃ katvā dassetuṃ siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca
atk-abh03a:2189_2: kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya ārammaṇapaccayā hetupaccayātiādimāha. Tattha ārammaṇapaccayā
atk-abh03a:2189_3: hetupaccayāti ettāvatā ārammaṇapaccayaṃ ādiṃ katvā hetupaccayapariyosāno ekamūlakanayo
atk-abh03a:2189_4: dassito. Tato paraṃ ārammaṇapaccayā adhipatipaccayāti dukamūlakaṃ āraddhaṃ. Tattha
atk-abh03a:2189_5: imaṃ paṭhamadukañceva ārammaṇāvigatadukañca dassetvā sesaṃ saṅkhittaṃ. Ārammaṇapaccayā
atk-abh03a:2189_6: hetupaccayāti ayaṃ osānadukopi na dassito. Sace pana katthaci vācanāmagge sandissati,
atk-abh03a:2189_7: sveva vācanāmaggo gahetabbo. Tato paraṃ ārammaṇapaccayavasena tikamūlakādayo adassetvāva
atk-abh03a:2189_8: adhipatipaccayaṃ ādiṃ katvā ekakādayo dassetuṃ adhipatipaccayā, anantarapaccayā,
atk-abh03a:2189_9: samanantarapaccayā, sahajātapaccayā, aññamaññapaccayāti ettakameva vuttaṃ, taṃ ekamūlakavasena
atk-abh03a:2190_0: 41. Tato paraṃ avigatapaccayaṃ ādiṃ katvā dumūlakameva dassetuṃ – avigatapaccayā
atk-abh03a:2190_1: hetupaccayātiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha avigatahetuduko, avigatārammaṇaduko, avigatādhipatidukoti
atk-abh03a:2190_2: paṭipāṭiyā tayo duke vatvā pariyosāne ca avigatavigataduko eko duko dassito. Tato
atk-abh03a:2190_4: avigatapaccayā hetupaccayā adhipatipaccayā, avigatapaccayā hetupaccayā anantarapaccayā”ti
atk-abh03a:2190_5: evaṃ paṭipāṭiyā tayo tike vatvā “avigatapaccayā hetupaccayā vigatapaccayā”ti pariyosānattiko
atk-abh03a:2190_6: vutto. Tato avigatapaccayavaseneva catumūlakaṃ dassetuṃ “avigatapaccayā hetupaccayā
atk-abh03a:2190_7: ārammaṇapaccayā adhipatipaccayā, avigatapaccayā hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā anantarapaccayā”ti
atk-abh03a:2190_8: dve catukke vatvā “vigatapaccayā”ti padaṃ uddharitvā ṭhapitaṃ, sesaṃ sabbaṃ saṅkhittaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2190_9: Tassa saṅkhittabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “ekekassa padassa ekamūlakaṃ, dumūlakaṃ, timūlakaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2190_10: sabbamūlakaṃ asammuyhantena vitthāretabba”nti vuttaṃ. Tasmā yathā hetupaccayaṃ ādiṃ
atk-abh03a:2190_11: katvā hetuādipadavasena ekamūlake ekādasa pucchāsatāni chasattati ca pucchā…pe… sabbamūlake
atk-abh03a:2190_12: ekūnapaññāsaṃ, evaṃ ārammaṇapaccayādīsupi ekamekaṃ ādiṃ katvā ārammaṇādipadavasena
atk-abh03a:2190_13: ekamekassa padassa ekamūlake ekādasa pucchāsatāni chasattati ca pucchā…pe… sabbamūlake
atk-abh03a:2190_14: ekūnapaññāsāti ekekassa padassa ekamūlakādibhede sattasatādhikāni cuddasa pucchā
atk-abh03a:2190_15: sahassāni honti. Tāsaṃ sabbesupi catuvīsatiyā paccayesu ayaṃ gaṇanaparicchedo –
atk-abh03a:2193: Yathā ca kusalattikassa, evaṃ vedanāttikādīnampīti sabbesupi dvāvīsatiyā tikesu –
atk-abh03a:2197_0: Dukesu pana “siyā hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetudhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā”ti evaṃ
atk-abh03a:2197_1: hetuṃ paṭicca hetu, hetuṃ paṭicca nahetu, hetuṃ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca, nahetuṃ
atk-abh03a:2197_2: paṭicca nahetu, nahetuṃ paṭicca hetu, nahetuṃ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca, hetuñca
atk-abh03a:2197_3: nahetuñca paṭicca hetu, hetuñca nahetuñca paṭicca nahetu, hetuñca nahetuñca paṭicca
atk-abh03a:2197_4: hetu ca nahetu cāti ekamekasmiṃ duke hetupaccayādīsu ekamekasmiṃ paccaye nava pucchā
atk-abh03a:2197_5: honti. Tāsu hetupaccayaṃ ādiṃ katvā ekamūlake dvesatāni soḷasa ca pucchā honti. Tāsu
atk-abh03a:2197_6: hetupaccayasseva aññena asammissā nava pucchā gahetabbā, sesā aṭṭha vārena gahitā.
atk-abh03a:2198_0: Tāsaṃ dukamūlakādīsu tevīsatiyā vāresu ekekaṃ navakaṃ apanetvā yāva sabbamūlakā ayaṃ
atk-abh03a:2198_1: gaṇanaparicchedo – dukamūlake tāva ekamūlake dassitesu dvīsu soḷasādhikesu pucchāsatesu
atk-abh03a:2198_2: nava apanetvā dvesatāni satta ca pucchā honti, tato nava apanetvā timūlake aṭṭhanavutisataṃ.
atk-abh03a:2198_3: Evaṃ purimapurimato nava nava apanetvā catumūlake ekūnanavutisataṃ, pañcamūlake asītisataṃ,
atk-abh03a:2198_4: chamūlake ekasattatisataṃ, sattamūlake dvāsaṭṭhisataṃ, aṭṭhamūlake tepaṇṇāsasataṃ,
atk-abh03a:2198_5: navamūlake catucattālīsasataṃ, dasamūlake pañcatiṃsasataṃ, ekādasamūlake chabbīsasataṃ,
atk-abh03a:2198_6: dvādasamūlake sattarasādhikasataṃ, terasamūlake aṭṭhādhikasataṃ, cuddasamūlake navanavuti,
atk-abh03a:2198_7: pannarasamūlake navuti, soḷasamūlake ekāsīti, sattarasamūlake dvāsattati, aṭṭhārasamūlake
atk-abh03a:2198_8: tesaṭṭhi, ekūnavīsatimūlake catupaññāsaṃ, vīsatimūlake pañcacattālīsaṃ, ekavīsatimūlake
atk-abh03a:2198_9: chattiṃsaṃ, dvāvīsatimūlake sattavīsa, tevīsatimūlake aṭṭhārasa, sabbamūlake navāti.
atk-abh03a:2198_10: Yathā panetāni hetupaccayavasena ekamūlake soḷasādhikāni dve pucchāsatāni…pe… sabbamūlake
atk-abh03a:2198_11: nava, evaṃ ārammaṇapaccayādīsupi ekamekaṃ ādiṃ katvā ārammaṇādipadavasena ekekassa
atk-abh03a:2198_12: padassa ekamūlake soḷasādhikāni dve pucchāsatāni…pe… sabbamūlake navāti ekekassa
atk-abh03a:2198_13: padassa ekamūlakādibhede dve pucchā sahassāni sattasatāni ca pucchā honti. Tāsaṃ
atk-abh03a:2201: Yathā ca hetudukassa, evaṃ sahetukadukādīnampīti sabbasmimpi dukasate –
atk-abh03a:2203: Asīti ca sahassāni, pucchā dukasate vidū.
atk-abh03a:2204: Ayaṃ tāva suddhike tikapaṭṭhāne ceva dukapaṭṭhāne ca pucchānaṃ gaṇanaparicchedo.
atk-abh03a:2205_0: Yaṃ pana tato paraṃ dvāvīsati tike gahetvā dukasate pakkhipitvā dukatikapaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh03a:2205_1: nāma desitaṃ, tattha “siyā hetuṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya
atk-abh03a:2205_2: hetupaccayā”ti evaṃ dvāvīsatiyā tikesu ekekaṃ tikaṃ dukānaṃ satena satena saddhiṃ
atk-abh03a:2205_3: yojetvā dassetabbānaṃ pucchānaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayena sabbesaṃ ekamūlakādīnaṃ vasena
atk-abh03a:2206_0: Yampi tato paraṃ dukasataṃ gahetvā dvāvīsatiyā tikesu pakkhipitvā tikadukapaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh03a:2206_1: nāma desitaṃ, tatthāpi “siyā kusalaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo hetudhammo uppajjeyya
atk-abh03a:2206_2: hetupaccayā”ti evaṃ dukasate ekekaṃ dukaṃ dvāvīsatiyā tikehi saddhiṃ yojetvā dassetabbānaṃ
atk-abh03a:2206_3: pucchānaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayena sabbesaṃ ekamūlakādīnaṃ vasena gahetvā paricchedo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2207_0: Yampi tato paraṃ tike tikesuyeva pakkhipitvā tikatikapaṭṭhānaṃ nāma desitaṃ, tatthāpi
atk-abh03a:2207_1: “siyā kusalaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sukhāya vedanāya
atk-abh03a:2207_2: sampayutto dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā”ti evaṃ dvāvīsatiyā tikesu ekekaṃ tikaṃ
atk-abh03a:2207_3: sesehi ekavīsatiyā tikehi saddhiṃ yojetvā dassetabbānaṃ pucchānaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayena
atk-abh03a:2207_4: sabbesaṃ ekamūlakādīnaṃ vasena gahetvā paricchedo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2208_0: Yampi tato paraṃ duke dukesuyeva pakkhipitvā dukadukapaṭṭhānaṃ nāma desitaṃ, tatthāpi
atk-abh03a:2208_1: “siyā hetuṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā”ti
atk-abh03a:2208_2: evaṃ dukasate ekekaṃ dukaṃ sesehi navanavutiyā dukehi saddhiṃ yojetvā dassetabbānaṃ
atk-abh03a:2208_3: pucchānaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayena sabbesaṃ ekamūlakādīnaṃ vasena gahetvā paricchedo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2208_4: Tathāgatena hi sabbampetaṃ pabhedaṃ dassetvāva devaparisāya dhammo desito, dhammasenāpatissa
atk-abh03a:2208_5: pana tena “ajja idañcidañca desita”nti saṅkhipitvā nayadassanamatteneva desanā akkhātā.
atk-abh03a:2208_6: Therenāpi saṅkhipitvāva vācanāmaggo pavattito, so therena pavattitanayeneva saṅgītikāle saṅgahaṃ āropito.
atk-abh03a:2209_0: Taṃ panassa saṅkhepanayaṃ dassetuṃ tikañca paṭṭhānavaranti ayaṃ gāthā ṭhapitā. Tassattho
atk-abh03a:2209_1: – tikañca paṭṭhānavaranti pavaraṃ tikapaṭṭhānañca. Dukuttamanti uttamaṃ seṭṭhaṃ dukapaṭṭhānañca.
atk-abh03a:2209_3: tikatikapaṭṭhānañca. Dukadukañcāti dukadukapaṭṭhānañca. Cha anulomamhi nayā sugambhīrāti
atk-abh03a:2209_4: ete tikapaṭṭhānādayo suṭṭhu gambhīrā cha nayā anulomamhi veditabbāti. Tattha dve
atk-abh03a:2209_5: anulomāni – dhammānulomañca paccayānulomañca. Tattha “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo
atk-abh03a:2209_6: dhammo”ti evaṃ abhidhammamātikāpadehi saṅgahitānaṃ dhammānaṃ anulomadesanāvasena
atk-abh03a:2209_7: pavattaṃ dhammānulomaṃ nāma. “Hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā”ti evaṃ catuvīsatiyā paccayānaṃ
atk-abh03a:2210_0: Tattha heṭṭhā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tikañca paṭṭhānavaraṃ…pe… cha anulomamhi nayā sugambhīrā”ti
atk-abh03a:2210_1: ayaṃ gāthā dhammānulomaṃ sandhāya vuttā. Idha pana ayaṃ gāthā tasmiṃ dhammānulome
atk-abh03a:2210_2: paccayānulomaṃ sandhāya vuttā. Tasmā “cha anulomamhi nayā sugambhīrā”ti aṭṭhakathāgāthāya
atk-abh03a:2210_3: dhammānulome tikapaṭṭhānādayo cha nayā sugambhīrāti evamattho veditabbo. Imasmiṃ
atk-abh03a:2210_4: panokāse “hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā”ti evaṃ pavatte paccayānulome ete dhammānulome
atk-abh03a:2210_5: tikapaṭṭhānādayo “cha nayā sugambhīrā”ti evamattho veditabbo. Tesu anulome tikapaṭṭhāne
atk-abh03a:2210_6: kusalattikamattasseva vasena ayaṃ imasmiṃ paṭiccavārassa paṇṇattivāre saṅkhipitvā
atk-abh03a:2210_7: pucchāpabhedo dassito. Sesesu pana tikesu sesapaṭṭhānesu ca ekāpi pucchā na dassitā.
atk-abh03a:2210_8: Tato paresu pana sahajātavārādīsu kusalattikassāpi vasena pucchaṃ anuddharitvā labbhamānakavasena
atk-abh03a:2210_9: vissajjanameva dassitaṃ. “Cha anulomamhi nayā sugambhīrā”ti vacanato pana imasmiṃ
atk-abh03a:2210_10: paccayānulome chapi ete paṭṭhānanayā pucchāvasena uddharitvā dassetabbā. Paṭṭhānaṃ
atk-abh03a:2212_0: 42-44. Idāni paccanīyaṃ hoti. Taṃ dassetuṃ siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo
atk-abh03a:2212_1: uppajjeyya na hetupaccayātiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha anulomapucchāhi samappamāṇova pucchāparicchedo.
atk-abh03a:2212_2: Tenevettha “yathā anulome hetupaccayo vitthārito, evaṃ paccanīyepi nahetupaccayo
atk-abh03a:2212_3: vitthāretabbo”ti vatvā puna pariyosāne “yathā anulome ekekassa padassa ekamūlakaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2212_4: dumūlakaṃ, timūlakaṃ, catumūlakaṃ yāva tevīsatimūlakaṃ, evaṃ paccanīyepi vitthāretabba”nti
atk-abh03a:2212_5: vuttaṃ. Tevīsatimūlakanti idañcettha dumūlakaṃyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Pariyosāne pana
atk-abh03a:2212_6: sabbamūlakaṃ catuvīsatimūlakampi hotiyeva. Taṃ sabbaṃ saṅkhittamevāti.
atk-abh03a:2213_0: Tikañca paṭṭhānavaraṃ…pe… cha paccanīyamhi nayā sugambhīrāti etthāpi dve paccanīyāni
atk-abh03a:2213_1: – dhammapaccanīyañca paccayapaccanīyañca. Tattha “kusalā dhammā”ti evaṃ abhidhammamātikāpadehi
atk-abh03a:2213_2: saṅgahitānaṃ dhammānaṃ “na kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca na kusalo dhammo”ti paccanīyadesanāvasena
atk-abh03a:2213_3: pavattaṃ dhammapaccanīyaṃ nāma. “Nahetupaccayā nārammaṇapaccayā”ti evaṃ catuvīsatiyā
atk-abh03a:2213_4: paccayānaṃ paccanīyadesanāvasena pavattaṃ paccayapaccanīyaṃ nāma. Tattha heṭṭhā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
atk-abh03a:2213_5: “tikañca paṭṭhānavaraṃ…pe… cha paccanīyamhi nayā sugambhīrā”ti ayaṃ gāthā dhammapaccanīyaṃ
atk-abh03a:2213_6: sandhāya vuttā. Idha pana ayaṃ gāthā dhammānulomeyeva paccayapaccanīyaṃ sandhāya
atk-abh03a:2213_7: vuttā. Tasmā “cha paccanīyamhi nayā sugambhīrā”ti aṭṭhakathāgāthāya dhammapaccanīye
atk-abh03a:2213_8: tikapaṭṭhānādayo cha nayā sugambhīrāti evamattho veditabbo. Imasmiṃ panokāse na hetupaccayā
atk-abh03a:2213_9: nārammaṇapaccayāti evaṃ pavatte paccayapaccanīye ete dhammānulomeyeva tikapaṭṭhānādayo
atk-abh03a:2214_0: Tesu anulomatikapaṭṭhāneyeva kusalattikamattassa vasena ayaṃ imasmiṃ paṭiccavārassa
atk-abh03a:2214_1: paṇṇattivāre saṅkhipitvā pucchāpabhedo dassito. Sesesu pana tikesu sesapaṭṭhānesu
atk-abh03a:2214_2: ca ekāpi pucchā na dassitā. Tato paresu pana sahajātavārādīsu kusalattikassāpi vasena
atk-abh03a:2214_3: pucchaṃ anuddharitvā labbhamānakavasena vissajjanameva dassitaṃ. “Cha paccanīyamhi
atk-abh03a:2214_4: nayā sugambhīrā”ti vacanato pana imasmiṃ paccayapaccanīye chapi ete paṭṭhānanayā
atk-abh03a:2214_5: pucchāvasena uddharitvā dassetabbā. Paṭṭhānaṃ vaṇṇayantānañhi ācariyānaṃ bhāro esoti.
atk-abh03a:2216_0: 45-48. Idāni anulomapaccanīyaṃ hoti. Taṃ dassetuṃ siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo
atk-abh03a:2216_1: dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā naārammaṇapaccayātiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha “hetupaccayā
atk-abh03a:2216_2: naārammaṇapaccayā…pe… hetupaccayā naavigatapaccayā”ti hetupadassa sesesu tevīsatiyā
atk-abh03a:2216_3: paccayesu ekekena saddhiṃ yojanāvasena hetupadādike ekamūlake tevīsati anulomapaccanīyāni.
atk-abh03a:2216_4: Tesu ekekasmiṃ ekūnapaññāsaṃ katvā sattavīsādhikāni ekādasa pucchāsatāni honti. Dumūlake
atk-abh03a:2216_5: pana hetārammaṇapadānaṃ sesesu dvāvīsatiyā paccayesu ekekena saddhiṃ yojanāvasena
atk-abh03a:2216_6: dvāvīsati anulomapaccanīyānīti evaṃ anulome vuttesu sabbesu ekamūlakādīsu ekekaṃ
atk-abh03a:2216_7: padaṃ parihāpetvā avasesānaṃ vasena pucchāgaṇanā veditabbā. Ekamūlakādīsu cettha
atk-abh03a:2216_8: yā pucchā pāḷiyaṃ āgatā, yā ca na āgatā, tā sabbā heṭṭhā vuttanayānusāreneva veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:2217_0: Tikañca paṭṭhānavaraṃ…pe… cha anulomapaccanīyamhi nayā sugambhīrāti ettha pana heṭṭhā
atk-abh03a:2217_2: Tattha “kusalā dhammā”ti evaṃ abhidhammamātikāpadehi saṅgahitānaṃ dhammānaṃ “kusalaṃ
atk-abh03a:2217_3: dhammaṃ paṭicca na kusalo dhammo”ti anulomapaccanīyadesanāvasena pavattaṃ dhammānulomapaccanīyaṃ
atk-abh03a:2217_4: nāma. “Hetupaccayā naārammaṇapaccayā”ti evaṃ catuvīsatiyā paccayesu labbhamānapadānaṃ
atk-abh03a:2217_5: anulomapaccanīyadesanāvasena pavattaṃ paccayānulomapaccanīyaṃ nāma. Tattha heṭṭhā
atk-abh03a:2217_6: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tikañca paṭṭhānavaraṃ…pe… cha anulomapaccanīyamhi nayā sugambhīrā”ti
atk-abh03a:2217_7: ayaṃ gāthā dhammānulomapaccanīyaṃ sandhāya vuttā. Idha pana ayaṃ gāthā dhammānulomeyeva
atk-abh03a:2217_8: paccayānulomapaccanīyaṃ sandhāya vuttā. Tasmā “cha anulomapaccanīyamhi nayā sugambhīrā”ti
atk-abh03a:2217_9: aṭṭhakathāgāthāya dhammānulomapaccanīye tikapaṭṭhānādayo cha nayā sugambhīrāti evamattho
atk-abh03a:2217_10: veditabbo. Imasmiṃ panokāse hetupaccayā nārammaṇapaccayāti evaṃ pavatte paccayānulomapaccanīye
atk-abh03a:2217_11: ete dhammānulomeyeva tikapaṭṭhānādayo cha nayā sugambhīrāti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2218_0: Tesu anulome tikapaṭṭhāneyeva kusalattikamattassa vasena ayaṃ imasmiṃ paṭiccavārassa
atk-abh03a:2218_1: paṇṇattivāre saṅkhipitvā pucchāpabhedo dassito. Sesesu pana tikesu sesapaṭṭhānesu
atk-abh03a:2218_2: ca ekāpi pucchā na dassitā. Tato paresu pana sahajātavārādīsu kusalattikassāpi vasena
atk-abh03a:2218_3: pucchaṃ anuddharitvā labbhamānakavasena vissajjanameva dassitaṃ. “Cha anulomapaccanīyamhi
atk-abh03a:2218_4: nayā sugambhīrā”ti vacanato pana imasmiṃ paccayānulomapaccanīye chapi ete paṭṭhānanayā
atk-abh03a:2218_5: pucchāvasena uddharitvā dassetabbā. Paṭṭhānaṃ vaṇṇayantānañhi ācariyānaṃ bhāro esoti.
atk-abh03a:2220_0: 49-52. Idāni paccanīyānulomaṃ hoti. Taṃ dassetuṃ siyā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo
atk-abh03a:2220_1: dhammo uppajjeyya nahetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayātiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha anulomapaccanīyapucchāhi
atk-abh03a:2220_2: samappamāṇo eva pucchāparicchedo. Ekamūlakādīsu cettha yā pucchā pāḷiyaṃ āgatā, yā
atk-abh03a:2220_3: ca na āgatā, tā sabbā heṭṭhā vuttanayānusāreneva veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:2221_0: Tikañca paṭṭhānavaraṃ…pe… cha paccanīyānulomamhi nayā sugambhīrāti etthāpi heṭṭhā
atk-abh03a:2221_2: Tattha “kusalā dhammā”ti evaṃ abhidhammamātikāpadehi saṅgahitānaṃ dhammānaṃ “nakusalaṃ
atk-abh03a:2221_3: dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo”ti paccanīyānulomadesanāvasena pavattaṃ dhammapaccanīyānulomaṃ
atk-abh03a:2221_4: nāma. “Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā”ti evaṃ catuvīsatiyā paccayesu labbhamānapadānaṃ
atk-abh03a:2221_6: heṭṭhā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tikañca paṭṭhānavaraṃ…pe… cha paccanīyānulomamhi nayā sugambhīrā”ti
atk-abh03a:2221_7: ayaṃ gāthā dhammapaccanīyānulomaṃ sandhāya vuttā. Idha pana ayaṃ gāthā dhammānulomeyeva
atk-abh03a:2221_8: paccayapaccanīyānulomaṃ sandhāya vuttā. Tasmā “cha paccanīyānulomamhi nayā sugambhīrā”ti
atk-abh03a:2221_9: aṭṭhakathāya dhammapaccanīyānulome tikapaṭṭhānādayo cha nayā sugambhīrāti evamattho
atk-abh03a:2221_10: veditabbo. Imasmiṃ panokāse nahetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayāti evaṃ pavatte paccayapaccanīyānulome
atk-abh03a:2221_11: ete dhammānulomeyeva tikapaṭṭhānādayo cha nayā sugambhīrāti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a:2222_0: Tesu anulomatikapaṭṭhāneyeva kusalattikamattassapi vasena ayaṃ imasmiṃ paṭiccavārassa
atk-abh03a:2222_1: paṇṇattivāre saṅkhipitvā pucchāpabhedo dassito. Sesesu pana tikesu sesapaṭṭhānesu
atk-abh03a:2222_2: ca ekāpi pucchā na dassitā. Tato paresu pana sahajātavārādīsu kusalattikassapi vasena
atk-abh03a:2222_3: pucchaṃ anuddharitvā labbhamānakavasena vissajjanameva dassitaṃ. “Cha paccanīyānulomamhi
atk-abh03a:2222_4: nayā sugambhīrā”ti vacanato pana imasmiṃ paccayapaccanīyānulome chapi ete paṭṭhānanayā
atk-abh03a:2222_5: pucchāvasena uddharitvā dassetabbā. Paṭṭhānaṃ vaṇṇayantānañhi ācariyānaṃ bhāro esoti.
atk-abh03a:2228_0: 53. Idāni yā etā paṇṇattivāre kusalattikaṃ nissāya hetupaccayādivasena ekūnapaññāsaṃ
atk-abh03a:2228_1: ādiṃ katvā nayamattaṃ dassentena aparimāṇā pucchā dassitā. Tattha kusalākusalādīnaṃ
atk-abh03a:2228_2: sahuppattiyā abhāvato yā pucchā “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo dhammo uppajjati
atk-abh03a:2228_3: hetupaccayā”ti evaṃ vissajjanaṃ na labhanti. Tā pahāya yā vissajjanaṃ labhanti, tāyeva
atk-abh03a:2228_4: vissajjetuṃ ayaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayātiādinā
atk-abh03a:2229_0: Tattha siyā – sace imā hetupaccayādivasena ekūnapaññāsaṃ pucchā sabbaso vissajjanaṃ
atk-abh03a:2229_1: na labhanti, atha kasmā dassitā? Nanu yā labhanti, tāyeva dassetabbāti? Āma, dassetabbā
atk-abh03a:2229_2: siyuṃ. Tathā dassiyamānā pana sabbesu tikadukapaṭṭhānādīsu ekekasmiṃ tike, duke,
atk-abh03a:2229_3: dukatike, tikaduke, tikatike, dukaduke ca saṅkhepaṃ akatvā dassetabbāyeva bhaveyyuṃ.
atk-abh03a:2229_4: Kasmā? Yasmā yā kusalattike labhanti, na tāyeva vedanāttikādīsu. Dhammānulomapaccanīye
atk-abh03a:2229_5: ca tikapaṭṭhāne vitakkattikapītittikānaṃ vissajjane sabbāpetā vissajjanaṃ labhanti,
atk-abh03a:2229_6: tasmā ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena ekekasmiṃ tike yattakāhi pucchāhi bhavitabbaṃ sabbā kusalattike
atk-abh03a:2229_7: dassitā. Evaṃ dassitāsu hi yā tattha vissajjanaṃ na labhanti, tā pahāya yā labhanti,
atk-abh03a:2229_8: tā vuccamānā sakkā sukhena vijānitunti sukhena vijānanatthaṃ sabbāpi kusalattike
atk-abh03a:2229_9: dassitā. Yā panettha vissajjanaṃ na labhanti, tā pahāya yā labhanti, tāyeva vissajjitāti veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:2230_0: Tattha kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiccāti catubhūmakakusaladhammesu vedanākkhandhādibhedaṃ
atk-abh03a:2230_1: ekaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca paṭigantvā sahuppattisaṅkhātena sadisabhāvena patvā, tena saddhiṃ
atk-abh03a:2230_2: ekato uppattibhāvaṃ upagantvāti attho. Kusalo dhammoti catubhūmakakusaladhammesuyeva
atk-abh03a:2230_3: saññākkhandhādibhedo eko dhammo. Uppajjatīti uppādato yāva nirodhagamanā uddhaṃ pajjati,
atk-abh03a:2230_4: nibbattatītipi attho. Attānaṃ labhati, uppādādayo tayopi khaṇe pāpuṇātīti vuttaṃ
atk-abh03a:2231_0: Evaṃ “uppajjeyyā”ti pucchāya “uppajjatī”ti vissajjanaṃ vatvā idāni yaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca
atk-abh03a:2231_1: yo dhammo uppajjati, taṃ dhammaṃ khandhavasena dassetuṃ kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a:2231_2: Tattha ekanti vedanādīsu catūsu yaṃkiñci ekaṃ. Tayo khandhāti yo yo paccayabhāvena
atk-abh03a:2231_3: gahito, taṃ taṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā tayo khandhā. Tayo khandheti vedanādīsu yo eko khandho
atk-abh03a:2231_4: uppajjatīti gahito, taṃ ṭhapetvā sese tayo. Dve khandheti vedanāsaññādukādīsu chasu
atk-abh03a:2231_5: dukesu yekeci dve khandhe paṭicca. Dve khandhāti ye ye paccayabhāvena gahitā, te
atk-abh03a:2231_6: te ṭhapetvā avasesā dve khandhā kusalahetunā hetupaccayabhāvaṃ sādhentena uppajjantīti attho.
atk-abh03a:2232_0: Yasmā pana eko khandho ekasseva dvinnaṃyeva vā, dve vā pana ekasseva paccayo nāma
atk-abh03a:2232_1: natthi, tasmā “ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca eko khandho, ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā,
atk-abh03a:2232_2: dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho”ti na vuttaṃ. Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato dhammo
atk-abh03a:2232_3: uppajjatītiādīsupi vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo. Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpanti idaṃ paṭiccatthassa
atk-abh03a:2232_4: sahajātatthattā yaṃ kusalena sahajātañceva hetupaccayañca labhati, taṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2233_0: Vipākābyākataṃ kiriyābyākatanti ettha hetupaccayābhāvato ahetukaṃ, rūpena saddhiṃ
atk-abh03a:2233_1: anuppattito āruppavipākañca na gahetabbaṃ. Paṭisandhikkhaṇeti kaṭattārūpasaṅkhātassa
atk-abh03a:2233_2: abyākatassa abyākataṃ paṭicca uppattidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Vipākābyākatanti tasmiṃ
atk-abh03a:2233_3: khaṇe vijjamānābyākatavasena vuttaṃ. Khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhāti
atk-abh03a:2233_4: idaṃ kaṭattārūpaggahaṇena vatthumhi gahitepi vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhānaṃ uppattidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2234_0: Ekaṃ mahābhūtantiādi rūpābyākataṃ paṭicca rūpābyākatassa uppattidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2234_1: Ekaṃ khandhantiādīsu vuttanayeneva panettha atthayojanā veditabbā. Evaṃ rūpābyākatamhi
atk-abh03a:2234_2: bhūte paṭicca bhūtānaṃ uppattiṃ vatvā idāni bhūte paṭicca upādārūpānaṃ uppattiṃ dassetuṃ
atk-abh03a:2234_3: mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānantiādi vuttaṃ. Evaṃ sante upādārūpanti ettakameva
atk-abh03a:2234_4: vattabbaṃ, itaradvayaṃ kasmā vuttanti? Mahābhūtepi paṭicca uppattidassanatthaṃ. Yañhi
atk-abh03a:2234_5: heṭṭhā “cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpa”nti dassitaṃ, taṃ na kevalaṃ khandheyeva
atk-abh03a:2234_6: ca paṭicca uppajjati, mahābhūtepi pana paṭicca uppajjatīti dassanatthamidaṃ vuttanti
atk-abh03a:2234_7: veditabbaṃ. Tattha cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ pavatteyeva, kaṭattārūpaṃ paṭisandhiyampi. Upādārūpanti
atk-abh03a:2235_0: Kusale khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭiccāti ettha cittasamuṭṭhānāva mahābhūtā gahitā.
atk-abh03a:2235_1: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpanti ettha pana bhūtarūpampi upādārūpampi gahitaṃ. “Ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ
atk-abh03a:2235_2: paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā”tiādinā nayena hi bhūtarūpampi khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca
atk-abh03a:2235_3: uppajjati. Mahābhūte paṭicca upādārūpanti vuttanayena upādārūpampi. Akusalañca abyākatañcāti
atk-abh03a:2235_4: pañhāvissajjanesupi eseva nayo. Evaṃ hetupaccaye nava pucchā vissajjitā. Etāyeva
atk-abh03a:2235_5: hi ettha labbhanti, sesā cattālīsa moghapucchāti na vissajjitā. Iminā upāyena ārammaṇapaccayādīsupi
atk-abh03a:2235_6: pucchāvissajjanānaṃ attho veditabbo. Tattha tattha pana vicāretabbayuttakameva vicārayissāma.
atk-abh03a:2236_0: 54. Ārammaṇapaccaye tāva rūpassa ārammaṇapaccayavasena anuppattito tāsu navasu rūpamissakā
atk-abh03a:2236_1: pahāya tissova pucchā vissajjitā. Teneva ca kāraṇena “vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā”ti
atk-abh03a:2236_2: vatvā “khandhe paṭicca vatthū”ti na vuttaṃ. Na hi taṃ ārammaṇapaccayena uppajjati.
atk-abh03a:2237: 55. Adhipatipaccaye vipākābyākatanti lokuttarameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tenevettha “paṭisandhikkhaṇe”ti na gahitaṃ. Sesaṃ hetupaccayasadisameva.
atk-abh03a:2238: 56. Anantarasamantaresupi rūpaṃ na labbhatīti ārammaṇapaccaye viya tissova pucchā.
atk-abh03a:2239_0: 57. Sahajātapaccaye paṭisandhikkhaṇeti pañcavokāre paṭisandhivasena vuttaṃ. Heṭṭhā
atk-abh03a:2239_1: pana paccayavibhaṅge “okkantikkhaṇe”ti āgataṃ tampi iminā saddhiṃ atthato ekaṃ, byañjanamattameva
atk-abh03a:2239_2: hettha nānanti. Apica “tiṇṇaṃ sannipātā gabbhassa avakkanti hotī”ti vacanato okkantīti
atk-abh03a:2239_3: pañcavokārapaṭisandhiyāvetaṃ nāmaṃ. Paṭisandhīti sabbabhavasādhāraṇaṃ. Idha pana
atk-abh03a:2239_4: “kaṭattā ca rūpa”ntiādivacanato pañcavokārapaṭisandhiyeva adhippetā. Sā hi rūpassapi
atk-abh03a:2239_5: arūpassapi paccayabhāvañceva paccayuppannabhāvañca saṅgaṇhāti, tasmā paripuṇṇavissajjanā
atk-abh03a:2239_6: hotīti gahitā. Bāhiraṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtanti anindriyabaddhesu pathavīpāsāṇādīsu mahābhūtaṃ
atk-abh03a:2239_7: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Paccayavibhaṅgavārasmiñhi cattāro mahābhūtāti ajjhattikañca bāhirañca
atk-abh03a:2239_8: ekato katvā gahitaṃ. Saṅkhepadesanā hi sā. Ayaṃ pana vitthāradesanā, tasmā sabbaṃ
atk-abh03a:2239_9: vibhajitvā dassento “bāhiraṃ ekaṃ mahābhūta”ntiādimāha. Asaññasattānaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ
atk-abh03a:2239_10: paṭiccāti dvisantatisamuṭṭhānabhūtavasena vuttaṃ. Mahābhūte paṭicca kaṭattārūpanti
atk-abh03a:2239_11: idaṃ pana kammasamuṭṭhānavaseneva vuttaṃ. Upādārūpanti utusamuṭṭhānavaseneva.
atk-abh03a:2240: 58. Aññamaññapaccaye khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhāti catunnampi khandhānaṃ ekato vatthunā aññamaññapaccayataṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2241_0: 59. Nissayapaccaye yasmā paṭiccattho nāma sahajātattho, tasmā yā heṭṭhā paccayavibhaṅgavāre
atk-abh03a:2241_1: cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ nissayapaccayatā dassitā, na sā gahitā. Cakkhāyatanādīni hi purejātāni
atk-abh03a:2241_2: hutvā paccayā honti, idha sahajātameva labbhati. Teneva vuttaṃ – “nissayapaccayo
atk-abh03a:2242_0: 60. Upanissayapaccaye rūpassa upanissayapaccayābhāvā tīṇeva vissajjanāni labbhanti,
atk-abh03a:2242_1: tena vuttaṃ “ārammaṇapaccayasadisa”nti. Tattha kiñcāpi na sabbe kusalākusalābyākatā
atk-abh03a:2242_2: ārammaṇūpanissayaṃ labhanti, ye pana labhanti, tesaṃ vasenetaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2243_0: 61. Purejātapaccaye vatthuṃ purejātapaccayāti vatthuṃ paṭicca vatthunā purejātapaccayataṃ
atk-abh03a:2243_1: sādhentena uppajjantīti attho. Vipākābyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhanti ettha yaṃ vipākābyākatassa
atk-abh03a:2243_2: vatthu okkantikkhaṇe sahajātapaccayo hoti, taṃ purejātapaccayabhājaniyattā idha na
atk-abh03a:2243_3: gahetabbaṃ. Yepi kusalādayo āruppe purejātapaccayaṃ na labhanti, tepi purejātapaccayabhājaniyatoyeva
atk-abh03a:2243_4: idha na gahetabbā. Ārammaṇaṃ pana niyamato purejātapaccayabhāvaṃ na labhati. Rūpāyatanādīni
atk-abh03a:2243_5: hi cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃyeva purejātapaccayataṃ sādhenti, manoviññāṇadhātuyā atītānāgatānipi
atk-abh03a:2243_6: ārammaṇaṃ hontiyeva. Tasmā idha na gahitaṃ. Khandhavasena hi ayaṃ desanā, na viññāṇadhātuvasena.
atk-abh03a:2243_7: “Vipākābyākataṃ ekaṃ khandha”nti desanāya ca sabbāpi viññāṇadhātuyo gahitā, na cakkhuviññāṇadhātuādayo evāti.
atk-abh03a:2244_0: Pacchājāto kusalākusalānaṃ paccayo na hoti, abyākatassapi upatthambhakova na janako,
atk-abh03a:2244_1: tasmā “uppajjati pacchājātapaccayā”ti evaṃ vattabbo ekadhammopi natthīti pacchājātapaccayavasena
atk-abh03a:2245: 62. Āsevanapaccaye kāmaṃ sabbā kiriyā āsevanapaccayaṃ na labhanti, labbhamānavasena pana “kiriyābyākata”nti vuttaṃ. Tasmā javanakiriyāvettha gahitāti veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:2246_0: 63. Kammapaccaye kusalākusalesu ekakkhaṇiko kammapaccayo veditabbo, tathā kiriyābyākate.
atk-abh03a:2246_1: Vipākābyākate pana nānākkhaṇikopi, tathā paṭisandhikkhaṇe mahābhūtānaṃ. Cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ
atk-abh03a:2246_2: pana ekakkhaṇiko. Kaṭattārūpānaṃ nānākkhaṇikova tathā asaññasattarūpānaṃ. Kaṭattārūpaṃ
atk-abh03a:2246_3: panettha jīvitindriyaṃ. Sesaṃ na ekantato kammasamuṭṭhānattā upādārūpanti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2247_0: 64. Vipākapaccaye kusalākusalaṃ kiriyañca na labbhatīti abyākatavaseneva vissajjanaṃ
atk-abh03a:2247_2: indriyarūpañca vatthurūpañca. Upādārūpanti tadavasesaṃ tasmiṃ samaye vijjamānakaṃ upādārūpaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2248_0: 65. Āhārapaccaye sabbesampi kusalādīnaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca arūpāhāravasena
atk-abh03a:2248_1: uppatti veditabbā, tathā paṭisandhikkhaṇe mahābhūtānaṃ. Cittasamuṭṭhānanti bhavaṅgādicittasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2248_3: Paccayavibhaṅgavāre āhārapaṭipāṭiyā paṭhamaṃ kabaḷīkāro āhāro dassito, idha pana
atk-abh03a:2248_4: kusalaṃ dhammanti pucchāvasena paṭhamaṃ arūpāhārā dassitāti veditabbā.
atk-abh03a:2249_0: 66. Indriyapaccaye paccayavibhaṅge indriyapaṭipāṭiyā paṭhamaṃ cakkhundriyādīni dassitāni,
atk-abh03a:2249_1: idha pana kusalādipucchāvasena paṭhamaṃ arūpindriyānaṃ paccayatā dassitā. Tattha
atk-abh03a:2249_2: kusalādīsu yathālābhavasena arūpindriyā gahetabbā. Asaññasattānaṃ bhūtarūpesupi jīvitindriyanti.
atk-abh03a:2252_0: 69. Vippayuttapaccaye vatthuṃ vippayuttapaccayāti vatthuṃ paṭicca vippayuttapaccayā,
atk-abh03a:2252_1: vatthunā vippayuttapaccayataṃ sādhentena uppajjantīti attho. Khandhe vippayuttapaccayāti
atk-abh03a:2252_2: khandhe paṭicca vippayuttapaccayā, khandhehi vippayuttapaccayataṃ sādhentehi uppajjatīti
atk-abh03a:2252_3: attho. Khandhā vatthuṃ vippayuttapaccayāti vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā vippayuttapaccayā.
atk-abh03a:2252_4: Vatthunā vippayuttapaccayataṃ sādhentena uppajjantīti attho. Cittasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ
atk-abh03a:2252_5: khandhe vippayuttapaccayāti khandhe paṭicca vippayuttapaccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ
atk-abh03a:2252_6: khandhehi vippayuttapaccayataṃ sādhentehi uppajjatīti attho. Sesavissajjanesupi vatthuṃ
atk-abh03a:2252_7: vippayuttapaccayātiādīsupi vuttanayenevattho veditabbo. Vipākābyākate cettha vatthuggahaṇena
atk-abh03a:2252_8: cakkhādīni saṅgahitabbāni. Ekaṃ mahābhūtantiādi rūpābyākatassa paccayabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ
atk-abh03a:2254_1: sahajātapaccayasadisa”nti vuttaṃ. Ime tevīsati paccayāti saṅkhipitvā dassitānaṃ vasenetaṃ
atk-abh03a:2254_2: vuttaṃ. Vitthāretabbāti yā pucchā vissajjanaṃ labhanti, tāsaṃ vasena vitthāretabbā.
atk-abh03a:2254_3: Ayaṃ hetupaccayaṃ ādiṃ katvā ekamūlake paccayānulome paṭiccavārassa kusalattikavissajjane atthavaṇṇanā.
atk-abh03a:2256_0: 73. Idāni ye ettha hetupaccayādīsu ekekasmiṃ paccaye vissajjanavārā laddhā, te gaṇanavasena
atk-abh03a:2256_1: dassetuṃ hetuyā navātiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha hetuyā navāti hetupaccaye nava pucchāvissajjanavārā
atk-abh03a:2256_2: honti. Seyyathidaṃ – kusalena kusalaṃ, kusalena abyākataṃ, kusalena kusalābyākataṃ;
atk-abh03a:2256_3: akusalena akusalaṃ, akusalena abyākataṃ, akusalena akusalābyākataṃ, abyākatena abyākataṃ,
atk-abh03a:2257_0: Ārammaṇe tīṇīti kusalena kusalaṃ, akusalena akusalaṃ, abyākatena abyākataṃ. Adhipatiyā
atk-abh03a:2257_1: navāti hetuyā vuttasadisāva. Dvādasasu hi paccayesu nava navāti vuttaṃ. Sabbesupi
atk-abh03a:2257_2: pucchāvissajjanāni hetupaccayasadisāneva. Vibhaṅge pana atthi viseso. Dasasu paccayesu
atk-abh03a:2257_3: tīṇi tīṇīti vuttaṃ. Sabbesupi pucchāvissajjanāni ārammaṇasadisāneva. Vibhaṅge pana
atk-abh03a:2257_4: atthi viseso. Aññamaññapaccayasmiñhi abyākatapadassa vissajjane rūpampi labbhati,
atk-abh03a:2257_5: tathā purejātapaccaye. Āsevanapaccaye vipākāni ceva vīthicittāni ca na labbhanti.
atk-abh03a:2257_6: Vipāke ekanti abyākatameva. Evamettha saṅkhepato nava tīṇi ekanti, tividhova vāraparicchedo.
atk-abh03a:2257_7: Vitthārato dvādasa navakā, dasa tikā, ekaṃ ekakanti sabbesupi tevīsatiyā paccayesu
atk-abh03a:2257_8: ekūnacattālīsādhikaṃ vārasataṃ hoti, ekūnacattālīsādhikañca pucchāsataṃ. Ekūnacattālīsādhikaṃ
atk-abh03a:2258_0: 74. Evaṃ hetupaccayādike ekamūlake gaṇanaṃ dassetvā ito paresu dumūlakādīsu vitthāradesanaṃ
atk-abh03a:2258_1: saṅkhipitvā ekamūlake dassitāya desanāya labbhamānagaṇanaññeva ādāya vāraparicchedaṃ
atk-abh03a:2258_2: dassetuṃ dumūlake tāva hetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇītiādimāha. Tatridaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ – bahugaṇanopi
atk-abh03a:2258_3: paccayo abahugaṇanena saddhiṃ yutto tena samānagaṇanova hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “hetupaccayā
atk-abh03a:2258_4: ārammaṇe tīṇī”ti. Hetuārammaṇaduke ārammaṇe vuttāni tīṇeva vissajjanāni labbhantīti
atk-abh03a:2258_5: attho. Samānagaṇano pana samānagaṇanena saddhiṃ yutto aparihīnagaṇanova hoti. Tena
atk-abh03a:2258_6: vuttaṃ “hetupaccayā adhipatiyā navā”ti. Hetādhipatiduke naveva vissajjanāni labbhantīti
atk-abh03a:2258_7: attho. Vipāke ekanti hetuvipākaduke vipāke vuttaṃ ekameva vissajjanaṃ labbhatīti
atk-abh03a:2259_0: 75. Timūlakādīsupi idameva lakkhaṇaṃ. Tenevāha – hetupaccayā ārammaṇapaccayā adhipatiyā
atk-abh03a:2259_1: tīṇīti. Hetārammaṇādhipati tike ārammaṇe vuttāni tīṇeva vissajjanāni labbhantīti
atk-abh03a:2260_0: 76-79. Dvādasamūlake pana vipākapaccayo na labbhati, tasmā āsevanapaccayā kamme tīṇīti
atk-abh03a:2260_1: vatvā vipākaṃ aparāmasitvā āhāre tīṇīti vuttaṃ. Terasamūlakādīsupi eseva nayo. Te
atk-abh03a:2260_2: pana saṅkhipitvā tevīsatimūlakovettha dassito. So duvidho hoti – sāsevano vā savipāko
atk-abh03a:2260_3: vā. Tattha paṭhamaṃ sāsevano dassito, so tīṇeva vissajjanāni labhati. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-abh03a:2260_4: “āsevanapaccayā avigate tīṇī”ti. Savipāko pana āsevanaṃ na labhati, tasmā taṃ pahāya
atk-abh03a:2260_5: vipākavasena gaṇanāya dassanatthaṃ anantarāyeva “hetupaccayā…pe… vipākapaccayā āhāre
atk-abh03a:2260_6: eka”nti ekaṃ nayaṃ dassetvā pacchā tevīsatimūlakova dassito. Etesu pana dvīsu tevīsatimūlakesu
atk-abh03a:2260_7: kiñcāpi ekasmiṃ vipākapaccayo natthi, ekasmiṃ āsevanapaccayo, pacchājātapaccayo pana
atk-abh03a:2260_8: ubhayatthāpi. Ruḷhīsaddena panete tevīsatimūlakātveva veditabbā. Tesu sāsevane āsevanassa
atk-abh03a:2260_9: vasena sabbattha tīṇeva vissajjanāni, savipāke vipākapaccayassa vasena ekamevāti
atk-abh03a:2260_10: ayaṃ hetupaccayaṃ ādiṃ katvā ekamūlakādīsu gaṇanā.
atk-abh03a:2261_0: Yaṃ panetaṃ hetumūlakānantaraṃ “ārammaṇe ṭhitena sabbattha tīṇeva pañhā”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-abh03a:2261_1: taṃ ārammaṇapaccayaṃ ādiṃ katvā ekamūlakepi dumūlakādīsupi sabbattha ārammaṇapade
atk-abh03a:2261_2: ceva ārammaṇena saddhiṃ sesapaccayayojanāsu ca yattha navahi bhavitabbaṃ, tattha
atk-abh03a:2261_3: tayova pañhā hontīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Vipākapade pana vipākapadena saddhiṃ sesapaccayayojanāsu
atk-abh03a:2261_4: ca ekova pañho hotīti. Iti yaṃ heṭṭhā avocumha “bahugaṇanopi paccayo abahugaṇanena
atk-abh03a:2261_5: saddhiṃ yutto tena samānagaṇano hotī”ti, taṃ suvuttameva.
atk-abh03a:2262_0: 80-85. Idāni ye ārammaṇādīnaṃ paccayānaṃ vasena ekamūlakādayo dassetabbā, tesu ekamūlako
atk-abh03a:2262_1: tāva hetuekamūlakeneva sadisoti ekasmimpi paccaye na dassito. Ārammaṇapaccayavasena
atk-abh03a:2262_2: pana dumūlake gaṇanaṃ dassetuṃ ārammaṇapaccayā hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi…pe… avigate
atk-abh03a:2262_3: tīṇīti vuttaṃ. Ettha ca “ārammaṇapaccayā adhipatiyā tīṇi…pe… avigate tīṇī”ti vattabbe
atk-abh03a:2262_4: ye hetupaccayādayo paccayā bahugaṇanā, tesaṃ ūnataragaṇanehi ca samānagaṇanehi ca
atk-abh03a:2262_5: saddhiṃ saṃsandane yā gaṇanā labbhati, taṃ dassetuṃ ārammaṇapaccayassa purimabhāge
atk-abh03a:2262_6: ṭhitampi hetupaccayaṃ pacchimabhāgeva ṭhapetvā “ārammaṇapaccayā hetuyā tīṇī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2262_7: Tenetaṃ āvi karoti – ārammaṇapaccayo yena yena bahutaragaṇanena vā samānagaṇanena
atk-abh03a:2262_8: vā paccayena saddhiṃ dukatikādibhedaṃ gacchati, sabbattha tīṇeva pañhāvissajjanāni
atk-abh03a:2262_9: veditabbāni. Vipākapaccayena pana saddhiṃ saṃsandane ekameva labbhati, taṃ vipākapaccayādikāya
atk-abh03a:2262_10: gaṇanāya āvi bhavissatīti idha na dassitaṃ. Yā cesā dumūlake gaṇanā dassitā, timūlakādīsupi
atk-abh03a:2262_11: esāva gaṇanāti ārammaṇapaccayavasena timūlakādayo na vitthāritā.
atk-abh03a:2263_0: Idāni adhipatipaccayādivasena dumūlakādīsu gaṇanaṃ dassetuṃ adhipatipaccayā hetuyā
atk-abh03a:2263_1: navātiādi vuttaṃ. Tatthāpi vuttanayeneva paccayasanniveso veditabbo. Yathā ca adhipatipaccayā
atk-abh03a:2263_2: hetuyā nava, evaṃ sesesupi hetunā samānagaṇanāsu naveva. Iti yo yo paccayo ādimhi
atk-abh03a:2263_3: tiṭṭhati, tena tena saddhiṃ samānagaṇanānaṃ saṃsandane ādimhi ṭhitassa vasena gaṇanā
atk-abh03a:2263_4: hoti. Tena pana saddhiṃ ūnataragaṇanānaṃ saṃsandane ūnataragaṇanānaṃyeva vasena gaṇanā
atk-abh03a:2263_5: hotīti veditabbo. Yathā ca ārammaṇapaccayavasena evaṃ adhipatipaccayavasenāpi tato
atk-abh03a:2263_6: paresaṃ anantarādīnaṃ vasenāpi timūlakādayo na vitthāritā. Tasmā dumūlake dassitagaṇanāvaseneva
atk-abh03a:2263_7: sabbattha sādhetabbā. Teneva vuttaṃ “ekekaṃ paccayaṃ mūlakaṃ kātuna sajjhāyamaggena gaṇetabbā”ti.
atk-abh03a:2267_0: 86-87. Paccayapaccanīyaṃ pana yasmā kusalapade na labbhati kusaladhammassa hetupaccayena
atk-abh03a:2267_1: vinā anuppattito, tasmā akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiccātiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha nahetupaccayāti
atk-abh03a:2267_2: hetupaccayapaṭikkhepo hetupaccayaṃ vinā aññena paccayena uppajjatīti attho. Vicikicchāsahagato
atk-abh03a:2267_3: uddhaccasahagato mohoti ayañhi sampayuttadhammānañceva cittasamuṭṭhānarūpassa ca
atk-abh03a:2267_4: sayaṃ hetupaccayo hoti, aññassa pana sampayuttahetuno abhāvā na hetupaccayā uppajjatīti
atk-abh03a:2267_5: ṭhapetvā hetupaccayaṃ sesehi attano anurūpapaccayehi uppajjati. Iminā nayena sabbapaccayapaṭikkhepesu
atk-abh03a:2267_6: attho veditabbo. Ahetukaṃ vipākābyākatanti idaṃ rūpasamuṭṭhāpakavaseneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-abh03a:2268_0: 88. Naadhipatipaccaye kāmaṃ adhipatipi attanā saddhiṃ dutiyassa adhipatino abhāvā
atk-abh03a:2268_1: naadhipatipaccayaṃ labhati, yathā pana vicikicchuddhaccasahagato moho ahetuko, na
atk-abh03a:2268_2: tathā adhipatayo eva nirādhipati. Chandādīsu pana aññataraṃ adhipatiṃ akatvā kusalādīnaṃ
atk-abh03a:2268_3: uppattikāle sabbepi kusalādayo nirādhipatino. Tasmā mohaṃ viya visuṃ adhipatimattameva
atk-abh03a:2268_4: anuddharitvā sabbasaṅgāhikavasena esā “ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā”tiādikā
atk-abh03a:2269_0: 89. Nānantaranasamanantaresu nārammaṇe viya rūpameva paccayuppannaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-abh03a:2269_1: “nārammaṇapaccayasadisa”nti. Sahajātapaccayo parihīno. Yathā cesa, tathā nissayaatthiavigatapaccayāpi.
atk-abh03a:2269_2: Kiṃ kāraṇā? Etehi vinā kassaci anuppattito. Sahajātanissayaatthiavigatapaccayepi
atk-abh03a:2269_3: hi paccakkhāya ekopi rūpārūpadhammo nuppajjati, tasmā te parihīnā.
atk-abh03a:2270: 90. Naaññamaññapaccayavibhaṅge paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākate khandhe paṭicca kaṭattārūpanti hadayavatthuvajjaṃ veditabbaṃ.
